045131.content:
Not too long ago, Blake Heart and Raven Flame felt almost as if they were melting in the scorching temperatures of Volatile Valley. But their sweating quickly turned to shivering when the pair reached the bitterly cold expanse of Frostbite Fjord. Blake briefly looked back at the now-distant Mt. Mortem, thinking about returning to the toasty warmth of the volcano...but he had a mission. A mission to cure the love of his life! Following Raven's lead, the high-school mage jumped across glacial platforms to avoid a dip in bone-chilling waters. At the other end of the sub-zero stream was an icy cave - no doubt the location of the Freezy Frosting.

Shaking like heck in the cavern, Blake finally spoke. "H-how long have we been searching for that Freezy Frosting?"

"Only five minutes..." Raven replied, seemingly unfazed by the sudden cold spike.

"Well, it felt like six!"

Soon enough, the duo saw a pedestal where their next ingredient waited. A chalice sat on this pedestal and contained a silver, powdery substance - the Freezy Frosting!

"Leave this one to me!" Raven smiled with confidence, eagerly stepping forward to collect the frosting...

Raven rushed to the base of the frozen stairway, but her hasty attempts to climb said stairway only caused her to slip and slide on the ice repeatedly. After twenty-something attempts, she slumped down in frustration.

“Darn it..!” Raven growled with anger, but that anger was quickly replaced with shock as she saw...Blake, at the staircase’s top, holding the chalice of Freezy Frosting! “How in the world did you get up there so easily?!”

“Easy,” Blake smiled, “I took the escalator!”

...this whole time, there was a nearby escalator to the Freezy Frosting?! Raven’s palm met her face.

“Well done, both of you!” Lord Samedi’s voice echoed again in the cave of ice and snow. “But the real challenge begins now - your final ingredient, the Galvanic Glaze, is east of here, in the most dangerous section of the underworld...the Cyclone of Chaos! No one has ever made it to the eye of this storm...well, good luck!”

Even with the dangers ahead, even with a less-than-likeable ally, Blake knew he needed to keep pressing on. Aria’s life was on the line! The two perpetual rivals exited the ice cavern and headed east, where they could see the cyclone they sought, swirling over distant waters...

051.content:
Even after changing out of his robes, Blake still smelled of smoke. The black marks from earlier magical explosions clung around his fingers, bringing their prints out. There were still a few dark specks across his glasses, too, narrowing his range of vision.

"*Cough*...Another night without results..." He murmured, head pointed to the ground. A small green vial rested in his hand, so loose it nearly dragged across the school's tiled floor. The mage glanced over it, twisting it back and forth. "This muscle-growth liquid... this last one should work, but... class starts soon, and... *zzz*... the last twelve all ended up just... growing my ears... nose..." Failing to hide his tiredness, his soles slid in a slow pattern, while his droning voice slipped and slurred over words.

Other students stepped out of the way. As if a hex or invisible force field surrounded the boy, they avoided his path. Even ambush-ready bullies looked in the other direction. Something foul, more than the lingering musk, had caught on him during the magical experiments. He barely took notice of the reactions around. His eyelids sagged, to say nothing of the rest of his body.

"Nnh... I'll try it right after... Zzz..." He shook his head, black hair floating around, concentrating on moving one foot in front of the other.

Only one person was brave enough to stand in his way. One young woman approached Blake, ignoring the subconscious warning lights and sirens in her head. A girl following her golden heart and logic through that inexplicable fear. Her lemon-tinted shoes shuffled hesitantly, soft eyes looking her friend over.

That person, Aria, finally walked up to her friend. Blake didn't stop walking, his brain still set on auto-drive (and eyes still covered by sleep and soot). So she scooted up, slender fingers interlocked behind her skirt, and asked: "Hey, are you okay?"

By the time his ears registered his crush's voice, and his brain processed the question, the young man had already walked right into her.

"Oh!"

"Ah!"

They both sputtered in surprise almost simultaneously. The teens crashed to the ground together. A snickering crowd stared from the nearby lockers as they got up, making their already-blushing faces even redder.

Aria was the first to rise, dusting her clothes off. Her fingers felt a touch heavier, her head dizzy from the impact... and a little wet. She slowly offered her hand to the dark-haired boy. "Do you need help? I really should've been more careful."

Blake, nearly ready to collapse to the floor, groaned out: "Sorry, sorry, no, you're - you're good... I can... get up..." He pushed himself from the floor, on his knees - then instantly crashed down from fatigue. He shook his head. "Yes. Please."

When their fingers touched, the boy's poor heart lit up for a second. In front of all these people, it was more than embarrassing. He'd get teased for this a lot in the future. But just for a moment, he felt separate from all that. He was in another world at his lover's Midas Touch. Her hand was much larger and warmer than he remembered, and he had to stretch his fingers out to fit around it. In fact, it was getting bigger every second.

He froze. His tired eyes snapped open, a chilling realization rushing over him - like the time Nora put ice cubes into his gym shorts. When he looked at the girl before him, he had to gaze up to make eye contact. And the vial wasn't in his hands. He shivered. "A-Aria... where's that... that thing I was holding?"

She looked to him with curiosity, surprised at having to move her neck down. Her eyes came across a bit of green liquid dripping down her clothes. It ended at her shoes, where the vial lay - empty. She put a hand to her mouth, immediately leaning over to pick it up. "Oh, sorry! Was it something important?"

Blake shivered. He'd intended to use the potion on himself, get beefy - even just for a day - but his last few attempts had all sorts of effects. He still didn't know if this one would work out. Come to think of it, Aria's hold was stronger than any girl he'd met - even the ones giving him swirlies. (Then again, that was his main frame of reference for female contact.)

He lied: "No... nothing big..." His shaking hands reached into his bag, pulling out a backup shirt. "Here... To... to make up for it... It might be a bit large, s-sorry..." Was it just his tiredness, or was the hallway smaller compared to this girl? He didn't dare speak. The crowd edged away more, chattering things he couldn't make out.

"Thank you!"

Having picked up the container - which fit easily between her index and thumb - she took for up the shirt, and held it to her chest. Even with the sleeves spread out, they didn't reach her shoulders. She stood up to get a better sense - hand her brown hair crashed into a ceiling light. "Ow!" She cried out more in surprise than pain. The sound vibrated through the halls, sounding out loudly.

People now began running away, leaving the two in relative privacy. At least, until a few concerned teachers and friends gazed from the hall, a safe distance away. Aria was clearly growing. She had to lie down to even fit in the hallway. Her face had a pained expression across it, glancing left and right in shock.

"Oh... Oh no..." She shut her eyes, but could still feel the lockers brushing against her thighs and arms. Within a few seconds, she flattened them into scrap metal. Her face clenched, and she didn't dare to speak beyond a whisper - or several whimpers that she let out in tiny spurts. "What's happening?"

Blake covered his eyes, too - and found Aria's ground-level chest pressing into him. He jumped away instantly, but found the thing pushing him again. Her clothes had absorbed some of the magical liquid, which the mage was partly thankful for... He wouldn't have been able to forgive himself for publicly revealing her. But at the same time, the formula sunk deep into her skin. And it turned out, this one made one's body grow at an even rate!

He sputtered out: "Uhm... *gulp* That formula, it... It was sorta... important..."

She didn't answer, just holding her hands into fists to endure the process. The walls now cracked and groaned as soft skin and soft fabric made contact with them. Her expanding shape smashed open some windows, and twisted doors. She kept shuddering and shivering even after the process had ended. The schoolgirl was now 50 feet tall. Yellow dominated the hallways.

Blake now lay against her, trembling just as much. He did his best to say reassuring nothings, even though he could barely move his mouth. It looked like anything Aria did would make her smash the school apart. And by now, his secret life as a mage was in jeopardy. But most than that, he'd destroyed his friend's chances for a normal life!

He took a step back, looking up over her. She was struggling to hide her own worry, standing still. She didn't say a word, feeling like even speaking would be destructive.

Their mother had only just left on trip little more than an hour ago, leaving her two children with the house to themselves for the whole week. His already worn patience shattering at the chide, Blake swirled his chair around sharply to look at her. “Because I don't want-”

His voice hitched in his throat at the sight of her and he physically recoiled, sending him and his chair careening backwards till he collided with his bedroom floor. He crawled back in a panic till he couldn’t crawl anymore, his back pressed up against the wall. Now with nowhere else to go, Blake could only look up at what Jade had become and weakly mumble. “J-J-Jade?!”

Jade, now looming over him, looked down at him with a smug smirk and an unnerving glint in her eye. “Cool, huh?” She asked, sweeping a hand over her new form to accentuate it, particularly highlighting her newly acquired curves. “With this…” Her tongue coated her lips in a thin veil of saliva as she eyed up her distraught brother. “The two of us can have so much fun.”

As she reached for her sandwich, Indigo paused, thinking she might have heard something. Looking for the source of the sound, the giantess was surprised to notice a familiar, tiny figure on her desk...

"Blake?!" Indigo interjected.

"Y-yeah...it's me..." Blake replied sheepishly.

"Why are you so small?"

"W-well...I'm a mage. I made a deal with ghosts to shrink myself because...I kinda need help with the upcoming biology exam..."

Indigo was silent for a moment before speaking up again. "So...you were planning to...study MY body?"

"Y-yeah, kinda..." Blake blushed and looked away.

"That's kinda weird...but since you're so tiny anyway, I'll let you explore my insides for today." Indigo lowered her palm onto her desk.

Blake timidly walked onto the giantess's hand and was raised to eye level. "Th-thank you..."

"Now, how would you like to enter me?"

"I...don't understand the question."

"The way I see it, you could enter through ny mouth, my nose, one of my ears..."

Blake thought for a good minute before finally deciding on Indigo's...
053221.title: Explanation and Entry Points

0532211.content:
"I'd like to enter through your...mouth..." Blake had a bit of trouble getting his words out.

Indigo couldn't hold in a cute giggle. "Alright, little man! Be careful in there, OK?"

And with that, the Asian giantess parted her lips and extended her tongue out a bit, revealing to the tiny mage the cavern of her mouth - dark, warm, and moist. Blake slowly and carefully treaded onto the slimy tongue, feeling every little tastebud on its slippery surface. Saliva from the roof of Indigo's mouth dropped down upon the boy, coating him almost completely. As Blake walked closer to the dark abyss ahead of him, Indigo slowly closed her mouth, believing that being too abrupt would scare her shrunken friend.

With puny Blake secured within her mouth, Indigo...

GULP

The same could not be said for his clothes, as they disintegrated in the bubbling pool. This caused Indigo to let up a mild burp up above before finally speaking.

Indigo heard two delicate knocks on the front door. “Oh, uh...I’d better get that...”

The Asian introvert walked very carefully, knowing that going too fast could make her internal passenger motion-sick. She opened the door to see a yellow-clad brunette - Aria, who just happens to be Blake’s crush!

“Oh, hi, Aria!” Indigo greeted.

“Hey, Indy!” Aria smiled back. “Just thought I’d drop by for a bit and study with you...biology is one of my weaker subjects.”

Indigo showed her friend into her bedroom, both girls now preparing with textbooks.

“Oh, have you seen Blake?” Aria suddenly asked. “He wasn’t home when I swung by today.”

“Oh...” Indigo’s cheeks reddened. “About that...he’s kind of...inside me.”

“...what?”

“Hi, Aria!” Blake called out from within Indigo’s belly, but his tiny voice was muffled to the girls.

“Blake?! Is that you?!” Aria interjected.

“Y-yeah...Indigo said it was alright for me to shrink down and explore her insides for study purposes.”

The brunette took a moment to digest this information, before a smile crept onto her lips. “Hey Blake, wanna explore MY innards after you’re out of Indigo?”

Blake was taken aback, but when would he get such a chance again? “S-sure! Um, Indigo...can you burp me back up?”

Conveniently, Indigo had a can of soda on her desk. Grabbing it, she chugged the drink down and waited. Bubbles formed in her stomach, and soon Indigo let out a loud belch, launching Blake out of her mouth and...

053222.content:
Although it would be far safer and less dangerous, Blake felt compelled to go in naturally; To see what food went through with no hesitation. He would be able to see what happens to food first hand, without becoming part of it himself. Quickly he jogged over to Indigo's plate while she was busy looking over her room for something. She steps away from the plate, giving Blake enough time to sneak into the sandwich. This fills Blake with excitement and a little bit of nervousness. He didn't know quite what to expect. He mixes himself in with mustard, tomato, and lettuce and waits for Indigo to return. A short while later and his patience pays off. Indigo walks back into the kitchen then picks up the plate. Though he couldn't really see it, Blake had a sense of Vertigo as he was lifted quickly into the air, something most people don't really pay attention to when they're carrying light stuff.

After a short walk Blake feels the plate lower and clank softly onto a surface. She must have moved back into her room. He peaks out from the sandwich and looks up to see Indigo moving around and looking at her screen. It looks like she's reading... a story or site of some kind...Before Blake can get a clear look, Indigo sits down and reaches for the sandwich and lifts it. Blake snaps back to reality and shuffles a bit back, not wanting to be part of the first bite. Just as he finishes shuffling a set of teeth tear into where Blake had just been. The sandwich pulls back and reveals Indigo's blissfully unaware face as she simply eats her lunch. Blake watches as she chews the bit of food in her mouth, a look of satisfaction coming across her face. Some time passes between the next bite as she reads the site. Then she brings the sandwich back to her face, revealing the inside to Blake.

In a split second Blake sees so much detail. Indigo's tongue, red with bits of mashed bread. Her perfect teeth stained from bits of lettuce and specks of tomato. Deeper into her mouth are her molars, uvula and her throat itself. Her molars are just like the rest of her teeth, left with traces of pulverized food.He sees the uvula in the back darker red and very plush looking. and just beyond and under that is her throat.. the entry point to her body's digestive system. As soon as he finishes analyzing the scenery, Indigo snaps her teeth into sandwich behind Blake and brings him inside her mouth. Immediately Blake slips out before she can move him to her teeth and just in time too as Indigo begins to chew. Blake watches first hand how a person eats their food. While a bit gross, it was still fascinating. Blake watched around him as the sandwich he had hid himself in became nothing more than mush that collected on Indigo's tongue.

Soon after enough of the sandwich was chewed the wad of mush was moved by Indigo's colossal tongue. Blake was swept into the mess as well, accidentally taking a small mouthful of the food as well. While he spit most of it out some of it he accidentally swallowed, blushing brightly. He tried to wiggle out but found he was stuck and could not move. Indigo let out soft sigh that let Blake catch a glimpse of the outside world, a view that he most likely wouldn't see for a while. Then Indigo swallows Blake, along with the mass, down into her. Peristalsis takes ahold of the wad and pulls and compresses it downward towards Indigo's gut. Indigo's warm flesh rubbed and brushed against Blake on his descent and caused the mage to blush some more.

On his way down he could actually hear the deep breaths of Indigo, taking in oxygen and dispersing it through her body and into her thunderous heart which he also passed as well. The loud thumping nearly deafening Blake as he slipped deeper into his unaware friend.

Soon his journey was brought to a halt as the wad bumped onto something... then oozed into what could only be, the stomach. The fall, saliva as well as peristalsis helped ease and break down the food around Blake and helped him slip out of the masticated food. It was dark as one would expect the inside of the human body to be, but Blake could still faintly see the red walls and the lake of digestive fluids already starting to break down the first bite of food. Saliva and mucus lined to stomach walls making everything look and feel very wet, slippery, and squishy. Blake took a few steps and found the "floor" had a lot of give but still had an underlining of muscle that supported him. Deep above him he could hear a giggle.followed by a gentle whirring from outside... Indigo had lightly felt him moving around and his actions tickled her, confused she simply thought it was a trick of the mind and she resigned to just rub her belly to soothe herself. Blake looks around the cavern and wonders just what to do now.

The spirit looked at Blake with a serious gaze. "Look, I'm sure Claire will be fine helping you. All you got to do is ask her and tell the truth." They said. At Blake's continued disbelief, they said, "It'll be fine. She won't get mad at you. Just tell her the truth about you." A few seconds passed by before Claire called out, "Blake? Are you awake? I'm home!"

Blake finally sighed and got up. "If this goes south, I'm blaming you for your advice." He said to the spirit, who only nodded in agreement. Blake slowly went out of his room and down the stairs to the living room, where his mother was sitting on the couch. Claire perked up from watching the news and smiled. "Hey kiddo. How was school?" She asked. Blake nodded in response, "Good. Um... Can I ask you something?"

Claire nodded and muted the television. "Okay. Go ahead." She said. Blake bit his lip. "Before I ask you, I need to tell you something." He said, causing Claire to tilt her head. "Did you get a girlfriend, Blake?" She teased, smirking. Blake blushed heavily and waved his hands. "No! At least...not yet..." He said. Claire laughed, "Relax, hun. I'm just teasing you. So what is that you want to tell me?"

Blake clenched his fists and took a deep breath, before sighing. "I...have a talent for mystic arts and...might be a mage." No turning back now. He said it. Claire smiled went to hug her son. "Easy, Blake. I'm mad. I'm actually proud that you came out with the truth." She said reassuringly. Blake sighed in much-needed relief before hugging back.

The two then pulled back and sat on the couch. "So, about that question?" She said. Blake nodded and explained, "So, I have a biology project and test really soon and I need help studying for it." Claire could hear a bit of worry in her son's voice. "I assume that you forgot to study?" She asked, which Blake hesitantly nodded to.

Claire sighed with a smirk, "Let me guess. You were too busy daydreaming about Aria again." "Maybe..." Blake said with a blush. Claire chuckled and pat Blake on the back. "Calm down. It's fine. I'll help you." She said, causing Blake to smile. "Yes! Thank you!" He nearly shouted. Claire covered her ears. "You're welcome. Just try to not to shout next time."

Luck was apparently on the teenager's side once again. Now all he needed to do was shrink. Though a problem was that Claire would probably freak out if Blake started shrinking if she didn't know why. However, it's possible that she'd assume that it was to help Blake study.

What should Blake do?

05333112.content:
Blake slowly walked into the living room, where his mother was watching television to relax after a long day at work. “Blake is a mage!” the spirit exclaimed, causing the various pictures on the wall and furniture to levitate. Claire turned around, gasping. “Blake, what’s going on?” Claire asked. The various small objects went back to their original positions.

“Mom, can I ask you for help with something important?” Blake said.

To Blake's deep embarrassment, the part of the biology exam that he was having the most trouble with dealt with the female reproductive system. Having no experience with the opposite sex certainly didn't help matters.

“Would it be okay if I explored your reproductive system?” Blake asked. He could feel his face turn bright red. The spirit let out a surprised cough. “I mean, only if you're okay with it!”

“So you want to go back to where you began, huh?” Claire said with a chuckle. To Blake's immense relief, his mother didn't seem too upset. Her reddening cheeks showed that she was probably just as embarrassed as her son.

“It's just, all the tubes and things are really confusing, and to be honest, I probably spent too much time daydreaming in class,” Blake said, nervously twiddling his thumbs. With a smile, Claire moved closer and planted a kiss on her son's forehead.

“It's fine. You know I'd do anything to help my little man,” Claire said, rubbing Blake's shoulder. “Speaking of little, how exactly are you going to make yourself small enough for this?”

“I have a shrinking spell, but I have to get some stuff ready first,” Blake said. “Can you meet me in your bedroom in ten minutes? I'll be on your dresser.”

“Oh, I can't wait,” Claire said, with a sly smile. She turned her attention back to the television as Blake hurried up the stairs to his room. He could feel his heart racing as he closed his bedroom door. He was really going to explore the human body!

“So, what exactly are you going to bring on this little expedition?” the spirit asked, as Blake grabbed his backpack.

“Well, I figure I'll be doing a lot of spelunking, so I'll conjure up some rope and a grappling hook. Oh, and a high-powered headlamp, too,” Blake said, as he created a magic circle on the floor. The items magically materialized, and Blake stuffed the rope and hook into the backpack, and fastened the LED headlamp into his forehead.

“Hey, don't you have to pay for that?” the spirit asked.

“It's fine. I'll send them back to the Netherworld when I'm done,” Blake said. He left his room and walked across the hall to his mother's bedroom. He opened the door and stepped onto the plush carpet. He spotted the perfectly-made bed and the ornate wooden dresser across the room. Stepping in front of the dresser, Blake ordered the spirit to shrink him to half an inch.

“Here? Are you sure? Your mom might step on you!” the spirit said.

“Don't worry. I have a little surprise in store.”

“Well, here goes nothing,” the spirit said. A magic circle appeared at Blake's feet, and he felt a rush of magical energy flow into his body. In a flash so bright it hurt his eyes, Blake suddenly found himself among a forest of carpet fibers. Each thick strand was as tall as himself. He uncoiled the rope and hook from his backpack.

“Err… not to burst your bubble or anything, but that rope ain't long enough to reach all the way up there,” the spirit said. Certainly, the top of the dresser loomed far above Blake's head. Undaunted, he began to twirl the grappling hook above his head.

“If this was an ordinary rope, then you'd be right. But this is no ordinary rope! Observe!” Blake said, releasing the rope. Magically, the hook shot straight up, making contact with the plateau of the dresser far above their heads. The rope grew in length as well, and all Blake had to do was hold on and he flew up the sheer surface of the wooden dresser. In no time at all, he was in top of the wooden surface, looking at his tiny reflection in the gargantuan mirror.

“Well, I'll be damned. But I guess I already am,” the spirit said. Blake gathered up the rope, which magically shrunk to a much more manageable size. He put it back in his backpack and looked around at his surroundings. A nearby tube of lipstick towered over him, and it looked like he was small enough to comfortably fit on the tip. Blake's attention turned toward the door as he heard his mother's footsteps come down the hallway. He gasped in awe as she strode through the doorway. Even from across the room, Claire looked like a towering monument of femininity. “Blake? Are you in here?” Claire asked, looking around the room with a confused expression.

“I'm over here, Mom!” Blake said using his magic to amplify his voice. Claire walked over to the dresser, obviously confused. “I can hear you, but where are you?” Claire said. She stepped in front of the dresser, causing Blake to crane his head all the way up just to glimpse his mother's face. If Claire's distant visage was shrouded by clouds like a majestic, fog-covered mountaintop, then Blake wouldn't be the least bit surprised. Her crotch was directly in front of him, and the tiny boy found himself growing excited at the prospect of spelunking in his mother's sacred cave.

“I'm down here!” Blake said, blinking his headlamp on and off to catch his mother's eye. Claire bent down to investigate the flashing light, and gasped as she recognized her tiny son. “Blake, is that really you? You're so tiny!” Claire said, perplexed. “I guess this wasn't all some kind of prank, after all!”

“Nope, it's all magic,” Blake said. “So, uh, how exactly do you want to do this?”

“Oh, right! I guess I'll have to get undressed, won't I?” Claire said with a giggle, as she started to blush. Blake turned away to give his mother some privacy.

‘It's okay to look, Blakey. Consider it a review for your exam. Plus, I know boys your age can't look away from a beautiful woman!” Claire said with a wink.

“Damn! You're a lucky kid,” the spirit said. “Well, the other kids at school are always teasing me about how pretty they think my mom is,” Blake whispered to the spirit.

Claire walked toward the bed and unbuckled her belt, then unzipped her skirt and let it fall to the floor. Next, she unbuttoned her dress shirt and took it off, leaving her in just her underwear and pantyhose. Blake marvelled at the tautness of his mother's abdomen. Claire had often used the gym at her workplace, and the results were on full display. She pulled her pantyhose down her long, lean legs. Her bare toes sank into the carpet as she stepped out of her tights. Reaching behind her back, she unclasped her bra, letting her large breasts hang free. Finally, she took off her panties, and Blake's eyes were immediately drawn to the spot between her legs that he longed to explore.

0541122.content:
Blake's mouth stayed shut, even at his mother's probing. Her gaze was inescapable, looming over him, green eyes piercing into his soul. He found it hard to speak even if he wanted to. It made him want to shrink into an invisible little dot on the folds of her palm. Even at his current size, the plain white walls of the Jengain office towered around him.

"No answer?" Claire massaged her temples, underneath her dark bangs. "Hmph, this is too much. Can't we work together on this?" Her breath blew out with that same smell - still foul. It turns out chewing on his body wasn't a very good freshener. Before he realized what he was doing, he lifted a hand to cover his nose. Her eyelids narrowed with repressed anger. Still, the shrunken teen didn't dare speak.

She spoke again, nearly blowing her son offhand: "Please. You're a nice boy. Don't make this hard."

He shook his head, looking down with regret. Revealing his intentions would ruin chances of his future allowance raises. And revealing his magic skills - well, that'd ruin chances of his future, period. "Really, mom, I - I don't know..."

Her hair flew a little as her head shook. "But I know when you're hiding something. Even when your eyes are this small, I can still see right into them." Every time her mouth opened, he could see the full, horrifying details of the landscape he'd just escaped. The little drips of saliva from the edge of her uvula made him shiver as they caught the dim ceiling light.

"I can't say!" The mage paced backwards, trying to get away from the all-encompassing face before him. From his tiny perspective, he could make out a few blemishes and wrinkles that she'd hidden under thin makeup. A steep incline behind him halted his reverse voyage. Claire was curling her fingers up, forming a ramp, then a wall, then a shell around him as they fell more.

And her wrist- it didn't stop turning upwards. He could see the rug pattern below. What was she doing? At this rate, Blake was starting to slide, and would soon end up dropping into her mouth...

The office worker still kept a hand to her forehead, as if attempting to hold back a migraine's throbbing. "We're already late. Honey, if you feel like telling me later this night, go ahead." Her breath blew against his wet clothes, but wasn't enough to counter the force of gravity. The smell from the warm air was still fairly foul. "But there was a reason I needed that breath mint. I didn't have time to brush my teeth. If you won't speak to me like a person, then you could at least help clean them."

Blake gulped, and instantly regretted it. Her face opened, like ancient doors to a forbidden realm; and in a second, he'd fall in. She wasn't smiling, or frowning; in fact, he'd never seen his mother so neutral.

"Mooom, don't!"

*GULP*

In an instant, he fell back into the familiar darkness. Now, her jaw was held deathly still. Saliva pooled up at his ankles; the boy instinctively lifted one tiny shoe in disgust. He couldn't see a place he could put it down without landing in Claire's warm fluids once more. In fact, he could barely see anything, beyond a thin outline. To the left and the right, only vague, wet shimmers.

Under his breath, Blake chanted a spell. Dim light glowed from his hands, illuminating the area inside the monolithic mouth. He almost regretted that; with the brightness only covering the bottom half, it gave the area ominous shadows. Like when he'd put a flashlight under his chin to tell horror stories to Jade... The light flickered against the row of her firm, eggshell teeth, on and off. His magic couldn't keep going forever.

Something caught his eye - and his nose. A brown chunk of something, with hints of leaf-like green. Yes, there was a bit of leftover lunch caught between her front teeth at the bottom; and it disgusted him how easily he could distinguish it. Club sandwich. Mayonnaise-heavy. He swallowed his pride - and his fear - and stepped towards it.

Even his gentle footsteps made her tongue flex slightly in discomfort. He lost his footing once before getting to the end. "M-mom... I can't believe this..." Whether she heard him or not, she couldn't answer in a public place. Only a simple hum rang through his head and limbs, shaking through the cavern of thick saliva and pink muscle.

He grabbed the crumbs and lettuce sediments, tugging forward. No movement. With another hard pull, he only managed to dislodge some of it, breaking the food chunk in half. The rest remained stuck hard between the ivory towers of enamel. If only something could lubricate it...

Holding his breath, he reached below. His hands cupped, Blake quickly grabbed some of his mother's salty spit. Its pale, bubbly surface glowed a warm yellow from his illumination spell. In a rush, he spilled it over the lunchtime remains. Even after it splashed across the surface, he still felt the saliva clinging between his fingers; the sensation made him want to throw up. Especially when he realized that was only ONE tooth; many more formed an impenetrable wall, keeping him enclosed.

Sitting back, he groaned. "At least I'm not alone tonight." Shaking below made even this seated position uncomfortable; he quickly set back to cleaning Claire's teeth.

Outside, Claire was walking down the halls of her building. Her legs moved gently, but quickly. Keeping her body language was more important with clients than coworkers. And even more crucial was keeping her son in check - whether that meant punishing him, or ensuring he wouldn't fall down her throat. Her eyes hit target after target, each turn and door a checkpoint where she'd flex her tongue gently to make sure Blake was still there. At the elevator, she felt him gripping hard on the muscle, trying to stay in place. She might have tossed a reassuring word to him if there weren't other people there with her. Instead, she maintained a natural smile. It wasn't too hard for her. Brightness was part of her personal brand.

Having scraped out only the third crumb from his mother's teeth, Blake was already about to collapse. The office lady's liquids soaked him, from casual clothing to brown hair. It dripped from his glasses to his feet, and there wasn't a single dry surface to wipe them on. His arms felt ready to drop to the ground, too. He panted desperately for air; but each inhale only brought more of that murky, foul breath into his lungs.

Still, the dangers of admitting his whole past to his mother... How he'd gotten his magical book... The things he did behind her back... The ways he'd covered it up from her... It wouldn't work. She could spill it that to the entire world. Even if it just stayed their secret, she'd never trust him with anything again. She had to stay in the dark about that.

His magic light giving out, it seemed he'd be in the dark pretty soon, too. Things were getting desperate. Without thinking, he whispered another spell:

"Misty mountains' rivers, oceans' ebb and flow - cast yourselves into my hands, and let my power grow!"

With this, cold water erupted from his hands in a torrent. He struggled to control its currents, legs buckling on the squishy tongue against the force. Gritting his teeth, and keeping his arms pointed out to the white walls, he hosed them over slowly, washing away nearly imperceptible bits of dirt and food that added to the odor.

Unable to hold himself, he fell over - and more of the water splashed across the roof of her mouth, before raining down upon him. Still not knowing how to conjure liquid, his spell only took whatever fluids it could find nearby. In this case, Claire's saliva came to his hands. And now, it crashed down on his unprepared face like a waterfall...

The food on the office tables was salivating. Almost alarmingly so - the businesswoman didn't remember drooling this much since her mother still cooked for her. She licked her lips. Suddenly, when they retreated, she felt a squirming against the plush surface.

Mixed emotions filled Blake. On one hand, the torrent on his face ended. He'd escaped the deluge and musty air, and could see natural light. Only, he could also see the floor a precarious distance down, only a slide off his mother's lips. And anyone looking forward could probably see him. He grabbed hard, as the pink behemoth cast its shadow over him once again...

Claire effortlessly slurped her son back in upon realizing her mistake. She gave polite nods to everyone around, and spoke in monosyllabic greetings and responses that didn't use too many mouth movements - "Hi", "Hello", "Oh", "I see". Each time, she covered her mouth, as if laughing at some in-joke. Really, she'd have liked to add more in - but she also needed to make sure Blake learned to be respectful and honest with her. After all, she acted the same towards him.

Still, those appetizers looked very enticing. Juicy fruits and vegetables. Crunchy, though... A friend seemed to take notice, of her curious gazes.

"Try the celery. It's from my garden!" The woman smiled.

Claire shrugged "Not hungry..." She spoke without moving her teeth.

"Oh, you're worrying about a diet, aren't you? They're perfectly healthy!"

Her hands twitched - first in offense at that statement, then in fear. She suddenly recognized this woman: a manager of another Jengain branch. And with the company's budget cuts coming up... If she offended this manager somehow, vegetables wouldn't be the only thing on the chopping block. For the first time that night, Blake's mother felt very small.

She decided to...

The tiny mage had to hold on for dear life when Rachel tilted her head back to take a sip of wine. The entire earring began to sway back and forth like a pendulum, causing rushing air currents to swirl around his body. He watched as gallons of pink wine rushed past the woman's lips, listening with awe to the sound of her swallowing the river of alcohol down the waterfall of her throat, flowing deep into her body. When she put the wine glass down, Blake had to wait until both the earring and his stomach ceased their undulations before continuing his climb.

Finally, Blake reached Rachel's earlobe, where a hook the size of a boat anchor was threaded through a hole in the skin. Blake climbed up the hook until the could grab onto the warm skin. He moved past the piercing until he pulled himself up onto the shelf of Rachel's ear. The ear was as delicately whorled as as a seashell. A small cave surrounded by fine hairs marked the entrance to her inner ear canal. Blake could shrink himself down further, and go spelunking in that cave. Indeed, the mysteries that he could discover that lay hidden within this woman's head beckoned to him. A whole new adventure awaited him inside that cave. Or, he could continue his exploration of Rachel's face. Perhaps he could clamber over to the corner of her mouth, in hopes that he could be gathered up by her tongue as if he was a stray crumb, to allow him to explore the cavern of her mouth. He could also climb higher and run through the field of golden blonde hair at the top of her head, and maybe play on her nose like a slide.
0542212112.title: Can you ear me now?

choices: Teach Rachel a lesson! Assault her body with clones until for begs for mercy!
Shrink Claire and Amy and have some size-changing fun.
05422121121.content:
Blake was always fascinated by the inner workings of the human body. In particular, the tiny bones of the inner ear looked as if they were crafted by an expert artisan in a miniature workshop. The tiny mage cast a spell to make him even tinier, until he could walk into the ear canal without even having to duck his head. Brushing aside the small hairs guarding the entrance to the ear, Blake couldn't help but grin as he made his way into the ever-darker cave. He cast another spell to let him see in the dark, which illuminated the puddles of wax littering the ground. Blake heard a squishing sound as his foot landed right in a glob of yellow wax, and he nearly lost his sneaker pulling his foot free. Rachel's inner guardians would have to try harder than that to keep this intrepid explorer out! He knew that if he lost his shoe, the little hairs would eventually carry it to the cliff edge of Rachel's throat, where the sneaker would be unceremoniously dumped over the edge to be dissolved in the woman's stomach.

The temperature increased as Blake walked deeper into the organic tunnel. The hairs and wax soon gave way to smooth walls, and Blake ran his hand across the warm flesh. He finally came to a roadblock, in the form of a fleshy membrane that spanned from floor to ceiling and from wall to wall. Blake could hear the sounds of the party, and could even pick out his mother's voice. The vibrations of the membrane told him that he had arrived at the eardrum. Placing his hand up against the organic wall, he could feel the vibrations pulse through his fingertips. He tapped out a beat on the eardrum with his fists, curious as to whether or not it would be translated into sound in Rachel's brain.

Not wanting to hurt his host, he cast a spell allowing him to phase through matter, and stepped through the eardrum. On the other side, he found himself surrounded by the intricate machinery of the inner ear. Bones in the shape of a hammer and anvil moved in tune with the eardrum. Overhead, a system of tubes curled around each other like a sleeping octopus. A spiral-shaped structure dominated the rear of the area. Curious, Blake climbed atop one of the tubes and gave it a good squeeze. He could feel the fluid slosh around under his fingers. He shook the tube around like a garden hose, then his world took a tumble. Suddenly airborne, the tiny mage flew into the bony hammer, which whacked him in the back and sent him sailing until he crash-landed onto the fleshy spiral. Picking himself up, he adjusted his glasses.

"Rachel, are you alright?" Blake heard his mother ask. "You look dizzy."

"I'm fine, really," Rachel said. "I must've had too much to drink." Blake could hear Rachel's voice reverberate through her skull, formed by her tongue and lips to reach the ears of her tiny passenger. Well then, that tube must've controlled Rachel's sense of balance. Blake was certainly learning a lot during his little adventure inside the human body.

Blake walked to the end of the fleshy spiral. He saw what looked like a wire plugged into the end of the spiral that crackled with electricity. As soon as his fingertips touched the wire, he could hear every sound of the party as if he heard it with his own ears. He knew at once that he was holding Rachel's auditory nerve, which had a direct link to her brain. The control center of the human body would be the ultimate destination for the tiny explorer, and this nerve would give him easy access to her brain. Otherwise, Blake would have to find a way to get through the fortress of the skull and past the pesky blood-brain barrier. He casted a spell that turned his body into pure electricity, and he zoomed through the highway of the neural pathway.

Popping back into a physical form, Blake found himself surrounded by grey, spongy flesh that crackled with electricity in the darkness. Red and blue veins criss-crossed the flesh, supplying necessary nutrition to the hungry organ. Immersed in a thick, viscous fluid, Blake was able to swim around like an underwater diver. He knew that the auditory region of the brain was located deep in the center of the organ. By brushing his fingertips against the flesh, Blake received snippets of the sounds of the party. A little to the left, and he got a taste of the wine Rachel drank. To his right, he was able to smell the perfume his mother was wearing.

He was curious to confirm his suspicions of Rachel being a spy, so he swam around the brain, touching various parts to see what they controlled until he found himself at Rachel's memory banks. Like a movie playing in his mind, he watched through Rachel's eyes as her memories were replayed. He saw her accept a job to spy on Jengain, then watched as she stole some classified documents from Dr. Kobayashi's computer. That seals it, Rachel's definitely a spy. He fast-forwarded to just a few minutes ago, when he was climbing Rachel's body. She felt him climb, and she even got sexually aroused at the thought that a tiny intruder was exploring her body. Blake realized that this might be the first time he's ever gotten a woman aroused. Blake saw that Rachel was impressed by Blake's ingenuity at overcoming the obstacles she threw at him, as he continued to find new routes to continue his climb. She figured that a counter-spy had used the shrinking technology that she was trying to steal to spy on her. Rachel was a little disappointed, though, that Blake didn't give in to temptation and dive into her panties, even after she gave him a sneak peek. His tiny body exploring her most sacred area would've helped alleviate the burning sensation she felt between her thighs. She thought he was quite bold to cop a feel of her breast on his way to her shoulder. She felt a moment of panic, however, when she felt a tickle in her ear, followed by a dizzy spell. Little did she know that her tiny intruder had found his way to her brain, and that her mind was an open book to the mage.

Blake wondered if he could take control of Rachel's body. Firing lightning from his fingertips, he took control of all of the areas of the brain, which lit up like a Christmas tree. He then saw his mother, and realized that he was looking through Rachel's eyes. Testing to see how much control he had, he tried to make his host talk.

"Claire, I'm going to run to the bathroom, okay?" Blake said, as Rachel. Her voice was sexy and feminine, quite unlike Blake's awkward voice, which always cracked at the most annoying times.

"Sure. I'll go get us some more drinks," Claire said. She had no idea that she was really talking to her son. Blake got up off the couch, wobbling a bit when he stood. High heels sure are annoying, he thought. Even without heels on, Rachel was quite a bit taller than the mage at normal size, and it was a little strange to control a body that had such longer arms and legs. He moved through the party, with no one the wiser. Blake was a little grossed out at all the guys that were smiling at him, until he remembered that his host was pretty hot. When he got to the bathroom, Blake was glad that it seemed to be empty. He looked at himself in the mirror, still shocked to see Rachel's face staring back at him. He leaned in towards the mirror and opened Rachel's mouth wide, looking at her perfect teeth. He stuck her tongue out a few times, then swallowed and watched her uvula bounce around. He then grabbed Rachel's boobs, feeling their full-size softness. After making sure he really was alone, he lifted up Rachel's dress and stuck a finger inside her panties. He felt an electric shock of arousal as he touched her cleft. Man, Blake thought, climbing this woman really turned her on! Blake wondered if he could use his magic while in this body. He pointed a slender finger at a garbage can, and chanted a shrinking spell. To his surprise, the garbage can began to diminish in size until it was the size of a soda can. Grinning, he raised Rachel's foot and stomped on the can, feeling it crush under her toes. When he lifted the sandal, the can was a ball of scrap metal. He felt a rush of excitement, but wasn't sure how much of it came from his own mind, and how much of it came from the mind of his host. Either way, Blake was brimming with excitement.

His mind racing with ideas, Blake returned to the party. His mom still wasn't back yet, and Amy had fallen asleep on the couch. He searched Rachel's mind, and saw where she parked her car. He even downloaded the information on how to drive, since the tiny mage wasn't old enough to get a permit. Blake could bring Rachel back to her apartment and sexually torture her until she begs for release, as punishment for spying on his mom's company. He could project some clones outside her body, to arouse her in many different ways. Or, he could shrink Claire and Amy, and take them back to Rachel's apartment where Blake could play with them using his borrowed body.
05422121121.title: Blake, now in the driver's seat

choices: Amy was now back at home.
Amy was at a nearby bar, still with Claire.
05422122.content:
Blake decides to climb up Dr. Amy Kobayashi’s boots, considering how much he wanted to get to know her, as well as have some shrunken fun with the beautiful and mature woman. And given his other option, besides going back to Claire, which would be choosing the possible spy; approaching Amy might be the wiser choice.

And going back to Claire would be like giving up, so Blake can't retreat to the (relative) safety of her toes without trying first! Even though he was always too nervous to speak with her in the past, now that he's improved as a mage, he was feeling a bit more confident.

As he walked a bit closer to Amy, Blake's confidence was shattered when she suddenly tapped her foot, just barely missing Blake's tiny body by a few inches. While he slowly got back up, he hears her laugh while saying “This really is a nice party! It's great that Jengain can give us some extra bonuses now and then…”

In response to that, Claire sighs and says “I always enjoy the office parties, but they can get a bit stressful for me at times.”

Amy nods and says “You do need to do a lot more schmoozing than I do, so I don't envy you at all!”

As Amy and Claire continued to chat, Blake takes another look up towards Amy. Her boots looked spectacularly tall and mighty, but there seemed to be plenty of buckles and things to grab onto, which could shape for an easier climb. That would only be the start of his journey, but he'd feel better knowing he was making progress, especially since her tights would be equally manageable to climb.

And thanks to Blake's invulnerability, he didn't have to worry about much, since even if she stepped on him, it'd only delay him. So he runs up to her boot and starts his long climb, not wanting to give her a chance to unintentionally stomp him flat first.

The first thing he noticed as he climbed was a powerful scent, which smelled heavily of roses, making him wonder if this was from her perfume. While he was sure that it wouldn't be this overpowering normally, since he was so small right now, Blake truly enjoyed the aroma. And as he climbed up, it only reminded him of his crush on Amy, making him hope even more that she'd want to thoroughly test his size and durability once he was found.

But as Blake reached halfway up her knee-high boot, she suddenly crosses her legs, forcing him to hold tightly as he was thoughtlessly dangled in the air. While he remained in this position, he could see his mom continuing to happily chat with Amy, although he also noticed that Rachel seemed to have left, which was good for his overall safety.

While Blake gripped tightly onto one of Amy's boot buckles, he sees his mom shuffle her feet toward her black pumps, reminding him that they were bare. She immediately starts to play with the pumps, moving them about idly, as she seemed to feel more relaxed while sitting with her close friend. It also made him glad that he left the area when he did since that would surely be a hectic experience, but he also wondered if it would be enjoyable too. Blake tries to ignore those thoughts though since she is his mom after all, so he instead turns his attention back to her incredibly beautiful friend.

Even though he was still dangling in the air, Blake doesn't let that stop him as he continues to climb toward Amy's knee, occasionally moving so he'd be closer to the shin side of her leg. It was a challenging climb, especially since Blake wasn't the fittest person around, but the shrinking spell seemed to be compensating a bit. And as Blake continued his long climb, the women continued their idle conversation.

Surprisingly, their discussion eventually shifted toward Blake, causing him to stop and listen closely. And the strangest part was that Amy brought the topic up, as she says “How's Blake doing in school? I can't believe he's already making it through high school!”

Claire quietly laughs and says “You're telling me, Amy… He really grew up so fast. I just wish he stopped with all his ‘magic’ nonsense…”

Blake freezes when he hears this since he was sure that he stopped sharing that stuff with her since she always assumed that he was playing pretend. But Amy looks over curiously, as she says “Magic…? What do you mean Claire?”

She then sighs and says “Well, Blake used to always brag to me how he could cast spells as if he was in a fantasy novel. I used to find it adorable, but I think he's still obsessed with that stuff. I've found a few books in his room that looked directly out of a fantasy movie.” Then she quietly laughs and adds, saying “I just wish he'd spend his allowance on stuff kids buy, like sports gear or video games…”

Blake was feeling a bit down about the conversation, but Amy just smiles and says “I think you should be proud that Blake still has a wonderful imagination. It's good when kids can think creatively. Maybe you should get him to try writing? It could be a good outlet for him.”

Claire smiles back and says “I never thought of it that way. I guess I worry a bit too much…”

Amy just quietly laughs and says “It's good to worry a little bit. I'm happy to hear that he's doing well.”

The fact that she was concerned with Blake made him feel warm inside, which inspired him to move even faster along her boot, hoping to get her attention before she decided to stand back up. And after a few more minutes, Blake reaches the end of the boot, close to her knee, so he decides to take a short break.

That decision soon proved to be an unwise one, as Amy suddenly moved her legs again, threatening to throw Blake back onto the floor. Right after that, she reaches toward him and tugs on her boot, creating a small gap along her leg. Blake managed to keep his balance, but an odd tingling at the back of his neck worried him, as he hears one of the spirits whisper “We're sorry Blake, but we're having trouble maintaining your current size!”

Before he could do anything else, he feels himself get even tinier, causing him to fall through that gap into Amy's knee-high boot. Blake continued to fall until he crashed into her instep, which was covered by a thick wool sock. Thankfully it was incredibly soft and fluffy, but the sweaty and hot environment quickly hit his senses.

Even though Blake was even tinier than before, Amy seemed to notice him in the back of her mind, prompting her to subtly move her foot, causing him to slide directly under her warm sole. While he was here, his nose and mouth were assaulted by the strange mixture between oppressive sweat and sweet strawberries. And as unique as it seemed, it was incredible to Blake, finding Amy's boot to be far nicer than his mom's pump.

But due to the extreme weight of Amy's foot, Blake couldn't move a muscle, so he takes the chance to adjust to his surroundings while enveloped by her heavenly scent. Using a magic spell, Blake scans himself to find out just how much he just shrank, realizing that he was now ½ of an inch tall. This would probably make getting discovered by Amy a lot harder, but that was a part of the challenge after all. Besides, his invulnerability was still present, so it wasn't like he was in any danger. And since he was inside her boot now, no matter what happened, he'd be able to get her attention eventually.

His thoughts were interrupted once Amy stood up, putting her full weight onto him, as she says “I'm grabbing a drink. Do you want anything, Claire?”

Claire starts to rub her temples while saying “You know what? Can you get me a stiff drink, Amy? I think I could use one…”

Amy begins to laugh while tapping her foot and unintentionally flattening Blake repeatedly, as she says “Don't worry Claire, I'll get you something nice…”

Following that, Amy walks back toward the party bar, stomping tiny Blake with each and every step…

Amy made her to the bar, wanting to get her and Claire some nice drinks. Even though she didn't need to feel as stressed since her role as the R&D head allowed her to avoid some of the pressure that Claire felt since she had fewer people to please. Even though Claire had a high-ranked position too, she needed to mingle more closely with all of the outside company guests, which was why she was so stressed. Amy only needed to worry about a few direct bosses and her R&D staff, and internal stuff at Jengain was normally more on the relaxed side.

So Amy decides to get herself a beer and her friend a nice glass of hard liquor and another glass of soda. As she waits for her drinks to be prepared, she begins to shift her weight back and forth, inadvertently giving Blake a forceful massage. And once the drinks were ready, Amy slowly walks back to the couch, not wanting to spill a drop. Due to that, Blake was thoroughly crushed with each step, since her movements were far more deliberate and careful.

Soon though, Amy gets back to the couch, and hands Claire her drink. As they begin to enjoy their beverages, Blake closes his eyes and simply basks in the radiating warmth of her ginormous foot. Even though he was shielded from harm, he was still vulnerable both emotionally and mentally, and this was a crazy experience.

It wasn't that Blake disliked this; it was far from it as he was having a great time, even being his mom's unaware toe toy had its charms, even if that environment was a tad too intense for him. But he was drained, which caused him to quickly fall asleep, while Amy and Claire chatted for hours longer, as neither of them knew of their tiny guest.

In fact, by the time Blake woke up, Amy had brought him to a completely different location. The big question was, where was Amy now…?
05422122.title: Climbing Amy's Boot

choices: Amy goes to inspect her foot.
Amy goes to put on a pair of socks, ignoring Blake.
054221221.content:
Blake slowly got back up, feeling a bit groggy, but surprisingly well rested despite taking a nap under Amy’s socked foot. As he brushed himself off he noticed the biggest change; Amy’s massive foot was no longer pinning him into the boot’s insole. And with that revelation, Blake proceeds to escape from her humid and smelly boot, walking across the insole while trying to avoid the larger indents along the way. As he walked, he noticed that the insole was pressed down, perfectly matching to her foot. At one point he walks past the number ‘9.5’, meaning that Amy had slightly larger than average feet.

Once he reaches the pillar-like opening of the boot, Blake activates some wind magic, allowing him to soar up to the exit. Now even though he was doing this now, trying to climb Amy with this spell would have been far too risky, since he was not as skilled with navigating while flying through the air. But a straight flight upwards was easy for him, allowing him to escape the boot and crash back onto the carpet near the discarded shoes.

And after he brushes himself off again and rubs his eyes, he looks around and notices that Amy was sitting on her couch, comfortably sprawled out while working on her laptop and watching the television at the same time. Currently, she was wearing a loose fitting pink T-shirt and an off-white pair of sweatpants, without socks on. Her hair looked a little messier than before, with a few strands sticking up, giving Blake a peek at her casual demeanor. Since it must’ve been incredibly late right now, it made sense for her to be dressed so casually, and Blake found he just as stunning as usual.

But while he was still farther away from Amy, he decides to use his scanning magic on her, finding out that she was 5’11”. She also had size 9.5 feet, and even though he learned the size of Amy’s boot, there could've been a chance that she wore either too large or too small shoes. He wasn't able to glean all that much more about her, which meant that Blake still needed to practice in certain areas, but his curiosity was satisfied for now.

So he walks closer to the lounging giantess, hoping to make contact with her before she went to sleep. Soon, he nears her bare foot, noticing that her toenails were painted a light shade of purple, though they were slightly faded. There was a potent odor present too, possibly because Amy's feet were now able to air out, though he found her sweaty and rose-like aroma to be amazing. But while Blake was admiring Amy's titanic foot, she loudly yawns and moves her leg forward. Blake is unprepared, as her towering toes rapidly approached him, tackling him into the soft carpet.

Amy then begins to rub her foot into the carpet, pinning Blake down harshly while stretching her arms and saying “Talk about a late night…” She then wiggles her toes, scooping Blake up and depositing him between them, giving him a forceful hug. Her toes felt ridiculously soft, for even though they were treating him roughly, Blake was in bliss from the attention, while the radiating warmth soothed him. As he struggled against the gigantic toes, which were at least twice his size, Amy yawns again and mumbles, saying “Maybe I should get ready for bed…”

Following that statement, Amy stands up and shuffles on a pair of fluffy moccasins, wanting to keep her feet warm until she got to her bedroom. Blake was forced to experience darkness yet again, so he tries out a night vision spell, allowing him to see more clearly. He could see that Amy's toes were relatively clean, with a few grimy patches in the tight spaces, which actually impressed him a bit. Oddly enough, Blake had a momentary idea to clean Amy's toe spaces for her, but he ignores that thought while he still needed to get her attention. But as Blake’s mind was still racing of things to do once she found him, Amy scrunches her toes into the soft fluff, forcing his face into the same filthy spaces that he was daydreaming about a second ago. And as he was being brutalized unknowingly, he was made fully aware that cleaning Amy’s toe spaces would be a laborious task, but he still felt like he could accomplish it if he tried.

Then, Amy begins walking to her bathroom, causing Blake to be pounded into with every step. She had a decently large house, probably because she was the head of Jengain’s R&D department, but that only elongated your experience. And once she gets to the bathroom, she starts brushing her teeth, tapping her toes the entire time. Blake was glad that her slipper was incredibly soft, but it was also highly insulated, which caused her foot to sweat a bit more. And that caused Blake to get coated by Amy’s sweat, as the salty and not very viscous liquid got absorbed into the moccasin.

Even though it still wasn't as bad as when he was in his mom's pump, it was still intense, but Blake surprisingly found it to still be enjoyable; possibly because of his crush on Amy. And despite his magical invulnerability, getting mashed into by a set of gigantic toes was still a little bit scary, especially when they were only a small part of the whole titaness. But because of how soft Amy’s toes were, it felt almost relaxing at times for Blake, since those beasts would continually press him into the fluffy ground of her slipper. And after about 2 minutes, Amy finishes with brushing her teeth and goes to wash her face, scrunching her toes at the same time. That provided Blake with another round of punishment, as he was ruthlessly squeezed between those long and slender toes, making him feel much more like a grape than anything else.

Once Amy was finished in the bathroom, she walked over to her bedroom and kicks off her slippers, while you remained crammed between her mighty toes. After that, she shuffled into her bed, going to check her phone one final time before bed. While Blake was stuck under the warm covers, where he was feeling stuffier by the minute, while she would constantly wiggle her toes, rubbing him vigorously. As she checks her phone, Amy notices that Claire sent her a message. When she realizes that, she squeezes her toes in anticipation, unwittingly mashing him even deeper between the warm and incredibly constrictive space. Apparently, Blake wasn’t home when she got home, and Claire was worried.

When Amy reads that, she sighs and says to herself, mumbling “Oh Claire… Hopefully, Blake just went out and forgot to tell her, like a typical kid…” Right as she quietly said this, she forcefully wiggled her toes, brutalizing Blake against those pillars of flesh while preventing him from hearing a bit of what she just said. Unfortunately, Blake never thought about what would happen when his mom would get home, but he needed to focus more on Amy and her possessive toes. And since she was more relaxed right now, her toes stopped moving and writhing as frequently, inspiring Blake to try and do something to get her attention.

Even though he was still super tiny, he had a few spells at his disposal, so he tries to cast a medium level wind spell, hoping that it would be enough to alert Amy of his position. But she simply squeezes her toes in response, stopping his magecraft in its tracks. It made Blake feel like Amy was disciplining him for his actions, which was a surprisingly enticing thought, but it was more likely that she barely even registered his actions. She continues to clench and unclench her toes, brutally manhandling Blake while thinking that something soft was caught between them, but feeling a tad too tired and lazy to check.

And once those toes settled down, Blake changes tactics and tries to cast a more powerful ice spell, hoping that the sudden decrease in temperature would get her to inspect his general location. Because of his size, even an ice spell wouldn’t actually harm Amy, which would have been a major concern for him, but it would surely annoy her enough to react in some way. At first, Amy doesn’t even react, prompting him to spread the ice spell all along her toe, putting extra effort in near the tips of her toes. That finally causes Amy to act upon his attempts, but he was only filled with dread as the toes he was pestering rapidly smashed against him.

Right after experiencing that warm and soft sandwich, Amy’s toes begin to wiggle, massaging Blake aggressively between those fleshy beasts, as she mumbles “My foot’s getting a bit chilly… How strange, even though it’s the middle of Summer…” After that, she stretches again while still in bed, vigorously squeezing her toes at the same time, accidentally burying him deep between the sticky toe space in front of him.

Following that, she lifts the blanket, filling Blake with a moment of hope. Amy was staring down in his direction with a look that was filled with sleepiness, with a hint of annoyance mixed in. Even though he didn’t want to disturb Amy, he had to do something drastic to prevent her from falling asleep before finding him. So he casts another ice spell, this time in the direction of her cramped toe space, causing her to squeeze those toes yet again, enveloping him in her unyielding flesh. As she does this, she grumbles and says “Why in the world are my toes getting so cold…?”

It looks like Blake finally prompted the giantess to act, but the big question though was, what was Amy planning on doing in response…?
054221221.title: At Home With Dr. Amy

choices: They continue the conversation together (don’t add here please)
Blake asks to take a shower with Amy
Blake asks Amy for some food
0542212211.content:
Amy was definitely feeling a bit confused, since she felt two sudden waves of coldness coming from her foot, even though she felt fine everywhere else. Because of that, she decides to take a closer look, sitting up and leaning closer, not expecting to find all that much. As she leans forward, Blake realizes that Amy was about to look in his direction, so he tries to free himself so he could get her attention. Unfortunately, Amy’s toes were just sweaty enough to keep most of his body stuck to the soft flesh, where only his torso and right arm were free.

He tries his best to wave, while Amy looks at her toes, not noticing anything out of the ordinary. Due to the lack of light, Amy’s eyes kept on passing over the tiny Blake, despite his feeble attempts. But as his hopes were dwindling, he comes up with an idea, so he aims up and casts a fire spell, creating a small surge of light near Amy’s toes. She immediately notices this, as she gasps and says “What in the world…?”

She then turns on her bed lamp and takes another look at her toes, this time noticing a small object lodged between them. As she sees this, she giggles to herself and says “I can’t believe I never noticed this… Might as well remove it before going to bed.” So she reaches toward Blake, effortlessly peeling off of her toe, as she lifts him in the air carelessly. And because of what she said, he knew that he wasn’t safe yet, so he casts another fire spell, causing her to stop in shock. She continues to stare, before she rubs her eyes tiredly and mumbles “I don’t think I drank enough to hallucinate…”

When Blake hears this, he immediately begins screaming for help, shouting nearly incoherently. Luckily for him, Amy was able to hear his squeaks for assistance, causing her jaw to drop as she mutters, saying “Blake…?” Once Amy utters that word, Blake stops and nods slowly, not wanting to spook the titaness, causing her to take a deep breath and smile, before saying “Are you okay…?”

Blake smiles and nods again, before saying “Umm… I’m okay D… Dr. Amy…”

She then carefully rubs his head with her pinky finger, while saying “You look so adorable right now, Blake… I hope you’ll fill me in, but for now, I’m happy you’re safe.” With that, Amy walks over to her desk and grabs her phone, before saying “But before any of that, we should call your mom, okay Blake?”

When Blake hears this, he tilts his head and says “She might be asleep by now…”

Amy frowns though, and says “You probably weren’t aware Blake, but Claire is very worried about you. She has no idea where you went, so I’m sure she’d want to learn that you were safe.”

And when Blake hears this, he looks down sadly and says “I just wanted to have a fun adventure… I didn’t want to worry her…”

When she hears this, Amy raises an eyebrow and says “So you did this to yourself? Fascinating…” Then she clears her throat and adds, saying “I’ll call her right now!”

Following that, Amy gives Claire a call, explaining that she just found Blake. But Claire just sighs and says “Are you sure you didn’t just dream that up…? I’m grateful that you’re worried too, but I’ll handle it…”

But Amy taps her chin, before saying “I know words won’t convince you, so let’s change to a video call…”

After that, Amy smiles and says “You should sit down first if you aren’t…” And then, she moves the phone so the video was centered on Blake, as he nervously waves at his confused mother.

Claire stares at the sight of her much smaller son for nearly a minute, before finally shouting “B… Blake??”

Blake in turn rubs the back of his neck nervously and says “Umm… Hi mom… How was the party?”

Claire just rubs her temples, before loudly sighing and saying “It was very fun Blake… I’m not sure why you’re at Amy’s house now, but I’m so happy that you’re safe…” Blake sighs back, thinking that he got away with this without a punishment, but then Claire narrows her gaze and asks “How’d you end up at Amy’s house and at your current size? I expect the truth, Blake Heart…”

When Blake hears his full name being dropped by his mom, he knew that he was on the road to trouble, so he explains everything, from how he shrunk himself and the rest of his magic, to how he snuck to the party in her black pump. And once Claire heard all of that, she sighs again, before smiling and saying “First, let me be clear that I’m incredibly relieved that you’re okay, Blake.” Then she pauses for a moment, before her eyes widen as she says “Blake… That rock I felt in my shoe back at the party, was that you??”

Blake wordlessly nods, causing Claire to sigh again and mutter “I can't believe I treated my own son so carelessly. I even used him as a stress reliever with my toes...” When she noticed that Blake heard her, she quickly clears her throat and says “I hope you reflect on how dangerous your little stunt was!”

When he hears that, he immediately stands up straight, as she sighs says “We can talk about your punishment when you get home. I’ll come get you right away…” It seems like Blake hadn't dodged the consequences of his actions just yet.

Surprisingly, Amy interjects and says “Blake can stay the night here, Claire! It’s way too late anyway…”

Claire smiles and says “I appreciate the offer, but I don’t want to put you out, Amy. Blake isn't the easiest kid to deal with...”

Blake was filled with embarrassment by that statement, but Amy quietly laughs and says “It’ll be fine Claire… Besides, at his current size, he won't be able to act out even if he wants to. Right, Blake…?”

He nods quietly, before saying “I’ll behave for Dr. Amy, mom! You should get some rest…”

Claire then smiles again and says “I’m happy my boy has good manners, even if his judgement was a bit skewed today.” Then she sighs and says “Fine, you can stay Blake… I expect you to be on your best behavior!”

Blake nods again, causing Amy to giggle and say “I’m sure we’ll be completely fine. He can stay a few days if he really wants to. I’ve got some time off, so I wouldn’t complain…”

Claire taps her chin and says “You and Blake can figure that out I guess. Let me know if you need anything of his, Amy.” Then she turns to Blake again and says “Good night, sweety… I love you…”

Blake smiles back and says “I love you too mom! Sorry for worrying you…”

After that, their video call ends, as Amy places Black down on her desk, as they prepare to have their own chat…

Amy starts things off by smiling at Blake and asking him “Are you hungry or thirsty? You must not have eaten for a little while…”

Blake taps his chin, before saying “Could I have some water? I’m not very hungry though. Thanks Dr. Amy!”

Hearing that, Amy lightly chuckles to herself, before saying “I’ll be right back then, Blake. And you can just call me ‘Amy’ if you’d like. I don’t mind…” Then, she stands up and walks to the bathroom, before coming back with a bottle cap filled with water.

And once Blake had access to his drink, he quickly quenches his thirst, before smiling and saying “That was nice! Thanks, umm Amy…”

Amy smiles when she hears that, while saying “That’s the spirit Blake! I’m a bit younger than your mom, so you can think of me as one of her cool friends…”

She winks at Blake, causing him to smile back, before she adds, saying “But before we move on, do you need a shower or anything? I understand the gist of what you went through, so I’m sure you could use a chance to clean off…” Then she adds saying “And are you sure you're not hungry? Because of me, you were stuck effectively by yourself for hours. I do still feel guilty since I was eating and drinking throughout the party, and you couldn't even get a scrap of food. The least I could do is cook you a quick meal…”

Blake thinks for a moment, wondering what he should do next. It might be nice to be bathed by Amy, since you were definitely too small to do so on your own, so this could be a rare opportunity for you. You did hope to have some hot and exciting adventures with Amy when she found you, and this was your first real chance.

And even though he said otherwise before, having a bite to eat might be a good idea, especially since Blake hadn't eaten much all day, mainly because of how bored he was. It could be wise to have something before going to bed, since he wouldn't be able to wake Amy once she fell asleep.

Eventually, Blake comes to a decision. What does he choose to do…?

(I’m splitting this chapter in two, because I went a bit over the character limit this time. So please don’t add to the first choice. I’m not planning anything with the others, so ho nuts if you want! Also, for the previous chapter, ignore that I wrote ‘Author’s choice’ as an option. That was just a mental derp by me. I mean it as a reader’s choice.)
0542212211.title: Discovered By Amy

choices: Blake stays up to continue the conversation (please do not add here)
Blake decides to sleep with Amy (specific locations in the next chapter)
Blake decides to sleep in her moccasin, despite the risks.
05422122111.content:
Amy smiles again in response, before saying “I’m more than happy with continuing our conversation, Blake. I’ll ask Claire to bring some of your clothes over, and we’ll see what we can do with them for you.” Following that, Amy asks “Could you share with me how you ended up at my house though, Blake? I’m quite curious of your little adventure…”

Blake felt like he would do whatever Amy asked, so he readily tells her all about his journey here. And when he described his attempts at climbing her boot, falling within it, and ending up stuck between her toes while she prepared to go to sleep, Amy stared at him wordlessly. Once he was finished, Amy gently rubs his head with her index finger, while saying “You must have been so miserable Blake… I’m sorry I didn’t notice you sooner…”

The last thing Blake wanted was for Amy to feel guilty, so he quickly shakes his head and says “Don’t worry Amy! I actually… kinda… enjoyed the experience…” His face grew redder with each word, as Amy’s eyes widened with surprise, before she finally smiled at him warmly.

And to his shock, she simply says “Color me surprised, Blake… I never would have guessed you’d have a thing for feet. Was that why you climbed into Claire’s shoe?”

Blake adamantly shook his head, while saying “No way! I just thought that’d be the best way to get to her party…”

Following that, Amy hums to herself, before saying “I’d say it’s pretty likely that you never realized that about yourself. Are you sexually active, Blake…?”

He knew that Amy would eventually ask some embarrassing questions, but Blake never thought they’d get that crazy, causing him to blush heavily while quietly saying “N… no…”

Hearing that, Amy lightly pokes Blake’s cheek, while saying “You don’t need to feel embarrassed, Blake. I was just curious. You’re still young, so don’t worry too much about that. But that’s probably why you never realized that you liked feet.”

Since this was the second time Amy dropped that phrase, Blake scratches his hair and says “Does that make me weird…?”

Amy shakes her head and says “Of course not Blake! As you get older, you’ll find that plenty of people have things that they enjoy that are outside the mainstream. Personally, I think that as long as you do things in a respectful and consenting manner, you’ll be just fine in that regard.”

Blake never expected to have this kind of conversation with Amy, especially since he could barely say two words to her the last time he saw her. But he nods and says “I’ll keep your advice in mind. Thank you Amy!”

But following that, Amy smirks and says “I also think that being a bit weird is a good thing. Sometimes that can let you stand out, especially if you have a lot of passion for your potentially weird hobbies and interests.” Blake nods again, as Amy adds, saying “And I think you’re plenty unique, Mr. Mage!”

Right after that, she adds, saying “And I must say Blake, I'm impressed by just how much more confident you are now. I remember how you could barely ask if I wanted a drink the last time I visited Claire. You were such a little cutie… Well you still are, but more of a mature cutie, but extra little.”
