When Blake hears this, he smiles and slightly blushes while saying “Thanks Amy… I guess shrinking down to this size and seeing you like this made my nervousness feel inconsequential.”

Amy quietly laughs when she hears that, as she says “That does make sense. After your intense experience that I no doubt made more challenging? I can see how that could get you over your shyness.”

Blake nods, feeling much less nervous around Amy after his long date with her foot and toes, but then she sighs and says “Your magic must be so cool though… You'll give me all the details, right? The researcher in me wants to know so bad, I'll even let you have whatever crazy experiences with my feet while you stay with me. Or maybe some other things, if you want a break from my feet, since you've already become so closely familiar with them…”

With that, Blake knew that he’d have to explain all his magic stuff to Amy and her offer was insanely tempting, but then he suddenly yawns. When Amy notices this, she lightly giggles and says “You must be so exhausted, Blake… After spending hours in my boot while I enjoyed the office party, and then getting dragged along for my bedtime routine in my moccasin, not to mention how many times I probably messed with your body without noticing, I’m impressed that you didn’t pass out yet!”

But after she says this, she begins to rub your head softly while saying “Now that I think about it, I probably didn’t treat you very gently, especially when you were stuck in my moccasin. I doubt my toes showed much restraint once you were near them either, even though you were their guest. Honestly, I barely notice half the things my feet and toes do, even more so when I'm focusing on three things at once, and it didn't help that I was exhausted from the party. It wouldn't surprise me if I put you through some rough punishment once you ended up between my toes too, but I really didn't think anything of it, and in my defense; why would I? I didn’t even feel you while you were in my boot, but I guess I’m glad you fell inside of it, instead of you getting left at the office without Claire or myself. Even if you were trapped in my stuffy boot, I would have dragged you back to my house eventually even without noticing you, so I think you can forgive me for stomping on you all night long…”

She begins to laugh to herself after saying that, possibly realizing that she hadn't let Blake respond for a few minutes. Blake was well that Amy was a straightforward person, so describing what happened in this great of detail was perfectly expected of her. After that, she warmly smiles and asks “You weren’t afraid from all of that, were you Blake?”

Despite that long rant, which actually did more to excite the tiny Blake, he would have gladly listened to her speak for hours about practically anything. And even though his experience with her powerful feet was mainly exciting, he had to be honest with Amy, as he says “It was mostly fun, but it did get a little scary at times…”

When Amy hears this, she immediately grabs Blake and presses him against her cheek, as if trying to reassure the tiny human. She then starts to rub him up and down it, treating him like one might a small animal, as she says “Oh you’re so brave, Blake! I’m sorry if things got too frightening for you. I had no idea…”

After that, Amy eventually frees him, as he dusts himself off and says “Really, it was a fun kind of scary. I wanted to go on an epic adventure, so you really helped make it even more exciting. Your toes didn't exactly show me mercy, but I kinda liked it that way. And the spirits made me practically invulnerable to harm, so I had nothing to worry about!”

When Amy hears this, her eyes light up as she says “Spirits…? Invulnerable to harm...? You just keep on piquing my curiosity, Blake!”

Now that Amy’s investigative mind was fired back up, Blake gets ready to explain further as he assumed that she’d take back her offer to go to bed now. But then she carefully picks him back up, enveloping him in her soft skin for a moment, putting his mind at ease. After that, she brings him closer to her face, giving him a clearer picture of just how much larger she was than him. And then, she smiles and says “Putting my selfish curiosity aside for a moment; would you like to go to bed now, Blake? I don’t mind saving our chat for the morning...”

Blake thinks to himself for a moment, before saying “Where would I sleep though?”

Amy taps her chin a few times, before saying “Well, you can always sleep with me if you think you’ll get chilly. With your smaller body, it could be more difficult to retain body heat, although I’m not the magic expert here. But if you’d like to go with this, I’ll be extra careful tonight. I’d never want to lose Claire’s cute kid after she left him with me”

After hearing Amy’s suggestion, Blake starts to blush again, even more than last time, causing her to giggle while saying “You look so adorable Blake… If you’d feel uncomfortable with that, we can always use my moccasin as a bed. It’s the same one you were in before, so it’ll keep you warm, and I can even throw in the sock I wore for the party as a sort of blanket for you…” Then she smirks and adds, saying “I usually slip them back on when I wake up, so I might forget to take you out beforehand, but I’ll make sure I won’t forget you for too long. I’m much too fascinated by all your mage business for you to slip my mind! And with this strange invulnerability of yours, we won’t have much to worry about.”

Even though it was a bit nerve wracking to think about this stuff, this was the chance for Blake to have some really hot adventures with Amy, and it’d be crazy if he didn’t make the most of this chance. So after a few more minutes of deliberating, Blake eventually comes to a decision.

What does he decide to do…?
05422122111.title: Continuing the Conversation

054221221111.content:
Even though Blake was feeling slightly tired, he wanted to continue chatting with Amy, so he says “I can stay up later! I actually fell asleep at some point while in your boot, so I feel okay.”

When Amy hears this, she scratches her chin and says “You fell asleep while in there? Talk about impressive…” But then she smiles and adds, saying “In that case, I want to hear all the details with your mage business!”

With that request, Blake begins, saying “It all started with those spirits, the same ones I mentioned earlier. Back when I was little, they made contact with me because I had a natural talent for magic, according to them.”

Amy then interjects, saying “That's impressive, Blake! Those must be wise spirits, because it's good to foster talent at an early age.”

Blake proceeds to blush when he hears her compliment, causing her to giggle and gently rub his chin, while saying “Sorry for interrupting you. You may continue…”

After that, Blake says “They taught me all of my magic spells, so I kept on practicing with them, but I'm still barely an intermediate mage, since I had to keep up with my school work too…”

Amy nods when she hears this, as she says “That's very common for students. But learning how to juggle all that stuff can really prepare you for adult life. You're just a bit more unique, since I doubt there are other mages at your school…”

When Blake hears this, he smiles and says “I'm actually friends with a few other mages at school. They're different kinds of mages, but they're nice, so we try to help each other out when we can.”

Amy proceeds to lightly giggle when she hears that, as she says “I never would have guessed…” Then, she taps her chin a few times, before her eyes light up as she says “So how did you shrink? You said something about those spirits helping you, correct?”

Blake nods and explains, saying “That's one spell that was way too advanced for me. I needed to find a few materials for them first, but it was worth it in the end, since it made me invulnerable too.”

When Amy hears that, she nods and says “It would have been far more dangerous if you didn't have that invulnerability. It makes me shudder when just thinking about it…”

Blake nods and says “Yeah… I just wish I stayed at a consistent size…”

Amy suddenly raises her eyebrow, while asking “What's that supposed to mean, Blake?”

Blake explains, saying “When I first cast the spell, I shrunk down to 2 inches. But while I was climbing up your boot, I shrunk down to ½ of an inch. That's how I fell in your boot too.”

When Amy hears that, she hums to herself while saying “No wonder I never noticed you Blake! I'd have felt so embarrassed if I couldn't feel a 2 inch tall object in my shoe…”

Blake nods and says “Yeah! I wasn't expecting to get even smaller, so I'm glad you noticed when you did…”

Amy smiles in response and says “It was all because my foot kept getting chilly. Was that you, Blake?”

Blake nods in confirmation as he says “I needed to get your attention somehow, so a cast a few ice spells. Sorry if I bothered you…”

Amy just giggles quietly at the tiny Blake, as she says “You don't need to apologize to me… I think it's quite impressive. Was the flash of light one of your spells too?”

Blake nods and says “That was my fire spell. I made sure not to aim it near you. Unlike my ice spell, my fire spell could actually hurt you, even at this size.”

Amy then smiles at Blake, while saying “Well thank you for being so concerned with my well being, even while I was treating you like a piece of junk between my toes…”

Blake shakes his head in response and says “You didn't know it was me, so don't feel guilty!”

Amy nods and then says “That's true. If I knew it was you, I'd have at least asked you if you wanted a break occasionally…”

But after that, she smirks and says “But anyway, I would love a tiny little mage to cool down my feet after a hot day, so I should be thanking you for using your spells! I would have never guessed it was you, which was why I didn't respond kindly to your hard work, so I'm sorry if things got a bit too rough for you.”

When Blake heard Amy's request, it made him wish to do whatever she needed, as just her warm appreciative smile could melt his heart. So he starts to stammer out a response, while blushing heavily and saying “I'd do an…” He then clears his throat and tries again, saying “I’d do anything to make you more comfortable, Amy!”

Amy proceeds to lightly blush while saying “That's so sweet of you, Blake… You really are a little charmer!” After that, she smirks and adds, saying “Careful though… I might put you to work after we wake up tomorrow! I could even test out your invulnerability with with a morning jog, and I'd gladly give you a front row seat to my toes.”

When Blake hears this, he proudly folds his arms and says “I'd do it! I'm not afraid!”

But when Amy hears that, begins to giggle while saying “In that case, we'll need to fully test that theory tomorrow! I might even be able to get Claire to go easy on you if I really work you to the bone… Just make sure you reflect on why she was upset at you, so she doesn't yell at me… And you'd be able to fit into some really tight spots, so I don't think I'll have much trouble with thinking up jobs for you to do.”

Blake's eyes widened, as he realized that he'd get to have all kinds of insane fun with Amy, while potentially lessening his upcoming punishment too. Then, Blake grins and yells, saying “It’s a deal!”

After that, Amy shifts the subject slightly, and asks “You said that you couldn't cast your shrinking spell on your own, right? Do you know how to return to normal?”

Blake taps his chin a few times, before saying “Not really… But I could commune with the spirits when I get tired of this size though.”

Amy nods and says “Well that's good. You can stay at this size for as long as you want, Blake. As I mentioned before, I have almost two weeks off, so I'm not in any rush. And I'd love to thoroughly test out your new size…”

Blake gulps his saliva nervously, as he quietly nods, causing Amy to laugh and say “I love how cute you act when you get flustered, Blake…”

Right after that, Blake loudly yawns, prompting Amy to yawn in turn, blowing him down onto the floor during the exhale toward her discarded moccasin. Unfortunately for Blake, Amy closed her eyes right as he started his fall. This was a pivotal moment for Blake’s future, which depended entirely on what Amy was able to see once she opened her eyes back up.

Does she notice Blake tumble into her moccasin at the last second? Or does she miss it and lose the tiny boy before their first night ended? Either were equally likely, but which occurred…?

(Another case of writing a bit too much and needing to split things up. But I guess that means more branching paths for everyone else.)
054221221111.title: A Longer Chat with Amy

choices: Blake casts a fire spell (sleep with Amy’s toes [don't add please])
Blake casts an ice spell (wants to sleep somewhere else)
Blake asks for something totally different! (Reader’s choice)
0542212211111.content:
Fortunately for Blake, Amy was able to see that he fell down toward her open moccasin, as her eyes widen with concern. He lands within it, causing him to roll down into the toe section, while Amy gasps and says “Are you okay, Blake…?”

Blake slowly gets up and nods, causing her to giggle and say “I guess we both stayed up a bit too late. But I think I know the perfect place to keep you while we sleep…”

Suddenly, Amy shuffles her bare foot into the moccasin, surprising Blake as her mamouth toes approached him rapidly, cutting off the light. Once they were close enough, she tackles him with her foot, using her toes to grasp at the tiny mage blindly. As she does this, she says “Hold still Blake… I'll get you eventually… I don’t mind working hard for your sake...” She continues to wiggle her toes, endlessly smacking his body with those snake-like appendages, reminding him just how amazing they felt. As she continues to struggle with grabbing at Blake, she sighs and says “You really are slippery… And tiny… But I think I've almost got you! Hopefully you're enjoying it…”

Blake was 100% loving what was happening right now, as Amy's soft and slightly sticky toes were attacking him aggressively, and it was even better knowing that he was so entertaining to her. But after almost a minute of trying and failing, Amy finally captures Blake and moves him between her 2nd and 3rd toes. And now that he was here, she slips her foot out of the moccasin and claps to herself and says “Yay! I caught the bug mage!” Following that, she affectionately squeezes her toes, smothering Blake in the warm and soft flesh as she says “I think I'll let you sleep right here, between my toes, little Blake. Do you object…?”

He shakes his head and yells up, shouting “I like this plan! Thanks Amy!”

Amy proceeds to giggle while saying, “Great!” Then she pauses and adds, saying “I'm surprised I can even hear you from down there…” She then scrunches her toes, smothering Blake in the warm flesh, as she says “You feel so strange Blake, but in a good way I think. I can understand why my toes were so possessive of you earlier, even though I wish they were kinder to you, since you’re just so cute and lovable. A part of me doesn't want to let you go…”

She then starts to giggle profusely, before adding “When you get home, you might want to offer to let Claire have a turn with you. I can tell that you'd be an excellent stress reliever, especially since I can squeeze you as hard as I like without worrying. Your body has an excellent texture, and you contort in just the right ways as I squeeze you. The satisfaction I feel when I squish your body against my tired skin is hard to describe, but it’s almost therapeutic in a way, so I'm sure she'd appreciate it. And if she’s still a bit frustrated with you, she can take it out on you in a healthy manner.”

She pauses for a moment, before exaggeratedly waving her arm while saying “I can picture it now, Claire relaxing after a long day at work after wearing her cute yet uncomfortable pumps all day, using her thoughtful son as the greatest stress toy a lady can ask for. I’ll be sure to bring it up to her later… I might even sneak you inside and say you're an actual stress toy, just so she can use you to your fullest… Wouldn’t that be hilarious…?”

Blake wonders about that, since if Amy liked to use him this much, his mom might feel the same way. And Blake still felt guilty for worrying her, so that could be a good way to make it up to her, even if he loved Amy's toes far more. Following that, she walks over to her bed, pounding Blake relentlessly with each step, before sitting down and opening her drawer. Once she had it opened up, she pulled out a pair of thin socks that stay below the ankle, as she says “I think I'll put these socks on. At your size, you're sure to get chilly tonight, so this will give you an extra layer of warmth.” But then she pauses and adds, saying “Although I say this, you might want a break from my toes, since you've practically become best friends with all 5 of them, even though they treated you far harsher than a friend should, so would you rather sleep somewhere else? I wouldn't mind…”

Before Blake could respond, Amy clenches her toes, preventing him from speaking as the walls of flesh closed in on him, while she happily sighs and says “Ahh… It feels incredible to squeeze you like that. If you have a crush on somebody at school, do this for them and I'm sure they'd be appreciative. High school can be filled with stress, if it hadn’t changed since I went, so a personal stress reliever would be the perfect gift.”

She pauses for a moment, before skillfully moving Blake between her 3rd and 4th toes next, brutally squeezing him right after that. After doing that, she sighs and says “I’ll use me as an example! If I were back in high school and one of my friends willingly acted as my toe toy, letting me use him through all of my tough classes, allowing me to abuse him whenever a teacher annoyed me, or whatever else; I’d probably fall for them. I’ll bet that if you had a crush, they’d be the same as I was…”

Blake immediately thinks of his main crush Aria, but he also thinks about many of the other mage girls he's befriended, like Vixen. Maybe this was the key to getting them to like Blake as more than a friend…? As he considered that, Amy stretches her legs and vigorously clenches her toes, burying Blake even deeper into the grimy space between them as she says “Sorry if I keep on doing this, but you’re just so soothing to toy with…” Then, she loudly sighs to herself and adds, saying in a much more authoritative tone “I had a really long day, so I need a few more minutes…”

After saying this, Blake had a feeling that Amy wouldn’t ask for his thoughts on her request, which was confirmed when she quickly began scrunching her toes with an extreme vigor. Amy does as she promised, putting Blake through a truly hellish experience, as took all of the day’s stress out on him. Sometimes she’d squeeze Blake so hard that he wondered if he’d really pop, and other times she’d wiggle her toes so ferociously that he thought he’d be grinded to dust, making him realize just so effortlessly Amy could dominate him right now. But he was absolutely enthralled by the idea, as his powerlessness strangely excited him, while her soft toes vigorously mashed his body, forcing him into more and more awkward positions.

As time went on, it became clear to Blake that Amy would not merely use him for ‘a few more minutes’, as she soon became distracted by a fascinating scientific article. Due to that, she decides to skim it, prompting her toes to work the tiny mage far harder and faster, to the point where he was struggling for air. But despite this harsher treatment, Blake was perfectly fine with the situation, since she was just so pretty and cool to him. And her toes, with all their minor imperfections and sweat, proved to relax him completely as his own stress was smashed away. More than anything else, it reminded Blake of just how small he was now, as he could nothing to stop Amy’s toes and their onslaught, even though he had no desire for them to slow down really.

When she finishes with the article, she looks around while mumbling “Wait, what was I doing…?” After a short moment of silence where Blake worried that Amy actually forgot about him, he hears her loudly gasp while saying “Oh shoot, I forgot all about Blake!” She then separates her toes and looks at Blake warmly, while saying “Sorry about that Blake… Are you okay? I really only planned on going for a few more minutes…”

Blake was feeling pretty drained at this point, in no small part due to how well her toes aggressively used him, so he just gives Amy a thumbs up, causing her to sigh again and say “I’m glad you’re not upset…” Then, she clears her throat and says “My original point was that, instead of telling me where you wanted to sleep, why don't you give me a signal? I wouldn't want you to strain your voice any more than you already have…”

That idea made sense, so Amy continues, saying “I'll keep a close eye on you, and you can cast a spell to give your answer. If you're okay with the current arrangements, cast a fire spell. If not, cast an ice spell. Would that work for you…?”

Even though Blake was currently mashed between her long and powerful toes, he manages to nod, causing Amy to smile and say “Perfect! Whenever you're ready Blake. I want to accommodate you as best as I am able. I am the host after all, so I can't have you feeling uncomfortable...”

After a short thinking break, Blake comes to a decision, casting his chosen spell. Which spell does he choose…?
0542212211111.title: Final Foot Fun Before Bed

choices: Success! It triggers Amy's memory of the tiny mage (don't add here please)
Failure! Amy stomps him and ignores the cold magic
05422122111111.content:
Suddenly, Blake casts a fire spell away from Amy's toes, showing her a short burst of light. When she sees that, she smiles and says “That really does look impressive… And that sounds good to me!

Following that, Amy scrunches her toes yet again, smothering the puny Blake while she shook out her thin sock. And once she was ready, she waves in his direction and says “Goodnight little Blake! I hope you enjoy your company… I'm a bit of a morning person, so I hope you're ready for a bright and early start...”

And right before Amy goes to put the sock on, she suddenly giggles and says “Let's hope my toes don't keep you up all night. You'll need to let me know how it goes, because I have no clue and I'm curious…” That statement was a bit worrying for Blake, but exciting too, since he wouldn't mind a bit of unconscious punishment from Amy as she innocently slept.

But then Amy blows Blake a kiss, before saying “Sweet dreams Blake…” That act caused Blake's heart to melt as it was both incredibly cute and enticing, but he tries his best to wave back at her.

He also manages to squeak out “Goodnight to you too, Amy… And thanks again for letting me stay with you!”

Amy simply giggles and says “Oh Blake. I quite enjoy your tiny company…” That statement caused him to blush, but Amy failed to notice as she slowly pulled her socks on. Once her sock was on, he buries his face into one of the slightly moist folds in her toe space, causing her to giggle again while saying “Don't tickle me, Blake… It's bedtime now!”

Following that, Amy squeezes her toes while shuffling under the covers, immobilizing Blake as she got comfortable. After a few moments of moving about, Amy deeply sighed before quickly falling asleep, as the sound of her breathing filled the room.

But after the day Blake had, and because of just how often he was ruthlessly played with by Amy's energetic toes, he soon falls asleep too. Her toes and sock proved to keep him toasty warm, as the incredibly soft skin made him feel like he was resting on the best mattress in the world.

Blake slept for about an hour, before he was woken up by Amy's toes, as they began to scrunch into him. As he got roughed up more and more, he hears Amy groan in her sleep while mumbling “Blake… If you don't pamper me properly, then I'll just squish you like a bug…”

It seems like Amy had a bit of a mean side buried down below, but Blake didn't really mind it, so he decides to try kissing her toes, wondering how it would feel. And put plainly, it felt strange to Blake, mainly because he felt like he was kissing a soft wall, but it was still fun to him. As he continued doing this, Amy moans in her sleep and mumbles, saying “That's right Blake… Serve me…”

After that, Amy drifted back into a deep sleep, as her toes sandwiched Blake softly. He would have never have guessed that Amy would treat him this way, but she was dreaming after all, and he had to admit that she did get pretty commanding with him by the end of the night. Despite that, Blake found it oddly enjoyable when Amy forced him to be her stress toy without even asking him. It made him briefly wonder if he'd like it if Aria or another of his lady friends bossed him around like Any occasionally did.

But before he thought for too long, Amy's toes affectionately squeezed him tightly, as if instructing him to go back to sleep. And since he was an agreeable mage, Blake complies and snuggles closer to her toes, swiftly falling back to sleep as they kept him warm and comfy.

This time, Blake manages to sleep for two whole more hours, before Amy's toes rub into him to wake him back up. And while he rubbed his eyes, Amy giggles in her sleep while muttering “I need more attention, Mr. Bug Mage…” It seems like Amy was far more domineering in her sleep, as she barely gives him a moment to react before she clenches her toes forcefully, smothering Blake in the warm flesh, as she mumbles “Too slow… time to… punish the buggy…”

Blake wasn't sure what to expect, but he was both excited and afraid for what Amy planned to do, since her sleeping mind barely showed him a shred of mercy. She begins by scrunching and unscrunching her toes, brutally mashing him deeper between him, as she groans with satisfaction. As she has her way with you, she sleepily mumbles, saying “Tiny Blakey needs to… learn how to… treat…” She surprisingly trailed off before finishing her sentence, but the meaning was not lost on Blake, who mentally prepared himself for more intense toe action. The tiny mage was becoming more and more disturbed by just how cruel Amy got as she innocently slept, but he figures that she means no real harm since he was invulnerable to any harm, so he just appreciates it while it lasts.

To Blake’s surprise, Amy drifted back to her deep sleep soon after that, sparing him from experiencing whatever her dreaming mind thought up to abuse him. And now that things quieted down, and the only noise in the room was Amy's light snoring, Blake collects his thoughts. Even though this was the second time Amy woke him up, he didn't feel groggy at all, making him wonder if his shrinking allowed him to survive off of short bursts of rest.

But as Amy continued to snooze, Blake noticed that the smell of sweat wasn't as heavy now, making him wonder if her scent dissipated as she slept. Despite that, it was still present enough to be distinct for each of Blake's senses, but that sweaty aroma almost relaxed him even more anyway.

Soon, Blake falls back asleep, and rests undisturbed until morning, as Amy seemed to have gotten her fill of her nighttime abuse toward him. And once morning came, Amy woke back up, vigorously squeezing her toes and jolting Blake awake too. As sudden as that was, Blake couldn’t think of a better way to be woken up, as her toes embraced him with their heavenly texture and aroma.

But after that, she swung her legs out and onto the carpet, grinding her feet onto it sleepily, while mumbling “Talk about a late night…” That caused Blake to be harshly crushed, as her toes made sure that he remained their personal plaything, making him hope that she didn't forget about him.

Right after that, she starts to rub her temple, while muttering “What a headache. Guess I got a bit of a hangover. I should have gone straight to bed…” Following she quickly plucks off her socks, briefly giving Blake some fresh air, before shoving her feet into her fluffy moccasins. He was already closely familiar with these babies, as the heat already caused Amy's toes to sweat a bit, which of course impacted the tiny mage.

But then she stands up and vigorously presses her toes into the shoe, while sighing and saying “At least my moccasins know how to put me in a better mood. Might as well take a pain pill for this headache though…”

Following that, she walks to her bathroom, treading on Blake as she moved, still not yet remembering the tiny boy. And once she got there, she takes a pill and before bending down to wash her face. Due to how much Amy's toes were now sweating, a distinct odor soon formed around Blake, as the powerful scent was almost intoxicating to the puny mage.

She waits a minute for the water to get warmer, while forcefully squeezing her toes, cramming little Blake even deeper between them. Despite how vividly she described how her toes ‘most likely’ treated Blake last night in an attempt to apologize, they acted just as brutally as before. It seemed like whenever she wasn't clearly thinking of Blake, she punished him with an insane level of severity. Despite how much he enjoyed it, he was still a bit disturbed by how cruel Amy could get without realizing it.

But Blake liked just how effortlessly Amy dominated him, especially when she was just performing a routine task up above. Speaking of that though, by this time she had finally started washing her face, scrubbing it down with her moisturizing soap. And as she did that, her toes continued to scrub Blake too, mashing him into each and every crack and crevice that formed along and between them. She was abusing him so rapidly and relentlessly that he could barely catch his breath, as her toes didn't need air breaks like the bug they were battering.

Once she was all finished, she dries her face and sighs while saying “Time for some breakfast. I'm starved…”

At this point Blake knew that Any wouldn't remember him on her own, so he needed to take some initiative, so he prepares to cast an ice spell into the sticky space between her 3rd and 4th toes.

Once he mentally prepared himself, he hurls the spell and hopes for the best. Does Blake succeed at reminding Amy of his existence…?
05422122111111.title: Sleeping in Amy's Sock

choices: Amy accidentally scoops him up as she ate
054221221111111.content:
Blake's spell managed to stop Amy for a moment, as she scrunches her toes, brutally smothering Blake while mumbling “Why did I feel chilly for a second…” She then taps her foot while in thought, pounding him ceaselessly, as she mumbles “And I think something's in my moccasin too. It feels oddly familiar and strangely pleasant…”

After a few more moments of thought, Amy's eyes widen as she yells “Oh no! I forgot all about Blake!!” Following that relieving statement, Amy lifts her foot and shakes off the moccasin, allowing Blake to breathe fresh air again, as she carefully pries him out from between her sticky toes.

Once she gets him on her palm, she looks at him sadly and says “This was all my bad… Are you okay, Blake?”

Blake takes a deep breath, before nodding while saying “I'm good Amy! I just wasn't expecting all of that…”

Amy then quietly laughs and says “I wasn't planning that either. I feel a bit better knowing that you most likely enjoyed the experience, but it kind of scares me by just how harsh I can be with you if you ever slip my mind…” But then she smiles and gently strokes Blake's head, while saying “Did you have a good sleep...? I hope my toes let you rest in peace, at the very least…”

When Blake hears this, he laughs nervously and asks “Do you want the truth…?”

Amy proceeds to frown with worry as she says “Oh no… How bad was I…?”

Blake proceeds to explain his night between her toes, describing the things she said and did, leaving Amy speechless.

And once Blake was finished, her jaw drops as she mutters “Jesus… I sound like a nut…” Then she clears her throat and says “So I said all of that?” Blake nods, causing her to rub the back of her neck while mumbling “Just what was I dreaming about…? I don't think I want to know, and I'm normally fascinated by that stuff…”

Blake agrees, before saying “I still slept enough to feel good. And I had fun!”

Amy then sighs with relief as she says “I'm lucky you're such a forgiving buggy… But, I'll cook us some breakfast!” Then she smirks and adds, saying “And I know the perfect place to store you in, Blake…”

Following that, Amy bends down and drops him into her moccasin, allowing him to land with a thud. And as Blake stood back up, she angled the shoe up with her foot, causing him to roll down back into the hot and humid toe area. Once he was there, Amy shuffles her foot back into the moccasin, barely giving him a moment before pouncing on him with her gigantic toes.

As she does this, she giggles and says “I'll make us a wonderful breakfast, so you can spend a quick shift as my stress toy again. I hope you're ready for even more fun…”

Following that, Amy proceeded to thoroughly dominate Blake with those long and slender toes, forcing him into plenty of awkward positions in the process. At some points he felt like she was trying to fold him up until he was mashed into a ball, but this time, Blake wanted to try fighting back if only to see how it'd go.

Amy quickly notices his struggles while she cracked two eggs on the frying pan, causing her to giggle and say “Are you trying to be tough, Blake…? Let's see how long you can manage against me…” It soon became a fierce battle, as Amy's toes seemed to always hold the advantage, but Blake occasionally managed to slip away and resist, amusing the giantess.

While this great struggle was occurring, Amy was happily cooking the eggs, only really paying attention to Blake in the corner of her mind. In a way, that might have been why he was having a moderate level of success, but he had no way of knowing that personally. And since Amy wanted her meal to be tasty for her and Blake, she let him feel like he was holding the advantage, finding his spirited resistance to be incredibly adorable.

As Amy fried the eggs, she got another pan to cook a small strip of scrapple too, wanting to make sure both she and Blake had a varied breakfast. Around this time, he managed to avoid her 3rd to, inspiring him to try and wrestle with her 4th one, causing Amy to lightly chuckle while saying “Look at you… You've sure got a lot of energy!” Right after saying this, she pins Blake down under that toe, immobilizing him while saying “You'll need to try a lot harder…”

Now that Blake was pinned, he grabs that toe and squeezes it as hard as he can, causing Amy to giggle and say “Aww… You're hugging the very same toe that so meanly bullied you all night…? You're so precious…” But now that the eggs were almost done, Amy shifts her attention back to the stove, while allowing Blake to win a few minor victories against her toes.

As she focused on the eggs, she puts a slice of rye bread in the toaster, while Blake started punching her 4th toe. Because of his puny size, it only really tickled her slightly, so she allowed him to continue unobstructed, as if to repay him for aggressively abusing him all night and into the morning without ever realizing it.

Before long, the breakfast was finally ready, so she starts piling it onto her plate neatly, before walking to the table. To her surprise, Blake prepared himself for this, as he managed to crawl on top of her 3rd and 4th toes. She decides to give Blake this victory, since it was a clever move, before sitting down.

Once she was seated, she shakes off her moccasins, threatening to toss Blake to the floor. And when he looks up, he sees Amy grinning down at him, before swiftly capturing him with her other set of toes. Now that he was successfully transferred, she squeezes and mashes him with great vigor, overpowering the tiny mage in an instant. As she does this, she laughs and says “I'm impressed Blake, but I hope you remember that you only win if I don't feel like trying…”

She continues to manhandle Blake ceaselessly, scrunching him again and again, while saying “So long as you remain this fun to play with, you'll be my favorite little boy toy…” After that, Amy frees Blake and places him on her palm, allowing him to dust himself off.

And while he shakes away his dizziness, she giggles and says “You really tried hard, so feel proud of yourself for that!” Blake beamed proudly when he heard that, but then she smirks and adds, saying “If we've learned one thing though, it's that my toes are deadly weapons for tiny mages, and whether or not I notice those tiny mages doesn't seem to matter to them…”

Following that, Amy frees Blake and drops him onto her plate of food while saying “At your size, I think we can safely share everything. You don't mind, right?”

Blake nods, before saying “I'm cool with it, but please watch out for me…”

When Amy hears that, she nods back and says “Of course Blake! If Claire found out I accidentally ate you, I think she might actually kill me…” She then nervously laughs and says “Let's both be careful. You're not the easiest guy to keep track of at your size…”

With that excellent point, Blake and Amy both begin eating, as they each tried to do so carefully. Unfortunately, they were both ravenously hungry, causing them to both get more careless as they ate.

The big question is, does Blake eat his breakfast without an accidental disturbance by Amy…? Or does he get scooped up by the starved giant by mistake...?
054221221111111.title: Early Morning with Amy's Toes

choices: Blake asks to go in Amy’s sock (don't add here please)
Blake asks to go outside Amy’s sock
0542212211111111.content:
Luckily for Blake, he manages to finish eating safely, since he only really needed a few scraps to fill up now, so he waits next to Amy as she continues to scarf down her food. It was more than a bit intimidating for him to watch her devour her food, especially since he could easily get stuck to her food without her ever noticing in time.

But with that thought, Blake climbs off of her plate and wait for her to finish, thinking about how lucky he was that Amy discovered. From the beginning, she was incredibly fun with him, indulging him with his size-related interests without a complaint. And it was even more fun when she lost track of him, as her toes seemed hardwired to thoroughly abuse him, which was awesome in his book.

Then, he looks down toward the floor, and notices her furiously playing with her moccasins, idly shuffling and tossing them about, making him wonder how he never noticed that about her before.

After a few minutes though, Amy puts her utensils down and smiles, before saying “That hit the spot… Did you eat enough?”

Blake nods and says “Yeah I'm full. It tasted great!”

Amy playful rubs Blake's head while saying “You're so sweet Blake… Are you ready to get to our tests? I'm excited…”

Blake nods again and says “Yep! What are we doing first?”

With that, Amy grins and snatches the tiny mage up, bringing him into her personal lab. Once she set him down, he looks around and sees all the different machines and piles of papers, as Amy giggles and says “It can get a little messy in here…”

Following that, Amy pulls out a computer chip half the size of Blake, before quietly tinkering with it. As she does this, she apathetically says “Give me a few minutes… Wanna go in my moccasin so you don't get bored?”

This was a side of Amy that Blake heard about from his mom, since he'd only seen her when she was relaxing at their house. Apparently, whenever she was doing stuff in her lab or at work, everything else around her became unimportant. And after hearing about Amy’s behavior while in her lab, Blake was incredibly interested in seeing what it would be like, even more so if he could be her small toe toy while she worked.

But Blake nods and says “I'd like that, thanks!”

In response to that, Amy merely says “Sure...” After that uninterested reply, Amy grabs Blake uncaringly and deposits him into her left moccasin. Once he was there, he notices that the potent odor from before was just as noticeable at the moment, as the smell of sweat caused him to cough a bit. And before he could get readjusted to this location, she shuffles her foot inside and begins to toy with him, barely giving him a chance to react.

Her toes squeeze and writhe, smothering Blake with a brutal efficiency, while their master tinkers up above. They continue to manipulate the tiny mage, treating like a piece of dough to be kneaded, overwhelming him with her sweat all throughout the experience.

Blake remains the researcher's plaything for nearly 15 minutes, as he gets repeatedly slammed against her warm and affectionate toes. She doesn't even give him a moment to breathe, vigorously mashing him between her sweaty toes, while intently focused on her work up above. And whenever he would slip away to catch his breath, her toes would immediately recapture him, as if they wanted him to pass out first. After that time passed, which felt far longer for the diminutive mage, Amy cheers to herself and exclaims “And… done! That's how the head of R&D rolls!”

Following that, Amy frees Blake, lifting him up to her desk while saying “You did a great job as my thinking tool! You should consider a career in this… I know I'd give you plenty of business, personally…”

Blake blushes when he hears that, as he smiles and says “Yeah… I'm glad you've got my back!”

After that, Amy proceeds to explain what she was working on, as she says “I set this device up so it'd accurately record your vitals and basically everything else about you, since I've got a few challenging tasks in mind for today. This way we'll have some data, besides your testimony!”

When Blake hears this, he looks up and says “Wow! You work crazy fast!”

Amy happy grins when she hears that, as she says “Thanks for the compliment, Blake! What else did you expect from me?”

After that, Blake asks “How does that thing work?”

Amy smiled in response and says “I'm glad you asked! Basically, it's able to record the vitals of anything within a certain range. So even if I don't attach it to you, it'll still work fine. Normally, we'd place it under your skin since it's so thin, but I'm afraid we can't make chips small enough for mages of your super puny stature just yet…”

Blake nods and says “That's fair… So what's the first test?”

Amy proceeds to smirk while saying “This is right around when I take my morning jog, so what could be a better stress test than stuffing you in my sock while I go…?”

When Blake hears this, he grows excited as he says “You'll really let me go with you??”

Amy nods and says “Of course! Remember what I said last night? I'll make sure to thoroughly punish you so Claire might go easier on you; but we can ignore the fact that you'll definitely like my acts of discipline…”

Blake nods in agreement, as he says “I like your plan! I'm ready when you are…”

Following that, Amy brings Blake back into her room, pulling out a pair of light pink ankle socks. After that, she grabs her dark pink running shoes and stitches the computer chip into the side of the sneaker, making sure that it was working properly.

Once she seemed ready, Amy smiles and says “For the record, you can go outside my sock if you’d rather do that. I’ll get my data regardless, but I’d feel you better if you went in my sock. Especially since I’ll be able to really feel your tiny struggles, so I’d personally prefer it if you did that. But I’m not here to boss you around!”

Blake prepares to retort, but Amy cuts him off as she says “I should restate that; I’m not bossing you around this time. Apparently I’ve got a bad habit of pushing you around, but can you blame me when you’re so teeny tiny and easy to bully…? Consider it a compliment, Blake!”

What would Blake rather do? (And no, this isn’t a last minute choice because I originally made the chapter too long for the character limit. Shut up.)
0542212211111111.title: Prepping for a Morning Jog

choices: Blake wants to shower on his own (don't add here please)
Blake joins Amy for a crazier shower
05422122111111111.content:
After that, she separates her toes and pokes Blake deep between them, staring in bemusement as his body contorted to her whims. Once he was secure, she tugs her sock on while saying “I'll see you a bit later, Blake… Have fun!”

Once her sock was on and Blake was trapped in darkness, he casts his night vision spell again as Amy put on her sneakers. Then, she smiles and says “This chip will send the info to my phone, so let me make sure everything is working properly. Ya know, calibrate it and stuff…”

Before saying another word, Amy lifts her foot high into the air, before slamming it down as hard as she could. Blake was caught off guard, as her toes crushed him to harshly that the air was knocked out if him. Then, Amy checked the readings, while saying “All of your vitals look how they should after experiencing something sudden and dangerous. It works like a charm!”

Following that, she laughs and says “I hope you're ready to exercise, because I'm planning on working up a sweat…” After that final tease, Amy walks out her front door and starts her run, pounding Blake mercilessly with every second.

Now that Any was outside and moving, Blake was forced to contend with the full brunt of her immense weight. Even though she started with a slower jog, practically every step made him feel like his body might explode, even though he didn't notice a bit of actual damage. He briefly wonders if the psychological impacts of this overrode everything else, even though he knew he'd be just fine.

But as Amy jogged down her block, she laughs and says “I'm going to start listening to my music now Blake… But I've got a little surprise for you…” He wasn't sure what to expect, but then he suddenly heard what sounded like the main theme for the game Chrono Trigger, as she giggles and says “I did some tinkering on that sneaker while you weren't looking, and added a few tiny speakers for my equally tiny bug boy. Now you can enjoy the music with me!

As far as Blake was concerned, Amy was a genius, and her stunning beauty and only elevated his opinion of her in his mind. And despite how often he was getting crushed by her, he was simply proud of himself for getting over his shyness while around her. Then, Blake wonders if he could convince the spirits to shrink him on a regular basis, as he was sure that Amy would assist him in obtaining whatever they required for the spell.

His thoughts are interrupted Amy suddenly stops, overwhelming him as her toe flesh bared down on him, sandwiching him entirely between that and her warm sock. As she does this, she laughs and says “Sorry… Needed to stop at a red light…”

While Amy waited for the light to change, she started tapping her feet to the music, as Frog’s Theme was now playing, which was highly upbeat. Blake kept on getting smashed down under her sweaty toes, as the track played in the shoe, giving him something nice to listen to while she happily dominated him.

Soon the light changed, allowing Amy to continue, battering him endlessly with each step. She continues at this leisurely pace for about 20 minutes, while Blake was starting to really feel the burn. He was never the most active kid, since he would rather read or play video games, but just being in Amy's sock gave him a heavy workout, and she wasn't even finished yet.

After that, Amy stops for a moment and says “Doing okay in there, Blake…? You didn't pass out on me, did you?” She then starts to scrunch her toes, burying you among the sweaty flesh. As she does this, she taps her chin and says “I can't really tell if you're awake or not… Why don't you cast an ice spell for me if you're still kicking?”

Blake does as he was asked, shooting an ice spell toward the space between her 2nd and 3rd toes, causing her to happily grin and say “Oh that feels wonderful, Blake! You're such a convenient little guy…” But now that she knew that he was still awake, she giggles and says “I forgot to warn you, but I like to go all out for the last 10 minutes of my run. You should prepare yourself…”

With that statement, Amy speeds up, getting herself up to a fast running pace, putting Blake through an even more intense experience. Each time her food collided with the sidewalk, he thought that his body would be obliterated underfoot. And right after the initial collision, her toes would dig into him as she prepared to lift the other leg.

All during this, Blake could feel his body get flatter by the second, as her sweat kept him lubricated within the stuffy sock. Everything became a blur at this point, as he could no longer process what was happening properly, as the pounding of her toes became almost normal.

Due to that, Blake continued to space out until Amy finished her run, after which she popped off her sneakers and yanked off her socks. And now that Blake could feel fresh air again, Amy reaches down and frees him, before placing him on her palm. Now that he was free, he was able to see how she was currently dressed.

Amy was presently wearing a red tank top and a white pair of short shorts, as her dark and short hair looked messy and damp with sweat. When she notices Blake's stares, she giggles to herself and says “You okay Blake…? I look pretty gross right now, don't I?”

Blake shakes his head though and says “You look amazing Amy…”

When Amy hears that, her eyes widen as she says “Oh you're such a tiny charmer…!” She then reaches down and plants her gigantic lips on the tiny boy, wanting to give him a quick kiss. Blake felt like he was going to get sucked into her mouth as his mind was overwhelmed by this awesome occurrence, before she ended this kiss and looked down at him happily.

But then she suddenly scowls, as her face scrunched as she says “Eww… You taste awful! Are you sure you actually like my feet and aren't just crazy…?”

Blake shakes head, while stumbling from that unexpected kiss, before saying ‘Your feet are incredible! I'd stay near them all day if you let me…”

When Amy hears this, she smiles and says “That could be arranged… You know how much I adore your presence near them, and we both know that my toes are your biggest fans, even if they seem to enjoy bullying you most of all…”

But after that, she smiles and says “Would you like to get washed off? I have something designed to clean small devices, so it should handle your clothes just fine.”

Blake nods, but then she slyly grins and says “Though, I need to take a shower too, since I'm just covered in sweat. You can always join me, if you think you'll need assistance with washing yourself. I have no issues with the tiny mage being my shower buddy…

Now this was a unique and powerful chance for Blake. When he first saw Amy at this size, he briefly fantasized watching her shower in secret, but now she gave him an open invitation to join her! How could he pass up on this?

Whatever the case, Blake was given a choice, so he eventually makes his decision…
05422122111111111.title: A Morning Run in a Sock

choices: Blake lands on the sink, allowing him to shower as planned (don't add here pls)
Blake falls off, toward Amy’s washcloth on the floor
054221221111111111.content:
Blake thinks for a little bit, before saying “I think I'd rather just wash up by myself…”

Amy just smiles and says “That's fine! Let's get you all set up…”

Following that, Amy jury rigs a small shower for Blake, taking some time to make sure it would work properly for him. Before she starts though, she stares at him slyly, worrying him as she suddenly grabs him while saying “I’ll need to work some of my own magic to get your shower working properly, so I’ll need some heavy motivation… You wouldn’t mind letting me use your services again, would you?”

Even though Blake had no issue with the idea, he feels like being snarky, so he says “But I’ve literally been away from your foot for less than five minutes…”

Amy merely laughs and says “I know… I have a feeling that my toes might be a bit obsessed with you, because they already miss you like crazy…” But then she smirks and adds, saying “Now that I think about it, why should I have to ask my little buggy guest…? He should jump at the chance to assist me, since I’m being so accommodating…”

With that, Amy drops Blake onto the carpet, allowing him to bounce on the soft flooring until he came to a stop. And once he could stand up, he brushed himself off as a dark shadow formed over him, causing him to look back and see Amy’s sweat soaked foot raised overhead. This time though, Blake didn’t want to be an easy target, so he casts a speed boosting spell and a jump increase spell, making him far more agile.

Due to that, he avoids Amy’s toes just in time, as she giggles and says “That was pretty clever Blake…” Then she grins and adds, saying “If you want me to earn my toe toy, then I’m game! Let’s see how long you can keep this up, little mage boy…”

Following that declaration of war, Blake continued to dodge Amy’s foot at the last possible second every time, making him wonder if she was actually toying with him, like how a cat might treat their prey. He doesn’t let that distract him though, since Amy barely gave him a second to spare, as she started to slam her foot harder and harder. And as the resulting shockwaves and dust clouds made it more difficult for Blake to see, Amy giggles and says “You’re definitely a quick little bug, but will your stamina outlast mine…?”

Due to how often Amy was stomping her foot, it was becoming difficult for Blake to see clearly, and he had to many spells active already to improve his vision too. And any time he tried to escape the general area, she made sure to block his path with her giant foot, ensuring that she remained in full control of the general situation. Despite all of that, it still felt good for him to be able to avoid Amy’s foot for this long, as it was a major magic confidence booster for him. Since he lived a fairly normal life so far, without going on any dangerous adventures, he never needed to use his magic to this degree. But he was maintaining the two spells fairly well, while somehow avoiding Amy’s constantly stomping foot, even though he was starting to lose focus a bit.

Then, as Blake went to dodge Amy’s foot yet again, she surprises him by trying to swipe him with her other foot, sending him flying back from the resulting gust of wind, nearly colliding with the nearby wall. While he struggled to get back up, Amy haughtily laughed and said “Did you get this worked up and forget that I’ve got two feet at my disposal…? You’re definitely a skilled little mage, but you’ve gotta think outside the box…”

Before Blake could get back up, Amy uses her feet to corner him against the wall, he grins while saying “Don’t think I’m giving up just yet!” Following that, he casts a stronger jump boost spell while deactivating his speed spell, before leaping high up in the air. Amy watches him curiously, as he then casts a wind spell, propelling him forward and under her chair, officially escaping from her for the moment.

As he scurries further under the chair, Amy whistles to herself while saying “Okay, that’s pretty clever Blake! I’ve still got one more trick up my sleeve though…” Following that, she starts to rub her feet together slowly, while loudly sighing and saying “I can’t wait until I can get cleaned off… My feet feel so gross right now… Might as we get back to work…” Blake wasn’t sure what Amy was planning, but then she adds, saying “Without something to keep my toes busy, it’ll probably take twice as long to set up Blake’s shower. What a shame… I would have loved to feel his tiny body between my toes, but I would have felt so bad, since they’re so sweaty. What can a lady do…?”

It seems like Amy’s final strategy was to guilt and seduction, and despite Blake’s previous boasts, this was having a powerful effect on him. As he debated to himself about what to do next, Amy slides her legs back, before crossing her ankles and flicking her toes against each other, providing the small mage with an engaging show. And while she continued to flex her footwork to him, he was drawn closer like a moth to a flame, eventually touching her right big toe before even realizing it.

Amy notices this instantly, and scoops him up and trapping him between that toe and the ball of her foot. As she toys with him, Amy profusely giggles while saying “See that Blake? Mental warfare sometimes is the most effective…” After that, she clenches her toes even harder, burying Blake deeply in the soft and moistened flesh, while saying “You get an A from me though, especially with that little escape move! And you’ll always get an A+ when it comes to being my toe toy, so you should be proud Blake...”

But as she continued to tinker at her desk, she dully mumbles, saying “Looking good so far…” The coolest part of this was that despite how bored Amy sounded while working on her inventions, her toes remained spirited and energetic, as if they stole away her typical fun and excitable personality. His thoughts were interrupted though, as she begins to slam the ball of her foot into the hardwood floor repeatedly, as if she wanted to crush his body into a fine paste. Thankfully, Blake’s durability held strong, as Amy continued to work on his shower, spending almost twenty minutes hard at work.

And right when Blake thought he’d pass out from being intensely used by Amy’s sweat coated toes, she suddenly cheers to herself while yelling “And... done!!” Following that, she quickly picks him out from deep between her toes, as she giggles while saying “I thank you for your noble sacrifice, Blake… I was worried that it’d take me an hour to get that prepared, so now I can shower too!” Blake only gives Amy a weak thumbs up, as he was still a bit dizzy from his passionate date with her possessive and affectionate toes, so she brings him and the new shower into the bathroom with her.

Following that, Blake removes his clothes and places them in a small washing device that Amy set up next to his shower, while she prepared to start her own shower. But since they were currently in the same room, Blake hides behind a wall nervously as he says “Shouldn’t I be in the other room??”

Amy merely giggles and says “This’ll be just fine Blake…” After saying that, she went into a nearby closet to grab a washcloth, wanting to get herself ready before teasing Blake further. And at the very same time, Blake snuck closer to the sink’s edge, wanting to get a clear view of the room before Amy returned.

But as he was looking around, Amy walked into the room and suddenly tripped, causing her washcloth to fall directly below where Blake was standing. As he watched it fall, he turned around and saw Amy crashing down in his direction, as she hastily grabbed the sink. And as he fell down, he hoped that nothing bad would happen. Where does Blake land…?

0542212211111111111.content:

He then heads into the shower, glad that nothing bad happened as Amy draped a towel over his shower box, preventing him from seeing anything outside of it and making him feel less bashful. After that, Amy strips down, happy to peel her hot and sweaty clothes off, before stepping into her shower. And as she washed off, the roar of the shower filled Blake’s ears even from down at the sink area, but then a different noise started to spread around the room. To Blake’s surprise, Amy started to sing to herself while basking under the warm stream of water, and he thought that she sounded beautiful.

And Blake got to have a relaxing shower while getting to listen to Amy’s wonderful singing voice, before he finishes and gets his now dry clothes. In front of Blake was Amy, towering over him, fully nude and dripping wet, causing him to freeze while blushing. Consider this my little reward for always making my toes feel happy… Plus for dealing with how much I wind up pushing you around, which is only sometimes intended...”

Since Amy gave him her blessing, he sat down fully dressed and watched as she stood in front of him, checking her face in a nearby mirror. At his angle, he could see more of Amy than he ever thought he would, making him feel lucky to be alive. Her breasts were insanely huge right now, although he’d have no way of guessing how large they’d be to a normally sized person, but he couldn’t help that since he was small enough that one of her boobs seemed more like a small mountain to him.

Thankfully, he was positioned a bit too high up to see her private area, as he might actually faint from shock if that was visible to him. But in general, Amy had a very slender body type, but also looked slightly curvy overall, and this only made him view her as even more visually stunning. His chance to simply watch Amy as she stood still didn’t last that long though, as she quickly started to dry off, rubbing her large fluffy towel all across her body.

Blake continued to observe Amy as she did this, getting see look at her from every angle as she constantly turned about while drying off. At one point, Amy turned around and revealed her butt to Blake, causing his eyes to widen at the sight. Because of how unexpected that was, he fell back, while noting that it looked like how expected a butt to look, without being able to make any other clear observations.

Eventually, Amy finished and picked Blake up, carrying him back into her bedroom, still fully naked. As she carried him in her open palm, he covered his eyes while yelling “A… Amy!! Shouldn’t y… you cover yourself up??”

Amy just laughs and says “Why? It’s just us… And I don’t mind you taking a peek now and then…”

After that, she throws her damp towel onto her bed, before throwing Blake onto it next, causing him to crash into the soft mass. As he climbed out to freedom, Amy giggled while saying “If you got this embarrassed by seeing me after my shower, imagine how flustered you'd have been if you joined me for it…? I would have loved to see that…”

Following that, Amy smiles and says “Feel free to look if you want… It won’t take long for me to get dressed…” With that invitation, Blake watches intently as Amy started by slipping on a pair of pink panties with a white star design, causing him to immediately blush. Amy watches him with extreme amusement, as she continues to get dressed in front of the tiny boy.

Once she was dressed, he turns around and sees that she was now wearing a light blue blouse shirt and a black skirt, along with matching black flats. After that, she smiles and says “How do I look…?”

He merely stares for a few seconds, before simply saying “...Stunning…” Amy found his antics as adorable as ever, so she picks him up and brings him into her living room. Once she was there, she places him in her palm, before looking at him happily.

After that, she smiles and says “What do you want to do next? I have a few ideas. Want to hear them…?”

Blake nods and says “Sure! What did you have in mind, Amy?”

Amy grins after that and says “So my first idea is to invite Claire over. I meant what I said before about being her toe toy, and I really think she'd like it. I'm sure she'd want to see you and hold you herself, at the very least.” But then she smirks and says “If you wanna surprise her, I can always say you're sleeping in, and just sneak you in her shoe. That could be a fun little experience. Do you think her toes will be as mean as mine get with you, or do you think they'll recognize and want to spoil you instead? I'm fascinated, personally…”

Then she continues, saying “I also have more experimental ideas for you. I can always test your size limits in more and more different ways. At the very least, that shower left my toes feeling lonely, so you might just need to act as my personal pebble for another shift. I might even have some tinkering to do, so you'll surely have a wild time…”

Blake didn't think of inviting his mom, but it sounded like an interesting idea. And he would be willing to act as her toe toy if it'd make his mom feel better, especially if it'd get her to lessen his punishment.

But Amy's first experiment was incredibly fun, so doing more of that sounded like the perfect idea. And after that first experience between her toes while she was actively inventing might have been his most intense bout with Amy's fleshy beasts yet, so that'd also be a good idea.

Eventually though, Blake comes to a decision…

05422122111111111111.title: Blake Gets a Choice (Aware of Unaware?)

Amy claims Blake for herself again, with Claire's approval
054221221111111111111.content:
Blake thinks that seeing his mom might be a good thing, so he looks to Amy and says “Can you invite her? And you don't need to hide me or anything…”

Amy nods and says “Sounds good to me!” Following that, she calls Claire and tells her that Blake wanted to see her, so she agrees to head over soon.

While they waited, Amy and Blake chatted to pass the time, as she says “Can you do any tricks with your magic? Could you create shapes if you used a fire or ice spell?”

Blake scratches his chin and says “I've never actually tried it…”

Amy then nods and says “I see… I'm sure if you practiced that, then your friends would definitely find it cool.”

He decides to keep that in mind, appreciative of all the times Amy had advised him about impressing girls.

After a few more minutes, Claire arrives and enters, before saying “Hello…!” Right now, Claire was wearing a striped T-shirt along with a white short sleeve cardigan, with a pair of black slacks and some gray flats.

Blake then waves at his mom, who quickly picks him up and stares at him in disbelief, as he says “Hi mom… Sorry for worrying you last night…”

Claire merely presses Blake against her cheek, hugging him the way she might a small pet, as she says “I'm so happy to see you! How are you feeling…?” She then releases him and starts to poke and prod at him while saying “You didn't get injured at all, right? Amy took good care of you?”

Blake nods at both questions, as Amy laughs and says “He was quite well behaved. I even got to learn all about his magic stuff. Wanna hear about it Claire…?”

Claire nods, so Amy explains everything she learned from Blake, leaving Claire speechless. Once she learned about everything, Claire took a deep breath and said “I never knew you were keeping all of this a secret… I wish you told me, Blake…”

Blake looks down and says “Sorry mom… I thought you'd not let me continue to practice magic…”

Claire then sighs and says “Honestly, I probably would have stopped you. But at this point, I can't exactly do that, can I?”

Following that, Amy smiles and says “To change the subject, I made quite the discovery with little Blake…”

Claire looks at her friend curiously and says “Did you learn how to reverse this?”

Amy shakes her head and says “Nope. For that, I think he'll need to visit those spirits again. But there's no need to rush…”

Claire then looks at Amy with a hint of confusion, as she says “Well what did you both discover?”

With that, Amy informs Claire about Blake's little fetish for feet and how he ended up being an excellent stress toy for your toes. As she listened, she stared with wide, shock filled eyes, while Blake looked down with extreme embarrassment.

Once Amy finishes explaining all of that, Claire glares at her friend and says “You put Blake in your shoe?? What in the world is wrong with you…?”

Amy merely chuckles and says “I'm just doing the little guy a favor. He was a huge fan of the idea…”

Claire shakes her head and says “He could have been injured!”

Amy merely sighs and says “Did you hear the whole magic thing? Blake invulnerable to harm at this size. I doubt we'd actually be able to hurt him even if we wanted to…”

Claire proceeds to scratch at her hair in a frustrated manner, while saying “This is just crazy…”

But then Blake smiles up at his mom and says “I'd like to make you feel more relaxed, so can I please do this for you…?”

Claire finally gives in and sighs, before saying “I'll admit that I do have a bad headache from the party, so maybe I could use some stress relief. You're 100% sure that you'll be safe with this, Blake?”

Blake nods and says “Definitely! I ended up falling in Amy's boot at the party, and I was under her foot for hours, and I was fine!” He then laughs proudly to himself and adds, saying “I even went in Amy's sock during her morning run, and I ended up totally okay…”

When Claire hears this, she glares at Amy again and says “Were you trying to kill my baby boy…?”

Amy simply giggles and says “It was all for research, I swear…!” But then she smirks and adds, saying “If you don’t wanna do it, I’d be willing to make use of Blake instead. I’m a big fan of his stress relieving ability…”

Claire sighs when she hears that, as she says “You just want to bully my son some more… If he didn’t enjoy it then I’d have some serious words for you…”

Amy just shrugs and says “That’s fair… You can make the decision though…”

Claire thinks for a moment, apparently not feeling the need to ask for Blake’s opinion, but he’d have no issue regardless of her choice. He definitely wanted his mom to have a chance, since it’d be a great way to relieve her stress, and he definitely still felt guilty for making her worry last night. But getting ruthlessly abused by Amy’s toes was a new but beloved pastime for him, so that’d be awesome to him as well.

What does Claire decide to do…?

Claire nervously frowns while shuffling her feet out of her flats, providing Blake with some fresh air while keeping him lodged between her toes, before saying “I wish you’d keep that stuff to yourself… You’re lucky he seems to enjoy the whole experience, as well as your company…” Her slight annoyance at her laidback friend was expressed through her toes, as they clamped down on Blake, burying him in the warm and sticky flesh.

I like to push the envelope with him specifically because he likes it when I do so. But Blake really has matured in such a short amount of time…”

Claire smiles and nods, while saying “He really has… I remember just last year when you stopped by for a drink, and Blake could barely say three words to you without stammering up a storm… Now look at him, chatting with you like you’re his buddy…” Her toes proceed to clamp down on Blake hard, as if hugging him with loving care.

Right after that, Amy changes the subject and says “Hey! Do you wanna get some ice cream real quick? I’m sure Blake would find a frozen treat at his size to be amazing…”

Claire merely sighs and says “I think you’re getting a bit obsessed…” But then she smiles and whispers, preventing Blake from hearing as she says “I don’t mind doing that, since Blake has his little crush on you after all…”

Amy giggles a bit more and whispers back, saying “I know… He’s so sweet with me, even when I unintentionally abuse him with my toes, so I’m trying to indulge him as thanks for putting up with me…”

When Claire hears this, she frowns with worry as she says “The less I know about it the better. Since I know that he’ll be fine with the invulnerability, I’m less concerned as long as he still enjoys himself. Claire scratches her chin as she says “That’s good to hear. Just don’t let that give you an excuse to push him around too much, okay Amy?” Amy mischievously smirks, as Claire adds, saying “Did Blake sleep well last night?” As she asks this, Claire shakes off her right flat and begins to shift Blake around, using her toes to move him about idly. She had a strong hold on him, and could skillfully manipulate him, until depositing him in the space between her 3rd and 4th toes.

Amy begins to nervously laugh in response to that question, as she says “Well, he slept well, but I didn’t exactly make it easy for him…” She then explains that she kept him in her sock between her toes for the night, mainly for warmth, and also explains that she got excessively harsh with him as she slept. Amy then describes how she apparently woke Blake up every few hours, pestering him roughly, before suddenly leaving him alone again. I’d need to collect data on him tonight though, so I can have something to work off of, just to be sure…”

Surprisingly, Claire smirks and says “Maybe you have some pent up aggression, Amy…?” As she says this, she clenches her toes, plastering Blake against her soft flesh, finding him to be enjoyable to toy with regardless of where he was located on her foot.

Amy’s eyes widen when she hears this, as she says “That’s cold, Claire! I’ll have you know that Blake has enjoyed it each and every time I’ve absentmindedly bullied him.” She then smirks and adds, saying “It’s not like you’re treating him any better right now…”

He wouldn’t want me to baby him.” Blake thought that his mom had a point, since he’d rather her actually de-stress with him rather than worry about him the entire time, since he was gifted with physical invulnerability. Due to that, Blake casts an ice spell toward the space between Claire's 2nd and 3rd toes, hoping that would jolt her memory.
