Soaring nonstop through the summer air, you keep your eyes peeled for a brunette clad in yellow -- Aria, the girl of your dreams. The streets of New Opal are rather quiet today...is everybody on vacation or something?

Eventually, walking in your direction without a care in the world, you see her -- Aria. The girl you've been crushing on since middle school. Her gorgeous brown hair, her cute yellow shirt and golden skirt, her lovely blue eyes, her delicate lips...but that's not all you like about her. She's the nicest girl you'd ever met!

As the giantess unwarily approaches your position on the sidewalk...

055332112.title: Frog Food?

0553321121.content:
Before you could react, something wet grabs you and pulls you away from Aria, darkness covering before a gulp is heard. Squeezed down by a wet tube, you didn't take long to realize, a frog got you and had you inside its stomach, as you plunge into a fleshy sack of acid.
"Delicious," a mature woman's voice said, coming around you as the frog starts to hop away.
Confused, you try to contact the woman, a part of you believing it was the frog.
"Help, I'm a human turned into a fly and was eaten by a frog! ," You scream out, hoping someone hears you and the frog's movements cease.
"Oh my! To think I ate a former human! Tell me, how did you end up in that state? ," She asked, revealing herself to be the frog.
"I was trying to make myself more handsome by using potion recipes from my spellbook and..."
"You have a spellbook!? Where is it?.," She asks eagerly, interrupting you.
"My apologies, I've been turned into a frog for a very long time and I wish to see myself human once more," she said, you understanding her sentiment.
"That's okay. I also want to be human again, so head over to the blue house with the open window to the right. That window goes to my room, where the book is..." You said, now realizing you couldn't get to it now.
"Worry not, I'll get us there, even if it almost drains my mana," the frog said, sensing your break off.
"Really? Alright then! I'll stay here while fending off your digestive system as you get there, Miss..." You said, now realizing you didn't ask her name.
"The great socrecoress supreme, Bertha Evergood! ," She announce, though you never heard of her.
"Blake," you said, short compared to her introduction as she hops to your house quickly.
Eventually, she gets underneath the window sill and you wonder how she'll do it, until you feel her magical aura around your host. It takes a while, someone spotting a levitating frog, that would sway occasionally, but paid no mind to it as she reaches the window and hops in. Now on your desk, Bertha spots the book not to far and hops to it immediately.
"Ugh, it's not the one I would have liked, but it should do, if I don't mind any side effects. Blake, you still alive in there?, " She asks.
"Yeah, just do you have any mana to spare? ," He said, shooting back a question to her.
"Of course! The only reason why I stayed as a frog this long is because I needed a spellbook as a medium, percularly one that could null curses," she explains before flipping through it and reciting the spell.
As the chant goes on, the stomach widens out as you slowly return to your human form, though you stay the same size.
"As I thought, there were side effects, on both of us, considering my stomach isn't bulging out. I suppose a reward is needed, as if it wasn't for your help, I would be stuck as a frog forever. You shall have me as a wife, and now let me knoy husband's face! ," She said, sucking in air and loudly belching you out, as you try to tell her that it wasn't necessary for that kind of reward, only to fail as you're spat into her hand.
As you wipe off her saliva, you immediately could tell she was a beautiful bluenette woman, wearing a purple dress with her massive cleavage exposed and a matching witch's hat. However, you could see what she meant by side effect, as it left her body...

05533211211.content:
Looking at the green giantess before you, you could see not only she was beautiful, but sexy, as her breasts were larger than K cups and her hips were wider than your desk. She smirked as she saw you staring at her and turned to walk over to your bed, revealing her dress straining, yoga ball sized butt cheeks.
"I'm glad you're enjoying the view. Just wait until I completely remove the spell on both of us, ribbit!" She said, grimacing at the frog sound she made as she sits down on your bed, sinking in a few inches deep.
"While you're indeed beautiful and I rather say sexy, I've already have a crush on someone else, so sorry. I can't be your husband. Besides, you're older than me and that may lead to some problems later in the future, but if you really want to reward me, just teach me magic as it looks like you know a lot!" You said, hoping to dissuade her.

"Hey, didn't you hear what I said before? I..."
"I heard, but I must refute it, as it doesn't matter as it contradicts with the vow of marrying my saviour, if they remove my curse from my 358 year old body!" She said pridefully, interrupting you as you stood there slack jawed.
Before anything else could be said, your door opens, revealing Jade to come in.
"Hey Blake, are you here, as I heard a loud..." She manages to say before Bertha shoots out her tongue at her and yanks your sister back as Jade...
05533211211.title: Froggish woman

055332112111.content:
You watch horrified as your sister shrinks down to your size before entering Bertha's mouth and is quickly gulped down to her stomach.
"That... Was my sister," you said, completely shocked as the frog woman belched while rubbing her belly.
Hearing you, Bertha stares down at her bloated gut as she nervously chuckles.
"I thought she was an enemy and also, I still have a few of my frog instincts," she replies, you keep staring at her in shock.
"Don't worry, I'll cast a protective spell on her now," she said, a glow emitted from inside of her comes and goes.
You stare at her announce as she smiles back at you with a newlywed wife aura around her and her belly shows off tiny bumps from your sister's attempts to escape. Your door opens again, only for your mother to show up and starts asking a question.
"Hey kids, do you know what that sound was? It sounded like a bur..."
Just like your sister, Bertha yanks her to her mouth as your mother shrinks and enters her stomach, Bertha's belly now poking out.
"That was my mom you just ate!" You said, no longer shocked, but now annoyed at the green giantess.
"Very well, then I shall protect her as well. You would not have any other living here, as I don't think I can take in another," she said, her face cramping as she rubs her bugley belly and the same glow returns briefly.
Her belly gurgles omiously and before either of you could do anything, a huge, lenghty fart escapes from Bertha's thick bottom, much to her relief and embarrassment.
"Pardon me! Your family are giving me quite the indigestion! I think I'll render them unconscious and wipe their memories before spitting them out," she said, grimacing from her gas and leaves, holding her belly in pain.
You stare at her, until you could no longer see her bulbous cheeks and take a breath of relief, only to start coughing violently. Bertha's swampy flatulence quickly spread throughout your room and eventually overcame your consciousness.

Waking up in your bed, normal sized, you sigh in relief and try to move, only to realize that something, or someone, was restraining you. Seeing the nude form of Bertha, you groan while you blush at her and Bertha slowly wakes up.
"Good morning, husband dearest," she said, smiling at you.
"Morning, Bertha."
"I've extracted the in-laws out of my stomach, along with their memories of the event, and temporarily restored your size, but if you remove that medallion around your neck, you'll shrink down again," she explains, you now noticing the medallion around your neck and then check the time.
Seeing how close you're cutting it to being late for school, you wriggle out of her grasp and start to change.
"What's wrong?"
"I'm going to be late for school, but don't come! You aren't ready for the outside world until you get our common sense," you said, before leaving Bertha behind.
She doesn't move, until her face fixes itself into a frown and she gets up.
"This school is probably where he met my rival. Time for me to prepare!"

As you're heading to school, your exhausted mind relaxes for a bit, getting some room from Bertha's antics, but when you get there, you see Bertha there already.
"What are you doing here?" You asked angrily.
"I've decided to go to school, to learn more of this era, as I pose as...."
055332112111.title: Snack in-laws

choices: Bertha spits Jade up and wipes her memory.
Bertha absorbs Jade, fusing the two of them together.
055332112112.content:
… could only let out a startled scream as she was flung towards the frog woman’s gaping mouth. Blake watched on, paralyzed in horror, as his sister’s head vanished between Bertha’s lips, which rested on the younger girl's neck for only the briefest of seconds. Her shoulders were slurped in next, followed by her chest, her belly and back, then her legs; Jade’s body was being devoured at an impeccable, and extremely terrifying, speed. Soon, all that remained of her to the outside world was her feet, before Bertha hungrily snapped them up too. The entirety of the girl was quickly sent careening down into her gut with a loud and booming gulp. A chill rushed down Blake’s spine.

The bulge sunk behind gigantic, froggy breasts and was dumped into the predator’s stomach, causing the chamber to expand larger than humanly possible and spill over Bertha’s legs. The flesh hugged Jade tightly, exposing every nook and cranny of her curled-up form within the belly. She futilely struggled against the walls, hardly able to move within the confines of her prison, and the imprint of her face bore an expression of fear as she mouthed muffled pleas into the skin.

Blake was aghast at what he had just witnessed, his mouth hanging open in complete shock. Bertha let out a resounding belch before patting her overflowing tummy in satisfaction. “Oooohh! That was delicious! Almost as good as you were, hunny!” She teased, turning her head to wink towards her tiny husband. The look of horror he wore gave her pause. “What's the matter, dear?”

Blake managed to swallow down the fear that threatened to clog his throat. “That… was my sister!” His voice began weak, but quickly it evolved into a roar. His sister was in trouble! “Let her out now!” He yelled up at the frog girl.

Bertha was taken aback. “Your sister…?” She croaked, staring down wide-eyed at the outline of her wiggling meal. A smile came to her lips. “My sister-in-law, huh?” Reaching down, she took the stomach between her hands, playfully squeezing the groaning girl inside. She lifted it up, and held it for a few seconds, before letting it drop down with onto her legs again with unnerving slorp. “Nice to met you, dearest sister-in-law! Or should I say… eat you?” The frog giggled.

Blake was growing impatient. “Spit her out, Bertha! Now! Or I’ll never be your husband!”

Bertha stared down at him. A glint flashed in her eyes that made Blake suddenly remember the difference in size and magical power between the two. Nonetheless he stood his ground and kept his gaze locked with hers, even as that smile of her’s widened.
055332112112.title: Eating In-Laws

0553321121121.content:
Bursting into laughter, Bertha laughs so hard, her body jiggles from it, catching you off guard.
"Sorry for startling you. I would never harm my husband's family; just give them a bit of scare, that's all!" She said, you letting out a sigh of relief as she rubs her stomach.
"Oh, thank god for that! Now then, spit her out and I'll let you sleep with me for the time being," you said, only for her to shake her head no.
"While I can spit her out and wipe her memory, I don't want to. She was tasty and she feels so good in there, especially when she wasn't able to hear our conversation," she replies, slapping her gut and making Jade move around as much as she could.
"Of course, you wouldn't let her go that easily. I just wished I knew why you would do such a thing in the first place," you muttered to yourself, reaching Bertha's ears.
"That also reminds me, because of my semi-restoration, my enemies are probably aware that I'm back and you should be on guard for while until I'm fully back. Because of that, I thought your sister was one of them when she entered your room and I tried to eliminate her," she warns, her face becoming very serious.
"But for now, let's cuddle! Wife and husband need to know each other to make the relationship better!" She said, eventually losing her serious look and looks at you all lovey-dovey as you're teleported onto her belly, directly on Jade's head, much to your displeasure.

Meanwhile, a cloaked figure stares at your house and a wind blows by, revealing the figure to be a muscular woman. While the woman didn't look anything different, despite the clothes being in the way, an oddity could be found in the muscle gut she sported. Her belly bulged out to form a human being inside, though the muscles made it hard to tell.
"Alright, Miss Nora, time to work," she said as her green and heavily scaled hand pats her belly as she smiles at it, exposing some gator like teeth.

The next day, after Bertha regurgitate your sister and clean her memories, you found a magic tool not too far from you, with a note nearby. Reading that it would temporary restore your size, you take it, growing back to normal and do your usual morning ritual. As you head down, you could smell food and you enter the kitchen to see Bertha wearing just an apron. Even worse, she has the same kind of belly from yesterday, just larger.
"Don't tell me..."
"I thought I would cook for my husband and when your mother came in, I couldn't resist," she confesses, stroking her stomach, revealing the figure of your mother inside of it with a horrified expression on her face.
"Don't worry, I'll spit her out and wipe her memory too. It's just that your family is too delicious! Oh, hi sweetie!" She adds in, changing her tone when Jade entered the room.
"Hey mom! The food smells great!" She said, not realizing her mother was inside the imposter and you realized she's using an illusion spell on herself, drawing a sigh of defeat from you. Once breakfast was over, you head over to school as Bertha stays behind to learn much about the era she's in.
0553321121121.title: Wifey likes to joke

05533211211212.content:
The school day transpired like any other school day. There were brief moments when things felt amiss, when he would catch fleeting figures out of the corner of his eye, but all-in-all it was a calm and mundane day. While normally the routine was beyond boring to the young mage, after the strange little journey he had recently been through – being turned into a fly, eaten by a frog, that frog actually being a gorgeous and powerful woman who was adamant about marrying him, and had a nack for snacking on his family members – Blake was honestly extremely grateful for a period of relative sanity.

Sadly, he had little doubt that sanity would crumble away once he returned home. And indeed, as he shut the front door of the house behind him, Blake felt a chill fall upon him like a heavy curtain; a weight that spiked to a crushing degree as a sultry purr from the depths of the building snaked into his ear.

“Oh, honeeeey~!”

Blake shuddered, the blood in his veins running cold. He pondered for a moment over the extremely tempting idea of throwing the door open and making a break for it, but he quickly brushed that thought away as he recalled the overwhelming magical prowess of his would-be pursuer. Any attempt to escape her would no doubt prove futile.

With great effort, Blake pried his hand from the handle and hesitantly turned around. What he saw made him wish he hadn’t. (Sorta. His body was kinda fifty-fifty.)

Standing in the hallway, separated from him by only a minute gap, was Bertha, adorned in what was, with little doubt, the skimpiest lingerie he had ever seen. The wicked web of white fabric stretched from her neck to her neither region, keeping her all naughty bits hidden away while teasingly exposing the smooth green skin beneath. The intent of the clothing was made even more obvious by the naughty expression the frog woman kept upon him.

The sight stirred something primal withing Blake. A mighty need to reach forth and enjoy the willing and supple beauty before him. Yet he resisted it, unsure if it was a spell inflicting the feeling upon him or not, and clamped his hands over his eyes. “W-Where did you get that?!”

Bertha giggled, obviously amused by the boy’s embarrassment. “Your mother’s closet. She was nice enough to let me borrow it for our date tonight.”

“D-date?” Blake muttered in confusion. “Bertha, wha-Mmmpph!”

With his hands blocking his vision, he never saw Bertha close the distance between them, and was only made aware she had moved when her bosom hungrily engulfed the young mage’s head. “Hush, dearest.” She whispered, softly stroking the back of his head. “You just relax and let your loving wife take the lead.” Her husband safe within her grasp, she began her trek up the stairs towards Blake’s room.

A particularly bounce of Bertha’s body as she cleared another step freed Blake’s head from it’s enclosure. He gasped for air before looking up at the frog woman. “Wait, Bertha, please-”

Again Bertha, after giving him a somewhat sympathetic look, forced his face into the canyon of her tits. “I’m sorry, Blake,” She said as she finally reached the top of the stairs. “But no can do. I sensed a few of my old enemies hovering around your school. Thankfully, they didn’t get any closer, but I was so worried about you! Just thinking about all the terrible things they could've done if they had caught you – oh, it makes my blood boil!” She viciously growled, making her breasts vibrate around Blake. Approaching the bedroom door, the voluptuous woman smacked it open with her massive rump, too impatient to open it by hand. “I have to keep you safe. And my body is the perfect safe for my most precious item!”

Inside, she instantly cast Blake towards the bed with frightening accuracy. He landed with a small thump against the mattress, disorientating him slightly, and before he had any chance to recover Bertha was atop him, cutting off any form of escape. She flicked the door shut with her frog tongue and, after recalling it back into her mouth, starred down at the mage below her with a seductive smile. “Besides, isn’t this a great way for newlyweds to bond?”
05533211211212.title: Newlyweds Bonding

05533212.content:
Your decision to stay put starts to become a bit of a gamble as your younger teen sister Jade enters the basement, wearing her signature green crop top, blue jean shorts, and green sneakers. The sight of your now-monolithic sibling in all her midriff-baring glory really makes you wonder if trying potions at random was even a good idea. Making her way down the stairs to the basement, Jade begins searching for her brother.

"Blake? Are you in here?"

No response. Crossing her arms with a frustrated huff, your sister approaches the table where you've been conducting your magical experiments. She then takes out a washcloth and proceeds to clean up the liquid mess you'd left behind. Sure, she's annoyed with you right now, but she's also very concerned about the well-being of her big brother.

Now's your chance! But how do you plan to get Jade's attention?
05533212.title: Enter Jade

choices: Try again with Jade eating Breakfast
Try to get mom's help while she cleans
Try and go outside to someone else
055332121.content:
"Finally! Thank goodness! Jade I'm over here! I'm over-"

"EW! A FLY!" Jade starts to swat at the fly buzzing close to her face, unknown that that fly was her big brother! Blake flies back

"J-Jade this isn't funny! Its me! Blake. Your brother?!" Jade doesn't see tiny Blake as she continues to swat him away. Blake lands on the wall panting, wanting to nearly cry as not even his own sister recognized him."How am I going to turn back!" Jade sighs as she can't find her brother and walks away. Realizing what she's doing, Blake gasps and flies towards the door, not wanting to be stuck and trapped in there. Once he zooms out of the room above Jade's head he lands again on the wall seeing what was going on. From what he can see his mom is off cleaning the house to his left while Jade is going to the kitchen, possibly to get some breakfast. This day was turning out to be so much of a hassle and pain. Blake sighs and thinks of where he wants to go.
055332121.title: Fly towards her face

choices: And not surprisingly, Jade doesn't hear him
0553321211.content:
Blake decides to try again with his titanic sized sister and flies over to her. Jade sits down on the counter after having gone to the cupboard to get some cereal and the fridge for some milk. She pours the cereal in first and pours the milk in afterwords. She smiles and licks her lips. She digs her spoon in and starts to much away, looking at her phone while she eats. Blake flies again near face, hoping to be able to talk to her through her ear and it works, Jade hears him.. or more specifically his buzzing. She looks over in disgust and sighs swatting the air around her before Blake can get word out. Blake groans and flies down to her bowl to rethink this.

"How am I going to get her attention... I could crawl up her She wouldn't hear me buzzing but she would feel me crawl on her.. and I wouldn't want to be on her when she freaks out... So probably not a good Idea.... " As Blake goes over his options unaware Jade goes back to looking at her phone and eating her cereal... in that order. Her spoon misses the bowl and clangs right next to Blake, startling him and making him loose his balance and fall into the bowl! Blake is throw into the milk and swims back to the surface and coughs of the milk. "This isn't good" Blake thinks to himself so he starts to shout. "Jade! I'm down here! I fell into your cereal! Help!" He tries to flail above the milk, also making his way to the sides of the bowl as well, hoping to get out before something bad happens... but its too late. Just as he gets towards the edge Jade sends down her spoon again ... and scoops up her tiny brother along with bits of cereal. Blake yelps as he is pulled to the bottom of the spoon as Jade lifts it to her face. She smiles and looks at her phone and opens her mouth , ready to take in the cereal. Blake can only watch in horror as he is lifted towards his little sister's mouth! He shouts at her just as she places him into her mouth.
0553321211.title: Jade's Breakfast. Now with daily serving of Blake!

choices: Try to get her attention again
Try to find a way out
Give up and give yourself to your little sister
05533212112.content:
No dice. Jade effortlessly places her spoon in her maw, before sealing her lips upon it. Jade then sucks the contents off the spoon pulling everything off as the spoon retreats. Leaving the cereal and Blake... to begin the process of digestion. Immediately, Blake falls onto the floor that is Jade's massive tongue and everything begins to be thrown and bucked around from the tongue under him, the orchestrator of it all. It moves and pushes the cereal to her pearly whites and she begins to chew, destroying everything in her mouth while Blake helplessly attempts to hold onto the slippery muscle. The teeth destroy and crunch the cereal into oblivion, a normal everyday action for nutrition for Jade, a nightmare for her big brother. Blake grips onto the small taste buds as the cereal and milk join together as saliva coats the tiny fly boy, soaking his wings. She keeps chewing until the cereal is a soft mush before moving it all on top of Blake in the middle of her tongue.

"Agh, JADE!" Blake cries out from under the pile but again his cries fall upon deaf ears as Jade is back again focusing on her phone ignoring what is in her mouth as she readies another scoop. She moves what is in her mouth, including her downsized brother to the back of her mouth, near her awaiting throat. Blake's titaness of a sisters wastes no time as she swallows everything down... spit, cereal, milk and all. Blake tries to hold on as the powerful suction threatens to pull him down. And for a brief moment of salvation she opens her mouth... just in time for Blake to see the next spoonful arrive. Saliva pools up quickly around him as Jade salivates... and swallows again, sending the tiny mage down against her slick, powerful throat as Jade's lips close around the spoon, starting the process all over again.

Jade is none the wiser as she hear nothing and simply chewed her food. She tasted a peculiar piece that had a unique flavor compared to the rest of her cereal of which she was quite familiar with. Although not enough to pull her conscious mind to it she noted that is was tastier than the rest and went about her business, eating her breakfast.

Back inside, Blake is being pulled down quickly with the rest of his sister's spit to her waiting stomach. The thought of being covered in his little sister's spit grosses him out a bit but he stays calm.. even though he can her massive heart beating in his ears. As quickly as it arrive it fades away as the grumbles of Jade's hungry belly slip through the organic tube. A gust of stale wind blows up past Blake as he audibly hears his younger sister burp, quite loudly too. Soon Blake hits a firm "floor" before it opens up below him and spills him onto digested mush along with the cereal he came in with. Blake's eyes adjust to the darkness of the belly around him as his ears are assaulted by the groans and the sounds of the constrictions around his ribbed prison. The "cereal" and juice have become unrecognizable as they bubble and begin to break down even further into bile. Blake blushes and tries to quickly think of a plan to get out of this mess, figuratively and literally.
05533212112.title: Big Brothers are Part of a Balanced Breakfast

0553322.content:
How about we wind the clock back a bit?

Option 15 (Shrunken among Suitors): In another alternate universe, there exists a fantastical kingdom of wonder and prosperity -- Topaz Kingdom. The eldest prince, Blake, is much too shy around women outside his family tree to even consider pursuing marriage. A mysterious yet beautiful lady attempts to woo Blake, but the prince wimps out. However, it turns out that this woman is a witch -- she casts a curse upon Prince Blake that shrinks him to an inch in size. Now he'll HAVE to summon his courage as princesses from other lands visit the Topaz Kingdom in hopes of marrying him!
0553322.title: Tiny Royalty

05533221.content:
It was a pleasant, clear evening in Topaz Kingdom, a fantastical land of swords, sorcery, and success. The king and a few of his royal bodyguards had diplomatic matters to handle abroad, and so Queen Claire was currently in charge at the castle. Among her many regal tasks was setting up her eldest son to find a wife of his own. Unfortunately, Prince Blake was much too skittish around the opposite sex, as his latest date -- a mysterious yet beautiful woman with dark hair, a purple dress, and a pale complexion -- would soon find out...

The young man, currently clad in a blue outfit with dark blue pants and boots, nervously walked into the castle garden to greet the lady who wanted to win his heart.

"H-hello..." Blake greeted timidly as he seated himself at a round table opposite his date.

"Aww, aren't you a cute one!" The young woman smiled. "You're Prince Blake, correct? My name's Raven -- I come from Amethyst Kingdom. You really should visit sometime, the blue roses are beautiful when they bloom! Now, before we talk about marriage...I'd like to know some more about you, Blake!"

"You can do this, you can do this..." Blake repeated in his mind, convinced that this mantra would FINALLY earn him true love. A few seconds in, however, he blurted something out.

"I CAN'T DO THIS!"

In a panic, the prince rose up from his seat and fled into the castle, much to Raven's frustration.

"This wouldn't be the first time he's chickened out of a romantic evening..." Raven said to herself, before a newly-hatched idea brought a soft smile to her face. "But, one way or another...he'll learn from his mistakes!"

That night, as Blake struggled to sleep in his bedroom, Raven snuck outside the Topaz Kingdom castle, whispering a strange series of chants and giving off a faint purple glow...

"Until the prince pursues his prize...take his body and shrink his size!!"

The prince was suddenly bombarded with pink dust. Abruptly exhausted, Blake collapsed onto his bed.
05533221.title: Tiny Royalty

055332211.content:
The morning sun rose to the east of Topaz Castle, gently beaming through the window of Prince Blake’s bedroom. The young man slowly and groggily stirred, reaching over to move his blankets...

...only to make the shocking discovery that his blankets were much larger than they should be! Come to think of it, his whole bedroom and all the furniture looked much more massive than should be possible.

“What the heck?!” The prince interjected.

Queen Claire rushed into the room, hearing her son’s panic. “Blake, honey, what’s wrong — BY THE GODS!!” Staring at the tiny speck on the bed, Claire realized that her son had somehow been shrunken to half an inch in size!

...

“Hmm...” a robed, elderly man analyzed the tiny prince on a wooden table. “This is most peculiar, your majesty. If I had to guess, I’d say foul magic is responsible for your son’s shrinkage...”

“Well, is there any way to help him, Advisor Grey?” Claire asked, clearly worried.

“There IS one way to restore him to normal size...”

“And what would that be?” Blake inquired.

“...I have no idea.”

Just then, the doors slammed open as a young messenger barged into the throne room, drawing the attention of the others.

“Dale!!” The queen shouted.

“Sorry to interrupt your lamenting, your highness,” Dale spoke, “but...”
055332211.title: Half-Inch Prince

choices: Princess Indigo wonders: maybe this isn't a seat... but a footrest, or doormat?
Princess Indigo requests another invention, to prepare for Prince Blake.
0553322111.content:
Claire cupped her face in her hands. "Oh, can't the princess wait until later? We're in the midst of a national crisis!" Her voice shook the tabletop Blake, who waved his arms for balance. Dark robes, his pajamas, fluttered around his arms.

With a panting wheeze, Dale had his hands on his legs in a bow. "After all the distance the Lee House traveled to reach us over air, it would only be proper for them to receive a greeting."

"Through air?" Blake blinked, looking to the curtains around his bed. "Princess Indigo can fly? Mom... are you trying to marry me with a bird?"

With a pant, trying to regain her composure, the nation's temporary ruler lifted her son in her hands. The gloves beneath were soft, padded, like a pillow. She carried him to his window: outside was a spectacular sight. Great wooden boats were outside - ABOVE the capital city's glimmering Topaz Castle, floating up. They trod through clouds as if it were water, with a thousand sails on either end - and colorful dragons' heads at the front. Interconnected, these air-boats wound like serpents around the clouds, making them their own in a graceful display.

Blake couldn't help but sit back in wonder. "Woah..."

Eager to pop in, Grey stepped over, clearing his throat. "The Lee Royal House's famous Dragon Aircraft, Tian Long. Their country has wholeheartedly embraced forward movement and invention; their princess, herself, has contributed much to their technological prowess with her studiousness and skeptical nature. Still, the family remains keenly aware of their traditions." He leaned in, whispering. "Their lineage is known for... rather rigid customs, if you don't mind me saying so. They would appreciate seeing some semblance of order as reciprocation, if only for our heirs' first meeting."

Sighing, and sloping down - rocking the prince - Queen Claire nodded. "Very well. If Princess Indigo is so wise, perhaps she can arrange a cure for you."

In a panic, Blake shook his head, staring up at his mother. It was still odd seeing all her features spread out before him, magnified many times over, from his half-inch form. "You're kidding! Didn't you say this was serious? Besides, I..." He shook, hiding his face in the pale glove - feeling its latex touch his hair. "I don't think I can do this... She'll be so huge."

To the queen, this last complaint didn't help his case. She shook her great head, the swish of her hair making sonic booms for him, and patted his head - tilting it around. "You can't keep running from every suitor. Please, at least humor this one - I'm sure she's a very nice girl."

"Wait!"

A pair of immense, rose lips engulfed him and silenced his calls. The wettest kiss he'd ever experienced, it drenched his shirt and made him scarlet in embarrassment. The pressure from either pillow-like mass of flesh, and sucking within, made the little teen squirm, unable to say anything.

Taking a black embroidered cushion from his bed, and placing the royal family's son atop it, the queen - followed by her servants - carried him to the castle garden. The bumpy ride tossed him upwards and downwards, each step like a thunderstorm below. Once-familiar halls in glowing shades became towering monoliths, the lights through windows blinding him, the portraits making him shudder in terror as they looked upon him. The open air battered against his pitch-black robes; it was lucky that woman's hex shrunk his pajamas with him, though the clothes did little to make him feel much less exposed to the elements.

When she placed him down, Blake gazed up at the rushing, flowing dress his mother wore, swishing like great sails on the wind.

Dale spoke up. "I've already let the reception know of the prince's stature."

Claire nodded in approval. "Commendable. Then, don't let me get in the way, Blake! You'll be fine."

He screamed: "No, I need help here --!" But it went unheard, drowned out by the echo of footsteps as the royals left the garden - and the sound of someone new coming in. His head darted to the entrance, bracing himself, as odd noises crashed through his ears.

The wide doors creaked as they opened. A small progression of handmaidens entered, heads bowed in perfect order; each of them carried a gift. From the miniature prince's perspective, he could still make out some of the details. Some of them, great dishes of cakes and fruits prepared just the way he liked them, ornamented with almost-supernatural frosting. Some of them clothes fitted for his earlier scale, in a dashing black - now probably able to hold him completely in one sleeve. Along with that, iron works with gears and pipes that he couldn't understand at all. Was that some sort of weapon in one titanic maiden's hand? Their sandals crushed the tree-like blades of grass below him, as they entered in a circle, surrounding him.

Everything went silent for a moment. With her servants ordered carefully in the entrance, still and mighty as statues, Blake wondered about getting up, darting away. Nobody could see him, after all...

Then, a carpet rolled out, right up to his makeshift platform. He gulped, as light from the rising sun framed the delicate silhouette of his next suitor: Princess Indigo of Lee.

She was about his age, and stood shorter than many of the dark-haired women who entered; but compared to the insect-like boy, she was larger than the entire castle. The first thing Prince Blake saw, looking forward, were wooden sandals, tightened around pale socks. Those delicate toes, with her measured stride, would be able to crush most of the village's huts and stores beneath their weight. Indigo's socks lifted up higher and higher, each a pale, silky tower that flexed around her thin muscles, transforming into a web of folds every time she took a step forward. Her hands, smoother than anything he'd ever seen, brushed across her purple dress. (was that from a lotion given by the Lee house? It smelt vaguely of mandarins.)

He gulped, staying in place, head craned up - just taking everything in. That one handmaiden holding an iron tool, which Blake took as a weapon, held it over a bowl and pressed a switch - making a smoothie for the princess. The princess took it in her hand, bowing. "Thank you for this drink, Jun. It will help me calm my nerves. I'm glad I brought my blender invention with me." A machine to blend fruits together, amazing! The Topaz Kingdom had a lot to learn from these creations.

The servant - Jun? - replied. "Her highness has practiced the local language well. I hear no accent or errors."

She continued ahead, bringing more of her body in view for the shrunken prince.

The outfit, itself, was unlike anything that Blake knew from the Topaz kingdom, and not just because of how jaw-droppingly large it was. From his scale, as she approached, he could see every detail of the minuscule silk that went into sewing it. The material was light, and allowed for great comfort and mobility from the massively-sized visitor - which she showed off with how gracefully she trod, each fall of her feet like a drop in a pond of water. Despite this practicality, it was no less formal or impressive: embroidered designs rushed along it like the mighty paintings at great cathedral ceilings. It illustrated a map of stars and constellations, fully accurate to what the Topaz Kingdom saw in the night sky. Blue ribbons tied around the back gave form to her chest and hips. The shoulders weren't present, exposing part of her neck and collar. Detached sleeves, hanging on her arms at either end, were large enough to hold an entire army between them. Her arms held still so as not to rustle them much, but they swayed like curtains still as she sipped her drink.

Princess Indigo's servants did up her dark hair in two tight buns, with blue-and-purple ribbons around them. Her bangs were straight; they brought out her solid eyebrows, thick lashes, and chocolatey eyes. They seemed to analyze everything that came before them, from the flowers to the stone walls. Blake had some suitors from nations further east before, and was familiar with some of their makeup trends. While not as heavy as some preceding her, this princess had a few touch-ups to accent the depth of her eyes, and the roundness of her cheeks and chin. At once demure and striking, she was the kind of woman who might hold back quietly in a hallway - but when she gazed upon the cushion, it was like steel turned in her head.

Blake waved up: "Hello!... Hi there!" She didn't budge. "Uh, nin hao? Neih hou? Annyeong...hasim...nikka?"

Did the young woman even hear him? Continuing to gaze down to the pillow with him atop, she nodded. "Prince Blake must still be preparing himself, after that incident. I assume the Topazian court set this cushion as my seat?" She brushed her hair, sighing. "A strange local custom, but I suppose it can't be helped."

Oh, no. His black robes and hair blended in with his pillow - Indigo hadn't seen him! Her backside, draped in fine silk, crashed like a meteor from above. He tried to scurry away, but before even a second had passed, astounding pressure from above crashed on his back, driving him deep into the fabrics. Princess Indigo sat on his pillow, inadvertently pancaking him between it and her titanic rear. While she rested back, the weight shifted above, smearing his head into the weave of intricate white strings. He could feel her sigh above, rushing through his body and echoing. Soon after, her booming voice followed:

"A spell on Prince Blake... and here I thought I could get away from my country's superstition. I'm sure there's a rationale behind this all." Another nudge of her backside, sensing something uncomfortable below - and it rolled Prince Blake around, engulfing him entirely in the warm undergarments.
0553322111.title: Princess Indigo Takes a Seat

choices: Blake ends up stuck to Princess Indigo's foot
Blake ens up stuck to the pillow
The Queen comes in and realizes what happened
05533221111.content:
"This seat is entirely unbearable! This is absolutely ridiculous!" Princess Indigo stands up and looks down to her cushion and looks it over. "How a kingdom can come so far yet not make suitable seats is beyond me." Indigo sighs and thinks for a moment.

Blake groans from the sudden reprieve and takes in a much-needed breathe of fresh air. His body, too tired to move, lies plastered to the seat. Blake looks up to the towering princess as she turns and inspects the cushion. Blake tries to move and call out to get her attention but fails, his voice already tired from his prior attempts. He watches as the giant princess inspects the cushion, hoping that she will find him against the cushion.

         "It's no surprise this thing feels so uncomfortable," the princess surmises. "Everything about its structure seems entirely off... Especially that button in the center." Blake's eyes widened as he tries to will his muscles to move again, knowing that there was no button in the center, only him!

         "H-here! D-down here," Blake croaks out. He tries more to move and wave an arm, a hand at least. No response from the observing giantess. Then, her gaze softens.

         "Wait."Blake smiles as he believes he's finally been found! "Is, this supposed to be some sort of... foot cushion?" Blake's heart sinks as he hears this from the giantess' lips. "It... looks like it could be now that I am observing it... Yeah. The design definitely seems better in that regard. Hm... let's try it." Princess Indigo grabs the pillow and sets it on the floor. She sits back down and slips off her tight slippers and sighs. "Feels good to be out of those. Mm.. now let's try this out." She rests her soles on either side of Blake and presses her feet deep into the cushion. Blake blushes and coughs from the strong scent of lavender and sweaty feet. Indigo wiggles her toes and leans back into the seat and smiles. "Ah, this is much better." Blake tries one last time to get away before her toes grab him in their wigglings, but is too late as Indigo's second and third toes grab him and rub him against her slick toe flesh. "There we go, precisely what that button is for," the princess coos. Indigo continues to rub and batter the prince with her mighty digits, continuously dragging his beaten form under her toes. Her giant foot pinning Blake to the pillow and rubbing ruthlessly against him. Indigo dragged and lifted her sole against the young prince and pillow, wiping her sweat and the dirt collected from insider her slippers onto Blake's body andseat footrest. Her toes danced and squirmed, elated to finally be free from her their confines and start wiggling freely again, gripping the fibers of the cushion. "I must say this is quite therapeutic. I should ask them if I could have one of their cushions. Or this one since it's already covered in my feet smell." Indigo giggles and continues to wipe her sweaty feet onto the cushion.

Indigo sighs and smiles seeming to have enjoyed her foot fun while Blake, if he could muster up the energy to speak, would wholeheartedly disagree.

         "I must say that was lovely... but as much as I would love to continue I must wonder where Prince Blake is!" Indigo firmly plants her feet into the cushion, trapping Blake against her musty sole, the scent of her warm musty feet filling his senses that he can practically taste her. "Hm. This won't do." Indigo withdraws her feet and slips them back into her slippers, shoving them on quite roughly. "I suppose I can wait a little longer, but any more and we will have to leave. It's impolite to keep a lady, no less a princess waiting." Blake mentally panics at this and tries to rest, in hopes of getting her attention. During the commotion...
05533221111.title: Footrest for the Princess

choices: "Prince Blake? You have to hide. You could be arrested here."
"So - the prince is a tiny spy! I know how to punish you..."
055332211111.content:
Blake found himself glued to the flexing foot: flattened by the dexterous digits; engulfed in the soft, worn flesh; and stuck by the humidity and warmth. The impossibly huge royal visitor lifted her leg, the constellation dress slipping across it; then directed it for the mouth of the blue shoes. The visiting princess slammed the shrunken boy into her slipper! His shouts of anguish drowned into the sweaty surface of her sole, smothering his lips beneath the wrinkles. Indigo, standing at her full height, pressed all her weight on the prince's puny body - the supple skin shifting slightly on his torso. Already lathered in a thick layer of stale sweat from being the dark-haired beauty's footrest, Blake was now practically drowning in the pools of liquid that gathered in the filthy insole. Tastes of lavender, mandarins, and salt conquered his nose.

Indigo shoved her toes harder into the footwear, her thin lips in a disgusted frown. "Nggh. I much preferred the sandals I wore earlier." She wrung her feet in circles, twisting her ankle - unconsciously massaging Blake, the valleys of travel-weary wrinkles grinding into his minuscule torso. "These slippers are so... constricting."

She wasn't lying. The shoe tightly hugged her ped on every side, giving it barely any room. The discomfort made her keep fidgeting and squirming actively, kneading the spongy surface. And with his body stuck so tightly to her gigantic flesh, the puny Prince rocked with each twitch.

The handmaiden, Jun, patted the noblewoman on her exposed shoulder. "Please maintain your composure, your Highness. This design shows off your refinement and taste. Prince Blake will adore them."

Ingido sighed, squeezing her slender digits together. "If only he knew how uncomfortable it is in them."

Blake groaned, pain shooting through his minuscule nerves. Every time he flexed a muscle to force the moist skin away, he just found himself pinned down. With each breath he took into his compressed lungs, the putrid aroma of imperceptible dirt stung his nostrils. He couldn't even twist his head aside from the unyielding odor and wetness - the harsh pressure from the massive, soaking surface prevented all movement.

If Princess Indigo was cramped in her shoes, Prince Blake was outright pancaked!

The royal daughter pulled out a miniature clock of her own design, the arms still ticking on the Lee House's local time. Fine silk draped as she crossed her arms, and tapped her foot. "We've stood for some time. There's shyness, and then there's simple disrespect."

Jun nodded. "I'm sure his highness is near."

Groaning, Indigo tapped harder, grinding her shoe into the ground. No matter what position she put it, there was something looking her inside it. Perhaps a pebble...

Blake's whole world lifted up with her immense shoe. The force squeezed his arms deeper into the sweaty surface. He gasped in terror. The next second - SLAM! She drove him into the ground. He squealed weakly, wind rushing from his lungs like a flattened whoopee cushion. Gravity pulled him up, giving him a brief sensation of weightlessness, until - SLAM! That one was even have than the last; the princess in blue was losing patience rapidly. SLAM! SLAM! SLAM! She scrunched the prince deep into the center of her sole, launching an attack on him. Impact after impact with the ground mangled and numbed his body further.

Minutes blurred together; nobody came. The longer the princess stood, the tighter her footwear felt, and the warmer the sun beat on their procession. She nudged, wiggled, rocked, stamped, and rubbed her tired peds. She brushed them on top of each other, attempting to knead out the soreness. Whole avalanches of skin caught Blake, grinding him deeper in. It was starting to mold around him, accepting him as a clump or dirt caught on its underside.

As the solar rays grew hotter, more sweat built up in the criss-crossing wrinkles and prints. Rivers of salty-sweet fluid flowed through the miniature folds, splashing the shrunken teen's face. He reeled his face away, coughing and hacking. But with every slide away from the sole, another idle fidget or terrifying SLAM squished him flatter.

Slowly, the door to the main hall creaked. Princess Indigo jumped into a straight posture - wincing as something crunched beneath her sole. She'd investigate later. The procession bowed quietly, and she cupped her hands before her, welcoming...

...A girl with a short green dress, dark hair, and a huge tiara.

"Hey, Princess!" She pointed to the mechanical dragon hovering in the sky. "Can I take a ride?"

Indigo blinked, looking to her ride. She'd heard about a younger heir to the Throne of Heart. "Princess Jade?" She took a step away from Jade, twisting her toes into the ground - a little surprised at how forthright this little noble was. "I'm all for cultural exchange..."

A rough pat on her shoulder. Jun coughed. She understood.

With a glance away, the noblewoman in blue continued: "... But Tian Long's on a path to the Central Kingdom after this. If any royals from your kingdom come aboard without the proper procedures, it would violate our age-old treaties." She whispered: "They might consider you a spy."

Jade threw her arms out, smile fading. "C'mon. What kind of spy would wear this kinda clothing?" She curtsied furiously, showing off her Emerald garbs. "If I wanted to stay hidden, I'd dress in black!"

The dark-clothed prince kicked from beneath the shoe, desperate for attention. He called out: "Indigo!... Sis! In here!" - but every word came out muffled. The foot above him twisted, left and right. From the skies, his unaware captor spoke...

"...Where might your brother be? It's past time he appeared." She looked everywhere for him.

Jade thought for a moment, then shrugged. "Probably hiding. He gets the jitters, you know? Always starts screaming and squirming when a princess visits."

Below, the prince screamed and squirmed, trying his best to get either princess' attention. His world lifted- and Slamed down again, keeping him firmly stuck to the weary skin.

"Then," Indigo bowed, "I'll respect his wishes. Jun, please start the engines. We're leaving." She tugged at her assistant's sleeve, forcing a smile.

Jade's face lit up. "Ooh, enjoy your trip! I'll be down here, watching you lift off!" She gave a thumbs-up.

Peering at the gesture, Indigo slowly mimicked it, as she stepped across the carpet and up the stairs. The handmaidens followed, flashing the same single-thumb salute.

ThunkThunkThunk... The steps, each feeling higher than the last, would have made Blake hurl - if he'd eaten before the spell shrunk him. His blood rushed to his head, even as his other senses grew numb. Thundering footsteps interrupted his racing mind. "Leaving?" SLAM! So that meant Indigo was walking inside that dragon airship! SLAM! He had to alert her - SLAM! - or one of the assistants - SLAM! - or she'd carry him with her back to - SLAM! - her country!

Indigo slammed the carpets, traversing the hard wood. How dare they disrespect a potential suitor, after her whole castle had gone to so much trouble dressing her up for the occasion? She headed for her chambers. It had been a long day, and she wanted to be home as soon as possible. She sat on an elegant blue mattress, resting her tired buttocks on it.

The pressure released from the prince's chest. He breathed deeply, regaining lost air - even if that meant taking in Indigo's less-than-clean odor. Almost as soon as the shaking from her steps stopped, another trembling began. A harsh rumble, like steam traveling through pipes, and gears twisting together in a clockwork rhythm. His sense of time faltered as he lay soaked in sweat, against a swampy insole. It may have been minutes or hours that he was in there. It should be too soon for them to lift off! And yet, the roaring became steadier and steadier, and the pressure change drastically. Tian Long, the dragon aircraft, had taken to the skies.

Without any warning, something launched Blake upwards. He slipped slightly in the perspiration - but was too tightly compressed to move much. He flew back and forth, jerked around carelessly.

Indigo kicked her legs as she read a book on etiquette, to occupy herself for the long voyage ahead. They had finally crossed out of the Topaz Kingdom's borders - and not a second too soon. She just wanted to forget the whole thing.

Quietly, someone knocked at her door. Jun entered, holding her hands behind her. "It's unfortunate that they were so disrespectful. But please, don't consider this journey a complete loss. I arranged a small trade deal before packing up." She revealed the cushion she stretched her feet on earlier, in midnight black. The footrest! The one that made her aching feet feel so good.

Indigo clapped her hands together - then coughed, and regained her composure. "Thank you. I look forward to the next visit." As Jun left, she giggled, wiggling her toes - and slowly slid them out from the confines of her tight footwear.

The shrunken prince's spine dragged on the slick surface of the slipper. The princess' toes rocketed into the air, and onto the "footrest" once more. Having been subjected to her continual steps, he was a mere sticker on her sole. The titanic girl brushed her feet against the fabric, cooing in relaxation.

Thinking quickly, Blake grabbed a tiny loose thread. The massaging motions above peeled him off the foot, finally giving him a bit of fresh air. He gathered his spirits, looked up to the vast landscape of a woman, and shouted: "Princess Indigo! Look here!"

Her huge eyelids blinked. She glanced down. Her mouth went flat.

Finally, Indigo spoke:

"P... Prince Blake? Is that you? What are you doing here?!" Blake smiled and jumped, waving his hands as he was finally glad she could see him. "What are you doing here? If my guards find you they will assume you to be a spy, no matter your stature! They'll surely lock you up and have you on trial." Blake's joy instantly turned to worry.

"W-what? B-but I'm not! I-I was on the pillow you were rubbing your feet on when you first arrived and I-"

"Well, it doesn't matter what I think sir Blake." The Violet clad princess interrupted "I have a feeling you weren't- wait... on the pillow? For how long?" Indigo's face started to blush. Blake saw this and looked away, this was hardly the way to make a good first impression on a suitor and knew he should have fought harder to avoid a conversation like this.

"S-since... since you entered the courtyard. I was on the pillow the entire time." Indigo's eyes widened as she realized the button that was missing from the center wasn't a button but was actually Blake. PRINCE BLAKE. She had been rubbing her sweaty feet all over him! Thoughts raced through her head about how vile she must have appeared before the Prince.

"S-sir B-blake I-I had no idea you were on there and of your... a-affliction." The princess apologized profusely. " I had no idea. I would never mean to hurt you. E-especially with... " She pulled her feet away and Blake blushed, relieved he didn't have to be smothered under her hot foot flesh again but guilty he made the princess feel self-conscious about her feet.

"I-it's fine your highness and ... I wasn't just on there but.. t-that's beside the point. There are no... hard feelings." Indigo's gaze grew more concerned and more defensive at the prince's point.

"Wait, what do you mean you weren't just on the pillow? Is that not how you got here?" Blake blushed and looked away.

"No... it..... it's not. When you were finished with my... cushion I was stuck to your feet. I ... was plastered to your foot, your highness." Indigo's face reddened more than before as she reached over and started to fan herself.

"Great... I stepped on my suitor..." Indigo mumbled to herself, Blake could see she was struggling with this. She sighed and looked back at him. "Well... I'll try to figure out a way to get you home Prince Blake. It will save us a lot of headache if the rest of the crew don't know you're here. Do you understand?"

"N-no, not really. Why can't they know I'm here? I think it would be best if I had more people to... help me." The violet princess sighed heavily and reached a hand down to scoop up the tiny prince. She carefully gestured for him to climb on. Blake hesitantly agreed and she lifted him up to her face.

"We passed your borders already. If my crew find you here they must obey Topaz law and... well... hold you as a prisoner until they can set a court. They could believe you to be a spy and I fear my parents may assume the worst. They believe superstitious nonsense and I have no doubt they would warp this into some prophecy of some sort due to your affliction. I'm certain there is a logical explanation for this but... you have to trust me, Prince Blake." Blake looked up to her town-sized face and blushed. There was not much else he could do so, for now, his suitor was his only way to get home. And if what she said was true, it seemed like she was the only one who would want to help. Just then Both the princess heard a knock on the door!

Indigo swallowed, pulled on her low shoulder-less collar, and tossed him in. A world of shifting blue and peach tones engulfed the shrunken boy, cutting off all signs of light. He landed snugly, blushing furiously, in pale cloth that bound her chest.

A lump caught in Indigo's neck, and traveled under Blake's body. "Everything's fine."

Jun entered, turning her neck. "I heard voices..." Ornaments on the door reflected light over the princess' pool-sized eyes. The dark irises twitched nervously.

The folding, swaying fabrics partly muffled the soft voice. But as soon as it reached them, the girl in blue stood straight. Blake could tell; even when secured by the undergarments, Indigo's buoyant bosom bounced enough to toss him up. The breast mountains sloped at a vertical angle. He slipped down their slick surface, towards the cleavage. He gripped for support, but couldn't get a hold on the surface. This noblewoman obviously took good care of her skin. It was unblemished; felt silkier and smoother than her dress; and had the same fragrant lavender lotions coating it. His friction was practically nonexistent against her tracts of land. The boy was sliding backwards towards an enormous cloth bra.

Indigo coughed. "I was simply... Practicing public speaking." It wouldn't have been audible to anyone normal-sized; but inside her elegant clothes, her racing heart was an earthquake to the little thing. His tiny body brushed along the sensitive curve of her gland. It tickled. She fidgeted, curled her fists, subtly rolling her immense neck and round shoulders.

"My lady, you're tense." The older woman patted her on her ribbon-decorated hair, her eyes shut. "I know this is embarrassing, but please understand that it wasn't your fault. Prince Blake was simply shy. No amount of dialogue would have brought you together." She pointed to the cushion. "Maybe you'd like to have a longer massage?"

The simple act of a servant touching Indigo jolted her stowaway more. "No - AURGH!" He bounced off the mound, slammed against an ornate embroidery. Then, his black-clad legs slipped into her cleavage. The dark crevice ate him up, covering him in moisture.

Tight walls limited his movement. Mounds of skin blocked his visibility and filled his senses. Before him, a damp cloth kept him in place. But at the same time, it didn't feel sturdy. He was already slippery with the girl's foot sweat. Indigo's twitches, breaths, even her heartbeat made the humid microcosm quiver, loosening and contracting. Ever second was more humid, sweltering, and unstable. There was nothing under him but the hundred-foot-long drop down her massive, flat tummy.

He couldn't possibly imagine what this gaping cavern would look like at normal size...

The young noblewoman's forehead went white, then red. The rushed, uneven motion in her chest became worse. Goosebumps popped up over her. "No - NO - no thank you, Jun... It's fine, I just need time to read..." She squeezed her arms together, resisting the urge to swat the squirming speck. The wet surfaces pressed together, holding Blake between them - and sending jolts through her nerves.

Her servant rubbed the girl's thin shoulders, feeling around the joints and kinks. "It's not a problem, Your Highness. Please, relax." She smiled, moving her thumb deep into her. "Let that little prince go."

Blake yelped. "D-don't let me go!"

Indigo quivered. She fidgeting away from the touch, trying to keep the mini passenger out of view - but too worried to make sudden motions. "Let's not discuss him..." She began reciting poetry under her breath to focus, and bear with the overwhelming tension.

From either side of the tiny boy, the walls came crashing together. The simple motion buried his face in an avalanche of tit, choking him and cutting off every trace of light. Her quivering arms sloshed her boobs upwards and downwards, grinding and mashing his torso deeper into the marshmallow trap. He pushed against the skin, desperate for air - but knowing that too much movement might reveal him... Or have him drop to his doom.

Shivers traversed Indigo's spine. That bite-sized prince slipped into her bra... The delicate touch of his hands tickled her. But if she moved too much, he'd fall. She mumbled in annoyance: "My breasts..."

Jun leaned into her eat. "Pardon me? Your chest?"

Gulping, the princess waved her hands. "...Y-yes! This dress is almost as uncomfortable as my shoes! It's..." She used the opportunity to jump away. "...It's too tight!" She pulled on the opening, itching at the ribbons that gave it form - careful not to rub too hard, or pulverize her tiny passenger. "I must be excused to the changing room."

Still, it rattled him to the core. Again and again, the doughy surfaces kneaded him. The pressure was starting to make him light-headed, and the constant twisting turned his stomach in knots. He tried to stay stiff, not wanting to alert the gigantic handmaiden. But the continually-shifting landscapes and immense drops of sweat made him budge. It was getting hard to hold on.

She scanned the blue designs, tilting her head sideways. "It was specifically fitted for you, and woven by ten women from specially-picked silk." She pointed to the stars decorating it. "I know you struggle with our nation's traditions. But you should wear these garments with pride. Many people's wishes are in those stars."

Blake gulped. "I wish I were anywhere else..." The heart behind him pounded quicker. Along with the shifting forces of spongy tissue, the heat wasn't helping.

The servant felt her charge's forehead, with a concerned look in her eyes. "You're warm, your Highness..."

Shuffling side to side, Indigo tried for another excuse. "I'm not... I mean... Yes! Warm!" She grabbed a paper fan hastily, and waved it to her neck with a twitching hand. "We must be moving through a high pressure system!" The princess paused, rolling her fingers nervously around the handle. "I need hydration. Please bring me juice from the storage."

The constant fanning motion from her arm slightly wiggled Blake. He clutched tightly to the soft breast, wishing he had some kind of belt.

A discouraged frown crossed Jun's face. She brushed Indigo's bangs with the side of her hand. "Very well. But if you feel the need to confide anything, I'll be here." Her arms stretched out. She hugged her princess' petite body. Their tits pressed against each other.

Indigo turned pale. She felt like dying.

Blake turned purple. He felt like he was dying.

One pair of smothering boobs was enough. Now, this boy was sandwiched in a puffy, bulging hell of two sets of towering tits. Jun's steady pulse throbbed in his ear, joining Indigo's hurried heartbeat. The heat from two bodies joined to absolutely steam him, making his vigor drain. All his struggling and squirming only succeeded in moving the silky curtains that formed Indigo's dress' collar; giving him an even more intimate experience with the older woman's heaving bosom.

This whole time, he'd thought the princess' chest to be the largest thing he'd ever seen. Vast, meaty mountains that easily pushed him around. But what he experienced atop him in that moment... It made the boy speechless. Looming, milky orb as far as his vision stretched. Cotton hills and valleys shivering with tension, trying to hold in the bursting mega mammaries. Every subconscious sway of her torso mashed him flat.

If Jun were this big, either of the meteoric boobs could easily squish Topaz Castle flat. And create earthquakes strong enough to turn neighboring villages to rubble. In this incredible force, and dizzying trembles, Blake had no options but to sit tight and hope for it to end...

---

Meanwhile...

Topaz Castle was in a state of emergency. Claire called out over and over for her son; and nobody answered. Guards scoured the kingdom for clues of his whereabouts.

And in the heart of the storm, Jade fluttered the throne room, holding tickets. "Mom, I'm gonna borrow the carriage to the concert."

"Until we find your brother, nobody travels in or out!" The queen declared. She pondered, forehead in her glove. "If only we could find Blake's cushion..."

The perky princess shrugged. "The black pillow? One of Indigo's maids took it."

Claire's jaw fell agape.

Jade put a finger to her mouth. "Weird, though... She called it a footrest."

Claire screamed internally.

"She said, 'Princess Indigo will adore using it for massages!'"

Claire screamed externally.

The girl in green skipped out. "Whatever, I'll just ask my friend for that carriage!"

"My son... B-Blake... foot massages..." The ruler sputtered, slumping into her throne.

Within Queen Claire's Imagination:

"No!" Blake begged, on his tiny hands and knees, dirty and worn from work. "Please, goddess..."

Princess Indigo squinted down at him from a spiked throne, cackling and sipping wine. "Prisoners don't get breaks! If you want to live, little man... worship my big, smelly feet!"

The former prince wailed, as the sadistic giantess rubbed her filthy soles on him. "Mommy! Help!"


Claire shouted: "Grey! Dale!"

The advisors sprung in, saluting.

"That princess kidnapped my son! She's escaping in that awful steel dragon! Bring him back!"

Grey brushed his mustache. "If we attack openly, they could hurt him. We'll need someone stealthy."

Dale nodded sagely. "Luckily, I know a good bounty hunter. A girl in red..."

---

Finally, Jun pulled away from the hug, walking to the storage room - leaving Indigo blushing and panting.

"That was the... most embarrassing experience... of my life... Is she losing it?" She took a long breath, feeling her chest deflate. "I hope we can clear this up soon... Prince Blake?"

He struggled for a small breath of sweet courtyard air...

Deep breaths. Indigo gazed at her sandals, tilting them side to side. Then her head pointed at the large, oaken entrance. She tapped her fingers on the castle floor. "Perhaps... he's preparing a present." She turned to a handmaiden, the ribbons on her hairbuns flowing like waves. "Jun, could you please retrieve my tools?"

The minuscule twist of her waist ground Blake deeper into the cushion. Her voice reverberated around him, powerful and steady. He shouted: "I'm - I'm down here! Be-beneath your... uh..." His words were lost in space; a flex interrupted him. "...Tools?"

"Another invention?" Jun unfolded her hands, and pointed to the dark-haired women that had followed them in, holding all sorts of gifts. "The Lee are already displaying contraptions and automatons that will amaze His Majesty Heart. What could Your Majesty desire to build for him?"

Indigo shook her head. "It's... for me. Building something will help my nerves." Her back stiffened, and she shifted her weight.

The pull off her muscles scooped Blake between the cheeks. Even the delicate rear of a slender, fair maiden had greater strength than his whole body - twisting his tiny limbs in their quest for comfort.

Jun bowed, and made a quick sign to two other servants - who began fanning the princess. "Please, relax. His Majesty Heart is probably just as stressed as Her Majesty."

Every twitch and pound from Indigo pushed Blake with increased harshness. The continual shifts drive him deep into the silky fibers, brushing him from star to star.

The princess rubbed her backside on the pillow, kneading the fabric beneath her. Droplets of sweat trickled over her made-up forehead. Relax. Deep breathing, like her parents taught her...

"Inhale..." Blake lay stuck to her rising rump, pulled up into the air, little feet dangling hopelessly.

"... Exhale." As the blue-blood released her wind, her muscles relaxed - and her rear slammed down onto the shrunken teen, sending his own wind rushing out of his lungs.

Her attempts at meditation did very little to calm down the miniature prince!

The servant finally returned, her steps silent even to Blake's tiny ears, carrying an unornamented wooden box. With the flick of a switch, she set it on the ground; it unfolded with three clicks. The gears locked, making the box a workbench. Blake noticed a little change in the princess' heartbeat, like something clicking inside her. She grabbed the wrench from the case, twisting it against scraps of steel and copper. Her almond eyes turned to blueprints on parchment, adorned with shorthand characters at junction points.

Already lost in the nuts and bolts, the raven-haired girl needed a moment to tug herself away from her tinkering. "Thank you."

"Her Majesty still appears uncomfortable." Jun started preparing a second smoothie. Just the noise made Blake's mouth water. He found himself slowly opening his lips...

...And receiving a mouthful of perfumed silk when the princess shifted in her seat again. She pushed a delicate hand against her blue-class backside, clicking here tongue. "I'm just not used to dresses without pants underneath. It feels like I'm sitting on a zipper or a jewel..." Her rump ground into the cushion again, landscapes of fabric molding around her massive curves - with a little boy caught in between. "...It's still there, no matter how I move." With no result, she leaned over her workbench once again.

"It's me!" Blake swing his fists anew, vying for attention in his soft, squishy prison. "You're feeling me!" Amid punches, he tried to catch his breath - no small feat with the weight of a mountain on top of him. The thin outfit allowed him to feel an uncomfortable amount of skin underneath, his hands and legs sinking into it.

Jun loomed, putting the mixer aside. "Indigo... Has Her Majesty ever contemplated the Western tale of the Princess and the Pea?" She re-did a loosening knot in the shorter girl's hair ribbons. "The prince rejected many suitors, until one girl came to stay on a rainy night, claiming she was a princess."

Indigo kept hacking away. The noises rang through the shrunken boy's ears. Each twist of a cog twisted him as well. She groaned softly as the little prince kicked - and rolled back, flattening him once more under the mass of muscle. Something still itched.

"And when she awoke, she complained that she tossed and turned in the night, because she felt a pea underneath her mattresses. They knew she was a suitable princess for marriage, due to how sensitive her skin was."

Indigo fidgeted in her seat, unable to find a comfortable spot. She kept cranking her device, adding new components. Her painted brow furrowed. Slowly, her pace grew quicker, her motions wilder- dragging Blake along with each thrust of her sleeves.

"Perhaps..." Jun finished, "they hid a pea under Her Majesty's cushion, as a test."

The girl paused, twisting her device around. "Hm. If anything, I'd assume thick skin was best for a public figure." She eyed the knobs and curves of the machine, tapping it carefully. "Strange customs, to discomfort a visitor so much... Whether she was a princess or not."

Blake groaned from the continual, crushing pain. Why did he have to go ahead with the reception - in THIS state? If he were in his princely clothes, he might have had a brooch to prick the gigantic butt tormenting him; but in his pajamas, he was weak, exposed, and helpless.

The surface around him was smooth enough that he felt almost able to squirm out from the mass above, But when he crawled towards the courtyard light, the kneading movements from above undid his progress.

Finally, brushing the bangs from her forehead, Indigo lifted herself up. The prince remained glued to her seat for a moment, before he dropped to the pillow below. A weak noise fluttered up: "...Ow..."

Taking notice, Indigo turned - the movement looked like a curtain opening on a stage. Blake found himself stared down directly by her piercing eyes for the first time. They sucked all his words out, as she analyzed the pillow. The size difference magnified every pore of her skin several times over. Finally, she leaned over, and began patting the cushion. When the folds moved, she finally saw the prince, sprawled out, hair all messy, with traces of fabric coating him.

She finally spoke: "...Prince Blake."

His aching back lifted up, and he performed a small bow. "At your service, Princess Indigooooooh..." With a load moan of pain, he fell to the pillow. At last, she'd noticed him.

Indigo looked away, covering her mouth. "I... Formally apologize. I'm not used to these encounters - I kept thinking I had to study harder, or just have patience..." She brushed the side of his bruised cheek, the massive hand slightly tilting his neck. "I hope my error does not tarnish the bonds of our families."

With a pleasant smile, Jun patted her on the head, followed by tapping Blake. "Don't be embarrassed. This may just be a pleasant story for your majesties' children."

Blake went red. "Ch-children? B-b-but... I can't..." He gulped, the jaw-dropping frame around him not helping his jitters about relationships.

"Patience, please, Jun." Indigo seemed red, too. "We must first deal with the matter of the Prince's stature. Within that... moment of weakness..." She shut her huge eyes, showing the lashes. "...I designed a device that could restore him to normal. Hopefully, this can make it up to him."

She unveiled what she was working on. It was a cylinder, looking like a firecracker, with dented sides and a string. The bronzed surface caught in the sun's reflection, casting a ray of light on Blake.

Jun held her hands behind her back. "If I'm not mistaken, most of these hexes can be reversed with true love's kiss..."

For a moment, a sly smile crept across the teenage princess' face; for once, the introvert appeared truly excited about something. She looked right at Blake. "Our kingdoms not interfere with magicians, and magicians should leave our kingdoms alone. Whatever the person who cursed you wants, I refuse to comply. You will not play into her hands." She held a finger on the string, apparently the growth machine's trigger. "Our nations, our marriage, they don't matter at this instant. What matters is that we show this enchanter who the boss is. We need no magic spells or enchanters to decide our destinies. We will forge our own happy endings from blueprints and steel."

With that oration, Blake stood, stunned. She seemed really set on showing up that witch. Did she have some kind of grudge against them?... Well, he had no reason to worry. After all, he wasn't a magician. He lifted his tiny hands up, and smiled. "Thank you! Please, grow me back to normal size!"

"Then we're all set."

Indigo pulled the string, and released the cylinder to the ground with a clunk. The servants took a step away. Smoke poured out in shades of red, blue, and purple, making Blake cough. Something changed over his body, creeping up his spine and through his bones...

When the smoke cleared, Blake saw the results of the invention:
05533221112.title: Once Upon a Cushion

0553322112.content:
“What?!” Queen Claire interjected. “They attack our kingdom NOW, of all times? We’re in the midst of a national crisis, my son is in danger!!”

“Please calm down, your majesty...” Dale attempted to reassure the panicking queen. “Our knights are doing a great job of holding back those — “

Before he could finish his sentence, the shattering of the room’s window took the group’s attention. Stones were being flung! One such rock nailed Claire right in the face, knocking her out cold.

“MOM!!” Prince Blake yelled, understandably worried. Unfortunately, Chancellor Grey and messenger Dale were the only normal-sized men in the room, and thus the only ones who could try to wake the queen.

As Dale and Grey put their effort into getting her to stir, Blake turned to see a red-cloaked figure behind him - he could tell this was a female, but her face was hidden by a hood. The shrunken prince had no time to react, as the hooded woman quickly snatched him up into her hand before rushing out of the room.

Hidden by delicate fingers and scared to death, Prince Blake cowered while his captress hid behind a thick tree. The woman slowly opened her hand and removed her hood, allowing the tiny royal to recognize her as...
0553322112.title: Attack on Topaz

05533221122.content:
As the mysterious woman removed her red cloak, tiny Prince Blake suddenly recognized her. He noticed her flowing brown hair, cute sapphire eyes, golden tiara, and lovely yellow dress, his face reddening at his realization (and also possibly her gorgeous features)...

This was Princess Aria, heiress to the Garnet Kingdom throne! But what was she doing outside of her nation’s borders?

“Relax, little prince...” Aria tried to reassure the blushing Blake. “I’m aware that our nations aren’t on the best terms with each other, but that’s why I’m here. I want to help you. I can’t let my father’s desire for land and power lead to Topaz Kingdom’s ruin!”

Prince Blake blinked as he made sense of what he’d just heard. Though the Topaz and Garnet kingdoms seemed to have mutual hostilities, Princess Aria certainly didn’t look like the tyrannical sort of monarch. In fact, something about her just seemed...soothing. Maybe she used a fair amount of perfume today? Whatever the case, the puny royal in her gloved hand felt most of his fears melt away rather quickly.

“Princess Aria...” Prince Blake spoke at last. “That really means a lot, so...thank you.”

“It’s no trouble!” The princess replied with a soft smile. “But we need to stay hidden, at least until we can find a way to end our kingdoms’ conflict. I think it’s best if I hide you...”
05533221122.title: Contact with Princess Aria

choices: I don't do well in crowds...
05533222.content:
Since the earlier option for this side-story doesn't seem to be working...

Option 1 Revisited (School Party): The students of Opal High School throw a formal party to escape the stress of weekday work. Blake makes an attempt to make himself more appealing to Aria with his magic, but ends up shrunken to half an inch tall instead. Thus, he needs to get the attention of one of the girls and think of a way to restore his size, while avoiding a dip in the snack bowl, or a swim in someone's punch.
05533222.title: School Party?

055332222.content:
Sheesh, you're picky! How about we move forward several years, then?

Option 16 (Like Father, Like Daughter): Several years after Blake confessed his love to Aria and regained his size, the two are now happily married and have a wonderful daughter, Ember.
