Now a playful and intelligent teenager with black hair, orange eyes, a red T-shirt, a black skirt, and magic powers of her own, Ember uses several spells to toy with her father while her mother is away at work. What could go wrong?
055332222.title: Several Years Forward

choices: ...shrinking Blake down to half an inch tall!
0553322221.content:
It had been quite the adventure for Blake Heart, the shy and timid mage. Getting himself shrunken after a deal with the spirits was far from what he'd planned that fateful day -- enduring the stomps of unaware students' shoes, tossed from one oblivious girl's cleavage to another's hair, and even following one girl's meal...the whole way...

But perhaps the greatest challenge for Blake was confessing his romantic feelings to Aria Gleam, the beautiful, wonderful girl he'd been crushing on since middle school. While difficult, he managed to pull it off after getting her attention. Under her caring, accepting gaze, it took very little time for the ghosts' spell to wear off, returning Blake to normal size (but also costing him his superhuman durability).

The couple dated for a good few years, until Blake decided he wanted to tie the knot. Kneeling before Aria in front of New Opal's marble fountain, the dark-haired young man pulled out a diamond ring and asked for his love interest's hand in marriage. With an eager "Yes!", the two were engaged to one another, getting married by the next summer. Some months after their sacred vows, Aria gave birth to a daughter -- she and Blake agreed to name their child Ember.

And so, a new generation of adventure began, with Ember now in her teen years...

----------------

"Ember, I'm going food shopping!" Aria called to her daughter. "You and your father stay out of trouble, OK?"

"No problem, Mom!" Ember smiled...with crossed fingers behind her back.

Her father, Blake, was napping on the couch in the family room -- a tiring week of engineering had taken a lot of energy out of him. He figured it was quite fortunate for Ember to have gained magic powers at adolescence. And man, was he dead wrong.

Tiptoeing up close to her snoozing father, Ember whispered a chant in the mages' language...
0553322221.title: Like Father, Like Daughter

choices: Ember plays with Blake the whole day.
05533222211.content:
Ember approached the couch where the sleeping Blake lay, a sitting duck for her magic. She finished her chant as her hands began to glow with power, and she hovered them over her father's face.

The girl was a magical prodigy. Her father had figured that she may not ever develop magic powers considering her mother did not have any, but boy was he dead wrong. In her early teen years, she began developing abilities to a degree her father could only dream of. By age 11, she was more powerful than he was, and now the comparison was merely laughable.

Of course Blake was proud.... for a time.

"When mom's away, Ember will play! she thought to herself, sniggering. Funny how the non-magical parent was the only one who could keep her in line. Her father was her go-to guinea pig for her magical experiments or the butt of her magical hijinx for when she was feeling playful.

And with her mom gone, it was time to shrink him. One of her favorite spells, not to use on herself of course, but one she didn't use that often. Since she liked it so much, perhaps it was time to start using it more.

Ember shook her head as her father peacefully snoozed away even as the spell's effects began to work. She pushed a strand of blue hair from her bangs behind her ear, a streak of dye running through her naturally dark hair.

She placed a hand on her hip and jutted it out, smirking as Blake passed below three feet. Thoughts passed through her head about what she could do today. She looked down at her black foam flip-flips. Her toes were feeling a bit lonely; perhaps they could use a companion?

When the process was almost complete, Blake finally woke up. In his bleariness, he noted that everything was bigger than normal and his sense became alert as a result. There was a monolithic figure looming over him, and his field of vision allowed him to see something. A red shirt that revealed cleavage and an exposed midriff, and a well-manicured hand resting on the hip of the exposed midriff. Large breasts, very large breasts that strained against the shirt barely able to hold them in. A skirt that ended rather quickly to some long legs.

He didn't need to look at her face to know who it was. The exposed midriff and cleavage with that red shirt was Ember's signature look, and there was no one else who could've done this to him involuntarily.

His daughter loomed over him, but the question was: what did she plan to do with him?
05533222211.title: Future Escapades

choices: “...let you spend some time with my feet!”
055332222111.content:
Giggling audibly, Ember used a hand to scoop up her shrunken father, raising him closer to her face.

“Impressed, daddy?” The girl teased, her warm breath washing over the tiny man in her palm.

“Ember, what did you do to me?!” Blake retorted.

“I shrunk you down, silly! And now we’re going to have SO much fun!”

Despite his frustration, Blake was afraid to provoke his giantess daughter. “Ember, look, I know you excel at magic, but...change me back right now!”

Ember put a finger to her lips for a moment, “pondering” on her dad’s words. “Nah! You’re much more adorable at your current size! Hmm, what to do with you...” She had so many ideas swirling around in her mind, none of which Blake was likely to enjoy. “Oh! I think I’ll...”
055332222111.title: Fun Time for Ember

choices: Ember snares Blake between her toes
Ember wants to do something else.
0553322221111.content:
"let you spend some time with my feet!"

Ember clenched her fist around her tiny father, trapping him in darkness within the finger prison. She stroked her chin with her free hand as she adopted a thinking expression, before pulling the ottoman over to the couch where her father had been sleeping earlier. She deposited him on the cushion of the ottoman, before sitting down on the sofa.

"Ember, you can't do this! When your mother gets home..."

"Oh, I wouldn't worry about that. Something else I forgot to mention, I made this permanent, so you can be adorable forever! Mom's always saying you're too absentminded to be left to your own devices, so I think she'll be happy with this change."

Blake sputtered, the man's eyes looking betrayed at his behemoth daughter.

"P-Permanent? Why would you-"

"Duh. Because I have so much I wanna do with you at this size. Speaking of that..." Ember said, as Blake watched her reach down beyond his view. There came a loud thud on the carpet as Ember threw something across the room, and from his vantage point he could see it was her flip-flops.

Blake began to sweat as a long shadow fell over him, as Ember lifted her bare legs. Heel first, she dropped her now bare feet on either side of him, each one the size of a building to him.

Ember grinned at how uncomfortable Blake was.

"I said I was gonna let you spend time with my feet!" she said, as Blake turned away.

"Don't you like them, Daddy?" she asked, crossing one over the other and inching her toes closer to Blake, "They don't smell bad. They're really soft, too. Some of the boys are school really love 'em..." she giggled, wiggling her toes playfully. Her silver toe rings on her second toes gleamed in the light.

"Give 'em a rub. I need a foot massage!" Ember said. Blake gave a defiant glare but approached her left foot anyway. He reached a hand out and touched the flesh of her arch; she wasn't lying about its softness.

He began to massage his daughter's feet, grumbling to himself how he had gotten into this situation. Ember grinned when Blake was distracted by his task. She lifted her other foot, facing her toes towards her shrunken father and spread them.
0553322221111.title: Ember's Toes

choices: “...keep you in my mouth for a while!”
0553322221112.content:
Deciding against having her tiny father spend time with her feet, Ember brainstormed other ideas.

“I think I’ll...”
0553322221112.title: Other Ideas

choices: ...turning Blake into a little piece of candy!
05533222212.content: Tiptoeing up to her snoozing father, Ember whispered a chant in the mages’ language...
05533222212.title: Ember’s Sugary Treat?

choices: Blake’s awake, and he’s not pleased!
055332222121.content:
Ember could barely contain her excitement as she loomed over her sleeping father. The features of his face, his peaceful expression, his clothes, the way his chest rose and fell with his breathing; her hungry gaze took it all in, for soon he would not be there anymore. Well, he would be. Just not as he was now.

Her lips, curled up into an overjoyed smile, softly parted as they released the last word needed to finish the spell. The enchantment complete, the teenage girl watched with eyes wide as Blake was consumed head-to-toe in a wash of light. She watched the figure of her father begin to shrink, his arms, legs and head slurped up into his depleting chest, till all that was left was a tiny orb sitting in the middle of the coach. Then the light faded, revealing to Ember her parent’s new form: a squire of gum wrapped up neatly in a white sheet.

She’d done it. She’d actually done it! Her dad was candy! What had once been a person so familiar to her, one who she truly loves with all her heart, was now nothing more than a sweet. A treat to enter a dripping maw, to please taste-buds and to entertain teeth, to disappear down a yearning throat and to plop into needy belly.

And in this case, her needy belly. Though not needy out of hungry, but instead needy of the thrill of swallowing her father. Of taking him into her, of surrounding him entirely, of digesting and adding him to her, turning him into an indistinguishable glob of flab somewhere on her body. Would he end up bouncing on her ass or on her breasts? Her rapturous mind pondered, and both options made her shiver. She needed him.

Shaking with excitement, she reached down to pluck up the piece of Blake-candy, taking it gently between her fingers. She dropped him carefully into the palm of her other hand, and took a seat on the now-vacant couch as she examined her conquest. Taking great care not to damage her treat, she pulled away his covering with her nails, eager to see his true being. The sight did not disappoint her: her father’s form was a thick, supple slab of the juiciest red gum she’d ever seen! Her already watering mouth kicked saliva production into overdrive, forcing her to swallow down the ensuing flood.

Leaning forward, she closed the distance between her mouth and the gum, until her lips were maybe an inch or two away from the sweet. Then she spoke in a playful tone, purposefully pushing out her hot breath so it would wash over her soon-to-be snack. “Impressed, daddy?”
055332222121.title: Sweet Thing

0553322221211.content:
The transformation process had startled Blake from his slumber, and now he found himself unable to move and in the grip of his own daughter’s fingers! Trying to yell up, he was shocked to discover that no sound would come out, leaving only one other means of communication.

“Ember!!” Blake yelled through telepathy. “What did you do to me?!”

Ember couldn’t stifle a playful giggle. “I turned you into gum, silly! And now you’ll be heading into my cute little tummy!” She lowered her gum to her exposed midriff and patted her belly with her free hand.

“Y-you can’t be serious! Change me back, NOW!” Despite his anger at his daughter, Blake was actually quite terrified about what she was about to do to him.

Ember raised her helpless father back up toward her lips. “Sorry, daddy, but you’re in no position to protest. In you go!”

Without further ado, the girl tossed Blake into her open mouth, the salivating tongue already coating the poor piece of gum in her spit. Surprisingly, however, Ember didn’t feel the urge to chew on her father — the slippery tongue abruptly flicked Blake into the darkness of his daughter’s throat, swallowed with a swift gulp. Ember used a finger to trace her treat’s descent down her neck, past her chest, and into her depths.

Blake slid down the tight esophagus before finally falling through a small sphincter and landing with a wet plop in his daughter’s stomach. It was hard to see much in here, and it smelt of cereal and strawberries. The walls pulsated steadily, and a greenish lake of acid bubbled nearby.

Soon enough, Blake blacked out as his sweet body started to digest, and his consciousness would become trapped in Ember’s...
0553322221211.title: Ember’s Small Snack

05533222212112.content:
On the coach, Ember reclined with a small smile on her lips as she listened to quiet gurgling of her belly. A part of her couldn’t believe she’d done what she had just done – turned her beloved father into a simply piece of candy and swallowed him down so easily. She had expected her conscience to stop her from carrying out her wicked little scheme. To talk her down as she hovered over her sleeping father.

Yet in the end, it turned out unable to hold back the dark thrill that boiled up inside her. Every time she thought about it, her heart boomed with a level of excitement she’d never felt before. And as she stared across his napping form, it soared into a thunderous rhythm that filled her entire body with a wondrous warmth and drowned out any uncertainty or doubt. She had to have him.

And now I do, Ember mused with a soft glance down at her midriff. It had quietened down now, clearly finished processing it’s impromptu snack and handed it down for absorption. She couldn’t help but imagine what Blake was going through within her. She pictured him spinning, churning, sloshing about within her busy stomach, helpless against the digestive tides in his little gummy body. Her slimy sack mashing him down with all it’s might into a more absorb-able state, before pumping down into her eager intestines. There, the walls would caress and squeeze as they took all that they wanted from him; and if those walls were anything like their master, that would be everything. Then all that was left was to distribute what was taken. He would rush through her veins, powerless against the current, to be used in whatever way his daughter’s body saw fit.

Ember’s heart was beating faster than ever as her daydream came to an end. “Oh, daddy…” She purred with burning cheeks, and gave her tummy a few loving pats. “You’re sooooo good to me… I love you sooooo much.”

While her heart was quite quick to calm into a steady beat, the heat that had spread throughout her entire being refused to calm down with it. Some teasing words and a fantasy were not nearly enough to sate it. It demanded more.

Slowly, hazily, Ember reached an unsteady hand down. Down past her belly. Down towards-

“Ember…!”

Blake’s voice seared through Ember’s frenzied mind like a hot knife through butter. The teenager very nearly rocketed off the coach in fright – though said fright came less from the clear anger in the telepathic call, and more from the situation she had very nearly been caught in.

“O-O-OH! H-Hi, daddy! Ha-ha, ha… Fi-Finally settled inside my c-cute body, huh?” Ember said as she tried to save face. Her smile was clearly slapped on in a haste, it’s corners faltering and flickering, and her voice failed her too, sounding less like a woman in complete control and more like a girl who had almost been caught-

The desperate Ember interjected before her father had the chance to say anything about anything. “N-No! No, no! Don’t tell! L-Let me find out for myself…”

With a quiet incantation, a magical light encased the tip of her index finger. It was an easy-to-learn spell meant originally for dowsing, but could be easily tweaked to seek out other things; such as this variation, which sought out souls. Ember hovered her finger around her body, dowsing herself for wherever her father’s soul had ended up, until finally the spell glowed as bright as possible above Ember’s…
05533222212112.title: ...breasts or butt.

055332222121122.content:
Ember’s cheeks blazed a bright red as her dowsing spell glowed especially bright near...her rear end!

“D-daddy, uh...” Ember stammered, scarlet in the face still. “I think you’re part of my butt now...”

“Ember! Get me out of here!!” Blake’s voice yelled out again, this time compounded with little wobbles in his daughter’s ass cheeks.

The teenage girl thought silently for roughly a minute, staring at her rear - the same rear her father’s consciousness was now bound to. It felt indescribably good to have him wiggling around in there, but they were still family.

Finally, Ember spoke up.
055332222121122.title: Trapped as Ember’s Butt

choices: Blake still tries to convince Ember to free him
Blake resigns himself to his new life
0553322221211222.content:
The teenage girl thought silently for roughly a minute, staring at her rear - the same rear her father’s consciousness was now bound to. It felt indescribably good to have him wiggling around in there, but they were still family.

Finally, Ember spoke up. "Sorry, but I'm keeping you!"

"What!?" Blake shouted. "Ember you get me out of here NOW!"

Ember simply shook her head, "Not happening, you feel really good in there. Besides, even if I did let you out you don't have a physical body anymore. You'd be a rogue soul living on the physical plain, and you know how dangerous that can be."

If Blake could pale, he would. As much as he hated to admit it, Ember was right. A rogue soul without a body was at constant risk of corruption, being exorcised, or dragged under by malevolent spirits.

Having his soul inhabiting Ember's but was the only thing keeping him safe.

Blake went silent.

"You see. If I let you go then you'd be in danger." Ember explained before smiling. "This new arrangement won't be too bad though, after all we'll get to spend more time together."

"What about your mother?" Blake asked. What would Aria think of this.

"Knowing her she'd probably like this." Ember reasoned.
0553322221211222.title: Blake's Staying Put

0553322222.content: Option 17: In a bid to improve his magical skills (and maybe try to impress his crush), Blake decides to summon a spirit to assist him in his training. But the spirit he calls forth turns out to have a very strange way of educating the young mage. Perhaps he's bitten off more than he can chew...
0553322222.title: Summoner

choices: … shrunken and trapped between a dragoness’ breasts.
… absorbed and trapped as part of a demoness’ ass.
05533222221.content:
It wasn’t worth it. Blake grumbled mentally to himself as the world around him shook again. His current predicament wasn’t what he’d been expecting at all.

He had expected the summoning process to be simple, guessing that a weak spirit – or an Elemental, if he was lucky – would answer his call. Instead, the summoning circle had erupted with more magical energy than the mage had ever felt in his entire life, decimating his usually tidy room in a vortex of power.

From the smoke emerged an otherworldly women whose body teemed with sparks, the dying remnants of the destructive ritual’s energy. Easily she spotted him, her chilling eyes instantly freezing Blake’s feet to the floor, and slowly advanced towards him, taking her sweet time to close the distance between the paralyzed boy and herself. She came to tower over him, his face meeting the supple bosom that was now only a hair’s width away from his nose.

Against the resistance of his own body, and against his better judgment, Blake looked up. He regretted it, as the smile that shone down at him would surely haunt his nightmares.

A slender finger crept into his sight, and softly poked him on the nose. Everything went dark as foreign magic flooded into him.

Now, Blake found himself…
05533222221.title: The Dangers With Summoning

choices: “Alright, I’ll get you out on one condition.”
055332222212.content:
Blake slowly and groggily awoke, expecting to find himself somewhere other than his bedroom - he was at least partially correct. He tried to move but couldn’t as the otherworldly woman’s slender finger ran across his body...or, what remained of it. Trying to recall his recent summoning, the mage boy remembered seeing a scantily-clad, red-skinned demoness poking his nose, before his whole world had gone dark. Looking down at the floor, Blake realized what had happened to him.

He was turned into conscious fat on the demoness’s rear end! Trying to squirm and struggle, Blake could only cause weak jiggles in the flesh of the woman’s ass.

A silent little buzz from her ass initially confused the demoness, before she took a few seconds to realize that her summoner was causing said buzz. She slapped her behind and spoke to him,

“Ah, there you are, Blake! I was hoping you’d end up on my abs, but this is just hilarious! Now you know what it’s like to be part of Scarlet Cinders, the ultimate demon witch!”

“Urgh..! Come on, Scarlet!” Blake complained psychically, squirming some more. “Let me out of here! Please!!”

The demon witch put a finger to her dark lips, pondering how to respond to her captive’s pleas...
055332222212.title: A Hellish Prison

choices: “...I bet your kitchen has more food!”
“...how about I treat you to a belly dance?”
0553322222121.content:
After nearly a minute of deliberating, the scantily-clad demoness responded to her butt-bound captive. “Alright,” Scarlet said at last, “I’ll get you out on one condition.”

Blake had his suspicions about his host’s offer, but quickly realized that his options were very limited, given his current situation. “Ok...what’s the condition?”

“You have to spend a whole month as part of my abs!” Scarlet patted her bare stomach.

“WHAT?!” The entrapped mage retorted, squirming frantically within the demon witch’s ample rear. “B-but...”

Scarlet cut him off with a hard smack to his prison. “Or I could just keep you in my booty for all time and eternity...”

Poor Blake found himself short on choices; it was either a month as belly muscle, or the rest of his life as ass fat. Knowing it was his only chance to get his physical body back, the young man replied “Alright...it’s a deal.”

Smiling, Scarlet pointed a finger towards her buttocks and channeled her power. Blake felt his soul being forcibly separated from the demoness’s rear and transferred towards the skin of her midriff. Once the process was complete, the mage noticed that his new cell was significantly tighter than his previous one - Scarlet apparently didn’t miss a single day of working out her core. As he struggled to get comfortable, Blake’s squirms amounted to tiny, goosebump-like vibrations in the flesh of his captress’s stomach.

Laughing at her sentient contribution’s movements, Scarlet caressed her exposed tummy. “That’s more like it! Now then, first things first...”
0553322222121.title: AB-solute Torture

choices: Scarlet selects a single plate of something for a snack
Scarlet chooses several containers of food to eat
Scarlet's not short on time- she's going to eat everything available!
05533222221211.content:
"What?!" Blake yelped at hearing the demoness's words.

"What? I'm hungry! A girl's gotta eat, you know." Scarlet pouted, crossing her arms under her bust.

"Now, where is your kitchen? Or pantry, I'm not choosy. But speak quickly, you don't want to keep a millennia-old demon lady hungry, kid.

Blake felt apprehensive about what was soon to come, but decided it would be better to acquiesce to his jailer's wishes. After telling her, the tall, leggy demoness set off, hips swaying seductively and rocking her overly-ample rump from side to side. Upon reaching her desired destination, a wide grin broke out over Scarlet's face.

"Ah, now that's more like it! What a treasure trove! Ooh, what should I have first?! That thick, juicy steak? That nice big bowl of spaghetti? This box of muffins? Ooh, or maybe that container just filled with Teriyaki over there! I swear, do you know HOW difficult it is for a girl to get good takeout in hell? It always takes ages, and the service is just atrocious..."

Blake could only laugh nervously at Scarlet's words, wondering just which food she would choose to put into her body.


1. Scarlet isn't feeling super hungry- just one menu item will do.
2. Scarlet's feeling pretty peckish- and she'd like to taunt her detainee. She selects several different plates and eats them slowly, one by one
to tease Blake as his prison slowly tightens...
3. Being in hell for so long has caused Scarlet to work up a real monstrous appetite- she's aiming to finish everything she sees!
05533222221211.title: Even Demons need lunch breaks

choices: Scarlet flops down on a couch in front of the TV for some quality R&R.
Scarlet sifts through Blake's room for anything potentially dangerous to her.
A knock at the door interrupts Scarlet's fun!
055332222212112.content:
"Oh, well this just looks delicious! And this, and this! Oh, but a girl can't eat too much... I wouldn't want to ruin my wonderful figure... guess I'll just have to pick and choose." The demoness mused to herself as she pawed through the contents of Blake's family's well-stocked kitchen. Eventually the tall, curvy, crimson-skinned woman decided upon several containers positively heaped with food. But as she neared the dinner table where Blake's family traditionally ate, her eyes narrowed.

"I say, those chairs look awfully unappealing. Maybe fit for a bunch of mortals, but a woman of my stature deserves something more... fitting." Gathering her magic in her hands, she pointed at the chair closest to her. Swirling lights surrounded the previously unassuming chair before transforming into a richly-padded, high backed throne fit for a queen!

"You're going to turn that back to normal, right? It doesn't really fit with the rest of the kitchen, and it kind of... takes up a lot of space." And Blake's words were absolutely true- the demoness had finished rearranging the kitchen furniture, and she was left at the head of the table with her magnificent throne, while all the other chairs had been shoved up against the wall.

"Now, why would I ever bother with that? This is MY house, now. It may not be much right now, but just wait a week and I'll have a castle fit for a queen!"

Blake gulped, he really didn't like the sound of that. But there was nothing he could right now, stuck as he was in the rock-solid abdominal muscles of the demon.

Plus, even if he'd tried to argue with her, she wasn't in any mood to talk with him- not when she was practically drooling over the food laid out in front of her. Before Blake could so much as make a sound, Scarlet tore into the first container, a covered bowl filled to the brim with spaghetti. The demoness squirmed in delight at the taste, relishing each and every bite.

Minutes passed, and Scarlet neared the end of the bowl. Blake could hardly believe she'd eaten it all so quickly- sure Scarlet was a tall, rather well-built (if how toned her abs and thighs were was any indication) woman, but she shouldn't have been able to devour it all so quickly!

"Oooh, hee hee hee! *Urp.* Oh my, excuse me!" The demon cooed, running one hand over the warm, bare flesh of her stomach. Blake tried desperately not to think about how good it felt, having her run her hand over his location on her midriff.

"H-hey... that was a lot of Spaghetti... but you're done now, right?"

"Not even close, mortal!"

With that said, the demoness practically tore the top off a box of pizza and lifted the first cheesy slice to her plump, ruby-red lips.

"Oops, hold on a moment... there we go!" Even down in his fleshy prison Blake felt the sudden surge of magic energy, focusing on the slice of pizza in Scarlet's hand. The previously cool slice of pizza was soon perfectly reheated, as hot as if the box had just been received from the delivery guy.

And so it went, the demoness reheating each slice of pizza, downing it slowly and savoring each and every bite, while Blake could only groan and squirm. Scarlet may've had a naturally big stomach stomach, but during the demoness's pizza binge the organ reached the point where it was completely filled to the brim. But even then, Scarlet showed no signs of stopping, and every new addition would stretch her tummy just a little further, swelling it bite by bite, piece by piece. Every so often, the demoness's free hand would glide down her middle, caressing her overfilled tummy. Blake wished that he didn't get pleasure from this, but his prison was so tight, so stretched that her pats and rubs were the only things capable of lessening his torment.

"Ahh, that hit the spot. Its been ages since I last had pizza! Mmm... I just want to curl up and take a nap now!" Stretching like a cat, Scarlet took a moment to playfully pat her slightly-bulging belly.

"Had enough, mortal? Because my stomach is plenty stuffed! You must be feeling the pressure in there!" And that was certainly true- you were feeling like you were being squeezed and pressed down on by all sides, as if a vast amount of weight was somehow wrapping you up completely. You groaned out to your captor to relent, to show mercy- even a little more of this and you were going to feel like you were being completely crushed!

"Aw, you look like you're in pain... too bad for you, your torment hasn't ended yet!" Scarlet cackled, tugging a big box of donuts over to herself.

"W...wait. Those are... for my mom's... office party!" You gasped out, having to exert more energy to form the words thanks to the pressure in the demoness's distended belly forcing the surface area of her abdomen that you occupied to stretch apart.

"What's this now? Backtalk? None of that, mortal! Know your place!"

*Whap*

You yelped in pain at the sudden harsh slap, despite how full her stomach was she hadn't had any second thoughts about giving you a firm slap. With her belly being both bare to the world and bulging slightly from her huge meal, her slap really stung. You couldn't do anything except whimper from the stinging sensation now spreading throughout your 'body.'

As for the demoness, she didn't seem to be in any pain despite having slapped her own stomach, but a loud, unladylike belch tore from her lips.

*Beeelch* "Oof, that was a tad louder than I was expecting... still, what were you thinking? Trying to order me around? You are the slave and I am the master! And if I want to eat something, you have no say in stopping me!" The demoness smirked as she gave several smaller slaps to her tight tummy, relishing the feeling of you recoiling from each sharp pat.

With you no longer interrupting her, Scarlet tore into the box of donuts. She cooed and groaned in delight as each new pastry entered her mouth- truly, it had been far too long since she'd last been able to indulge herself like this! Taking no time at all to devour the contents of the box, Scarlet sat back in her chair groaning in contentment. Her stomach was rounded and bulging out a little bit, evidence of her massive meal. Still, she'd restrained herself from going completely overboard- at least this way she only looked like she had a food baby, and not an actual baby in her gut.

Ah, this was the life! Scarlet smirked, pondering what to do with herself now. It had been so long since she' been summoned to the human world- she couldn't wait to see what had changed. And the foolish child who had summoned her hadn't set any failsafe's or precautions to keep her in check, meaning she was free to do as she pleased!

Feeling another burp coming up, Scarlet stifled it with a hand and brought her other hand down to caress her stuffed, rounded stomach. The perfectly smooth surface (save for the concave of her belly button) was taut and unyielding to the touch, and she could still feel the pathetic mortal who had summoned her within. He was quiet now, likely trying to recover from the ordeal she had just put him through. Still absentmindedly stroking her bloated stomach, Scarlet hefted herself out of her throne as she made her next move.


1. An immortal demon like her has all the time in the world to do what she wants! Why not relax some more?
2. Eh, she should probably take precautions to prevent herself from being forcibly expelled from the human realm. Best check out that mage's room to make sure there's nothing that could be used against her in there.
3. Scarlet's plans for the future have met another interruption! Someone knocks on the front door to Blake's house!
055332222212112.title: Scarlet chooses several containers of food to eat

choices: “...how about I trap some of your friends in me, too?”
“...a belly button ring should shut you up!”
05533222221212.content:
“...how about I treat you to a belly dance?”

As much as he wanted out of Scarlet’s body, Blake’s teenage boy hormones simply couldn’t resist the allure of witnessing a belly dance. Unfortunately, his thoughts strayed into the mind of the demoness, who smirked at her abdominal prisoner’s arousal.

“Sounds like you’re on board with that idea!” Scarlet teased, rubbing her tummy some more before walking over to face her reflection in a nearby mirror. “Hold on tight, little man! Here I go!”

Blake was unable to protest as Scarlet immediately began moving her midsection sensuously to the rhythm of imaginary Arabian music. Instead of painful rocking, however, the assimilated mage felt large doses of pleasure from the seductive motions of his hostess. He moaned in ecstasy throughout the dance - part of him didn’t want this sensation to ever stop, but the other half begged desperately to have his physical body restored.

After a few minutes, Scarlet concluded her belly dance with a taunting flex of her abdomen, which brought Blake out of his trance and back to reality. He wiggled and thrashed around, causing more little reverberations in the demonic flesh of his cell.

“Quit squirming in there, you!” Scarlet demanded, slapping her gut and sending a jolt of pain through her captive. “Maybe I should punish you for misbehaving...”
05533222221212.title: Devilish Dance

choices: Blake tries to cut another deal
05533222221213.content:
"That's more like it! Now then, first things first... time to exercise my core muscles!"

Wait... What!?

Before Blake could protest, the demoness snapped her fingers, the world shifting in a crimson vortex. It was so sudden and so bizarre that it honestly left the poor summoner feeling dizzy.

Scarlet of course giggled at her summoner's predicament and waited for his consciousness to right itself.

When the world finally stopped shifting and the fog cleared, Blake was surprised to find himself in what appeared to be some kind of demonic gym.

"We're here!" Scarlet cheered.

"And where exactly is here?" Blake dare ask.

"Why my own personal gym of course." Scarlet answered.

If Blake could gulp he would. From his perspective he could make out the crimson matts, the scarlet medicine balls, the maroon weights, and the orange jump ropes.

Suddenly the memory of what the demoness said earlier returned to him. "You said you were going to work on your core muscles, right?"

The demoness smirked. "Oh yeah."

Blake began to tremble and the demon witch felt it. "Is this gonna hurt?"

The smirk didn't fade.
05533222221213.title: Gym Time

0553322222122.content:
“WHAT?!” Blake yelled, intensifying the jiggling of the demon’s ass in his desperation to escape. “WHY?!”

Scarlet’s smirk widened into a maniac grin. “Because,” She began, jabbing a finger into her mage-inhabited cheek and electing a grunt from the assimilated boy. “It’s in a demon’s nature to torment people; especially naive little mages like you. I mean, how could you not see something like this coming, summoning all willy-nilly?”

As much as he hated to, Blake had to admit that was a good question. He had been banking so much on the idea of summoning someone benevolent, he hadn’t even considered what he’d do if he got someone malevolent. And now he was paying for it.

Pulling her finger free from her fleshy backside, Scarlet gave a mighty stretch, not unlike that of a cat, and advanced towards the bed, stepping over or shoving aside any ritual-displaced objects that got in her way, before she stopped and softly patted her rump again. “Now hush up, will ya? A body like this needs a lot of beauty sleep to maintain!”

With that said, Scarlet leaped ass-first towards Blake’s disheveled bed, landing on the mattress with a mutted thud. Her plump cheeks spilled outwards at the impact, crushed between their master’s weight and momentum and the fabric beneath her, with Blake mercilessly squished in the middle. The mage squealed in pain as he was compressed against his will inside the demonic flesh that was now his prison, and he was sure Scarlet heard it, and was relishing in it, as she ground her booty against the mattress for a good minute or so to annoy her passenger even more.

Then, after she was satisfied with torturing the boy, Scarlet flipped herself over and came to rest upon her stomach, ass pointing up towards the ceiling. She wrapped her arms around a pillow and nuzzled her face into it, thoroughly enamored with it’s palpable softness, for it was not often she got to enjoy the sensations of the human realm. It wasn’t long before she felt her eyelids grow heavy, so she eagerly obliged, and, after loudly slapping her cheeks together to torment her prisoner one last time, quickly settled into a peaceful sleep.

Blake took a moment to review the situation, as well as to also recuperate from the beat down he had just received from his captor. “Scarlet?” He asked, barely louder than a whisper, not really wanting to wake his tormentor. No response came, except for the demonness’ gentle breathing as she slumbered. He was unsure if Scarlet was truly asleep, or if it was all just a ruse to get his hopes up so she could crush them right in front of him.

Regardless, Blake took this moment of peace to begin brainstorming an escape plan. Using his magic sight to scan the room for his spellbook, he could not find hide nor hair of it. Had it been buried by the ritual’s storm? He switched to a different spell, one used for sensing magic energies, and focused. The book, a treasure trove of spells, naturally reeked of magic.

There it was!… tucked deeply under his bed.

Damn. Oh how he wished the hadn’t skipped practicing Telekinesis!

At a loss, Blake bitterly mused on what to do now. He only knew a few spells from memory, and none of them would be any help getting free of this situation… except maybe…

Across the room, the summoning circle still crackled with remnant energy, just barely enough to reach out and beckon something forth once again. The enchantment was still fresh in his mind, word for word he still remembered it perfectly. Even being well aware of the dangers, Blake knew he had little choice, less he spend who-knows how long as this horrible creature’s backside.

He concentrated, and began the incantation…
0553322222122.title: Blake the Bubble-Butt

05533222221221.content:
“Dammit!” Blake thought as his focus failed for the umpteenth time. He had been trying to duplicate the summoning ritual for the last four hours only to be met with failure after failure. “I don't understand, what am I doing wrong!?” The young mage-turned-sentient demoness rump wondered. “Why isn't this working?” He suspected that the innate demonic energies being given off by Scarlet were interfering with his own abilities.The former mage exhaled an exasperated breathe and slumped back, the action-given his current form-merely translated into the sleeping fiend’s prominent, red backside jiggling a little bit, and prompted a snort from his dark captress. However, Blake’s sigh was more figurative than anything else.

“At this rate,” the boy thought, “I’ll be a this demon’s fat ass for all of eternity!”

Speaking of fat, Blake was struggling to come to terms with the recent chain of events. Just a few hours ago he was a young man, a mage with a bright future, now he was so much fat and tissue on the butt of a demon woman. He had noticed his body mirror haphazardly propped up against the wall near the foot of his bed, no doubt displaced by the maelstrom of magical energy released with the initial summoning. From his position he could see Scarlet and more importantly himself in its reflective surface. He could see himself, and yet it was not himself. Blake didn't see the face of a dorky guy with glasses, he saw a scantily leather-clad hellspawn with a-virtually bare-plump, rotund ass right where he should have been, sleeping on his bed. And he was very plump indeed. Scarlet’s rear was enormous. He was enormous. Blake was always captivated by the female form, especially large butts, thick thighs and long legs, and Scarlet had all this including more in spades. She was gorgeous, and Blake hated himself for seeing her as such. Then he remembered that he was part of her, and that she took his life away. His attraction left him. He wondered just how many other poor souls had fallen for her deceptive good looks and met similar fates.

The demoness had originally been shapely to say the least, but after consuming him, her already sizable, red buttocks had increased in size to resemble a pair of smooth, fleshy volleyballs, or even soccer balls. It made some sense, all things considered. All of his absorbed mass had to go somewhere, and though he was loath to admit it he was genuinely impressed that he had made the raven haired demoness’ butt so big. So Why then was he not even bigger? Should not Scarlet now have an absurdly huge ass? She assimilated an entire person, should she not now have a person sized rear as a result? The fact that she didn't only proved to frighten the former boy. Perhaps whatever profane sorcery Scarlet had employed necessitated some of his previous biomass to be metabolized and converted into energy to power the tainted rite. If so then what was taken would be lost forever. What would happen if he was returned to normal? If it was at all possible. Blake did not like where his train of thought was heading so he decided to quickly change his focus.

In the deathly silent darkness of his mess of a room, the only sounds he had were the subtle creaking of his bed springs whenever the creature he was joined with shifted in her sleep, and her gentle, eerily soothing breathing. The summoning circle even this long after the initial activation, cracked with residual energy. The nearby open window let in the cool air of the night, causing goosebumps to form over the demoness’ flesh, over Blake. This was just too surreal for his liking. He was really an ass. A fat, massive ass. Two buttocks perfectly rounded. A smooth, deep cleft running between his halves which harbored a black-leather thong like garment that did little to protect the demon’s modesty. Scarlet’s arrowhead-tipped tail-a moderately lengthy, slender, whip of a thing-would occasionally flick in her sleep and either brush against Blake or nestle within the cleft of his new form.

Blake decide to test the extent of his current state of being. He began by attempting to manipulate some of the muscles in the thick mass of his new body, pulling and tugging at nerves that he used to only feel in one tiny part of his former self, but which now made up his whole existence. The most he could manage were subdued twitches and spasms, which sent slight ripples through his flesh. Or was it Scarlet's? At this point he was not sure where he ended and she began. The two were one and the same. He strained as hard as he could on the most prominent muscles that he could feel: those around what he now realized with a little thrill of disgust was Scarlet's anus. He cringed internally when he realized that if he concentrated hard enough he could cause the tight little muscular ring to twitch. Not wishing to explore any further he returned to the silence. All in all it was not so bad. Despite everything...it was oddly comfortable. Warm. Soft. Only he was what was warm and soft. Heat radiated off his bulbous form just like it did from the rest of the infernal woman’s body. The quivers and quakes that would travel through now whenever his captress would move in just the right way made it feel as though Blake was laying on a water bed, though he was the water bed. He could just fall asleep.

“Wait! What?” He abruptly thought. “What am I thinking?”

Blake did not know much about demons but the little knowledge he possessed on the subject revealed that many if not all breeds can feed of the souls of mortals, its where they attained their true nourishment. Scarlet didn't just assimilate his body, she was gradually gnawing away at his soul as well, and it was starting to affect his mind. Was this why he was feeling tired? Blake knew that if he did not act soon he risked having his very essence devoured by Scarlet’s. He would be little more than inert booty meat! At the very least his mind could be warped into thinking that his current state was enjoyable and forget about ever being human.

Suddenly fearful for his very existence Blake reached out, and recited the incantation, again and again, fueled by desperation. The summoning circle was on the verges of collapse, but with its final flicker it exploded into a brilliant, blinding flash of light. Jake recoiled back, praying that whatever he dragged through would help him, and not be a Scarlet 2.0.

Speaking of The Ultimate Demon Witch, the demon lifted her head, the commotion jarring her awake. She squinted her dark eyes, still heavy with sleep, before realizing what was happening. “Someone's been a naughty butt.” She chided the soul bound to her bottom, and gave her rump a sharp slap. “Using the summoning circle again?” Scarlet spoke, “Didn't you learn from the last time? What do you even hope to accomplish? Your mine now, nothing will--” Scarlet’s words died down as the light faded and the smoke cleared. And what she saw surprised her. The confident smirk forever on her lips disappeared in an instant as she sat up in bed to now rest her knees as well as Bake.
05533222221221.title: Divine Intervention

choices: Scarlet flees from Aliyah over the city, the angel in hot pursuit.
Blake manages to force Scarlet down into an old warehouse building.
055332222212211.content:
In the center of the now inactive circle with her back toward you and Scarlet, stood another woman. She was fair skinned, tall for a female, only somewhat taller than Scarlet. She had long golden hair, and a similar form and build to Scarlet’s as well. The mysterious being was dressed in pure white, her ensemble comprised of a sleeveless top that exposed her midriff, a short skirt and gladiator like footwear. There was a dim aura of light around her. She looked around, obviously confused. “I-is this the mortal realm,” the being wondered aloud, “how did I get here!?” The angel turned around to face Scarlet and yourself. Her icy blue eyes snapping to attention when they met the black of Scarlet’s.

“You!” The two otherworldly beings cried in unison.

“Aliyah!” Scarlet uttered under hear breath.

“The Ultimate Demon Witch: Scarlet. Or rather that is what you're calling yourself these days, isn't it?” Spoke the angel, Aliyah.

Scarlet growled and looked back over a shoulder once again and glared down at her mage padded rear-end.

“I don't know why I'm here in the mortal realm,” Aliyah said,”but if you're here too it can't be anything good. At any rate, for your crimes against Heaven and humanity I hereby place you under arrest” The Angel’s brow wrinkled into a frown as she notice the considerable rump on her nemesis’ backside“You look strange.” she stated plainly.

“Of all the-!” Scarlet started. She harshly drove a fist into the side of her thick buttocks. Causing the frightened boy within to cry out in pain. “What did you do you wretched little fleshling?!” Scarlet asked. She was livid. Who ever this Aliyah was, the demoness did not want to see her. “Of all the things you could have called forth, you snag a Sentinel lieutenant? How can you even still use magic anyway?”

“Sentinel what's a Sentinel?” Blake asked between blows.

“They're like knights only angels, and the one you summoned has been after me for a thousand years!” Scarlet spat while still pummeling her mage infused ass. “She’s just as powerful as myself, maybe more! This can get messy.”

“Some Ultimate Demon Witch you are.” Blake laughed. “Maybe she can get me out of her.”

“Shut it!” Scarlet barked before grinding her rump into the bed, crushing the hope out of her captive.

The angel observed the demon’s bizarre display. She was was punching talking to herself. Talking to..her butt? A butt that was a lot bigger than the last time the crossed paths.

“What are you doing, demon? Who are you talking too?” Aliyah asked before gasping in surprise. “Wait I sense another, a mortal!”

It was now You and Scarlet’s turn to gasped, the latter focusing on the Sentinel before her.

“He’s very close. He should be right here but...I don't…” Aliyah seemed very confounded.

Scarlet palmed her face, and groaned.

“By the Seven Rings of Hell! You were always slow to connect the dots.” She began. A cocky grin returning to her face as she spoke in a smug tone “Let spare your dumb brain the trouble. There was a human here, yes. A mage in fact, He unwittingly summoned me here and as thanks I devoured him,” Scarlet giggled, “mind body and soul. And this...” Scarlet moved on the bed until she was on all fours with her large back side mooning the lieutenant. She shook it mockingly at her adversary. “...this thing of beauty is all that's left of him.” She explained.

The angel took an offensive stance after hearing this. “Foul creature! Release the human at once!” Aliyah demanded.

“It's too late for that even if I wanted to, which i don't, His body was used to fuel his transformation, what was left is now delectable Scarlet booty.” Scarlet taunted. “His living soul is now bound to this right here!” Scarlet capitalized this with a hard smack to her rear.

“If his soul is intact as you say, then he can be saved,” Aliyah spoke, “if you wont turn him over I’ll just have to take him from you.” She drew a short sword from a scabbard on her hip. The blade seemed to shine with a bright silvery light. “You got away every time we met before but not tonight!”

Scarlet stuck her tongue out at the angel, slapped her wide ass once more and leaped of the bed.

“You can try!” Scarlet shouted to her enemy as a pair of bat wings sprouted from the middle of her back as she sailed out the nearby open window, Blake cried out in fear as they took flight. “You'll have to catch me first you skank!”

Hey! Get back here, you bitch!” Aliyah cried out as a pair of white feathered, avian wings sprouted from her back before giving chase. “Scarlet!”
055332222212211.title: Divine Intervention-Part 2

choices: Aliyah makes it to the warehouse.(Reserved)
0553322222122112.content:
The sound of beating wings carried out over the cool night air. The people on the bustling city streets far below had no idea what was playing out over their heads as they went about their lives. Had one looked up, they may have seen what appeared to be a bat winged, red skinned woman desperately trying to lose a pale eagle winged woman wearing white tailing behind. None did however, as the demon and angel were lost so high up against the black, star dotted backdrop.

Aliyah was having a hard time keeping up. She had no idea that the mortal world would have such an effect on her body. It felt as though she was moving through molasses, every wing beat demanding more effort than it normally would in the spirit world. She had few opportunities to visit the human world, she was not used to actually breathing, the chill of the air, or the pull of gravity. Her body was slowly acclimating to the sudden change of environment, but not fast enough to prevent her target from getting away, and with a captive soul no less. Still the angel urged herself on, determined as sweat began to form on her brow. She blinked the strange liquid from her eyes before reaching forth with her right hand, arm straight and palm upright before she closed her left eye and focused.

Scarlett cursed under her breath as she struggled to maintain the control of her flight. Normally flying came to one such as herself as naturally as swimming to a fish. She had grown accustomed to the world of the living and its physical effects on spiritual entities such as Aliyah and herself, having been summoned many times over the ages by ancient devil cults or would be magisters looking to dominate her and control her power only to be outwitted. Occasionally she was brought into the world by foolish youths with too much alcohol that thought it would be fun to dance around a bonfire and hold a satanic ritual in the woods. It did not matter as they all met the same fate: their souls consumed by the dark beauty.

They were such delectable morsels, human souls. Each one claimed increased her power. The stronger the soul the bigger the boost. Scarlett had developed quite the gluttonous appetite for them. It was narcotic. The more she fed, the more often she needed to do it. She once tore through a cult with the ravenous fury not unlike like that of a fat woman with an eating disorder turned loose at an all one could eat buffet. Each one has a distinct flavor. Sinners, those with wicked hearts, we’re her bread and butter. Tasty, but standard fare. Equivalent to a cheap fast-food burger by human standards. Pure hearted souls were her favorite. The purer the better. It was such a delight to tempt them to fall to the dark just before their demise. Pure souls were like a savory sirloin steak one seldom dinned on. Virgins. They were the best a rare delicacy she rarely had the pleasure of feasting on. Such sweet, delicious things. The mage coalesced within her behind was such a rare commodity. Though her addiction may have figuratively bitten her in the ass. The energy she obtained by eating souls was stored in the form of extra weight on the fiend’s body, and much to Scarlett’s dismay she gained weight on her thighs and rump first, which were quite thick. Countless souls had gone into the making of her shapely, rotund behind. Her latest victim might have tipped the scales however as the mage riding in her caboose had caused her already prodigious backside to swell enough to seriously screw with her aerodynamic profile, throwing off her movement and balance.

Something caught the demoness’ attention. Scarlett saw it in the corner of her eye. A flash of white light somewhere behind her. She gasped and Instinctively rolled to her left as a bolt of bright energy whizzed by. The demoness looked back at the figure pursuing her.

“Ha,” she exclaimed while she clumsily attempted to level out of her barrel roll, “you missed, you self-righteous, big boobed sow!”

Aliyah gritted her teeth before firing another bolt of shimmering light from her outstretched hand. Scarlett narrowly managed to veer out of its flight path. “Missed me again!” She teased.

This went on for some time. Aliyah shooting potshots at her demonic counterpart, only for Scarlett to just manage barely to zig and zag out of the way before hurling insults which centered around Aliyah’s oversized breasts which seemed to be a sensitive topic as the angel would sometimes crack and shout back obscenities insulting the demon’s intelligence.

“These two are supposed to be powerful spirits?” Blake thought as he was thrown this away and that with Scarlett’s maneuvers. “They sound like two feuding high school girls.” Blake could see that the angel was slowly catching up. But she seemed be struggling for some reason. He had been betting on Aliyah’s help, but it occurred to him that if he did not do something Scarlett might get away and he would be stuck as her large butt for all of eternity, or at least until he broke and the demon’s finishes metabolizing him. He had no idea how much time he had left. Maybe a week? A month? For all he knew he may somehow survive the ordeal only to truly become the living ass of the demon woman.

Blake needed to do something to prevent that outcome, but he was having such a hard time focusing his magical energies. Scarlett’s body was still disrupting his own abilities, but he figured if he tried, he could manage...something. “It worked before!” he thought. As the two women continued their aerial ballet, Blake focused on what little of himself remained. He did not know how his powers would manifest in his current form, but he had to try. Clearing his mind. Blake tried to perform a fireball spell. “Come on. You can do this Blake.” The sentient ass thought. Trying again Blake suddenly felt a brief surge of energy.

“That’s it!” He exclaimed.

The chase had moved to the skies over the cities industrial district. An area filled with many old factories and warehouses overlooking the harbor. Scarlett managed to evade yet another shot of energy from Aliyah. “What’s wrong Aliyah?” Scarlett asked feigning concern, “you’re usually so calm and focused. Getting tired? First time ever feeling tired? Yeah the mortal realm can do that to a girl.”

"Do you ever shut up, you idiot?” Aliyah spat back. She fired another blast from her hand.

“Woo!” Scarlett squealed like a giddy school girl as she rolled out of the way. "I think I'm getting used to the extra weight." She flipped over so that she was flying upside down and able to look directly at her foe. “Your aim, it kind of sucks, hun? You really must not be used to this world, huh?”

Aliyah just growled in frustration as Scarlett stuck out her lounge and teased her. Scarlett laughed as she reoriented herself after diving under another shot from Aliyah. "And I thought this would be difficult!" Scarlett called out. She broke out into laughter and slapped her left but cheek as she prepared to lose the angel for good when without warning a large gout of flame erupted from between her plump buttocks. Scarlett eyes widened, and her mouth flew open in a silent scream.

“Whoa!” Aliyah cried as she swerved out of the way of the large fire ball. “D-did...she just...fart fire?!”

Scarlett looked back, face blushing as she noticed smoke and steam rising from between her but cheeks.

“T-the hell w-was that?!” She said in disbelief. “Mage was that you?”

“You got it!” Her ass replied.

“What are you doing? How can you even still use magic?” Scarlett asked in shock.

She noticed ice crystals begin to grow over the surface of her wings and back.

“Bringing you down! Don't know!” The soul bonded to her rump answered.

Scarlett hissed as black flames emulated her entire body. Instantly removing the previously rapidly accumulating ice. “Trying to freeze my wings, eh? Nice try Butt Boy!” She mocked.

“Only enough energy for one more spell.” Blake thought as he dug deep and put all he had into one last attempt to stall Scarlett.

The demoness was suddenly enveloped in a shroud of electricity. She and Blake both shrieked in agony as the boy turned butt unintentionally electrocuted them both. “Damn you, human!” Scarlett said through clenched teeth as electricity racked her body. The field of electricity dispersed and Scarlett promptly fell towards the ground unconscious. “That did it...” Blake thought as he began to black out, mana reservoirs depleted. He won’t be able to help himself again. Not with his magic.

Aliyah had caught up a bit, she saw the odd display play out in front of her. “D-did the human...was he fighting back?” She thought out loud. She paused in midair as she watched Scarlett's limp body nosedive until she smashed through the roof of one of the large rectangular structures, she believed the humans called a warehouse. Shaking her head, she snapped back to reality and descended towards the holed building.
0553322222122112.title: Aerial Pursuit

choices: Ripped Blake’s soul from the demon’s butt.
Shrugged, and finished swallowing the pair.
0553322222122113.content:
A few soft, milky feathers came loose from the angel’s wings as she launched herself out the open window, in hot pursuit of the fleeing demon and her rear-end captive. They dance upon the gentle breeze as they dragged slowly downwards, and silently burst into fading particles of light when they landed.

One, however, drifted a little farther than it’s brethren. It danced a more energetic dance as it’d descended, with tiny spins and flips and wide sways, till finally it came to a halt, making contact with the shoulder of a mysterious onlooker. They had paid no attention to the parting dance of the magical feather, nor to the feather’s final parting itself.

Their eyes were locked upon the scene far above. Of an angel chasing after a demon, and, more interesting than that, of the boy trapped beneath red skin. The onlooker sighed.

“Blake Heart, what have you gotten yourself into?”

---

Scarlet dove to the left as a blade of burning light cleaved through the air to her right. If she had reacted only a second later, there was little doubt she’d have been cleaved in two.

“Whoa!” Scarlet flipped herself over, turning to address her pursuer while flying upside down. “That’s a new trick! Looks like someone’s been training hard since our last encounter, hm?” She taunted the angel with a smug smirk.

Aliyah angrily bared her teeth at the demoness. Internally, she cursed herself. She couldn’t catch up to Scarlet in her current state. Her body hadn’t had the time needed to adjust to this mortal realm, and it wasn’t helped in the slightest by the sudden strain of giving chase to her nemesis. Scarlet, on the other hand, obviously had been given the time to adjust, in addition to all the extra energy her prisoner was unwilling providing her with.

Her new technique was the only option she had left. It cut through any evil, no matter how powerful, but it was simply too predicable and easy to avoid if your foe could see it coming. Had it hit her, Scarlet would surely have been dealt with and the human’s soul freed. Now that she was aware of it, Aliyah knew she’d need a miracle to actually land it.

“Surrender yourself for cleansing this instant!” Aliyah snarled, and swung her sword again, calling forth another blade of light towards the demon.

Scarlet comically rolled out of the way of the attack. She put a finger to her lip in mock thought. “I think… not!” She sneered. She turning around and repeatedly slapped her ass at the angel. “Nah-nah-nah-nah-nah-nah!” A final shake of her rippling butt, Scarlet increased her speed, smirking as she put even more distance between herself and the angel.

Within that jiggly rear, Blake was being mercilessly pumped from every direction by the demonic flesh surrounding him. Scarlet’s body was clearly stepping up it’s efforts to absorb him completely, demanding he hand over all that he had left to his new mistress. It flooded his mind with naughty images of a life as Scarlet’s butt: spilling out as she sat herself down, bouncing gently with every step she took, fighting against her as she struggled to fit him into a pair of tight yoga pants… Those thoughts only grew nicer as more of him slipped away, broken down and becoming more of Scarlet. He could practically feel the demoness’ smile widen as she felt him grow lesser and lesser inside of her.

Yet, somewhere deep inside his soul, a part of him clung to being Blake Heart. To his family, to his friends, to his crush and to his future. That part refused to budge or break or give in to the hungry walls. It was Blake Heart. And to it that wouldn’t change, no matter what.

Scarlet scowled. Seems the human’s soul was stubborn. No matter. All she needed to do was lose Aliyah. Then she could find a good spot to relax and focus on breaking him down completely. Mage or nobody, every soul breaks eventually-

Something wrapped tightly around Scarlet’s arms and stomach, stopping the demon dead in the air. She spluttered violently as the air was forced up from her lungs by the pressure, strong enough to make it feel like her bones could snap at any second. She glanced down to see tendrils of light ensnared securely around her.

“Oy, oy! W-what kinda angel magic is this?!” She yelled behind her at Aliyah. Her bat wings flapped and her legs kicked fruitlessly. “Let go of me, you dumb skank!”

“I-It’s not me doing this, you disgusting harlot!” Aliyah herself wheezed. The tendrils of light had also entangled the angel, twisting her arm until she was forced to drop her sword, which faded into particles of light long before it could hit the ground.

This magic felt familiar to Aliyah, yet at the same time different. It was definitely angelic magic… yet at the same time it wasn’t. What in name of the creator could it…

The angel’s eyes lit up. “It’s… this is…!”

With great force, the angel and the demon were slammed together, chest pressing into chest, and coated in an extra layer of light vines. To Aliyah’s left and Scarlet’s right, a new figure lifted herself up to loom slightly over the pair.

Aliyah took one look at her and her body was overcome with fear and disbelief. “Watcher!” She mutter, hardly able to believe her eyes.

Scarlet was annoyed and confused. “Watch-wha?” She quizzically looked at the new figure.

They looked like a teenage, medium height human girl. Her skin was pale and silky, yet seeping with life. Her hair was mostly black except for a certain red bang that swept to the girl’s left, and in length it stopped just a little above her shoulders. Her eyes were blue, but with weird, gear-like pupils. She wore a short, red sweater with a red scarf around her neck, a mostly exposed midriff, and a pair of red pants connected to her sweater by to black straps. From behind her, tendrils of pure light sprouted from her back like wings, the majority of which currently being used to ensnare the pair.

Looking over the girl again, Scarlet couldn’t understand Aliyah’s fear. “She doesn’t look so-”

Then the girl’s mouth grew wide above their heads, easily big enough to take in them both.

Aliyah closed her eyes and grit her teeth. Scarlet didn’t get to finish her scream.

The Watcher’s lips hungrily fell over the duo’s heads, coming to rest on their shoulders as her tongue lapped away at their hair and faces. Quickly, she continued, her mouth descending down to angel’s and demon’s forearms. Two bulges ballooned out in the Watcher’s throat. One struggled and fought and screamed into the flesh around her; the other was still and silent, knowing any attempt at escape was pointless.

The tendrils wrapped around the pair broke off from the Watcher’s back, making it easier for their master to continue her consumption as she claimed more of them. With her lips now around there midriffs, she lifted the pair up above her head using her arms, providing them with a clear slide into her stomach. Red legs flailed wildly as their owner sunk in deeper, but the fair skinned legs offered no futile resistance, even as it’s owner’s head dipped into the Watcher’s chest.

It was when the Watcher reached the butts that, for some reason, she stopped herself. Her tendril wings held the floundering red legs still as she grabbed a handful of the demon’s butt flesh. Blake felt something squeeze him a few, but he was too weak from the demon’s attempted assimilation to investigate what it was. Still, they were soft, curious squeezes, not the cruel kind Scarlet would give, so he found himself somewhat hopeful as to what it could be.

Eventually, after a few more squeezes, the Watcher…
0553322222122113.title: Along Came A Hungry Watcher

choices: “I’ll get you out, once you’re completely safe.”
05533222221221131.content:
“W-woah...”

Blake was unprepared as two of the Watcher’s gleaming tendrils proceeded to squeeze his prison within Scarlet’s rear tightly, before he found himself being forcibly ripped from the red flesh. The appendages of light then dragged the boy’s disembodied soul into what looked like an exposed midriff. The Watcher’s tendrils relinquished their grip on both Aliyah and Scarlet, and the strange girl spat the pair out onto the vacant street before teleporting away. Both angel and demon were flabbergasted at what just transpired.

Scarlet felt her rear, pouting as it had returned to its normal size. “Stupid Watcher...taking away my sentient contribution!”

“This is all your fault!” Aliyah growled at the demoness. “If you hadn’t absorbed that human in the first place, he wouldn’t be in this mess!”

The two promptly charged at each other in sheer anger, engaging in what could only be described as a dust-cloud brawl.

Meanwhile, in one of New Opal’s vacant warehouses, the Watcher reappeared through a dimensional rift, looking down and rubbing her bare belly...which now contained a bit of conscious padding better known as Blake Heart. The mysterious girl could feel her internal passenger’s squirms, and it made her giggle cutely.

“Please, let me out of here!” Blake begged through telepathy. “I want my body back!”

The Watcher removed her hand from her stomach before replying...
05533222221221131.title: From One Captress to Another

05533222222.content:
Option 18: Blake has finally done it. The young mage finally built up the courage to ask out his crush Aria, and to his great delight she said yes! His heart is alight with joy as he arrives at her house for the pair’s first date together.
But there’s a problem. Turns out that Aria’s mother and older sister are actually incredibly powerful witches, and both are extremely protective of their youngest member. Now Blake must earn at least one of their blessings if he wishes to date Aria, and to do so he must pass whatever strange test they have in store for him.
05533222222.title: Blake’s Crush’s Unusual Family

055332222222.content: Blake has lost a bet with one of his friends and he MUST honor the agreement or face his secret getting revealed! Though it may not be all THAT bad.
055332222222.title: Reluctant Servant

0553322222223.content: Option 20 (Diminutive Operative): Recruited by a secret government agency because of his experience with changing size, Blake is tasked with shrinking down to his familiar half-inch stature and taking on several covert missions. However, since solo infiltration is difficult when shrunken, Blake's normal-sized girlfriend Aria tags along to lend some assistance...though she herself won't be doing any shrinking.
0553322222223.title: Diminutive Operative

choices: Blake and Aria are sent on their first mission. (Reserved)
05533222222231.content:
Blake Heart sat in what looked like a dark interrogation room, next to his girlfriend, Aria Gleam. Opposite the couple approached a pair of adults in black suits and matching fedoras - one male, one female. It all had happened so fast - one moment Blake and Aria were on their way to see the new movie 'Love's Zenith', and the next they were knocked out cold by tiny pricks in their necks - tranquilizer darts, they now guessed.

"B-before you ask..." Blake spoke as the adults sat across from the teens. "I did NOT take the last slice of pizza at lunch this time!"

"Don't be alarmed," the black-dressed male spoke, "you're not in any trouble. We're simply looking for new recruits with...special talents."

"Who are you people?" Aria asked, feeling slightly uneasy about the situation.

The man showed the teens a golden badge. "Agent John, of the Buried Business Bureau."

The woman, John's partner, displayed her own badge. "Agent Casey. Pleased to make your acquaintance."

"Likewise..." Blake nodded. "So, what kind of talents are you looking for in us?"

"We've received word of shady dealings in downtown New Opal," John explained, "and we need you to help us in our investigation."

Aria chimed in, unfamiliar with the covert. "Are you asking us to become spies?"

"In a way, yes..." Casey affirmed. "But your friend Blake has an additional skill he'll need to put to use: shrinking."

Blake's cheeks turned a bright red. How in the world did the Buried Business Bureau know about his powers?! And who was to say that the entire world didn't know at this point?

"Shrinking to half an inch tall will increase your ability to stay stealthy," John said, "but I take it Aria lacks the power to shrink?"

"I've never dabbled in the magical arts..." Aria frowned, "so no, I can't shrink."

"No problem," Casey smiled softly. "It's best that you remain normal size, anyway. All the better to keep track of your partner!"

John pulled out a box of spy tools - small cameras, magnifying glasses, communication devices, and the like. "You'll need these to do the job right, though."

Blake raised an eyebrow. "Wait, where'd all of these gadgets come from?"

"That's classified information," Casey stated.
05533222222231.title: Buried Business

choices: Aria disguises herself to fool the crooks
Too late; Blake and Aria are caught!
055332222222311.content:
Aria took cautious steps into the downtown streets of New Opal, uncertain of what waited in the suspicious alleys, but determined to mete out justice. On her back was a knapsack hiding her arsenal of spy gadgets, and her now-shrunken boyfriend Blake kept watch from within her cleavage...with a deep blush on his face.

"A-are you sure this is where I'm supposed to conduct recon..?" Blake asked, his cheeks remaining bright red.

"Don't worry!" Aria replied, hoping to reassure her little man. "It keeps you secure and close to me. What else could you ask for?"

Just then, a soft ringing could be heard from the walkie-talkie within Aria's backpack. The brunette took out the walkie-talkie, knowing the Buried Business Bureau was checking in.

"Agents Blake and Aria, do you copy?" That was John's voice on the other end.

"Yes, we're approaching the target destination!" Aria responded. "Out."

"No, no! You're supposed to go IN! Out."

"Message received. Out."

John groaned in frustration. "Look, you're at the intersection of Baker Street and Electric Avenue, right?"

"Correct."

"Our intel has informed us that notorious crime lord Cassidy Butch plans to meet with a band of crooks to arrange the robbery of several Mexican restaurants. Apparently he calls his scheme 'Grand Theft Taco'."

Blake couldn't stifle a chuckle, but Aria silenced him by squeezing her breasts together, squishing the tiny boy and almost giving him a nosebleed.

"Your mission is to preempt and arrest the thieves. Understood?" John explained.

"Got it!" Aria smiled. "Out."

"Just one thing..." Blake chimed in. "How do we stop those bandits without giving ourselves away?"
055332222222311.title: Grand Theft Taco

choices: They would meet up with Sapphire on their first mission.
055332222222312.content:
"May I ask something?" The mage asked. Casey and John tilted their heads, waiting patiently for the boy to speak. "Is it okay for us to have an additional partner?" Blake asked. John tapped his chin, "Is she trustworthy?"

The boy nodded, "I would trust her with all of my secrets." "She's my cousin, Sapphire Heart." Blake explained, earning a nod from the two agents. "She's in the military, correct?" Casey asked. Blake nodded, "She's known about my abilities for a while, so I feel like she would be an excellent choice for an additional partner."

Casey and John looked at each other and nodded. "Alright." Casey said. "We'll contact the military and see what we can do." "Thank you." Blake said, earning a gentle smile from the woman before she left to contact Blake's cousin.

"You have a cousin in the military?" Aria asked. The mage nodded, blushing, "Yeah. She's the only one besides you that know about my talents." "I was going to tell Mom, but I...well, chickened out." Blake said, chuckling. "I then thought I should tell Jade, but there was a chance she couldn't keep it."

The girl nodded, "So you told your cousin. Why?" Blake sighed, "Because I knew that she would keep the secret and not judge me for my talents. When you tell that woman a secret, she will take it to her grave."

"She won't ever judge you either. She'll try to put you on the straight and narrow if the secret's bad..." Blake paused, sighing again. "And she'll try to convince you to tell others, but in the end, she will never betray your trust." Aria nodded, "She...sounds more like an older sister than a cousin."

The mage smiled, "Yeah, she's definitely more like a sister than a cousin. That's why she's great." "You said that...you told her because you knew she wouldn't judge you." The girl started. "Is...that why you kept your magic a secret?"

It took a few seconds for the boy to respond, but he eventually nodded. "I didn't know how anyone would react." He said softly. "I didn't know...if people would hate me...or FEAR me." Aria frowned sympathetically, before Casey came back in, grabbing the three's attention. She told Blake and Aria that....
055332222222312.title: Most Trusted Ally

choices: Sapphire decides to ask questions first.
Blake explains that questions will have to wait after the mission.
0553322222223122.content:
Before the two knew it, they were on a helicopter. Earlier, Casey had told them that they would be meeting Blake's cousin on the trio's first assignment. Needless to say, Aria seemed quite anxious about meeting Sapphire for the first time.

Blake easily noticed it and smiled, holding his crush's hand. "It'll be okay." He said. "She's quite chill and respectful. I've talked about you with her, so I'm sure she'll be happy to finally meet you." The girl smiled and nodded, "If you're sure."

After a long ride, the chopper finally landed and as the door opened, Blake could see Sapphire waiting in front of the vehicle. Her expression was filled with shock as she shouted, "BLAKE!?" "Hey, cuz!" The mage smiled nervously. It would seem that she hadn't been told who would be joining her for the mission.

Aria slowly crawled out and waved. "Um, hi." She said. "I'm Aria, Blake's friend..." The military officer nodded and shook the girl's hand with a smile. "Sapphire. It's nice to finally meet you, hun." She said, earning a smile from the mage's crush.

"I assume you have a lot questions, right?" Blake asked, hugging his cousin. Sapphire returned the hug and nodded, "Yes, actually."
0553322222223122.title: They would meet up with Sapphire on their first...

05533222222232.content: Perhaps Blake tries out magical potions in another attempt to woo Aria, only to accidentally spill one on himself. He falls unconscious and soon wakes up as a pet owned by a girl he knows!
05533222222232.title: ...Nah.

055332222222321.content:
Blake sighed, feeling frustrated with himself. All his attempts to get his dream girl kept going up in smoke. All his magic and he couldn't even get Aria to notice he even existed! It was infuriating!

In a fit of frustration, the mage began trashing his room, books, potions...he didn't care. He just wanted to vent his anger. The uselessness of his own magic in helping him with his goal only made him despise it.

As he continued to wreck everything in his room, he failed to notice that the potions he'd knocked over were mixing together in a puddle, creating a multi-colored, smoking mess on the floor.

As Blake kept tossing things around in his anger, he slipped and landed in the mixed potion. His eyes widened as he realized he was in trouble. Suddenly, his whole body was on fire. The pain was so intense, he couldn't even open his mouth to scream. All he could make was this strange, choking noise and clench his teeth, trying to drive away the pain but failing miserably. It spread through his veins like poison, and he could almost feel his bones melting in the heat of the pain.
