Sweat trickled from his forehead, and tears of pain were squeezed out from the corners of his tightly closed eyes. Other than the pain, he couldn't feel anything, finally, he blacked out.

***

When Blake regained awareness of the world around him, he realized he was no longer in his room. Nor did he feel...normal. Looking over himself, Blake let out a scream that went unheard.

What had that potion done to him?! He was an animal! In fact, judging from the room he was in, he was someone's pet!

The door to the room opened and Blake stared as he realized he was now trapped in the body of...
055332222222321.title: Blake & the pet potion!

0553322222223211.content:
Blake watched in unseeable horror as his regular tormentor, Nora Comet, entered the room. He could easily see her dark hair, pudgy body, purple T-shirt and jean shorts from his current viewpoint. He'd obviously never been to Nora's house before, but he sometimes heard loud hissing from beyond her bedroom window...

Blake gulped internally as he realized the truth: he had become Nora's pet snake!

"Hey there, Slick!" Nora smiled. Slick was her snake's name, eh? "How ya doin', little guy?" Kindness? Coming from NORA?! Blake didn't know if this was a genuine gesture reserved for those she actually cared about...or just a sign of the apocalypse.

The chubby girl petted her snake's smooth skin with shocking compassion. "Alrighty, Slick..."
0553322222223211.title: Snake? Snake?!?! SNAAAAAAAKE!

choices: "Blake...is that you?!" Nora finds him out
05533222222232111.content:
"...it's dinner time!"

With that declaration, Nora fetched a dead mouse that had apparently gnawed its way into her house only to be killed by a trap moments later. Normally, Blake would be disgusted at the sight, but rodents were just a part of the typical garter snake's diet. Blake/Slick slithered up and snatched the mouse into his mouth, swallowing the lifeless rodent whole.

As she observed her pet's behavior, Nora seemed to notice that something was a little different today. "Hmm...what's wrong, Slick? Normally you eat faster than that! Kinda reminds me of a certain dork at school..."

The mage in question prayed internally that Nora wouldn't find out that he was forcibly controlling Slick's body...
05533222222232111.title: Snack for a Snake

choices: Blake enjoys his life as a cat some more
Blake brainstorms a plan to return to normal
0553322222223212.content:
"Sunny, I'm home!"

That sounded like Ms. Solar's voice, Blake thought. Not long after, into the room walked his tall and gentle teacher, Feina Solar, with a bowl of...kibble? Confused, Blake tried to interject, but all that came out was a high-pitched "Meow!"

Then it all clicked -- Sunny was Ms. Solar's cat! And Blake found himself forcibly possessing this feline's body!

Ms. Solar put the food bowl down in front of Sunny and rubbed his fur a little, eliciting a surprisingly soothed purr. Blake figured that finding a way to become human again could wait for now -- Feina clearly cared a lot for her cat, and this type of pampering was just enough to keep him happy. Not to the point of spoiling him rotten, but just enough to warrant some relaxation.

As night fell on the town of New Opal, Ms. Solar petted Sunny/Blake one more time before getting ready for bed. Sunny/Blake felt drowsy as well, nestling into his own pet bed and easing into a good night's sleep.

The next day...
0553322222223212.title: Meow~!

choices: Someone not so friendly (Nora, Raven, etc)
05533222222232121.content:
As Blake (in the body of Ms. Solar's cat Sunny) rested on the pet bed, he suddenly felt the strangest tingle course through his entire form. Before he knew it, Blake's consciousness was no longer in control of the feline, but rather a different creature altogether. He found himself perched atop a broken street lamp in the moonlit downtown area of New Opal. His ears were located higher on his body than they should be, and he noticed wings where his arms belonged. Blake was now in the form of a bat!

From his biology lectures, Blake remembered that vampire bats were a nocturnal species of bloodsuckers capable of using echolocation in the dark, a trait counterbalanced by poor vision. Despite his new eyes nearly failing him, the bat-boy faintly detected someone walking down the street nearby. Blake squinted for a better look at this person...he could tell it was a female.

But who was it?
05533222222232121.title: A Bat Time to Transform

055332222222321212.content: Which of Blake's enemies is the bat-boy nearing?
055332222222321212.title: Someone not so friendly

choices: “Ah! My daughters always wanted a pet bat!”
“Blake..! Turned yourself into a bat, huh?”
0553322222223212122.content:
Blake’s heart sank as he recognized the nearby woman. “Raven..!”

The woman in question looked to be in her late 30s, sporting dark hair, a purple dress, and housing a bitter grudge against Blake...for some reason he seemed to have forgotten. But Raven definitely remembered.

Blake attempted to fly away from his nemesis, but his course was rather flimsy...the bat-mage wasn’t used to having wings. Even worse, a paralyzing hex abruptly stung him in midair, no doubt Raven’s doing. Poor Blake was gradually lowered toward the ground, near the streetlight Raven now stood under.

“Please don’t recognize me, please don’t recognize me...” Blake prayed internally.

But what was Raven’s reaction?
0553322222223212122.title: Bat Omen

choices: The girls start fighting over you, so Raven takes you herself
05533222222232121221.content:
Unable to move, stuck in an utterly unfamiliar body, your enemy looming over you like a giant...and all you could do was mentally beg she didn't realize who you were.

Sounded and felt like a nightmare...hell, it WAS a nightmare!

Then Raven did something that stunned you since whenever you were around her, she never showed she could: she smiled at you!

“Ah! My daughters always wanted a pet bat!” she said, then her palm glowed and she waved it over you.

No sooner had she pulled her hand back and the glowing faded than you fell on your butt as the surface under you raised a bit, causing a concentrated earthquake for you as several rods rose up around you with a creaking, groaning sound, all of them bending inwards and joining together at the top. Your eyes widened at what Raven had conjured. A CAGE?!

Then everything started shaking again as the woman grasped the conjoined bars at the top of it and she raised it so you were looking her dead in the eye. "Crystal and Gemma are gonna love you...in fact, I dare say they'd be absolutely..." Raven snickered, "batty over you!" With a laugh, Raven lowered the cage and resumed walking; blissfully unaware that the bat which she'd deemed the property of her daughters was actually her nemesis.

PET?! To Raven's...? NO! No! No, no, no, no, no, no! Oh, no, no, no! No, please, no! Not that! You knew Raven's girls. Since their mother hated you, you'd had to deal with them occasionally gunning for you too!

Arriving at her home and opening the door, Raven called out to your "wardens", "Crystal, Gemma...I'm home! And I have a present for you!"

Even if the two she'd addressed hadn't wanted to greet their mother, they were still teenage girls, so at the word "present", it didn't surprise you much when, moments later, the two bound into the living room.

Crystal was fourteen years old with a preference to wear light blue, had blue eyes and black hair, and was a bit more mature than her sister, Gemma. Gemma, on the other hand, was thirteen, with hazel eyes and brown hair, liked wearing red, and had a bit more of a playful personality. Both girls were fairly petite.

Holding out your cage, Raven smiled at them, "Say hello to your new pet, girls."

At the sight of you, both preteens squealed with delight at the sight of their new pet, approaching their mother and letting out a rapid series of 'thank-yous' to Raven before hugging her.

Seemed strange these two little (well, not-so-little, from your perspective) would be so overjoyed and ecstatic over getting a bat (not that you were a bat!) as a pet when most girls would want a puppy, kitten, or rabbit or something like that. Then again, these were a magic-users' kids, and given what bats symbolized (again, not that you were one), both the positive and negative, they made good magical familiars. So you could see why they would be excited at having one.

“Now then, who should get to play with the new bat first..?” Raven spoke.

“Me, obviously!” Crystal declared. “I’m older and much more capable of training a bat.”

“What?!” Gemma objected. “I should get him first, I’m the cuter one!”

“Girls!!” Raven yelled, shutting her daughters up. “I’ll decide who gets to play with him first, and I know JUST how to do it.” She pointed a finger at one girl, then the other, in a classic game of eenie-meenie-minie-mo to decide your first captor.

Meanwhile, you cowered in the cage, the way the pairs's eyes were locked on you was downright unnerving, the gazes were so intense. Heck, you could practically see hearts in their eyes!
05533222222232121221.title: The Double-Trouble Wardens

choices: Blake reluctantly obeys Crystal and attempts his push-ups
Blake defiantly tries to fly out the window
Blake puts Crystal to sleep and goes to check on Gemma
055332222222321212211.content:
After a few minutes of debating through eenie-meanie-minie-mo, Raven finally decided that the first to play with their new pet would be...

"Crystal!"

The blue-dressed girl squealed with joy as she was handed Blake's cage, while Gemma pouted in disappointment and ran off to her room, crying. The bat-boy felt slightly sorry for Gemma as she sobbed in her bedroom, despite the fact that she was related to his cold-hearted rival. Maybe he could try tapping into his mage powers to help her through a tough moment? ...Blake's thoughts were interrupted as Crystal carried his cage to her own room, setting said cage on her nightstand.

"Alright, little bat!" Crystal smiled at her pet. "I WAS gonna give you a name right away, but that can wait. Besides, tomorrow's the annual pet talent contest, and I'm simply dying to teach you some new tricks! Let's start with an easy one...twenty push-ups! Go!"

Blake found himself in a bind upon hearing his teenage warden's command - he could barely manage push-ups in human form, but as a bat they had to be sheer torture. Unfortunately, refusing to comply with someone bigger than you could have terrible consequences.

Then again, there was also the matter of Gemma sobbing alone in her room. Blake didn't like to see a girl so upset - even if that girl was one of Raven's daughters. If he needed to, the transformed mage could use a spell to put Crystal to sleep, buying him enough time to go comfort Gemma...
055332222222321212211.title: Crystal's Delight, Gemma's Sadness

choices: Crystal to impatiently barges in and demands her turn with you
Your soul abruptly ends up in control of another animal elsewhere
055332222222321212212.content:
“Gemma!” Raven decided at last.

The girl in red cheered with glee as she was handed the cage an d the bat within. Crystal, on the other hand, was a tad annoyed - she felt she deserved to play with the new pet first. Nonetheless, t he girl in blue headed to her bedroom, with little more than a frus trated huff.

Gemma rushed to her own room and set your prison on her dresser. Dashing around her room, Gemma quickly slammed and locked her window shut, stuffed the cracks under her door, then stuffed a throw pillo w into her ventilation grate.

You watch in terror as you realize the girl is making sure you couldn't escape her!

When Gemma was done, she then opened the cage door and reached i n to snatch you right up and you were yanked out of the cage with breakneck speed and slammed into her chest like a brick wall, nearly passing out as surprisingly affectionate arms held you. Come to think of it, her hold was uncomfortably tight....

“I love you SOOOOO much already!” Gemma pretty much swooned ov er you. Pulling you up to her face, she furiously nuzzled her cheek against you. Felt like she was out to smother you to death and use friction to burn what was left of you!

Finally pulling back, she eyes shining, she held you up to her face. "Pucker up, lil batty!"Gemma ordered.

As her lips drew in, your eyes widened in shock. SHE WAS GOING TO KISS YOU! But you were in the body of a bat! Being affectionate to a new pet, you understood, but what was wrong with this girl?!

You start to struggle, and just as you consider biting, the lips were upon you!

But rather than one long, dragged-out smooch like you feared, Gemma instead gave several quick pecks to your cheeks.

As she pulled away from the final kiss....
055332222222321212212.title: Given to Gemma

choices: ...chose to fly in front of Aria’s face.
05533222222232122.content:
Blake, still in control of Ms. Solar’s cat Sunny, woke up early the next morning, determined to return to human form again somehow. Unfortunately for the boy-turned-feline, his teacher seemed to know nothing about the magical arts. Before he could think any further, Blake felt an abrupt tingle course through him as his soul was transferred into another creature...

The mage slowly and groggily stirred from his slumber, noticing that he was now outdoors - particularly, perched atop a tulip. Blake attempted to gasp in shock; this resulted merely in a tiny buzz. He could feel wings on his back and smell nectar around him...it seemed he was now in control of a honey bee!

Just then, a giantess approached a row of flowers near Blake’s location - he recognized her brown hair, yellow shirt, golden skirt, and yellow shoes. This was none other than Aria Gleam, the girl he’d been crushing on ever since middle school!

Blake considered flying over to get Aria’s attention right away - he remembered from a field trip to the local zoo that she wasn’t allergic to (or even slightly fearful of) bees. However, the bee boy was also aware that using his stinger could have dangerous consequences...not to mention the fact it’d be just plain rude!

Weighing his options, Blake...
05533222222232122.title: I’ve Got Places to Bee

055332222222322.content:
Option 22 (Blake Joins the Nanocorps): Somehow, Blake is "recruited" into an elite organization of giantess-hunters known as the Nanocorps. The problem? Their latest mission from Dr. Micro is to assassinate someone at Opal High School! How did Blake get himself into this mess?

Nanocorps and its characters belong to K.Bonez - check the hunters' bios out here:

https://www.writing.com/main/view_item/i...
055332222222322.title: The Nanocorps' Newest Member

0553322222223222.content:
Option 23: The Frightful Family Gathering

Millennial ago, the progenitor of the Heart family name, Albus Heart, perhaps the most talented wizard of his time, conjured a great estate within the very Magic Realm that bound all the realms together. This domain, at which the center sat a gigantic castle, has stood unyielding and unbroken in the face of the Magic Realm’s wild and uncontrollable essence, an eternal testament to Ablus’ magical prowess, and a feat none had accomplished before or have since. Albus christened his creation “The Heart of Hearts”, and made it his base of operations, from which he journeyed to and discovered countless other realms, ensuring his place in the wizardry history books.

Many years later, when age had inevitably caught up to the triple-digit old Albus, he cast one last spell with his dying breath: that all living members of the Heart family, no matter where they were or that realm they resided in, would be summoned to The Heart of Hearts for a period of one month, to brake bread with one another and keep the family strong and united forever.

Truly, as his eyes closed for the final time, his many children and spouses gathered at his side, Albus wished for it to be a spectacular time for all who attended.

For a certain Blake Heart, it was always a contender for worst month of the year, if not always the victor.

Being near the bottom of the Heart family food chain, he was an easy and strangely popular plaything for his many magical relatives, both close and distance. Countless times he had been swallowed whole, digested, shrunken, crushed, turned into clothing and worn, turned into food and eaten, absorbed into someone’s body and trapped as a part of them, and multiple others he tried his hardest to forget. Thankfully, no Heart could die within the estate, and at the end of the day they would always reform safely within their rooms. But still, finding himself tormented almost everyday of it made the month taste incredibly sour to the young mage.

Now that dreaded month has come again. Will Blake somehow find a way to escape this gathering unscathed? Or will once again be a toy to some of the wicked members of his extended family?
0553322222223222.title: The Frightful Family Gathering

choices: Blake is approached by some relatives before he can make it in.
Blake makes it inside before anyone can approach him
05533222222232221.content:
When the magic vortex around him finally dissipated, only a grueling second after it had started, Blake felt the urge to hurl creeping up on him. Not from any sort of aftereffect of the transportation spell itself, but from the sight of the still-growing crowd that filled the courtyard.

It was filled with many different races; some human, some human-like and some clearly not human at all. Blake picked out many familiar faces as he surveyed the yard. A few of them brought his heart relief, but more made it skip beats in fear and terror. He felt the gaze of many where he was currently standing and struggled to suppress a shiver.

“I hope it’s as much fun as last time!” Jade’s joyful voice spoke from his left, utterly oblivious to Blake’s miserable mood. Despite being even less magically adept than her brother, Jade was, for some reason, never the recipient of the same torment he received. Why was that? Blake didn’t know. But he couldn’t help being extremely jealous of her “special” treatment.

His sister’s eyes lit up as she spotted a friend over in the distance. “Mom, Blake, I’ll catch ya later!” She said, and, after a small wave, dashed away into the crowd.

From his right, his mother hummed happily. Seems she had also seen someone of interest. She leaned towards her son and whispered softly in his ear, “Mom’s gonna go meet with some friends too, okay?” Her lips gently pressed against his cheek as she gifted him a motherly kiss. “You take care now. I’ll see you later.” And with that, Claire herself was off, eventually disappearing from Blake’s view behind rows of shuffling bodies.

Now it was just him. Alone in this vast sea of faces. Whatever small comfort his mother’s peck gave him washed away instantly.

With a deep breath, Blake made a beeline for the castle, his spellbook clutched tightly to his chest. He’d be safe if he made it to his room. No Heart could enter another’s without their explicit permission. That was a rule of the castle; enforced by the magic of the very structure itself, and by the many magical golems that resided within. So if he made it to his room, he’d be safe. He could figure out the rest, such as getting food, when he was there.

Unfortunately, his trek took him from right through the gathering collectives of people, and gained him the attention of certain individual…
05533222222232221.title: A Dreaded Month Begins

05533222222232222.content: Option 24 (Sucked into a Game): Blake is mysteriously sucked into a video game world, and finds himself tiny on arrival! He needs to find a way to get back home and restore his size.

055332222222322222.content:
Finally driven over the edge with envy at her brother’s magical ability, Jade makes a pact with a powerful spirit sealed away in the depths of the family attic. In exchange for it’s release and the young girl’s servitude, the being grants Jade magical power beyond her wildest dreams; far, far above the level of her brother. Her desire granted and a massive power trip surging through her veins, Jade turns a hungry gaze towards her brother…

Can Blake find a way to escape the clutches of his now empowered sibling and the spirit empowering her? Or is he doomed to be a plaything to the pair for the rest of eternity?
055332222222322222.title: Jade’s Power Trip

0553322222223222222.content: Option 25 (Tiny Tomb Raid): Blake and friends receive mail informing them that they’ve won a free trip to Egypt...despite not having entered any contest. They travel by plane to the sandy dunes of Egypt and soon find themselves searching the tombs and ruins for valuable treasures. Unfortunately, the group is shrunken down by an ancient curse and must find a way to lift it.
0553322222223222222.title: Tiny Tomb Raid

05533222222232222222.content: Option 27 (Anime Antics): Through a magical experiment gone wrong, Blake finds himself shrunken in the world of an anime. How will he get back home and return to normal size...if at all?
05533222222232222222.title: Anime Antics

055332222222322222222.content: Option 28 (Inside Job): Blake must shrink himself and travel inside the body of one of the girls he knows, whether it’s to cure an illness or retrieve a swallowed magical ring. Will Blake save the day? Or is this mission an ill-fated snow job?
055332222222322222222.title: Inside Job

choices: Blake’s sister Jade has a stomachache!
Blake’s crush, Aria, has a fever!
0553322222223222222221.content:
Through a series of events much too complicated to explain at the moment, Blake has taken on the role of a doctor in order to shrink himself and cure any disease!

But who is his first (and probably only) patient?
0553322222223222222221.title: “Doctor Blake” Is In (Over His Head)

choices: Jade had eaten something bad and Blame found it
Jade was lying, there's nothing wrong with her gut!
05533222222232222222211.content:
As Blake prepared himself for the first patient to enter his room he straightened his coat out while looking in the tiny mirror he had set up. It was alot of hard work to get to this point, but he was ready to help anyone that walked through the door. He just wasn't expecting the first person to be his own sister.

"Jade, what's wrong, did you need something?" He asked, watching his sister walk in while holding her gut. A look of small pain was painted on her face as she sat down on the chair next to Blake.

"I was just going to come and wish you good luck on your first day, but I've got a bit of a stomachache now...think you could take a look, doctor?" She said with a small laugh, holding her gut tighter as Blake walked closer to the edge of his examination ledge.

"Well, I'll always have time and room to help my family. Let's see if we can figure out what's wrong." The mini doctor said as he motioned for Jade to move her gut closer. A slight gurgling could be heard as Blake pressed his head into the warm gut of his sister. The shorter shirt she was wearing left the stomach exposed to let Blake get right to the source of the problem.

"Well...it does sound like something is upsetting it. Did you eat anything strange recently?" Jade's face blushed red in embarrassment, seeming to be the answer to her illness. "Could you maybe...take a look inside to see if you can get it out? I don't know if I can go all day with this pain, Blake."

Putting on her best pleading look, Jade held her brother up as he gave a worried sigh. "Alright alright, I'll take a look inside...but once I find it you'll get me out, right?" Blake asked, quickly getting a response from his sister by being squeezed into her cheek for a hug "Of course Blake, thank you, thank you!! I'll get you right out as soon as you find what the problem is."

Taking a deep breath, Blake calmed his nerves while Jade slowly opened her mouth. Jade's eyes looked down at her mini brother with anticipation, happy to soon be cleared of her sickness. A final look of confirmation was shared between the two siblings before Blake took the dive into Jade's waiting mouth.

All it took was a quick gulp for Jade to swallow her doctor and brother down like a mere pill. After a right trip down, Blake landed with a splash in the belly below. "Alright Jade, I made it! Let's see what the problem is..." Blake called up, starting to look around in the gut.

After a bit of time, it was clear to Blake what was going on here.
05533222222232222222211.title: Stomach Struggles

choices: Blake destroys the virus and escapes Jade’s stomach
Blake kills the virus but gets digested and absorbed
055332222222322222222112.content:
Blake saw no traces of rotten food within Jade’s stomach, but he did manage to pick up a strong magical aura radiating nearby. The shrunken doctor was quick to notice the source of his sister’s pain: a sickly green, amorphous microbe wreaking havoc.

“Oh my god...” Blake reacted. “That’s a Delphic Virus!”

“Huh?” Jade asked on the outside, poking her exposed belly and trying to hear her brother better.

“Jade, it seems you’ve contracted a magical type of virus somehow. Don’t worry, though; I’ll take care of this personally!”

“You mean with antibiotics or some other medical thingamajig?”

“Actually, I’m just going to destroy it with my spells.”

The virus turned to detect Blake, apparently sensing his magical powers, before beginning to lunge at him. The tiny mage retaliated by chanting a fire spell, sending a flaming orb rocketing directly towards the malicious microorganism and launching it into a stomach wall. This action caused Jade to jerk to the side, clutching her gut in agony.

Recoiling from the attack dealt to it, the virus extended its tendrils in attack, but Blake managed to dodge them in the nick of time.

After several minutes of exchanging blows...
055332222222322222222112.title: Delphic Virus

05533222222232222222212.content:
With a hand to her boiling forehead, Aria Gleam stepped into Dr. Blake’s office. Strangely, the new physician was nowhere to be seen...or was he?

“Aria! Over here, on the counter!”

The brunette recognized that voice. It was her classmate, Blake Heart! Looking around for the source of the familiar voice, Aria’s eyes widened at the sight of the tiny doctor on the counter.

“Blake?! Er, I mean, doctor?!” Aria reacted, leaning in close to where her classmate/doctor stood.

“Y-yeah...” Doctor Blake replied. “What brings you in today?”

“I feel unusually warm, I think it might be a fever...”

“Let’s have a look...”

Grabbing a nearby thermometer, the doctor raised it toward his patient’s lips, gently sticking one end in her mouth. The other end gradually turned a deep red, an indication of her temperature.

“Yes, it’s definitely a fever...” Doctor Blake confirmed to the worried Aria as he removed the thermometer. “I’ll have to take a closer look inside your body to find the cause of your elevated body temperature!”

“And...this procedure is legal, right?” Aria asked.

“Well, ‘legal’ isn’t the word I’d use...”

The girl blinked. “Alright...so, um, how do you plan on...getting inside of me?”

Weighing his options, Doctor Blake quickly decided to enter Aria’s body through her...
05533222222232222222212.title: Feverish Friend

05533222222232222222213.content: Perhaps one of his friends or another member of his family?
05533222222232222222213.title: Other patients

055332222222322222222131.content: Who will be visiting Doctor Blake? And what’s their issue?
055332222222322222222131.title: Stay in School!

choices: Jessica, Blake's aunt and Sapphire's mom.
0553322222223222222221322.content: Someone from his extended family, huh? Who shall it be?
0553322222223222222221322.title: One of his cousins.

0553322222223222222222.content:
“I’ve finally done it..!”

Truly, he had done it. Through tireless alchemical experiments in the janitor’s closet of Opal High, Blake Heart managed to craft a magical golden ring with the supposed ability to grant wishes. As he exited his dark hideaway, the young man held his latest creation in one hand and fixed his gaze upon it, failing to realize his shoes were untied...

Entering the cafeteria as lunchtime was just beginning, Blake suddenly tripped on his own laces, much to the amusement of others (and to Blake’s embarrassment). Blushing, the mage stood up and dusted himself off before realizing something was missing.

“Oh no...the ring!”

Blake quickly realized that his fall had launched the ring through the air, watching with a horrified expression as it finally landed in...
0553322222223222222222.title: Ring Rescue Mission

choices: Tell Indigo the truth and ask her to puke it up
Shrink down and sneak into her food
05533222222232222222221.content:
Blake stared in horror as his recently-created ring landed right in a salad that his friend Indigo was eating. Lowering her fork into the mix of veggies, the Asian introvert unknowingly scooped up the ring with her forkful, placing it in her mouth. The artifact thankfully avoided being crushed by her teeth, but Indigo soon swallowed her mouthful - ring and all - with an awkward gulp. Rubbing her throat a bit, the blue-clad girl wondered what was wrong with her lunch today.

Blake’s face went pale. His magical ring was now inside Indigo’s stomach, and he needed to get it out! But how?
05533222222232222222221.title: Screwed-Up Salad

choices: Go into the can of Pepsi.
05533222222232222222222.content:
Blake watched helplessly as the ring travelled through the air, towards a group of students sitting at a table, and into one of the student’s can of Pepsi. Upon closer inspection he realized that the Pepsi belonged to his friend Ruby Sparks, and since Ruby was sitting there, that probably meant that the people sitting next to her were her squad mates. However Blake immediately noticed something seemed different about Ruby. Instead of wearing her one piece cheerleading outfit, she was wearing a red short sleeve crop top that left her midriff exposed, and a stylish black & red skirt. She was still wearing her red high heels, however.

‘Huh. I guess Ruby doesn’t have cheer practice today.’ Blake thought to himself. Ruby having a day where she doesn’t have cheer practice wasn’t something that Blake had ever really thought about oddly enough, since most of the time when he sees her, Ruby is usually wearing her cheer uniform, even during class and outside of school.

”... And then he said, ‘It was a pineapple!’” Said one girl, eliciting an eruption of laughter from the other people sitting at the table. One of Ruby’s friends was telling a story about a time her family went on vacation. “You and your family have quite the life.” Ruby said while picking up her can of Pepsi to take a sip. When she took a sip of her Pepsi, Ruby noticed that it tasted off. Not bad, but different. It tasted heavenly. Ruby felt an intense urge to continue drinking. It was almost as if she got addicted to her drink’s magical new flavor.

‘I suppose a little more couldn’t hurt.’ Ruby thought to herself. Ruby raised the can back to her lips to continue drinking, but as she drank her Pepsi, Ruby felt something solid hit the back of her throat. This caused her to start coughing, all the while her throat had a noticeable bulge that gave off a slight glow. Ruby attempted to swallow the object a few more times, and after the third time the mysterious object finally went down her throat, disappearing past her collar bone.

“Oh my god! Ruby, are you okay?” Asked a concerned friend of hers. “Yeah I’m fine, I just swallowed a bug.” Ruby responded, while rubbing her neck. “Are you sure you’re okay? Because it looked like you were choking.” “It must’ve been a pretty big bug if it made you enter a coughing fit.” Everyone at the table began to smother Ruby with attention, with Ruby attempting to assure everyone that she’s fine.

Blake stood there frozen. Days of work wasted, all because he forgot to tie his shoes. He tried to tell himself that he could just make another ring, but that failed after he remembered that by making the ring in the janitor’s closet, and only the janitor’s closet, he has probably caused some of the janitors trouble by disallowing them access to their supplies, thereby preventing them from doing their job, and by continuing to do so he could receive detention, a suspension, or in the absolute worst case scenario, expulsion. Not wanting to face detention, or possibly worse, Blake retreated from the cafeteria and into the hallway.

In the hallway Blake started to brainstorm on how he could get the ring out of Ruby’s stomach. He could try using a teleportation spell to warp the ring out, but if he wasn’t careful he could create a mess by spilling whatever Ruby ate onto the floor, or even worse, accidentally remove some of Ruby’s internal organs. He could try waiting for Ruby to pass the ring naturally, but that would require knowing both where and when the ring exited Ruby’s body, and even if he did know, Blake wasn’t sure if the ring’s magical properties would be able to keep it from being digested.

No matter what, everytime Blake came up with an idea, a counterpoint against it always seemed to pop up in his mind.

‘This is hopeless…’ Blake thought. ‘How am I supposed to get the ring back?’ Getting desperate, Blake whipped out his miniature spell book, deciding that he would summon a spirit to help him out. After making sure that there was nobody around who could see him, Blake held out his hand and recited an incantation, “On this day that I swallow my pride, may the World of Spirits be my guide!” The area around Blake started to fill with technicolor smoke, in the midst of the smoke Blake could see a masculine looking silhouette, which he assumed was the spirit. When the smoke started to clear the spirit was revealed… to be wearing a shower cap and a towel? Blake and the spirit stared at each other in awkward silence. After a few moments, the silence was finally broken by Blake.

“...I didn’t know that spirits needed to bathe.”

“Look kid, I might be dead, but that doesn’t mean that I don’t care about proper hygiene. Anyways, what do you want?” The spirit responded in an annoyed tone. “I need your help with something.” The spirit rolled it’s eyes, having an idea where this was going. “Let me guess, you want me to help you win over that girl you like?” This statement made Blake’s face turn redder than a beet. “NO! I-I mean no… I don’t need help with... with... A-aria…” Blake nervously denied, before regaining his composure and clearing his throat.

“It’s about the ring.” Blake said, still having a slight blush on his face. “What, did you lose it or something?” “I wouldn’t exactly say that I lost it.” “Well if you didn’t lose it, then what did happen?” “I tripped over and fell, causing the ring to fly out of my hands and into a drink belonging to a friend of mine, and now the ring is trapped inside their stomach.“ The spirit stared incredulously at Blake. “One of your friends swallowed the ring.” “Yes.” Blake bluntly confirmed. The spirit sighed and rubbed it’s temples.

“Okay… Which one?” “Huh?” “Which one of your friends has the ring inside of them?” ”The ring’s inside of Ruby.” That name sounded familiar to the spirit. “Ruby… What did she look like again?” “She’s over there.” Blake said while pointing at a table “She’s the one with the blonde hair, skirt, and crop top.” The spirit rubbed its chin, staring at Ruby before turning to Blake. “Huh… She seems to be showing a lot of skin. Doesn’t this school have a dress code in place?” Blake shrugged, not really knowing how to respond.

“Anyways, I have an idea on how you can get your ring back.” Blake was ecstatic. “Really!?” “Yeah. Though I’m pretty sure you’re not gonna like it.” Blake gave the spirit a look that more or less said ‘are you sure about that?’.

“Okay, whatever kid. But before I tell you, I’ll need you to answer a question, you got that?” Blake nodded with a serious expression on his face. “Have you ever seen Fantastic Voyage?” Blake's face of determination turned to one of confusion. “...Yeah, I’ve seen it a few years ago on TV, but I don’t really see why that’s impor-.” Blake immediately cut himself off when he realized what the spirit was getting at. “You want me to go inside of Ruby’s body to retrieve the ring?” The spirit nodded. Blake thought about it for a few seconds, before giving his answer. “Fine, I’ll do it.” The spirit smirked. “Great.”

The spirit placed it’s hands on Blake’s shoulders and began to recite an incantation of its own “Mind, strength, and skin of steel, make this boy the height of one’s heel... or something.” Blake instantly shrank down to a millimeter in height. “This spell should be able to protect you from just about anything, but I’m not sure how well it will work since I haven’t done this whole magic thing in…” The spirit began to count with it’s fingers. “... A long time.” Blake nodded and turned to the cafeteria doors. “Now how am I going to get close to Ruby?” Blake thought out loud. “Don’t worry, I have that figured out too.” “Oh really? What do you have in mi-?” Blake didn’t know how to react as he saw that the spirit suddenly had a nine iron golf club, but when he saw the spirit winding up to swing it, he reacted with horror.

“No, no no no nononononononoNONONO!” Blake protested, but it was too late. By the time he began protesting, the spirit had already made up its mind.

“FORE!” The spirit shouted before swinging the golf club at a lightning fast speed.

*THWAP*

“AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!” Blake screamed after being launched into the air by the golf club. While Blake was sent flying, the spirit began laughing it’s spectral ass off. “HAHAHA, Ha ha haaa… I never get to have this much fun in the spirit world.” The spirit said, calming down from its laughing fit.

“AHHHHHHHHH-.” *THUD* “Ugh…” After reorienting himself from colliding with a hard surface, Blake rubbed his head and wearily looked around. However as he was analyzing his surroundings a deep, loud rumble garnered Blake’s attention, causing him to stare at its source: Ruby’s stomach.

Everyone at the table stared at Ruby after hearing her stomach roar like a ferocious animal. “… I guess I’m pretty hungry.” Ruby said before giving an embarrassed chuckle. ‘Or maybe it’s because of the ring that you swallowed.’ Blake thought to himself. Blake, reminded by Ruby’s stomach growling that he has limited time before she digests the ring, quickly thought about how he could enter her body and came up with two options. He could either try sneaking his way into Ruby’s can of Pepsi and wait until she takes a sip, or he could also try a more direct approach by flying up to Ruby’s face.

What to do, what to do…?
05533222222232222222222.title: Soda Pressing

choices: Blake finds it, but now he needs to find an escape route...
He can’t find the ring. Maybe it’s in Ruby’s intestines?
055332222222322222222221.content:
Blake had no way of knowing whether his recently-made ring was indigestible, but he certainly wasn’t keen on waiting to find out. Putting his rock-climbing experience to good use, the tiny mage slowly scaled the outside of Ruby’s can of Pepsi, eventually reaching the summit and jumping into the soda.

Ruby swore she heard a small splashing noise nearby. Peeking down at her Pepsi can, the cheerleader saw nothing unusual within. With a shrug, she raised the can up to her face and parted her lips, eagerly guzzling down the rest of her drink.

Staying submerged so as to avoid drawing attention to his shrunken self, Blake had to hold his breath to avoid drowning in soda. Feeling his world rise up to his friend’s open mouth made it difficult to keep his mouth closed, but thankfully the tipping of the can allowed the young man to finally inhale some (relatively) fresh air into his lungs before he was finally brought down Ruby’s throat with an eager gulp.

The tight walls of the esophagus constricted Blake on his way to Ruby’s stomach, where he’d hopefully find the ring in one piece. Squeezed through a small opening, the tiny boy finally arrived at his warm, fleshy destination. Despite stomachs usually having no light source, Blake was somehow able to see in here...maybe due to his magical powers. The walls slowly pulsated, and a sickly-green sea of acid bubbled nearby. Fortunately, he had landed on a fairly dry spot in Ruby’s gut.

Reciting a spell often used for dowsing, Blake created a glow in his pointer finger and used it like a metal detector to search for the lost ring...

0553322222223222222223.content:
*FZZZZZZ*

The loud buzz cut through the air of the brightly lit experimentation chamber. On a pedestal, the target of the just-fired shrink ray shrank in size until it was no bigger than a small pebble. The object, now only a single centimeter across looked like a shiny marble... if marbles were made out of metal and had faintly glowing lines crisscrossing their surface.

"Minimization procedure successful. Please stand by. Radiation levels will return to normal levels in T-Minus 5 minutes. Stand by for transportation of the artifact."

The loud robotic voice buzzed over the intercom, signaling to the people viewing the small room containing the shrink ray and 'the artifact' that the experiment had been a success. As the seconds ticked by, rushed movement could be seen behind a one-way mirror looking into the room. The figures behind the protective wall seemed to be talking in hushed but excited voices. Soon enough,

"Decontamination process complete. Radiation levels have been reduced significantly. It is now safe for authorized personnel to enter the testing chamber."

Upon hearing these words, a previously unseen door slid open in the door with a soft *whish.* An unusually tall figure entered the room, wearing a protective suit. Picking up the artifact with a pair of tongs, they carried it out of the room.

"Great job, ma'am!"

"This is all thanks to you, Senior Agent!"

"This will be a great advancement for our cause, ma'am!"

Yeah, yeah. She'd heard it all before. Taking off the hood, GTS senior agent Angela Davis III revealed her face to the world. The powerful woman was used to these kind of compliments- in fact she heard them so often that they'd become kind of meaningless. All these low-level scientists and researchers were just sucking up to her, after all.

But it was true that today was a big success. Looking down at the object grasped in her tongs, she knew that she'd be scolded by the boss lady for thinking of it as a toy, but honestly what else was it to her? She'd read the reports, she knew its capabilities. Such an object was incredibly powerful, incredibly dangerous in the wrong hands.

To bad for the world that it was in Her hands. Turning and looking a nearby scientist (a small, mousy woman with brown hair and a green turtleneck on under her lab coat), Angela asked...


OPTION 1: A military strike team led by Blake's cousin Sapphire bursts in, interrupting Angela's evac. In the confusion, Sapphire accidentally swallows the object!

OPTION 2: Angela feels like playing around, she goes to a captive Sapphire and forces her to swallow the object!

OPTION 3: Angela swallows the object for safekeeping, knowing the risks it involves. Eventually, something'll come up and she'll be forced to have Blake help her out.
0553322222223222222223.title: A mysterious artifact

choices: "I think so... Where's the artifact?" (She is unaware that she swallowed it.)

"Yes, ma'am." The scientist said. Angela nodded, "Good. The last thing we need is for those files to get stolen." As if on cue, there was an explosion at the entrance of the room, followed by the door falling to the floor. Angela gave a smirk as from the smoke appeared several soldiers and one Sapphire Heart.

"Ah, so my favorite prey has come to join the party~." The agent grinned, only for a bullet to graze her cheek. Sapphire, holding the pistol responsible for the bullet fired, growled, "I've been given permission to end your miserable existence. It's been a long time coming."

The agent howled with laughter as the soldiers apprehended some of the scientists. "What makes you think you have the balls to do so!?" She shouted. "I assume you're also here to destroy...THIS." Sapphire looked at the artifact and nodded, "After getting rid of you, yeah."

"Well, try and take it from me." Angela said, rushing and tackling her prey to the floor, knocking the pistol out her hand. The military officer then kneed and kicked Angela in the gut, knocking her off before punching her in the face. The agent blocked another punch, before attempting to strangle her opponent.

Sapphire grabbed the woman's arms, before headbutting her in the nose and knocking her down. Quickly, Sapphire grabbed her pistol, aiming at Angela as the agent grabbed the tongs and swung them in her direction. After the military officer fatally shot the woman in the head, she felt something hit the back of her throat, causing her to collapse to her knees and begin coughing.

She then swallowed, felling and tasting something unmistakably metallic as it went down her throat and ended her choking. She then felt one of the soldiers help her up, asking, "Are you alright, ma'am?" Sapphire paused briefly, before saying...

"We're still searching." The soldier said. He then looked at Sapphire who seemed both exhausted and pale. "Are you sure you're alright, ma'am?" He asked, raising an eyebrow. The military officer shook her head, "I'm okay. I just...need to rest for now." With that, she sat against the wall, before falling asleep.
------------------
A few weeks later, Sapphire was back in Opal on vacation and spending time with her family. She had asked to be updated on the search for the artifact, but so far, nothing came up. She was beginning to wonder if GTS created a decoy...or if it was destroyed during her fight with Angela...

She explained to her mother, Jessica what had happened, which led Jessica to make an appointment for her daughter. Even though she went to hospital to patch up her injuries and get a check up, nothing was out of the ordinary. Both Sapphire and her mom ultimately assumed that she was just exhausted when she fought Angela and left it at that...

In Sapphire's stomach, however, rested the artifact as it started to partially embed itself into the military officer's stomach "floor". As Sapphire continued her life, the artifact laid dormant. Sleeping, yet waiting. Regardless of what Sapphire was doing at the current moment, it remained asleep....as if it needed something other than Sapphire to trigger its power.

That all changed a couple days after her appointment....

*Doreedo's Note* Chapter written by Jackson, and published with permission*


When Sapphire got up, already she could tell that something was off... She wasn't sure if she was anxious or if something happened, but she was tense. She tried to brush it off and continue her day like normal. Helping her mom at home, helping her aunt, Claire with things at her and her children's home, spending time with Blake and Jade, etc.

Around early afternoon, she could tell something about HERSELF was up. The military officer groaned. she had tried napping, she had tried exercising, she had tried things that had worked in the past, but so far, she still felt off. She looked at the clock and groaned.

Her aunt, Jade, and Blake would be returning home in a couple hours...and Sapphire didn't want them to see her in a nervous and anxious wreck. She then got up, stretching, before...



*Author's Note* The artifact swallowed by Sapphire will have its effect triggered in different ways, leading to different effects. The triggers below are (in order) electricity, sexual arousal/pleasure, and extreme temperatures (either hot or cold.)

After a light dinner, Sapphire notes that she's feeling oddly full...
05533222222232222222231111.content:
Ugh... shit, there was nothing she wanted to do right now...

Well, might as well make herself useful. She had the house to herself for several more hours, and her time in the military had taught her that spare time and idle hands were ideal for completing chores. That at least drew her attention to a project that she could busy herself with. She'd overheard her aunt complaining about a surge protector that had been on the fritz, but had also lamented that she was too busy to fix it.

Heading into the garage, Sapphire spied the offending piece of equipment almost immediately after walking in. She could see it resting on a closed toolbox, whoever had taken it into the garage had clearly not bothered to store it properly. Even though she was doing this of her own free will, Sapphire's years of training and discipline still caused her to grumble whenever she saw things like this out of place. Reaching out with a hand to remove the surge protector...

*ZAP*

"Gah!" Sputtering and cursing, Sapphire removed her hand from the busted cord. Now that she was right in front of it, she could see that she'd foolishly grabbed a portion of the cord with exposed wiring!

"Argh, stupid, Stupid!" Now quite angry (with both herself and whoever'd been stupid enough to plug in a clearly broken piece of equipment), Sapphire opened up a side closet and hastily put on a pair of rubber gloves. God, that had been dumb of her! Her superior's would've laughed if they'd seen her handling something like this without taking proper safety precautions, civilian environment or not. She was lucky she hadn't been electrocuted... Yeah, the shock had hurt, but it had been more of a surprise than anything else. Still muttering angrily, Sapphire yanked the cord out of the wall socket (yeah, there was too much exposed wiring here. Better to just toss the surge protector and buy a new one. Oh well) and bagged up the device for disposal.

Well, that took care of that. And now she only had what, another several hours before Blake and the rest were home?

Sighing, Sapphire left the garage. Maybe she'd get lucky and there was something worth watching on TV...
------------

Unbeknownst to her, deep inside of her the shock she'd received was having unforeseen consequences. As the jolt traveled through her body, the electrical current had passed through the small sphere sitting in the base of her gut. Moments later, the object began to glow faintly... No longer dormant, the artifact would respond to any stimuli it received.

05533222222232222222231112.content:
Locking the guest bedroom door behind her, Sapphire looked through her drawers, before sighing. Instead, she grabbed her phone and opened the internet browser, before stripping her clothes off. She would need to do this either very quickly...or very quietly. Laying on the bed, the military officer picked up her phone.

"Fucking hell...." The military officer sighed, annoyed with her current situation as she started pleasuring herself. As she did so, she felt her vagina get warm and moist, while her nipples hardened. Sapphire gave a soft hum as her breathing slowly began more labored.

"Damn it, hurry up...!" She whispered to herself, watching the clock tick away as the time got closer and closer to her relatives arriving. She then let out a moan as she felt her entire body tense up and felt warm fluids rush out from her vagina. "Holy...shit..." She said, groaning as her body felt like it was on fire.

After taking a few minutes to relax, the military officer got off the bed, before grabbing tissues from the the tissue box on the bedside table. After cleaning herself and the comforters, she threw the tissue away and went to the shower with her clothes. After several minutes, she was clean, dry, in new clothes...

And feeling a lot more refreshed. "Why the hell have I not thought of that sooner?" Sapphire asked herself. She pleasured herself before, but she never did so to relieve stress. She made a mental note to remember that for the next time she was anxious.
---------------------------
Inside the woman's stomach, the artifact was starting to glow a soft white light. It had noticed the changes in Sapphire's body temperature and hormones. The chemicals reacted to the artifact, awakening it from its slumber.

It then began releasing its side effects, but at a pace that would be difficult to notice... That is...if Sapphire didn't notice the changes herself...

055332222222322222222311121.content:
After a day, there was no change to Sapphire. She continued her life as normal. The second day, there was, once again, no change. The third day, however, she noticed something. The military officer had a nightmare where she was looking in the mirror after a shower.

She saw herself covered in blood, before morphing into Angela, who then reached from the mirror to slit Sapphire's throat. Sapphire jumped awake, before quietly looking in everyone's rooms. After confirming that her family was safe, she went downstairs.

She had not been that frightened in a long time....

The fourth day at night, she was almost too scared to go to sleep. And rightfully so, as she was worried that her cousins and aunt would get harmed and she wouldn't be able to save them. The fifth night at her mother's house was when she noticed something was off.

At dinner, she was having a perfectly normal conversation with Jessica, only to almost snap at her angrily. Needless to say, both women were startled by the military officer's actions. After taking a minute to herself and apologizing, Sapphire explained what had happened a couple nights ago.

Jessica suggested that she'd go see a therapist. Sapphire reluctantly agreed and made an appointment for next week. The sixth day, she was still somewhat angry, but at herself for snapping at her mother the night prior. She thankfully managed to keep it in check most of the day and in public.

In the seventh day; after a whole week had passed since her unique stress relief, the military officer and her aunt and mother noticed something VERY off. A couple of somethings, actually. The day started as normal, with Sapphire arriving to visit her cousins.

The family then went shopping, with Sapphire, Jessica, and Claire needing clothes, while Blake and Jade went to check out whatever peaked their interests. When Blake returned to ask his mom if he could get anything, his military officer of a cousin had unpredictably and uncharacteristically picked out an outfit that would have killed it at a strip club.

They also noticed a faint light from Sapphire's upper abdomen. After knocking some sense into herself after being quite flirtatious, Sapphire changed back to her normal clothes, apologizing as she hung her head, embarrassed. That night, she went to bed wishing the day never happened...
---------------------
That night, she had another nightmare. She found herself in her bedroom, before spotting two more Sapphires. "What are you...?" She asked, gripping the comforter beneath her instinctively. The more aggressive of the two grinned, 'We're you...or rather...new forms of your personality."

Sapphire raised an eyebrow, before the one that looked like a stripper chuckled. "We were formed from the emotions of you that you despise the most." She said, pointing at herself. "I am the part of you who yearns for enjoyment, regardless of consequence."

The aggressive one said, "I am the part of you who is a warrior, willing to torture, fight, and kill anyone who stands in my way." "YOU are the one who is too afraid to admit these parts of yourself." She said. "You're timid. Cowardice. PATHETIC!"

Sapphire jumped as she backed up from her counterparts, who now seemed much larger in comparison. "We suggest you start panicking." They said. "Because soon, you will have no choice at all." The military officer's field of view got darker and darker, before rose from her bed, awake and feeling like she was going to scream.

Sapphire looked around. There was nothing. Nothing but the sunlight of the early morning pouring through the window. She curled up into a ball, before cracking out a quiet whimper as tears rolled down her cheeks. She felt like she was in Hell now...

0553322222223222222223111211.content:
(Note from Jackson: I apologize in advance if this seems really short. I struggled with coming up with ideas for this chapter...)

The next morning, Sapphire was scared to even come out of the guest bedroom. Eventually, she got out of bed and slowly began her day, though with extra anxiety. Thankfully, most of the day was uneventful, so her stress remained low the whole morning and noon.

That afternoon, she was watching the news. She then felt her hand clench into a fist suddenly as she watched as the news anchor began making lies about her operation....that was SUPPOSED to be secret! "Gotta be fucking kidding me..." She whispered, pulling out her phone as she called her general.

"You're seeing this, right?" She asked. After receiving a response, she asked, "Can you get someone to shut the story down? Or find the person who leaked the info?" After another response, she nodded, "Good. The last thing we need is for the public to panic and get into danger..."

After hanging up, she then kicked a wall in frustration. "Why the FUCK did someone leak that information!?" She shouted. She then noticed she had made a crack in the wall. She also noticed her hand was bleeding from tightening her fist, causing her nails to cut her skin.

She then heard the front door open. "Hey, Sapphire. Could you help me with some..." Blake cut himself off as he entered the house, seeing his cousin looking about ready to kill and a crack in the wall. "Is...something wrong?" He asked. The military officer began panicking internally.

This was NOT how she wanted Blake to see her. He deserved to know the truth, but she didn't want him to worry either. Plus, who knows if she end up causing more harm then good...
0553322222223222222223111211.title: Unexpected Fit of Rage

choices: Blake unwittingly eggs Sapphire's new daring, flirty personality on.
Blake now KNOWS something is very off...and questions Sapphire on it.
Sapphire takes back control, only to find her and Blake in an awkward position!
0553322222223222222223111212.content:
After that awful nightmare from the night before, Sapphire had been blessed with a relatively uneventful day. No appearances from either of her evil counterparts, no sightings of GTS... nothing. The day had been almost peaceful.

All in all, it had been a nice, normal day. Exactly the kind of relaxing break she'd needed after feeling so 'off' all week.

Well, it had been a normal day except for one thing. She'd practically had a heart attack at seeing it, but when she'd opened up her closet to pick out her clothes for the day, right in front of her face had been the impractical and entirely-to-revealing outfit from the previous day! How?! She could've sworn she'd returned it! Stepping back, Sapphire had thrown the closet door shut, making a much louder sound than she'd intended.

After apologizing profusely to the other occupants she'd just woken up with her thoughtless action (without leaving her room, she was still in her underwear, after all), Sapphire grabbed a spare set of emergency clothes from her bag.

They were rumpled but clean, and she'd rather just go with the ratty jeans and plain t-shirt she was now holding rather than have to look at that... thing she'd picked up from the mall. She should have the receipt somewhere... If she did, she needed to return the outfit later. She'd just have to be discrete, she really didn't want the rest of the family (especially Blake) to see her holding the ungodly outfit!

---------------------

Well, no luck. Sapphire sighed and a ran her fingers through her hair.

"Ugh, I guess it was too much to be hopeful for... Now what am I gonna do with this?" She muttered, staring at halter top and mini skirt combo laid out on her bed. She hadn't been able to find the receipt anywhere- maybe she'd tossed it out in a brief moment of insanity? The way this week was going, she definitely felt like she was going crazy...

And of course, no receipt meant that she was stuck with this god-awful barely-counts-as-clothes disaster in front of her.

Maybe she could just bury the offending articles of clothing deep in her closet and forget about them? No, that wouldn't work- Her aunt liked to clean the house regularly. She couldn't risk the outfit being discovered. Maybe she could just burn it, or something. ...No, that was probably illegal. At the very least, it would draw a whole bunch of the wrong attention.

*Knock* *Knock* *Knock*

"Gah!" Jumping nearly a foot into the air, Sapphire's hand shot to her chest, desperately trying to calm her racing heart.

"S-Sorry! Did I startle you? I just wanted to spend some time with you, cause, you know, you've seemed upset or something this week. I just wanted you to- Sapphire? Are you trying to hide something?"

Oh crap...

This was the worst! Her younger cousin, bless his heart, wanted to spend time with her in the hopes of making her feel better. Unfortunately, he was very much a teenage boy, and teenage boys were prone to making terrible mistakes even with the best intentions in heart. In Blake's case, he'd entered her room without waiting for her to give him the okay to come in.

On one hand, she was fully dressed (Thank God!) but on the other hand Sapphire was very conspicuously clutching the mini skirt (which stopped mid-thigh...!) and halter top (which only just covered her larger than normal chest) behind her back. All in all, Sapphire's posture combined with the bead of sweat trickling down her forehead painted a very suspicious picture...

'Blake... Couldn't you have please waited for me to respond?' Sapphire groaned internally, before going into an unnoticed trance as her curious cousin peeked around her much larger frame.

"Holy...! Sapph, I thought you put that back on the shelf! Don't tell me you actually bought those clothes?! I thought you were joking when you were trying them on!"

"Aw, what's the matter, Blake? Didn't like what you saw?" The military officer suddenly giggled. Blake recoiled, cheeks burning.

"N-no! You looked great- I mean, I mean... Argh, don't mess with me like that, Sapph!" He groaned.

The woman giggled once more, "You look adorable with that big blush on your face, Blake~. Admit it, you had the hots for me when you saw me flashing my nice long legs and rock hard abs!"

Normally, Blake would've been able to pick up that something was clearly up with Sapphire, but right now his teenage hormones were directing his attention elsewhere...

Man, seeing Sapphire showing off nearly all of her gorgeous long legs, super-toned midriff, and of course her big breasts nearly bursting out of that top's seams had illicited an embarrassing reaction from him the other day. The kind of reaction that 15-year old boys did not want their mothers to see...

Sapphire, on the other hand, was panicking... Now trapped in a mindscape that resembled that of a prison cell, she banged on the bars, shouting, "Damn you! Leave my cousin alone!" Her flirtatious personality chuckled, siting in something that resembled a throne. "Now why would I do that?" She asked. "You have to admit, your cousin is damn cute." "That doesn't mean you have the right to SEDUCE HIM!" Sapphire snapped.

The flirtatious personality just shrugged, turning to Blake and walking Sapphire's body right up in front of him, her breasts right in Blake's face. "Come on, Blake." The personality said in Sapphire's voice. "Tell me the truth on how much you like my legs. My hips. My ass. My abs. And even my boobs~." The blush on Blake's face grew until his whole face was red. Was this actually Sapphire? He had no clue, but as much as he thought his cousin wouldn't act like this...unless forced to, he couldn't really deny that his cousin was very beautiful...and sexy...

Within the mindscape, the military officer snapped. She was livid that this bitch that wore her face was taking advantage of her cousin. Out of sheer fury, she broke the cell door from its hinges, before tackling her seductive counterpart.

"You fucking bitch!" Her counterpart shouted. "I was just about to have fun with him!" The counterpart was then silenced as Sapphire unleashed a fury of punches on the lookalike. After the counterpart went unconscious, Sapphire sat in the seat, before concentrating.

She then awoke to herself on Blake's bed...with her cousin underneath her and the teenager's face in her cleavage. After noticing that Blake was trying to get her off so he could breathe, the military officer immediately got off, before backing up to the very edge of the bed.

She wrapped her arms around her as she curled up into a balls, averting her eyes from her cousin in embarrassment. "Sapph...? Blake called out, looking both confused and surprised.

Sapphire just curled up tighter, not wanting to interact. Not after what her counterpart might've done... "Sapphire. Something's going on and you know it." The teenager said. "Please. Just tell me. Maybe I can help..."

Or, invite her cousin in as a third-party "specialist"
055332222222322222222312.content:
"P...pardon me, ma'am... Are you sure? We need to document what we recover here for the reports, and..."

"Dammit, I said now! I felt whatever that thing was go down my throat! I don't know about you, but I'm not taking any chances with the experiments of GTS. I'm getting myself checked out STAT!"

----------------Sometime later, in the infirmary-------------

"Well, there's definitely... something... in there. To be honest, ma'am, I'm not sure what it is,"

Sapphire frowned, looking at the same set of x-rays the medical officer was examining. She could clearly make the small, round object located in her abdomen... God, who knew what it did? She really didn't like having the idea of an unidentified magical artifact inside her body.

"And you're telling me that because it's inside of me you CAN'T remove it?"

"That's right, ma'am. GTS was using tools specifically designed to work with magical artifacts without triggering their effects. As much as I hate them and their "leave no witnesses" philosophy, I have to admit that the tools they possess are excellently crafted. Our surgical equipment doesn't possess the same magic-dampening effects that whatever tools GTS was using to interact with the object. Any attempt to remove the object from your stomach might, well... trigger the effects.

Sapphire gulped audibly, that was a thought she could've done without.

"So what you're saying is that I'm stuck with a... with a dangerous unknown object, potentially a weapon, and there's NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT?!"

The poor scientist cowered before the irate officer now towering over him.

"I'm sorry, my superiors have ordered me not carry out any surgeries! Look, I want to help you but I can't! It's as simple as that! I already told you, we just don't have the right equipment, and I-"

The rest of the hapless medical staff's words were cut off as Sapphire half fell, half sat back down on the infirmary bed with a *thump*. Growling, the tall young woman seemed to seethe internally before standing up again, this time brushing past the shorter sickbay personnel as she made her way out of the infirmary.

"Uh, ma'am? Ma'am? We're supposed to keep you overnight for observation..." He trailed off, looking at Sapphire's retreating form. Oh well, he was definitely going to get chewed out by his superiors for this, but honestly? Even if he'd wanted to he wouldn't have been able to keep the officer in the infirmary. She'd looked more likely to kick his teeth in than listen to the rest of what he had to say.

---------------Outside the Infirmary---------------

"Well, that's something, at least." Sapphire admitted in her mind that she may have left the infirmary too hastily. To his credit, the medical officer in charge of the infirmary had requisitioned a share of the equipment recovered from GTS's labs, equipment that would be vital for examining (and potentially performing any surgeries) on her. Doing her best to cool down and lose the temper she'd worked up, Sapphire pondered her options for the future.
055332222222322222222312.title: "Get me to the infirmary. NOW!"

choices: Blake and his mom, Claire walking through the gates after talking with a guard.
Claire and Blake having issues with a guard, so Sapphire steps in.
0553322222223222222223122.content:
Sighing, Sapphire took out her phone. She was really hoping that she wouldn't have to do this, but she needed that artifact out NOW. She dialed a number and waited. After hearing the other end getting picked up, she said, "Hey, Aunt Claire. It's me. Sorry for calling you so late."

"Yes, I'm doing well. Thank you." The military officer said, a small smile forming on her face. "Sorry to ask, but could you please come over?" Sapphire nodded, "Yes, at the military base near Opal. I'll be in the infirmary. Could you please bring Blake with you?"

Nodding again, Sapphire sighed with relief, "Thank you. See you in a couple." She then hung up, before heading back inside. She looked directly at the medical officer, sighing, "I apologize for snapping earlier... But this thing in my gut needs to be removed ASAP."

She showed him her phone, saying, "I've called in a third party specialist. He should be here in a couple hours." The medical officer raised an eyebrow, "Has he...dealt with this before?" Sapphire nodded, "Unfortunately. He has dealt with GTS's plans and activities before. He's a victim of one of them..."

No more words needed to be said as Sapphire waited in the room...
---------------------------
After 2 hours and 15 minutes of waiting, Sapphire received a text, nodding. "He's here. I'll be meeting him outside." She said. No objections were made as she headed out to the front gates to meet with her cousin and aunt. As she walked closer to the gates, she noticed...

05533222222232222222232.content:
"Yes, ma'am." The scientist said. Angela nodded, a sadistic grin appearing on her face as she carried the artifact out of the room. The scientist was confused as to why the agent would bring the artifact with her, but decided to not argue with it, knowing how terrifying Angela was.

Angela soon arrived at the cells, walking up to one holding a certain and bruised Sapphire Heart. "Hello, maggot~." The agent said in a sing-song voice. Sapphire only retorted, "Kick my ass, bitch." "Oh, how is THAT a greeting?" Angela asked, smirking at the military officer's anger.

"I should've snapped your neck when I had the chance." The black haired woman growled as Angela got a glass of water and put both it and the artifact in the cell. "Yes, you should've. Of course, you couldn't, you weak little shit." Angela grinned. "My superiors want you to drink and take that pill."

Silence. Sapphire stared at what had been placed in front of her, then at Angela. She was certain that this psychotic bitch was trying to poison and kill her. Then again, if that were the case, she would've done it long ago... Hell, she was certain she was still alive for a reason that Angela had no control over.

She stared at the water, then at Angela again...
05533222222232222222232.title: "Say, do we still have that lady captive in...

choices: Sapphire is suspicious and wary! She gets checked for abnormalities immediately!
Sapphire visits Blake to recuperate... completely forgetting about the pill...
Sapphire gets sidetracked! Going into town, she notices GTS agents tailing her!
055332222222322222222322.content:
"You can't honestly expect me to just drink that, can you?" Sapphire retorted. Still, she felt a twinge of confusion inside her. If GTS captured her and went to the trouble of locking her away, why would they just have Angela poison her now?
Plus, she could see the sidearm holstered at Angela's hip. Why go to the trouble of poisoning her when GTS could just have their attack dog whip her gun out and put a bullet in her brain?

Snickering at the captive woman's question, Angela leered down at the bound woman. Sapphire was still chained to the featureless metal chair bolted to the floor, her arms kept behind her back (Angela would've freed one of them had Sapphire accepted her proposal... but that ship had sailed with Sapphire's refusal.)

"You know, It think you misunderstood the phrasing of my statement. It wasn't a request. My superiors want you to take that pill, so you will take that pill! Bottoms up!"

Quick as a flash, Angela lashed out, having scooped up both the pill and the glass of water. With expert precision, the hand containing the pill darted forwards, plunging into Sapphire's unsuspecting mouth!

"Mmrgh!" Sapphire grunted at the sudden intrusion of her personal space, and a twinge of panic surged through her when she realized that she could feel the cool metal of the small spherical object on her tongue. Lurching back in the uncomfortable metal chair, she attempted to spit it out but was impeded by Angela roughly grabbing her cheeks with one gloved hand.

"Aw, got something in your mouth, bitch? Here, this'll wash it down!" Grinning, Angela forced Sapphire's lips apart and poured the glass of water in, making sure the entire contents of the glass passed into her captive's mouth.

Of course, Sapphire wasn't able to actually swallow the entire amount. Angela released Sapphire's jaw and let the captive officer choke and hack, desperately trying to clear her airway. Some of the water was coughed up, creating a small puddle at the base of the chair while still more splattered on and was absorbed by Sapphire's clothes.

But both women knew Sapphire had swallowed the "pill." There was no shiny gray marble-sized artifact rolling on the floor, and there was no damp artifact currently caught in the captive's damp clothing.

Nope, it hadn't passed down easily at all, but Sapphire had felt the unmistakable lump of cool metal pass down her throat.

Sputtering out the last bit of water, Sapphire managed a heated glare up at Angela.

"Oh, what's that angry look for? I thought we were friends?" Angela cooed in a tone of voice that was nothing short of supremely smug.

"Besides, missy- be happy! You're free to go!"

"W-what? What do you mean?" Sapphire could hardly believe her ears, not having believed the words that had just come out of Angela's mouth. But before she could question her captor any further, the agent of GTS had already moved behind her and undone her bindings. Not wasting a moment, Angela hauled the statuesque young woman to her feet and roughly shoved her out the door of the cell.

"Didn't you hear? I said 'you're free to go.' Ta-ta~ it was lovely having you over again!"

Ugh, just that tone of voice alone made Sapphire want to smack the agent right in her smug face... but she new better. She may've been a skilled fighter, but she was tired, hungry, and unarmed... Plus Angela already had one hand at her holstered sidearm, daring her to make a move.

Angela waved at a security camera pointing down at the two women, and moments later two armed guards appeared, as if on cue. Each one seized Sapphire by her upper arms, practically dragging her away from the smug agent.

"Take care now, Sapphire! My friends here will help you find the exit of our little facility here! And don't you worry about the medicine you just took, it was a failed supplement, nothing more! Something that was supposed to keep our boys and girls in the field always peppy and ready to go!"

Yeah right, that was about as far from the truth as it could be. But the shots that Sapphire had been injected with before she'd woken up in her cell should be taking affect right about now, filling the military officer with renewed stamina and energy... and conveniently misleading her from the actual purpose of the artifact.

An artifact that, unlike a pill, had most certainly not been digested by Sapphire's powerful gastric acids. Yeah, Angela honestly thought that this was a pretty roundabout way of carrying out an experiment, but oh well, orders were orders. The artifacts powerful magic dampening effect needed to be in close proximity of a known magic-user to work, and who else would Sapphire Heart turn to for support and comfort after such an ordeal than one Blake Heart? Though she would admit that she liked the idea of using Blake's caring and protective cousin as a living Trojan Horse to deliver the instrument of his doom to him...

Assuming all went according to her superiors' plans, this little endeavor could permanently damage the young spell-casters supernatural abilities... or render him weak enough that GTS would be able to swoop in and capture him before he had a chance to find out what was wrong with his abilities.

And that wasn't even going into the fact that GTS's shrinking technology was vastly inferior to the spells that those vile magic-users wielded. Now, just how long did their Shrink Ray's effect last before wearing off completely? What was it... 7 days? Well, if those damn Heart's hadn't wised up before time ran out... well, even if Sapphire Heart survived, she'd be in for a world of hurt!



-----------------

Now, what direction should the story take after Sapphire leaves/is kicked out of GTS's research facility?
