For some reason, Blake felt compelled to go to Indigo's feet and get her attention from there. The tiny mage made his way to his giantess friend's shoe-covered feet and was caught off guard by the strangely...interesting smell they exerted. Not a repulsive or even slightly bad odor...in fact, the feet...soothed him a bit with a scent similar to tropical fruit.

Blake shook his head as he returned to reality. He had to get Indigo's help! But how?
123.title: Indigo's Feet

choices: Indigo checks to see what's been bothering her leg!
1233.content: Blake was thinking of different ways to go about getting Indigo's attention. Then, suddenly, Indigo's feet came to life and started moving! Indigo was taking off her shoes! Blake blushed a little though he was unsure why. Indigo had now slipped off both of her shoes and rested her black knee high socks onto the cold tile floor. He feet planted firmly on the floor and he could swear he saw a slight mist coming from underneath her feet. The floor was pretty cold... could her feet be that warm? Curious, Blake walked over and the smell of the tropical fruit grew. It must have either been a lotion or body wash. It was mixing with the faint aroma of her sweat and dirt from inside her shoes. The dirt most likely got in there from gym, or in the locker room or the track. Blake was now right next to Indigo's giant foot. Blake, like almost every other guy, didn't know how big her feet were normal sized but from here he would had to have guess maybe a size 7 or 8 in Women's. Right? He shook his head. He noticed that he was not pressing his body against the warm foot. He blushed brightly and backed away, flustered. "Come on. I've got to get to Aria. But I have to get Indigo's attention first... Blake walked back to her foot and grabbed onto her sock. It was slightly damp. Most likely because she had gym the class before. Or was it that she walked around a bit? Blake tried to figure out which one it was but realized that wasn't helping. He looked up and saw her sock just reached her skirt. All he had to do was climb her and get onto her desk. She'd see him there, answer questions and she'd, hopefully, take him to see Aria. So, Blake started his daunting climb. Grabbing the threads of her sock, he made his way up higher and higher about halfway up her shin when there was a shift under him. He gripped the sock tight and felt himself rise and swing. He closed his eyes until all was still. When everything stopped he opened his eyes to see that Indigo had only crossed her legs. "Jeez... her just crossing her legs caused earthquake to tilt everything. I need to be way more careful." Blake sighed and continued his long climb. The smell wasn't as strong up here, but was still distinguishable. Part of him really wanted to be down there... bask in it some more... was that.. weird? yes.. maybe? But it smelt so good... Blake blushed and shook his head. He continued up her leg and was just at the area where her sock ended and where her skirt hung. Blake smiled to himself "Halfway there." When he got to this point however he paused as two things went through his head...
1233.title: Socked Pillars

choices: Indigo had Physical Education next, unfortunately for Blake.
Indigo had Social Studies next, so Blake would have an easier time.
No more Class. Its the weekend!
12331.content:
For some strange reason, Blake just can’t shake away the idea to climb down into Indigo’s right sock. He wonders if the smell was starting to affecting his thinking, but he’s practically entranced. And to be fair, Blake was given the gift of extreme strength and durability, and while he was still in love with Aria, he wouldn’t mind a short diversion into Indigo’s sock. And no one had to know, right? After all, Blake was only an inch tall, so how would Indigo even consciously notice that he was in there? And would she even care enough to check what she felt, if she even felt anything?


So Blake squeezed under the end of Indigo’s knee high sock, and made his way down her leg again, so he could reach her feet and experience them without a sock in the way. It was a bit tight along the sock, which made the climb down slower than Blake would have liked, but it seemed that his presence slightly bothered Indigo. She pulled apart her sock, thinking that she needed to adjust it, which made him tumble quickly down to her foot. Blake landed right next to her instep, and the sock pressed his body into that part of her foot, covering his body with her sweat. But Blake was less interested in this part of Indigo’s foot, so he crawled slowly along her instep towards her toes, which were fairly still and calm. As he was crawling along her foot, it seemed to bug Indigo, as she mumbled to herself “Did my sock get loose or something? Is a pebble in there? It feels really annoying. Stupid thing!” Indigo was annoyed enough by whatever was inside her sock that she started rubbing her feet together, as a way to grind away whatever was itching her. Blake continued to crawl blissfully unaware of how Indigo was reacting to his presence, and was caught off guard once her feet slammed together, carelessly rubbing back and forth into each other. Blake was dragged back and forth across the side of her foot, as Indigo used her left foot to rub into the side of her right foot while slowly positioning it to rub into the sole of her right foot, and that gradual motion eventually sent Blake right under her sole as well. And as she continued to rub her sole, which she thought felt very enjoyable while focusing on class, Blake was haphazardly dragged around against her sole, and since all of her foot sweat seemed to gather around the bottom of her sock, there was plenty around him to act as an effective lubricant.


But once things settled down, he was closer to her toes, so Blake used that opportunity to squeeze under the ball of her foot to finally get to be right next to her massive toes. Because of his current positioning, when he reached the toe section, he found himself next to her 3rd and 4th toes, and his face head just barely fit in the space in-between them. She instinctively scrunched her toes, covering his face with her built up toe sweat and junk. And in the back of her mind, she thought that she felt a small pebble in her sock, but she was quickly distracted by her school work, so Blake remained undiscovered for the time being. And Indigo just reached a really interesting part of her book, so she was almost completely focused on reading, so whatever she did with her feet and toes, and by extension Blake, would be totally unconscious and unaware.


But then, the bell rang, which proved to be very painful for Blake’s currently much smaller ears. Indigo lazily shoved her shoes back on, which caused her toes to be pressed a bit more close together, which proved to lock Blake’s head in a vice grip of sweaty flesh. And the smell and heat intensified, causing the environment to become a lot more unpleasant. And Blake wondered if this was such a great idea after all. And as she stood up, pressing her full weight into tiny Blake, he wondered how far the spirits’ blessings would take him. And as she stood, she moved and shifted her toes around until she felt like they were completely inside of her shoes, which gave Blake a harsh massage. Blake wondered what class Indigo had next, because he only had afternoon classes with her this year. Where was Indigo’s next class?
12331.title: Into the Sock he Goes!

choices: Indigo reads her book, with her socks on
Indigo investigates her socks, trying to take out that pebble
Indigo takes off her socks and reads her book
123313.content:
Indigo smiled as she stood, "Finally! Now to get home and enjoy the weekend." Indigo bent down adding pressure onto her right foot to pick up her bag, then stood up right throwing her backpack on for her walk home. Indigo made her way out of the class, through the crowds, then out onto the main quad area. Indigo waved to passing friends, unaware of the one underneath her foot. She walked down some steps then began her short 25-30 minute walk home. As she was just leaving campus however she noticed how that pebble from under her toes was still there. She wanted to take it out for the walk home, but she didn't want to take off her long socks at school, she had forgot her short socks for gym today and didn't really want anyone to notice. She'd just have to wait until she got home to deal with it.

**************************************************************************** ****************************************************************************

Inside of her shoe the loud ringing had stopped. After Blake was done wincing in pain he heard Indigo speak, "Finally." Curious he went silent to see if he could notice anything. As he went silent though he noticed a shift as Indigo's foot moved. She had to be standing, getting ready to go to her next class. Blake sighed and tried to calm himself, breathing in the sweaty musk of Indigo's feet in the process. It wasn't too terrible but it wasn't fresh air. Then indigo's giant foot pressed down on him, causing the mage to groan slightly in discomfort. He blushed as Indigo's toes wiggled slightly as she bent down on him. Soon the pressure relented and he could breath somewhat easily now. Indigo was now lifting her foot and was walking, lifting Blake then bringing him back down. Constant slamming down against the hard sole of her shoe and the soft sole and toes of Indigo's foot. It was an odd feeling to say the least, but... not bad. Her feet were so soft that it almost WAS worth it.Blake could hear faintly the sound of his fellow peers outside of this very shoe! It was so strange, no one knew he was trapped underneath Indigo. No one, not even the giant introvert herself did not know. All of it was sparking feelings Blake had never felt before. He blushed but kept quiet. Indigo would go to her next class and he would work an escape plan then, but she kept on walking. The voices of fellow students grew farther and farther away. Where was she going? As Blake was being trampled on he wondered if Indigo was ditching school before he remembered that today was a minimum day, the last day before spring break! Blake struggled slightly, causing a slight irritation to the giantess above. She scrunched her toes "ugh that pebble is still in there... oh well..." With that Indigo continued walking. Blake gasped, he had gotten Indigo's attention, but not exactly the way he wanted. It would appear he would have to wait until Indigo got home before he could make his move... but would he even have a chance to?

**************************************************************************** ****************************************************************************

The tiny mage had submitted to being trampled over and over for what seemed like an eternity. A long and grueling journey to Indigo's home. Meanwhile Indigo was simply listening to music and was happy to be almost home. A few minutes later, after almost drowning her passenger in foot sweat, Indigo had made it home. She reached into her book bag and took out her keys. She unlocked the front door and stepped inside

"Mom?! Dad?! I'm home..." Indigo called out. She waited. No response. "Mom? Dad? Helloooo?" She slipped her bag off her shoulder and looked around. It appeared they weren't home. She went into the kitchen and saw a small note that her mother often used. She picked it up and read it. "Indigo, your father and I were called in for a company meeting. Its upstate and we'll be gone for most of the week. I know you wanted to go to the bookstore so we transferred $200 to your account. We'll be back before you know it. We stocked the pantry and fridge so you won't go hungry. Have fun. Love, Mom and Dad" "Huh... I guess i've got the house to myself." Indigo smiled slightly. She walked to her room and dropped her bag by the door and slipping off her shoes. For now ...
123313.title: No more Class. Its the weekend!

1233131.content:
Indigo lays down on her bed and smiles. She leans over and grabs her favorite book and opens it to where she left off. Happily she begins to read, crossing her legs and lightly rubbing her soles with her feet, unaware she is smothering her tiny classmate into them!

Blake gets trampled as Indigo walks back to her bed then gets disorientated when she lays down, having been laying on his back now, laying on his chest as Indigo gets into bed. Blake groans softly from being so displaced but manages to keep the contents of his stomach inside for now. Indigo had subconsciously noted a small irritation on her sole and began to rub it, the irritation of course being none other than helpless Blake! Indigo uses her foot to rub into her arch, pressing the tiny mage into it. The soft foot flesh yields under Blake and Indigo's other mighty foot. Blake now the unfortunate ingredient to an Indigo foot sandwich. Blake blushes and sighs as he contemplates on what to do. He could Wiggle and try to alert Indigo to his presence, but Indigo may just think he's just an itch and snuff him out just like before. Or worst case she feels him and thinks he's some sort of bug and squishes him. He know the spirits were protecting him, but he doubts the spirits could prevent hundreds of pounds of teenager being forced upon him.He could wait for her to take off her socks, but that could take all day... if not all night! Either way weren't too pleasing ways to go about this, but from his point of view it was the only two options he could think of on the spot.
1233131.title: Indigo reads her book, with her socks on

1233132.content:
Indigo walks into her room and takes a single step before she feels something. Something small.. Something squishy against her sole. 'Must be the pebble from earlier', she thought. She grinds it into the ground a little, hoping she could put off taking off her sock but it doesn't crush or break. Indigo sighs and shrugs, resigning herself to walking over to the bed.

As Blake is freed from the stuffy prison he is immediately pressed into the floor, his face and body becoming more smothered into Indigo's soft fragrant sole again. He groans softly and becomes surprised when he feels the foot above him grind him into the floor! Did Indigo feel him? Did she just think he was some rock, a piece of lint to be smothered away? Blake blushes at those thoughts and try to confirm to himself that Indigo would never intentionally hurt him... right? Indigo starts walking, trampling the poor tiny mage. Indigo eventually gets to the bed and is lifted up with her foot while she rests it on her knee. She starts to take off her long sock but Blake remains stuck fast to her sole. He blushes and attempts to wiggle free but is still stuck! Soon Indigo takes her sock off and looks directly onto her sole for the source of the pebble. She looks and sees ...
1233132.title: Indigo investigates her socks, trying to take o...

choices: “...so I’ll help you, for a price.”
“...but I’ll be keeping you for myself.”
12331321.content:
“Blake?!” Indigo’s reaction was sudden and full of shock. “What...how in the world..?”

Blake blushed intensely, grateful for being noticed...but still nervous. “I-I can explain, Indigo...I made a deal with ghosts to become able to impress Aria, but my strength cost me my height. I was able to summon those spirits because...I’m a mage.”

“...I had a feeling you were.”

Blake’s eyes widened, and his cheeks reddened even more. He figured that nobody had noticed any signs of his mage status...sans the librarian who gave him an odd look after checking out a book on the magical arts.

Turns out he was wrong.

“...Really?” The tiny boy asked sheepishly.

“You’ve been acting a little odd lately, Blake,” Indigo said. “Hiding away from everybody, whispering strange chants...but I don’t have an issue with that. To be honest, you look adorable at your current size! No wonder you’ve been wanting to date Aria...”
12331321.title: Indigo’s Tiny Discovery

123313212.content:
All the color drained from Blake’s face as his brain made sense of the latest words to escape Indigo’s lips. She was going to keep him for herself, instead of helping him reach Aria, his one true love?! Getting the intelligent introvert’s attention in the first place was apparently a mistake.

Needless to say, the tiny mage turned and made a run for it, only to be thwarted when Indigo’s hand speedily snatched him up, raising him towards her face. Blake gulped, fearing his classmate’s size and power relative to his own.

“Aw, were you trying to get away, little man?” Indigo asked tauntingly.

“Indigo, p-please...” Blake begged the Asian giantess. “Just help me get to Aria!”

“That’s not gonna happen~ you’re mine now, forever! And I know JUST the place to keep you, so that you never escape...”
123313212.title: Inescapable Indigo

choices: Indigo remembers that there was something under her foot
1233133.content:
Indigo takes off her shoes and grabs her book that she has been reading, "The Tale of Issunboshi". The recluse walks over to the switch to her own ceiling fan, turning it on to cool the room. She walks on, unaware of tiny Blake underneath her. Blake, plastered to her foot's sole, is constantly pressed against her and the fabric of the sock. The feeling of rising then the feeling of being flattened is very strange. Step, rise, step, rise, step, rise. Lift, splat, lift, splat, lift, splat. The sweat had now dried partially, almost gluing Blake to the enormous foot.

"Huh... well at least school is done" Indigo smiles as she lays onto her bed. She drags her feet onto the bed and starts to slip off her socks. She slips them off and wiggles her purple painted toes, smiling. She flips to her bookmark and sighs dreamily. She was at the part where the shrunken hero had finally made it to the capital. The hero, Issunboshi, was born at only an inch in height and he had stayed that way into his adulthood. He finally ventured out into the world to explore and adventure, running into perilous journeys on his way to the nation's capitol. He had just arrived and accidentally ended up in the Emporer's daughter's slipper. She was reading the part when she arrives in her room and they are about to meet. Indigo wiggled her feet slightly and giggled to herself, wondering how nice it'd be to have a cute little man with her.

Blake feels Indigo add pressure on him then lift her foot, along with him, onto the bed. He feels Indigo lay down and feels her feet shift. It sounds like she's taking off her socks! Blake tries to struggle and push himself off but to no use. Then Indigo's foot presses into him as it releases her foot and its tiny prisoner. However Blake still is struck to Indigo's foot like a piece of lint or dirt. He tries to wiggle free but finds that he can't and sighs, getting a breath full of Indigo's aromatic feet. Smelling of fruit and sweat. A strange and soothing scent.
1233133.title: Indigo takes off her socks and reads her book

12331333.content:
As Indigo continued to read the tale of Issunboshi, tiny Blake squirmed and struggled to escape from the giantess's foot. The Asian introvert initially regarded it as dirt or lint, but...she could've sworn she felt something move down there. It wasn't normal. Looking down, Indigo's eyes widened as she spotted a panicking black speck...with glasses...but bugs don't wear glasses...

"Blake?!" Indigo reacted, shock clear in her voice and face. "Is that you?" She then plucked up the little mage with two dainty fingers before raising him to eye level and letting him stand atop her palm.

"H-hi, Indigo..." Blake said nervously. "I-I can explain..."

Indigo paused for a moment before speaking again. "So..."
12331333.title: There's Evil Afoot! (That was terrible, I know.)

choices: "Of course I'm mad. I'm the better girl for you!"
123313331.content:
"...I guess you've read this book?" Indigo asked at last.

Blake found himself unable to hide to sudden blush on his cheeks. He actually hadn't read the story of Issunboshi, but at his current stature, he was practically LIVING it. Although the story's titular hero was born small, the shrunken mage had faced similar trials -- exploring a giant world, trying to win Aria's heart, nearly getting crushed out of existence by Indigo's feet...how could he possibly be blunt about his situation?

"Um, yeah!" Blake lied. "I'm a huge fan of Issunboshi. Heck, I invented a size-changing ray just to see what it's like to be so tiny!"

The Asian giantess raised an eyebrow. "Size-changing technology? Sounds a little farfetched to me!" She let out a sigh. "So really, Blake, what's going on?"

Blake tried to back up his ruse, but lowered his head in defeat. "Alright, I admit it...I called upon spirits to toughen my body and shrink my size so I could impress Aria."

Indigo just stared in silent thought. The little mage did manage to survive a day in her sock, and now here he was, standing in her hand at half an inch tall.

Blake gulped nervously. "So, uh, Indigo...you're not mad at me, are you?"

Indigo's next words made the answer obvious...
123313331.title: Indigo's Suspicions

choices: Indigo gets up... With Blake still stuck to her
Indigo tries to cure the uncomfortable itch
12332.content:
Clutching tightly to the crisp folds, he shuddered thinking: this was only one girl. There were plenty of other students in the class, who'd be just as horrifying. Blake tried not to let the thought get to him. He focused simply on the quick arm motions. Up, down. His climb went in sync with Indigo's writing pace.

Then - she stopped. Her expression showed a hint of confusion. His shoulders relaxed for a second - tensing up again when he felt himself slipping on the smooth slope. Had she noticed him? Taking a hopeful gasp, he released the air in his lungs with a large "Indy!"

The girl stood up. With a lead-darkened paper in hand, she began a short walk to to the front of the class.

Blake kept shouting as the skirt's gentle wafts tugged him back and forth once more. Her skyscraper-like legs kept pushing against his platform, restructuring it around their shape with every step. After a few booming impacts below, far louder than he expected, the mage glanced down instinctively.

Bad idea. Baaaaaad idea. He was dizzied by the distant floor tiles: the incredible pace with which the simple pattern flew by; the sheer drop below; and the constant shaking around. Despite that, he kept climbing - it was the only route to safety.

Even when Indigo stopped at the teacher's desk, her skirt kept moving. She pointed to one part of the page. "Excuse me - does this question refer to Everest, or Kilimanjaro?"

Blake could only barely see the teacher peering over the page. "Oops, that was supposed to be on the other side. It's asking about Fuji."

"Thank you, that's much clearer."

With the terse discussion reaching its end, Indigo turned back to her seat. The rotation did nothing for Blake's growing dizziness. His green face clashed with the purple clothing he kept a firm grip on. The thumping below kept repeating, either massive leg stretching up and swinging forward into the horizon. And yet, her desk looked as if it were kilometers in the distance. The rest of the world was blurred by speed, fear, and the unbelievable perspective. Head spinning, he called out: "Spirits... spirits, please help me!"

A cold wind rushed by his neck - and not just from the pace of the girl's immense stride. The wisps from before whistled by... Leaving a tiny capsule of motion-sickness medicine in his robes.

Whelp.

Below, the blue shoes finally stopped moving, having returned their owner - and her unknown passenger - to her desk. The mage sighed in relief.

That sigh quickly returned as a desperate gasp when his bespectacled eyes refocused. His little fold of the skirt was right under Indigo's firm backside! He felt the world rocking as she moved to take a seat. The mage's arms rushed to pull himself to the side - but the skirt's gentle swaying brought him back. The chair below grew closer and closer. Blake scurried up his friend's clothing, forcing his arms up - but the curve of her butt, which presently devoured the light of the ceiling, made for too steep a surface. Shutting his eyes, he let go, enhanced durability reducing the pain from his collision with the seat. But no matter how swift he was, it was too late to outrun the looming butt as it descended towards him.

In an instant, everything went black. Then, purple. The body heat that Blake felt earlier now permeated through him, an uncomfortable warmth that engulfed his tiny form. He felt the fabric pressing against his face, pinning it down mercilessly.

Regathering his strength, the shrunken boy pushed back against the young woman's clueless compression. He pressed hard, face first turning red from embarrassment at his position, then blue from lack of air. Pausing for a breath, he could barely grab anything from under the rump. What little air circulated around had that same faint, fruity hint of lotion. Under these conditions, Blake's next few attempts were even less fruitful: every time he tried for her attention, or just to get her to move her backside a smidgen, he found himself collapsing sooner, and he found the squeezing from Indigo's butt harder to bear.

With an aching in his arms, he opted to simply try squirming out, slowly wiggling his body side to side like a worm in mud. Blake made gradual progress, thanks to the smooth texture of his robes and the skirt surrounding him. However, that was quickly undone. Indigo - feeling something vaguely uncomfortable underneath her, like a princess with a pea - began squirming herself, readjusting her backside's position on the seat. The simple fidget rolled her friend left and right across her cheek. He was unprepared for the weight pressing against his torso - then his side, then his back. His exposed face and hands brushed against the purple-coated mountain at least four times before she finally stopped, her whole weight falling onto Blake's tired shoulders.

His black hair and clothing were in a mess from being jostled so much - to say nothing of the pain shooting through his slender limbs, or the nausea churning and boiling in his chest. But he had a mission at hand, and his mind was not going to give in, despite his total helplessness under the backside of a teenage girl.

He forced himself to focus, trying to shield his mind from the reality pressing down on him. There had to be some way out - some path that let him keep scaling upwards, and into Indigo's range of vision.

Her voice, though a quiet murmur to the rest of the class, shook the mage's body: "So, height relative to Fuji would be..."

Another slight wiggle from above squeezed him harder into the seat, nearly flattening the boy. He held his breath, curling in a little ball to endure it. Think... He needed to get out of the chair. But how?
12332.title: Up the Great Skirt

123323.content:
"Ugh..." Indigo groaned to herself. "I can't take this stupid itch..."

The Asian giantess lifted her rump off the seat a bit in an effort to investigate the cause of its irritation. Blake was allowed a brief reprieve before Indigo's hand suddenly snatched him up, and the tiny mage was raised toward the girl's face. Her dark eyes widened at the discovery she'd made...

"Blake..?" Indigo whispered, low enough to remain unheard by anyone else in the classroom. "Is that you?"

"Y-yes..." Blake confirmed timidly. "I need your help!"

"We'd better discuss this after class. For now, I should hide you..."
123323.title: Getting to the Bottom of the Itch

choices: Indigo forces the "bug" to have a wedding, and BOTH her feet are the brides!
Indigo wants to see what kind of bug it is and finds out it's really Blake
12333.content:
As Blake continued to climb up Indigo, the 14-year-old, Asian high school girl and classmate of his that was wearing a blue shirt, a dark purple skirt, and blue shoes looked down to see what was bothering her.

When she saw it, she was surprised. A little bug? That's what was bothering her leg? Shaking it a bit, Indigo saw the bug freeze as if it knew it was caught. Amused at the bug seemingly understanding that, she brushed it from her let to the floor with her hand.

"I know just how to take care of you...Don't worry, little bug," Indigo said with a smirk, "This won't hurt a bit!"

*Thump*

Almost instantly, Blake felt a immense amount of pressure on top of his body. He felt the moist, sweaty fibers of Indigo's sock. Blake also noticed the cheesy smell that the sock was emitting as it crushed him. It was far too heavy to resist against. As much as he tried, the sock had completely conquered him.

"Gotta grind it, or it may still be there." Indigo said and started twisting her foot on the bug.

Blake screamed for mercy as his entire body was now squished from ALL SIDES by Indigo's disgusting, sweaty, raunchy socks as he felt he was going to be torn apart. He couldn't move a single muscle, as he helplessly sank deeper and deeper into the tree trunk-sized sweaty socked fibers covering Indigo's sole. An embarrassing fate indeed, smothered and swallowed by Indigo's feet. In his mind, Blake felt as though he'd truly become one with her foot. Her smell completely overtook the little mage. The very air he breathed was now 100% tainted by Indigo's horrible foot. Foot stench filled Blake's nostrils and lungs, and slowly goes through his blood stream like some type of drug, making Blake loose his mind. Though it was pure black on the underside of the monolithic foot, Blake could swear he could see Indigo's socked foot, playfully squeezing and squishing him over and over again, as if it were chewing, trying to make him a part of it.

Indigo didn't step on the bug with her full weight, but she applied enough pressure to keep it firmly pressed against the ground. Enjoying the feel underneath her foot as the bug begin to struggle with all it's might, trying it's best to escape from under her black knee high socks. Indigo moaned as she felt the bug squirm under her sole. “That feels rather nice.” She informed it. “In fact I want you to keep struggling just like that.”

Blake yelped as Indigo began rubbing her humongous foot against him, using his tiny, struggling body as a foot massager for the next 30 minutes. By the time she had used him massaging every crevice of her socked left foot, Blake was panting with exhaustion.

After a while of Indigo grinding him under her sole, Blake was raised along with the foot he was now throughly stuck to and she saw Indigo's other foot getting closer to him.

"Noooooooooooooooooooo", he yelled at the top of her lungs, as the colossal foot came in contact. Indigo sandwiching Blake in between them. Blake was completely surrounded by smelly sock fibers. The thick, cheesy smell of Indigo's socks were extremely powerful, and they were rubbing the smell all over his miniscule body. She stopped rubbing her feet together, but, seeing how comfortable she was now, she kept them together in an attempt to suffocate the bug.

After a good hour, the socked foot was removed and replaced with Indigo's face. "Still around, bug?" she asked, seeing it still intact somehow after all that, Indigo bent down and picked up one of her shoes and peeled the bug off her foot before she held it over the opening.

"Enjoy your new home." she said. Peering down into the foul smelling cavern, Blake bit his lip nervously "Please don't tell me she's gonna..."

Then Indigo released him.

Blake was sent plummeting downwards, Upon making contact with the insole of Indigo's shoe, he simple bounced on it like a jellotine-like surface.

The footsweat the insole had absorbed had made it near spongy and had cushioned Blake's landing. "Gross" Blake complained as he stood up and wiped some of the moistness from his body. Walls surrounded him on every side. The floor underneath him was soft and spongy and felt wet to the touch. The atmosphere of this place was incredibly hot and humid, making being in the area a truly unpleasant place for the mage.

Looking up, Blake saw Indigo looking down at him within her shoe. He face eclipsing everything, demanding his attention as she loomed over him like a goddess.

"Awww ...you look so cold and lonely in there, little bug, don't worry...let me fix that for you by giving you some company. Here comes the FOOO~OOOT!" she said, then her face pulled away. Then the footwear tilted and Blake's eyes widened. A sock-covered foot that he'd gotten very familiar with entered the boot and drew near him. Blake, filled with panic, ran until he was in the toe section of the shoe. and had to turn around to face the beast that pursued him as Indigo's foot caught up with him and forced him onto his back.

Helpless, as it poured over him. Trapping him beneath it. Smothering him.

Indigo smirked as she trapped the bug inside her footwear, then went about her day. Upon arriving home, Indigo removed her shoes and turned them upside down and shook her shoe, surprised when the bug fell out, completely whole, it seemed to look up at her, then bolted away in the opposite direction...at least until Indigo pinned it between her black knee high sock-covered feet and lifted them into the air, raising the bug along with them as she sat down.

"Well now...trapped inside my shoes all day and you're completely intact...credit where it's due, little bug. You're pretty durable." Indigo said, impressed. Then she thought about what to do with her bug next and came to a decision.
12333.title: Fee-fi-fo-fum! Indigo's caugh herself a bug!

choices: "...should I call Aria and have her come over?"
123332.content:
"I wonder what species of bug you are, little guy..." Indigo said before reaching down to grab the little "bug" with those dainty fingers of hers. The Asian girl then raised the creature to her face and squinted her eyes a bit, surprised at what she discovered.

"B-Blake?!" Indigo reacted.

"Um...hi..." was all Blake could spit out as he nervously waved to the giantess.

"What...how...I don't believe it! How did you get so small?"

"I can explain...the thing is, I'm a mage. I made a deal with spirits to toughen me up, at the cost of my size. See, I was really hoping to impress Aria...Please, I need your help to get to her!"

Indigo was silent for a moment, leaving tiny Blake unsure what she would make of his confession. Would she be jealous? Amused? Angry at the little mage? All became clear when Indigo parted her lips to speak.

"I...I believe you..."

"R-really?" Blake asked.

"Of course. I mean, my classmate is half an inch tall and standing atop my palm right now. Oh, and, um...sorry for crushing you with my feet..." Indigo blushed a bit.

"No biggie..." Blake's cheeks also reddened.

"So..."
123332.title: Curiosity Saved the Mage

choices: Indigo seems to be stirring in her sleep
1233322.content:
Even after Blake forgave her, she still seemed distraught - as if something was lingering in the corner of her immense mind. Below, her socked soles shifted gently against the room's floor, sending painful thoughts shooting down in her shrunken friend's brain. Was she about to put him back in that prison? Was there something he said that would make her mad? He flinched visibly.

Indigo's mouth curled downwards in response. Her fingers began to curl up, as if she wanted to pet him. "It's... It's getting sorta late, huh. I think it'd be best just to tell Jade you're sleeping over with me, don't you think?"

He hesitated, thinking of how badly his little sister could take the situation, before nodding slowly.

Indigo's giant lip curled, showing the handheld boy the soft ridges making it up. "Don't feel I'm forcing you." She tapped the side of his leg slowly, before brushing the side of her index across it. He shuddered at the digit's size compared to him. "I'm not kidnapping you."

Unsure how to respond, the black-clad boy held his hand to her finger, feeling the smooth print sink into his palm. "If you don't want me here, I can get her to pick me up..."

"Hm. You really know how to make me feel guilty." She pushed her face in closer. It was all Blake could see as her eyes pointed right at his minuscule form. Her cheeks, spread out like mountains at either end of his line of vision, were still bright red, contrasting with the clothes he'd just been uncomfortably close to. It reminded him of looking up at her uncaring visage from the base of her dampened insole, helpless to react as the monolith of a sock entered, filling all space with its wriggling wrinkles and all breathable air with its fruity, cheesy musk.

Lost in his thoughts, he yelped a little, shivering and trembling. He only realized what he was doing after it came out; Indigo was still looking down, her eyes now a bit wider - her hold not as sturdy. In her other hand, she took out her cellphone to text Jade about the arrangement.

"We can't ignore that elephant in the room." When the enormous girl finished texting, she slowly knelt on her couch, ensuring the movement wasn't too brisk or intense for the mage. "You've just come out from my shoe after hours of me stepping on you and taunting you. That's..." she bit her lip. "That's bound to leave a mark on you."

That wasn't what he was expecting. She was always friendly, but a little suspicious, giving him quick looks as if he were up to something - as if he were some scientific oddity she'd been assigned to analyze. But now, her shoulders were shivering gently; her gigantic feet below folded over one another shyly, toes tugging at the material. For some time, he'd been in fear of his life, nearly becoming one with his friend's toejam, begging quietly for mercy from a cruel goliath above as she smothered him effortlessly. Now, even from his perspective, she seemed very... small.

Blake answered gently, but clearly as possible: "It's fine, r-really." He dusted the side of his black shirt, which still had the aroma of Indigo's foot lotion, and was still moist from the misty sweat built up below her socks. "My powers stopped me from getting hurt. And besides, y-you didn't know who I was."

The way she'd positioned her hand, Indigo had to look up to see him. He could see the details of her body grow fainter, harder to make out, as they stretched down further. "Does it matter? Even if you weren't shrunken, even if that was a bug - what would you think of me, pushing something helpless around like that? Stomping it again, and again... brushing its face into my sole... squeezing the life out of it until it refuses to fight back..." She gasped for breath, her palm feeling far warmer and sweatier. "...And... And getting such a RUSH from it."

She deposited him on the bed, as if she didn't trust her trembling hand to keep him safe. With that done, she curled up, her knees towering high over Blake. Instantly, her arms slumped over them, and her face fell into it, hiding her eyes. Nothing she said was wrong. Indigo's unstoppable stomping had shocked Blake, and scared him - but also, made him feel pathetic and worthless. Back there, in the sweaty confines of her footwear, he'd nearly accepted that was the end. That he was crazy to think he could impress Aria, an ant like him. That Indigo even acknowledging him was a miracle.

Now, those thoughts had left. The classmate whose head he had to crane up to see... She'd never looked so insecure.

"Look," he finally said, taking cautious steps closer, "you lost control. I don't blame you. We've both been pushed around by bullies. We're both just trying to grab a good hold on things." He kept gazing up as he walked, pausing occasionally. "We both want to feel like we're stronger - like we matter to the world. That's... That's why I wanted to impress Aria - she makes me feel special. And that's why..." He gulped. "I guess that's why you said all that stuff."

Her toes twitched slightly, revealing the hints of moisture clinging to her sole, like morning dew touching grassy fields. "I'm just... I didn't know that was in me." She was murmuring into herself now, at a volume so low that Blake wouldn't have heard it had he been any bigger. "I thought I was above that. I don't want to - to lose control again. Especially when it could hurt you."

For a straight minute, they were both quiet. They barely moved, the only sound their bated breath. Blake could see her thin stomach moving slowly with each breath - noticing they were slower than his own. She twisted her head to him, moving her lip as if to say something else - before looking away quickly, her hair slumping downwards.

Blake took a hesitant step forward. He went to the only part of her body he could reach without trying to climb her again - the side of her foot - and, after momentary uncertainty, stroked it with the back of his palm. He repeated the motion; the now-familiar fibres receding easily to his gentle touch.

The smell hadn't grown any less strong, a mix of pungent sweat and lotion. And the ball of her foot had an uncomfortable texture - spongey, drenched with liquids, full of loose threads and bits of lint that rubbed off onto him. But that didn't matter. In an instant, he fell right into it. His arms stretched as far as they could, and he pressed his torso against the dirty surface in a long hug.
The girl only now took notice of his actions. He could feel one of her toes twitch in surprise, before stiffening, too scared of his safety to move. Blake wrapped his arms around that digit, moving both limbs gently as if petting it.

"I... I'm not mad, Indigo." He gasped for air, letting the odor fill his lungs; and looked to the ground as he spoke, too shy to look up. "It was scary. I still can't believe I'm here. But - but it's over now. Please, don't - don't be hard on yourself."

She watched wordlessly as he kept embracing her sole. Soon, his petting turned into a full-out massage. He nearly buried his face into the cotton to hide it, letting the wetness cover his entire body. And... Despite having been subjected to that torture, he didn't seem to mind.

Indigo managed a smile, supporting her chin with her hands. "You're too forgiving."

"I can't help it." He moved slowly across the tips of her toes, still rubbing - sending gentle sensations through Indigo's sole. "You're always there for Aria and I. No matter what the two of us do, even if it... it doesn't work out between us..." He sniffed gently, nervous about even addressing that possibility - and inhaling a bit of the warm, odorous air. "...You'll still be our friend."

"You still trust me?" She leaned in closer, face nearly overtaking his body. It had the same puzzled look as if she were trying to solve a tough problem at school - not nearly as intimidating as it was seconds ago.

Blake looked up. "Yeah." As soon as that happened, he noticed how long he'd been rubbing her foot - and how much he'd thrown himself into it. His shirt almost consisted more of sweaty lint than its original fabric. He nearly jumped back from his friend in surprise. Had he really gotten THAT used to the smell and texture so quickly? The tiny mage started wiping the dirty substance off., giving a squeaky, high-pitched apology: "Sorry! Sorry!"

Her soft lips remained in a tiny, subtle smile, almost impossible to make out. She blinked. "If it makes you feel better, I don't mind."

The little boy knew what that meant: his massage was making Indigo feel better. Nodding quietly, he tossed himself back in, squeezing the skin beneath the sock within his arms. She slowly stretched herself out on the cushions, revealing the rest of her sole to the air; the worn material of her sock was darker and thinner near her heel. Blake kept holding on, now squeezing into the arc of her foot. His increased strength didn't just let him survive her footsteps; it let his friend feel his touch more intensely.

He felt something nudge the back of his neck. Looking backwards, his face with the overpowering big toe of her other foot - but now, just tapping him affectionately. Almost snuggling him. He heard his friend whispering above: "Here comes the fooo~ooot!" What was once a fear-inducing echo was now affectionate and... almost soothing.

To the background of Blake's continued motion, Indigo slowly fell asleep. The miniature mage didn't notice until he looked up, and saw her eyes shut - shoulders slouched back on the cushion. It was still unreal. She was still unbelievably huge, overwhelmingly powerful... But he wasn't scared. Her body stretched out like a slumbering mountain range, but - it was still Indigo, despite everything. In this gigantic room, he felt safe.

She shook her head, trying to dismiss her stupid, irrational anger towards Aria, but it still hung at the back of her mind. She's overstepping her boundaries, and it would be really disrespectful to both her and Blake if she acted all surly over it. Sighing, she look back to the cute, tiny boy in her hands, who was watching her intently. Sensing that it was his time to speak, he prepared himself to admit something to her.

His heart was beating hard in his chest, and visions of Indigo's worn socks and playful toes passed through his mind. Even aside from his burgeoning foot fetish, why was he acting so anxious around her? He only felt like his around...around...!

Indigo beamed at him. God, this was the luckiest day of her life! Blake, shrunk down in her hands, not just tolerating her feet, but telling her how much he wants to be with them. He was so teeny, so loving, so adorable—!!!

She couldn't stop herself from laying a deep kiss on his face, her lightly-glossed lips swallowing up his entire head. She kept it up for almost half a minute before she realized that he'd probably suffocate if she didn't stop. She parted the kiss with a pop, leaving Blake stunned in her hand. He hadn't moved or reacted at all when she planted that big, wet one on him. Worry swept over her thoughts as she asked, "Hey, Blake...are you okay?" The shrunken mage could only manage a squeak, his face as red as a tomato. Indigo soon matched him.

"I-I'm s-sorry, Blake," she muttered, "That was out of line—"

Her apology was cut short as she saw him fall to his knees in her hand. At first she panicked, thinking that he fainted, but soon enough she felt the same soothing sensation she felt when Blake massaged her feet. He had started to hug her fingers, nuzzling up to them. But below that blue shirt of hers...absolutely not. Underneath Indigo's dark purple skirt were rear end and her...lower regions, protected by sapphire-colored panties, and being caught in an expedition of a giantess's undies would surely land Blake in a whole heap of trouble.

12333222.title: Exploring Indigo

choices: He continues to rub her feet and tries to figure out why he likes her feet
Climb into her socks to be with her bare feet
123332223.content: Another thought entered his mind. Blake gazes down the body of Indigo and is filled with a strange desire to go back to her feet. His legs doing the walking for him he cannot think as to why he would want to return after everything yet he felt compelled to go. Soon going back down the body of his sleeping classmate he passes her socks and soon is face to sole with Indigo's feet. The cool night air causing her feet to cool off and the sweat to dry, both on her socks and on Blake as well. Blake's own body smelled of Indigo's feet and maybe it was the scent that was causing him to want to go back? To familiarity? He shakes his head and gazes at the giant pair of soles before him and finds himself blushing, not because of what happened... but .. because of something else. Some part of him was telling him... he liked what he saw. Was telling him he liked.. Indigo! But.. that's crazy.. he did this for Aria not for her! Was he really starting to have feelings for Indigo... or more specifically.. her feet? Blake shakes his head to try and push away the thought. As he looks forward he finds he is still in front of Indigo's feet. With his face beet red he sighs and thinks of what to do, his mind trying to wrap his head around why he is suddenly interested in Indigo's feet. His mind comes up with a few ideas of what to do some making them embarrassed.
123332223.title: The feet of the goddess

choices: Sleep in her sock with her toes
Indigo pins Blake under her foot in her sleep
1233322231.content:
Blake's mind raced as he thought of what he was doing. He looked at the massive sole in front of him and tried to rationalize what he was feeling. Again in his contemplation, he notices his legs moving on their own, moving him towards her sole. HIs hands lift again and he presses into the soft sock fabric. The sock is no longer damp, now simply dry and warm. The fibers of the wall in front of him gave way easily under his presses. It was now he realized just how much details he could take in at this size.

Indigo must have had a sort of lavender lotion on her feet that gave them a flowery scent, however, it did nothing to hide the sweaty scent of hours of being at school. While the fibers of the sock were soft, they were, at his size, slightly fuzzy. Whether that was by design or something that happened over time, the sock was now fuzzy with bits of the sock frayed and threatening to come loose at the threads. Hidden underneath, he could feel a vast warmth that he could rationally deduct was Indigo's heel. The thickest part of her foot was surprisingly soft. Given his experience, with the rest of his classmate's foot, he knew just how soft her foot was. Despite her monstrous stomps and crushes, his body melded perfectly into indigo's soft socked soles. Blake was unsure if he had Indigo's foot care habits or her socks to thank for his assisted survival. He sighed and breathed in the stale scent of cheesy sweaty feet around him.

It was comforting surprisingly. Despite what he had just gone through, he felt as if he was somehow attracted to these mighty soles of his classmate. They have an inexplicable warmth and exude sheer power.Maybe this is some type of Stockholm Syndrom. Blake thought to himself. It had to be. Blake continued to rub the giant soles. They towered over him and he felt some strange desire to be with them. Thet he needed to be here.

This is getting weird. Blake thinks to himself.Besides I... I still have to get to... Aria. Blake looks at his friend's feet once more and saw their giant fuzzy selves. Blake sighed and rubbed his eyes, his rubbing and service making himself tired.
1233322231.title: Foot Rubs for the Sleepy Giantess

choices: Hide on the pack of gum
124.content:
Adjacent to Indigo's book bag, Blake saw what looked to be an open bag of candies. Perhaps he could yell from a handful of sweets to get her attention...but then he'd risk being eaten. In the cubby of her desk, the tiny mage noticed a pack of spearmint gum...maybe he could climb up there and try not to be chewed?

So, what'll it be?
124.title: Sweet Success

choices: Tries to stay in her mouth
Lets himself be taken down into his friend's belly
Calls out to Indigo one last time and she hears him
1241.content: Blake decided that if he were to stand atop of the gum, it wouldn't end well for him. At least with the life savers they would at least melt without being chewed. At least.. he hoped Indigo was that kind of person. He stands among the top of the small candy spire and shouts to Indigo. He shouts and he shouts but it appears to fall on deaf ears as Indigo listens to the lesson and focus on writing than to the tiny mage by her sweets. Blake sighs and sits to ponder of a new plan, not bothering to move. He could keep climbing her shirt to her desk.. but that might be more risky... he could go behind her bu- hey! Blake suddenly snapped back to reality when he felt the warm, soft, but firm embrace of Indigo's hand. He tried to struggle but he could not move at all. He looked up to see Indigo listen to the lesson, not even bothering to look down at her sweets... her meal. Blake tried to call out but was too shocked to do anything. By the time he had worked up the nerve to call out. Indigo had dropped him and the saver onto her tongue.. and sealed her lips. Blake saw the light disappear from the fleshy maw. He could faintly see the outline of teeth and could feel the softness of the tongue underneath him.It felt.. nice for some reason. Like a waterbed except alive. In an instant Blake felt what felt like thick water surround his feet. He looked down and saw it was actually Indigo's saliva! "Ewww..." he said disgusted. He barely had time to react to what happened next Indigo started to swish Blake and the candy around her maw, licking and sucking on the sweet treat. At first Blake was terrified but something... made it feel... better? He snapped out of it as he literally swallowed some of Indigo's spit "Ugh I've heard of swapping spit but this is ridiculous" He then realized how sweet her spit was due to the candy and as much as he hated to admit it to himself, it tasted ... nice. Then there was another shift. Blake was spun around and landed on his back looking up at the palette of her mouth. He rolled over and saw the entrance to her throat, he blushed brightly seeing how close he was to being a tiny morsel for his friend. He felt Indigo's tongue move underneath him. A pool of saliva was pooling towards the back of her mouth. She was getting ready to swallow! Thinking quickly, Blake ...
1241.title: Hide in the candy bag

choices: Indigo burps out Blake on accident
12412.content:
Blake blushed. Everything in his body was telling him to get out. To escape. But he couldn't. He didn't want to. He realized that just as Indigo's great tongue lifted and then -*Gluck*- He was swallowed. Or in the process of it. Indigo's throat muscles seized the shrunken boy and pulled him down Indigo's throat. He slid right past Indigo's beating heart and heavy lungs, the sounds of Indigo all around him. He even heard, and felt, the grumbling below him. His destination, Indigo's stomach. The tiny mage, slipped head first into the valve, then into the cavernous belly. Blake slid down one of the walls and got up, wiping off the spit and mucus on him. He stood still, blushing. He was inside Indigo. This sort of things only happened in cartoons, but this... this was all so real. It is real! Blake continued to gaze at the ceiling and walked towards the belly's walls. The entire room or cave was alive, literally. Everything was moving and making sounds. The sound of Indigo's heart beating softly in the distance and the gurgles of the space he was in, attempting to break down this small snack.

Indigo was trying to save this candy for a bit longer, but her mouth was full of saliva. She positioned it away from her throat to only swallow the spit and eventually see what kind of candy it was. As she was about to swallow, the candy slipped down her tongue and was swallowed with her spit. "Oop... whoops.. oh well," Indigo said, not too concerned. She'd hopefully find another piece like that. As she tried to go back to work... she couldn't help but trace where that candy was going. She felt it. It slid down her throat, smoothly, creating a tiny lump in her throat as it sank. She felt it pass into her chest then slide into her stomach. She rested a hand on her covered belly. "Hmm.... odd"

Meanwhile, inside of Indigo, Blake was starting to get concerned. Things had already started to digest and melt already. He was starting to wonder if this was a good idea.
12412.title: Lets himself be taken down into his friend'...

124123.content:
Feeling a soft gurgle coming from her shirt-covered belly, Indigo tried rubbing it to calm things down in there. However, this only resulted in the rumbles intensifying steadily, until...

*BURP!*

Inside the stomach, Blake felt his prison shake a bit as something built up...maybe from the Lifesaver candy? Bubbles of all sizes floated out of the boiling green lake, some smaller than Blake, others much bigger. This could be his ticket out of here! With little else to cling onto, the tiny mage took a leap of faith and was taken in by one of the larger bubbles, rising up Indigo's throat with it. He dared not move too much as he was carried toward his giantess friend's mouth, fearing that one mistake could pop his vessel and spell certain doom.

With a fist to her mouth, Indigo managed to stifle a belch before feeling something land on her tongue. It didn't feel at all like the candy she'd swallowed...in fact, it didn't taste like candy at all! The Asian introvert spat the unfamiliar object covertly into her palm, then took a closer look at it.

"Blake..?!" Indigo reacted. Despite her shock, she kept her voice down so as to avoid disrupting class. "How...what in the world happened to you?"

"I-I can explain..." Blake stammered, shaking as much saliva off of his puny body as possible. "I'm a mage...I made a deal with spirits to become tough so I could impress Aria...but I ended up shrunk as payment."

Indigo stared at the shrunken boy in her hand. He always was a little unusual to her, seeming like he was up to something. But all he wanted was to win Aria's heart. Despite how surreal the circumstances were, she couldn't argue with the fact that Blake was now half an inch in size and standing atop her palm.

"Wow..." Indigo finally said. "I...I knew you were different, Blake, but...this is a real eye-opener."

"Gosh...uh..." Blake blushed. "Th-thanks..."

"I wish I could help you get to Aria, but right now I need to get back to work. In the meantime, I'll keep you..."
124123.title: Escape and Clarification

choices: Indigo forgets about him and swallows him... again..
Someone saw her put Blake in her mouth!
She takes him out at the end of class.
12412322.content:
Indigo thinks back for a moment and remembers how she accidentally swallowed Blake. How she though he was a delicious candy. In her own deviance she would solve two problems with one solution. "I'm going to put you in my mouth!" She says smiling down at the tiny mage. Blake is shocked and recoils a little, he had just gotten out of there. He didn't necessarily want to go back in either.

"Uh.. are you sure that's safe. Not to be mean but... last time I was in there you... ate me.."

"That's because I didn't know that was you in there. Now I know and I won't swallow you." She of course left out that she accidentally swallowed him when she intended to swallow some spit but he didn't have to know that part. "You'll be safe I promise. I won't hurt you. And if I do swallow you again I promise to get you out. Okay?" Blake stares at her for a few minutes before sighing

"Alright.. I hope it doesn't take too long though..." He says meekly. Indigo smiles and squeals quietly. She glances around and make sure no one has been watching. She grabs Blake and lowers him towards the candy bag. Just before Blake can ask what she's doing she pulls him back up and promptly places him in her mouth. Blake then realizes she was pretending to go back into her snack bag to make it less conspicuous. Inside Indigo's maw is her long wiggly tongue. Blake's hands again sink into the familiar slimy muscle causing him to groan and blush softly. Indigo lets out a small satisfied moan and smiles gently rubbing her tongue back on Blake. Blake sighs as he is subsequently tossed around, albeit more gently as before, blushing as he realized Indigo was enjoying his flavor. He simply grumbles and lets her toy with him, figuring there wasn't much point struggling.
12412322.title: Back in Indigo's Mouth

choices: Spit it out and have a look
1242.content:
Blake hatched a plan in his head: he would climb up onto a stick of gum and wait for Indigo to pick him up before trying to get her attention. Smiling, he scaled the pack and made his way onto a piece, smelling the freshness of spearmint. It would seem, however, that Blake had miscalculated Indigo's ability to multitask.

Indigo reached into her desk and plucked out a stick of gum, needing something to chew and suck on. The Asian girl then popped it in her mouth and began to chew, crushing the piece of gum into a glob again and again with her lips closed.

Blake's smile faded as he realized the horrible truth: he was too small for Indigo to see him, let alone hear him! Upon being deposited in the giantess's mouth, the tiny boy slipped onto her slimy tongue, getting soaked all over his puny body. Even if he wanted to escape, the lips behind Blake closed, trapping him in the darkness of Indigo's mouth. The massive, pearly-white teeth then came down on him and the gum, and the mage feared the worst...

...but he didn't die. The molars didn't even hurt Blake as they crushed him -- he was almost like a Jolly Rancher, squishing slightly but not being broken. Still, he was now covered in minty, sticky gum and unsettled as heck.

After the typical half-hour of class, Indigo kept chewing and noticed a slightly unusual taste in her little treat. What will she do?
1242.title: Blake-flavored gum

12422.content:
Not about to spit her gum out in the middle of class, Indigo used her tongue to flick it all back into her throat, swallowing it down with an awkward gulp. Feeling a small lump slide down her throat and vanish past her bosom, the Asian girl shrugged off the odd taste the gum had...until she started to feel a slight cramp in her abdomen. She softly rubbed its flat, soft surface.

Helpless to fight fate, Blake and the gum that covered his body were slowly squeezed down Indigo's tight throat before being forced through a tighter sphincter and landing with a wet plop on the floor of her hot, slimy stomach. The walls pulsated slightly, and a nearby green lake bubbled with gastric acids, ready to digest the tiny mage.

Shaking off all of the gum coating that he could, Blake rushed over to the nearest stomach wall and pounded repeatedly on it, screaming for help.

Will Indigo notice this?
12422.title: Indigo's Stomach

Ruby ignores the noise and goes to class
Ruby unwarily steps on Blake, but he survives
Blake hitches a ride in Ruby's backpack

Blake's eyes widened as he saw a gigantic figure walking in his direction -- red and white cheer uniform, blonde hair, red pumps...

"Ruby!" Blake panicked mentally.

Sure, Ruby was a decent girl, and quite an accomplished cheerleader...but Blake did NOT want to face the risk of becoming her eternal tiny plaything. Despite hiding a gentle heart under her modest demeanor, Ruby would likely spell trouble for the tiny mage.

Then again, she could very well be Blake's only chance of winning Aria's heart. With this little perk in mind, Blake yelled and waved for the cheer captain's attention.

Next...
13.title: Ruby, the Cheer Captain

131.content:
Ruby paused as she walked through the vacant halls of Opal High. She could've sworn she heard something, but...why doesn't she see anyone?

Then she heard them again. Tiny screams! Ruby looked down and was surprised at what she found.

"Blake?!" Ruby reacted, her eyes wide with shock. "Is that you?" She then scooped up the tiny boy into her hand.

"Yeah..." Blake sighed.

"How did you get so tiny?"

"Well...uh..."

What will Blake do?
131.title: Found by the Cheerleader

choices: She understands, and helps him look for Aria
1311.content:
"To be truthful, Ruby..." Blake sighed, not wanting to lie to a friend of his. "I'm a mage. I made a deal with ghosts to try and toughen myself up, so I could impress Aria...but I ended up shrunken as payment."

The cheerleader stared blankly at the tiny mage in her palm for a good minute, apparently unsure how to respond to this situation. Was she upset? Would she be understanding of his feelings?
1311.title: Honesty is the Best Policy

13111.content:
"Oh, I see..." The cheerleader frowned, giving a good hint that she's quite upset with Blake.

"W-Wait...are you upset...?" Blake nervously asked.

"You bet I am upset!" Ruby closed her hand around Blake's body with only his head visible. "Why couldn't you impress me!? I'm the most popular cheerleader in this school! Heck, I might be even the most beautiful girl in the town!"

"Exaggerate a bit much..." Blake thought to himself before his body being tighten up. "B-But I didn't know you like me..."

"I do...sometimes. But since you like Aria a lot, then maybe I WON'T take you to her." Ruby grins at the now scared mage."Maybe I should just get rid of you that nobody will notice your disappearance...perhaps eating you will do the trick"

Blake was sweating a lot when she licks her lips, this cheerleader is going to get rid of him and won't be able to see Aria ever again! He is at the mercy of Ruby, too frightened to use magic...All he can do now is to wait for someone to help him.
13111.title: Angry Cheerleader

choices: Yes, could he be puked up?
131111.content:
Too terrified to escape using magic, Blake was tossed into the dark cave of Ruby's mouth, instantly being coated in saliva. The cheerleader's pink tongue tossed the tiny mage around his prison as Ruby kept her lips closed to prevent her snack from getting away. Blake's eyes widened with horror when he was flicked into the lightless abyss of Ruby's throat, swallowed whole with a swift gulp. On the outside, Ruby gave her trim belly a few gentle pats, happy that her little problem was taken care of.

Blake was squeezed through a tight sphincter before finally landing with a wet plop in the depths of Ruby's stomach. It smelt of cereal in here, and it felt almost as hot as a sauna. The walls pulsated steadily, and a nearby greenish lake bubbled with acids. Fearing for his life, the puny mage ran to the nearest wall and pounded on its fleshy surface repeatedly, yelling for help.

Does it work?
131111.title: Cheerleader Chow

1312.content:
Blake ultimately decided that it was best if Ruby didn't learn the truth.

"To be honest...I don't remember," Blake fibbed, "I must've passed out in school at some point and just woke up this size."

"Wow..." Ruby replied, believing his lie. "It's just amazing that I have a tiny boy in the palm of my hand right now! But I imagine it's tough being small...I'd better hide you..."
1312.title: Lying to the Cheerleader

13121.content:
Ruby was many things - pretty, playful, perhaps even practical, but she was through-and-through a blonde. Her ditzy mind quickly thought about where to hide Blake, but remembering her cheer uniform had no pockets, she could only think of one place to hide you... "I'd better hide you... in my mouth! No one will ever think to look for you there, and you'll be safe all day! It's perfect!" Blake brought his palm to his face. No one was looking for him in the first place, which was part of the problem... And where did she get the idea that-

With no further ado, Ruby quickly brought Blake face-to-mouth, the rushing G forces bringing Blake to his bottom before its glory. He watched as her recently cherry chap sticked lips pulled apart to reveal a dark pink tongue, salivating for his arrival. Apparently Ruby was subconciously looking forward to this, as a large thread of saliva connected the roof of her mouth, before collapsing down with a splash as her tongue slithered out of her mouth. Blake was unceremoniously dumped onto the tip of her ruby red tongue, which quickly retreated into its dank cave.

Inside, Blake was assaulted by a steamy and smelly atmosphere, surrounded by saliva. The minty smell of toothpaste had begun to wear off after Ruby's breakfast, leaving behind the smell of milk and cereal as aftertones to the spearmint. The saliva quickly covered the boy, coming from below and above, soaking him in their smell and taste. A bit quickly got in his mouth - tasting quite like it smelled - and while the taste wasn't as terrible as he was expecting, this wasn't how he wanted to get his first kiss. He was then thrown about the mouth as Ruby took off running - she realized she was late, and had to hurry.

Unfortunately for Blake, this thought quickly took hold of the ditzy cheerleader's mind, and soon she forgot about his situation in her mouth. In fact, due to her cheerleader's typical addiction to gum, she was used to having tiny things like Blake in her mouth, and soon she was subconciously toying with his body as she ran towards...
13121.title: "...in my mouth."

choices: ...gulped Blake down to the depths of her throat!
,,,spat Blake out covertly into her palm!
...tried to hide Blake under her tongue!
131211.content:
Blake's body bounced from cheek to cheek. Every second he felt he could have a break, Ruby pushed him somewhere else within the cereal-scented caverns. Part of it was from her pumps pounding against the floor; each of the continuous steps sent him flying up. Her duties as a cheerleader gave her excellent agility, and that translated to her tiny prisoner as a sensation of nearly flying in her mouth, feet lifting off the ground, scarcely a thing to hold onto.

But even if she weren't so fast, her tongue's subconscious motions were enough to subdue him on their own. The pink behemoth grasped him, pushed him, poked him, prodded him, brushed its buds roughly against his torso, pinned him to different spots of muscle, and coated him with the girl's sweet fluids. The most flexible muscle on the body - Blake had heard it before, but this was undeniable proof. He screamed for help. Nothing. Nobody could tell he was in there. Caught in the jaw of a cute classmate. Hidden helplessly behind her molars and makeup.

The door to science class swung open with a conspicuous THUD. The students' heads turned in perfect synchronization to the entrance; a panting silhouette took the frame, leaning against the side. Sweat formed around Ruby's blonde bangs. Part of it was a result of her dash to get back into class; but more formed from embarrassment at the classroom's gaze. There were times she loved being the center of attention, encouraging emotions in others - cheer practice, sports events. The middle of a lesson was not one of those times.

Mariella Weiss, the teacher, broke the silence: "Ruby! What an unexpected surprise. Whatever brings you here?"

This woman's stare was hard for anyone to read. And if the cheer captain opened her mouth, she'd reveal Blake to the world... Ruby could only respond with a simple shrug, before scurrying to her desk. The staring eyes didn't stop. She hastily pulled out her workbook, placing it upright on the table - hoping to hide her face. It'd provide her internal passenger an extra layer of disguise - not to mention hide her rosy blush. Her anxiety made her teeth chatter gently.

CHOMPCHOMPCHOMP

The fog forming around Blake's glasses from her shallow breathing was the least of his concerns. In fact, he was almost relieved to have blurry vision; the vistas inside Ruby's mouth were too much for him to handle all at once. The folds across her mouth's roof, in an even pattern, coated with liquid stalactites of saliva that could nearly drown him... The glisten of her perfectly-straight teeth, and the soft gums holding them in place... And worst of all, the gaping, pitch-black path of her throat, leading down to the gurgling depths of her stomach! None of those sights would do anything for his quaking shoulders or intense heartbeat.

At the same time, he couldn't ignore the situation. After her run ended, there was a brief moment of stillness within his cavernous prison. In that fleeting moment, he felt hope. The dizziness ended. He could start to feel where his body ended and Ruby's began again. A bit of light formed beneath his black shirt.

Then, her teeth started moving.

The mage barely had time to realize he was resting on Ruby's left molar before the top one closed on him. The maxilla squeezed him down with a quick, brisk push, flattening him against the smooth, hard texture. Why? Why had the towering blonde's mind jumped to THIS as a hiding space?

The pressure left his body as suddenly as it came down. He quickly rubbed over his shrunken chest and toothpick-like legs, Her chomp had torn into his clothing, but there was no damage to his skin. In fact, there wasn't even a dent! The spirits, for all their trickery, had done wonders for his minuscule body's strength and endurance.

Soon, he felt the wall of gigantic teeth falling on him again. It crushed his arm against his torso, before lifting again. And falling, this time pressing hard into his leg. And raising, lifting him slightly from the enamel platform, effortlessly flipping his body over. And squeezing down, this time into his back. Rapidly, the teeth descended and ascended, chattering, chewing him.

He held his arms out, hoping to push back against the constant pressure. If he could just remind Ruby he was in there, maybe she'd stop subjecting him to this careless cruelty. He felt his hands touch her tooth, some saliva slipping into the folds of his palm. Tensing his muscles, he endured her jaw's crushing weight, clenching his own teeth. He was doing it. He was making this happen. The enormous cheer captain could feel his movement.

Unfortunately, Ruby's mind was now caught up in the science lesson. Well, that, and doodling idly in her workbook. She heard it helped concentration. Much like chewing gum. Speaking of which, there was a gentle pressure at the side of her mouth. Without even thinking, she chewed down hard on it, mouth being very used to handling little snacks like that. The little squelch it made brought her spirits up ever-so-slightly. She chomped again, only half conscious of her actions. Ms. Weiss finished off her lecture; the students' hands grasped their pencils and pens, ready to start an exercise. All the while, the instructor walked between the seats, ready to answer questions.

Her curious tongue poked at the side of her mouth, interested in the texture and shape of this snack. Odd - it was softer than she was used to, but her chewing didn't seem to change its shape like gum wads, or tear it apart like candy bears. It brushed over the morsel once again, feeling distinct limbs. But compared to most candies she had shaped like that, these ones were longer, thinner, and tasted vaguely salty...

It crashed down onto her blonde head all at once. Blake! He was still in there! Her head shook suddenly, and she desperately moved her tongue around, trying to get her shrunken friend out. Before she had time to react, her bright eyes were facing her teacher's face. The woman was standing before her, hand on her lab-coated hips, eyes pinned to the movement in Ruby's cheeks.

"Is that a piece of gum?" She asked.

Ruby shook her head, flinging Blake left and right. She could feel the impact of his teensy, soft body against her cheeks.

Ms. Weiss sighed. "I don't wish to project the image of a disciplinarian. Your well-being and future are my priorities. I just wish you would treat it as seriously as I did."

The student fidgeted, feeling her head burning up, Humming nervously, she went back to her workbook, answering a question.

Crossing her arms, the teacher grumbled: "I'm not blind. Spit it out."

This was an impasse. Reveal Blake to the world? Or face the wrath of her teacher? Ruby wished quick thinking was her strong suit. Shutting her eyes, she...
131211.title: A classroom.

choices: Ruby asks to use the bathroom
1312111.content:
Ruby sweated nervously as she debated what to do with her tiny prisoner. In the end, the cheerleader used her tongue to fling poor Blake backward into the depths of her throat, swallowing him down with a delicate gulp.

"Nothing in my mouth, Ms. Weiss," Ruby finally said.

"I've got my eye on you, young lady..." Mariella flatly replied.

The cheer captain returned to her assignment, answering another question in the workbook, when the full weight of her actions suddenly fell upon her. All the color drained from Ruby's face.

Blake was squeezed through a tight sphincter before at last falling onto the squishy floor of Ruby's stomach. It smelt of breakfast in here, and it was difficult to see much in the darkness. The walls pulsated steadily, and a nearby greenish lake bubbled with digestive fluids. Understandably, the tiny mage panicked, ran to the nearest fleshy wall, and repeatedly yelled to his cute captor for help.

Ruby put a dainty hand to her belly, worrying for her shrunken friend who would be dissolved into nutrients for her teenage body if she didn't get him out soon. She needed an excuse to puke him out without revealing his secrets, and she needed one NOW!
