stuff him in her top, surely no one would be looking there
1312112.content:
Ruby lowered her head behind her propped up text book and loudly spit her little passenger into the palm of her hand which she immediately clenched into a fist around him, now she just needed to think of another hiding spot. "Don't think that you can just pretend to spit it out" Mrs. Weiss's voice broke into Ruby's thoughts. Ruby startled, and looked up at Mrs. Weiss, she opened her mouth to show that it was empty. Mrs. Weiss peered at Ruby, "very well, now lets make sure we don't need to do this again." Mrs. Weiss then returned to teaching the class.
Blake squirmed in Ruby's protective fist, he knew she was trying to be helpful but now he was just being crushed in her hand and covered in her spit, although, it was better than her mouth. Still, Blake tried to call out to Ruby but couldn't really get enough air to shout with how tightly she was squeezing him. Meanwhile Ruby had thought of what to do with Blake now to avoid another close call. She would...
1312112.title: ,,,spat Blake out covertly into her palm!

choices: Ms. Weiss chews Blake until lunch
Ms. Weiss spits Blake into the trashcan immediately
1312113.content:
Ms. Weiss tapped a high-heeled foot impatiently. Wanting to get rid of the visible bulge in her cheek, Ruby attempted to surreptitiously move her tiny passenger from her molar to a safe spot under her tongue. Blake watched in horror as the pink leviathan reared up, moving to the rear of the blonde’s mouth and settling there like a frozen pink tidal wave. The tiny mage wondered what she was up to, as he attempted to adjust his saliva-soaked glasses. Before he could roll into the safe space between Ruby’s cheek and gums, the cheerleader’s tongue rushed forward like a striking snake. The tough muscle smashed into him like a linebacker, sweeping him off his feet. Blake landed with a splash into the small space under the cheerleader’s tongue. His pink tormentor came to rest on top of him, smothering him under its mass. It felt like a whale had just belly-flopped on top of him. There was even less air under the confines of her tongue than in the rest of her mouth. Blake tried to take shallow breaths, but the oxygen was quickly running out, and the little that was left to breathe was as hot as a furnace.

Confident that she had successfully hidden her tiny stowaway, Ruby gave Ms. Weiss her most brilliant megawatt smile. She didn’t want to actually say anything, lest she reveal the miniscule mage to the class. However, the nonplussed teacher wasn’t buying the cheerleader’s attempts at innocence. Ruby wasn’t the first student to try to get away with a contraband action, and she certainly wouldn’t be the last. Ms. Weiss knew that once you let one student get away with wrongdoing, then the rest of the class will be sure to follow suit. She couldn’t bear the thought of allowing one of her students to be corrupted by the dark forces of misbehavior; she simply loved her students too much to let that happen. Plus, her mouth still tasted like coffee and she really wanted a piece of gum.

Stepping over to the side of Ruby’s desk, Ms. Weiss leaned over and brought her face close enough to her student that their noses were almost touching. Captivated by her teacher’s entrancing eyes, Ruby involuntarily pursed her lips and swallowed as Ms. Weiss slid her hand onto the cheerleader’s ruby-red cheek. Mariella’s smooth skin felt cool and soothing against Ruby’s burning hot flesh. Up close, Ruby realized why all the male students were in love with the science teacher. The woman’s elegant features were enough to take anyone’s breath away. Poor Blake, however,felt his breath being taken away from the change in air pressure as his giant hostess drained all the saliva in her mouth down the pit of her throat. Thankfully, due to his position at the root of Ruby’s tongue, Blake was saved from joining the saliva rushing down the cheerleader’s throat like a sticky waterfall. His brief respite was short-lived, however, as the salivary glands at his feet began to work overdrive to refill the mouth with their thick excretions. The sweet saliva began to pool around him, like a pit of hungry quicksand. With the heavy tongue hanging over his head, Blake could only just keep his head above the rising tide. While he know knew that he could survive being chewed, he wasn’t sure how long he could go without oxygen.

“You know what they say about chewing gum in class,” Ms. Weiss said, in her most seductive voice. “You better bring enough for the whole class.”

Ruby’s lips parted at hearing those words. She had some gum in her bag, if she could just reach down and grab it--

Her thoughts were interrupted as Ms. Weiss quickly closed the final inch in distance between their faces and brought her lips into contact with Ruby’s mouth. Blake could sense the change in air pressure as Mariella’s lips sealed against her student’s oral cavity. He looked up, only to see a probing tentacle enter his temporary abode. This pink intruder swept along Ruby’s teeth, sweeping back and forth as if searching for something.

Ruby felt an intense rush of pleasure as her teacher’s tongue plunged into her mouth. It was her first kiss… but it felt so good. So good, in fact, that her own tongue rose to meet Ms. Weiss’s. From Blake’s perspective, it looked like his guardian dragon had taken flight to do battle with the invading tongue. They twisted and twirled in the humid air, rubbing against each other the way a vine climbs a tree. It would seem that Ruby’s tongue had triumphed over its rival, because its pink nemesis dove to the floor of the cheerleader’s mouth like a crashing zeppelin. However, its tip was pointing right at the tiny mage’s chest. But instead of smashing into him like Ruby’s tongue did, this mystery person’s tongue gently pushed itself under Blake’s legs and lifted him onto its bumpy surface as smoothly as a child being carried into bed. The tip curled behind him, rubbing his back and securing him on the ride. Fear gripped the tiny mage as he realized he was headed into an unknown person’s mouth. He took one last look back at Ruby’s quickly receding mouth as he was soon squeezed between two sets of wet lips. Blake now knew how toothpaste feels when it gets squeezed out of the tube.

Like a magical carpet ride, the tongue gently settled into its owner’s mouth. The change in atmosphere was apparent immediately. This person’s mouth was slightly bigger, and something glinted in the back of the mouth, atop the molars. It was close to the dark throat, with its dangling uvula.

What kind of metal could be in a person’s mouth? I didn’t see any braces on the way in, Blake though to himself. Oh yeah! Fillings used to be made with mercury and have a metallic appearance! Thus, he must be in the mouth of someone older than a student, probably a teacher. But what class could she be in now? Before the mage could try and recall Ruby’s schedule, the tongue reared up and deposited him on the very molars he was just admiring. Like a guillotine blade, the upper row of gnashing teeth crashed down on top of him. Once again, Blake was being chewed. He could see his own reflection in the filling. His nostrils were filled with an overwhelming scent of coffee.

“But I’ll let you go with just this piece,” Ms. Weiss said as she broke off the kiss with a wink. She walked away from her flustered student and began to pace the room once again. The students quickly dove into their notebooks, trying not to make eye contact with Ruby. However, their bright-red faces betrayed their true emotions.

Panic rose in Ruby’s throat as she could no longer feel the tiny mage within her mouth. Did she accidentally swallow him, or did he now belong to Ms. Weiss? Watching her teacher’s chomping jaws told her the answer. The poor boy, he had entrusted his life to her hands and she had already delivered him into danger. But lunch was next period, and she was soooooooo hungry.

What a strange taste, Ms. Weiss thought. It’s like an old gym sock. Is this what the kids are into nowadays? What’s wrong with peppermint?

Still, at least it would get rid of the coffee taste in her mouth. She had forgotten her own pack of gum in her car, so this would have to suffice for now. But she really wasn’t a fan of the taste.
1312113.title: Double your pleasure

13121131.content:
Ms. Weiss mashed the odd-tasting gum between her right molars, rolling it over slowly. A gentle flick of the tongue flipped Blake's minuscule frame over effortlessly. As easily as it had scooped him up, it twisted his body It lathered his teensy torso with saliva, right before the white ceiling crunched down on his back. Pain shot down his spine, feeling the enamel squeeze against his skin again and again.

Compared to Ruby's absent-minded chewing, this sent totally different sensations through the bespectacled mage. Though he couldn't identify the mouth's owner, her assault was quick, rhythmic, and harsh. The inside of his blonde friend's jaw was hell, to be sure. But she had some restraint to her squeezing. Ruby's brain wasn't fully aware of her actions, and what she was doing to the little thing - her chewing was slow. On the other hand, this teacher chomped like she was on a mission, as if there were something Blake had she needed to squeeze out of him. Every time he felt the crushing pain had numbed his senses, the unbreakable rows of teeth crushed a new joint between their combined force. And whenever he re-adjusted his glasses, staring back at his own reflection in the steel filling or white walls, the pink terror of a tongue pushed him somewhere new, leaving him unprepared for the next deafening descent.

And everywhere - no matter which new and uncomfortable angle his head had been forced into - it smelt. Her saliva, her teeth, her tongue, and the path to her esophagus - it all smelt like coffee. While not unpleasant, the odor permeated his nostrils, overriding his other senses. Every time he tried to regain the breath that this gigantic instructor stole from his lungs... Every time he tried to calm his racing heart rate with heavy breathing... Even when he tried to get enough air in his mouth to recite a spell... He just ended up choking on the morning drink. The familiar classroom chatter was drowned out by waves of wet sloshing and squelching.

A low groan emerged from the woman's vocal cords. The bitter taste of coffee still coated the roof of her mouth. This tiny gum wad wasn't doing much to help. She rested her still-moving lower jaw on one hand, looking over the class again. Some of the boys, still staring at her, tossed their heads back into the workbook quickly. Ruby didn't. Even as her hand was occupied with writing, her still-reddened face kept peeking back up to the front of the class, shooting a troubled gaze. The student's lashes twitched up and back down every few moments. It sometimes looked as if she'd raise her hand, before dejectedly resting her arm back on the table.

Mariella Weiss presently let her cheek sink down, looking at papers to mark. She could feel her jaw's motion against the side of her palm. Of course, the cheer captain was looking for sympathy. Subtly trying to make the teacher feel sorry. When said teacher was still in high school, and was caught doing something bad, she'd put on the same face. And after that long wrestle with her tongue, the girl was bound to be a little perturbed. Though the instructor felt a twinge of empathy, she also knew how dangerous it was to encourage that kind of manipulation. It would set a precedent.

So, out of love for her students, the woman at the front of the class made a point of chewing slightly harder. Her jaw made longer movements. Up, down. Up, down. No matter how odd this gum's flavor was, she wasn't going to let go of it. The chewing sound was almost audible from Ruby's seat - she visibly cringed with the hard chomps.

Blake's screams, tough, went unheard. The hysteric cries of pain were interrupted as a drop of the thick saliva traveled down into his throat. He sputtered it out clumsily before the next overwhelming compression against him. Now the taste of coffee was in more than just his nostrils.

It was as if the teacher's mouth had suddenly doubled in strength! He dropped many feet down, crashing into a slobbery surface. He found himself glued by the sticky spit to her lower row of teeth. Before a split-second passed, before he could even register the pain, it flew back up with speed that made it feel like his skin would tear off.

SCRUNCH

His whole body ached from the chewing. With teeth on either end of him, he barely had enough room to twitch an arm. When the lower wall of pearly whites fell, he'd been so tightly crunched that his body actually remained stuck on the steel-plated upper molar. The minute mage's eyes were granted a nearly landscape-like view of this foul ocean of a mouth. He had only a split second to see the active tongue, the glistening wetness that coated her lips, the crashing waves of liquid underneath, and a faint ray of light from the familiar, not-so-distant world of a classroom outside. It ended with another chew, applying thoughtless pressure to Blake's torso and back.

This, again, lasted only about a second before the cycle recommenced. He was caught in a continual cycle of chewing, pushed between moments of grueling compression and quick breaks to let the pain soak in. The sound of a tapping heel and etching pencil resonated outside, the only distractions he had from the fierce assault. His arms flailed out as if grabbing for a heavenly light - but whenever he made motion one way of the other, the mighty pink beast that a normal person would call a "tongue" tapped him, wrangled him, or scooped him up, dismissing him back into darkness.

He never thought he'd say this - but he wished deeply that he could be doing schoolwork like the rest of the class.

Mariella kept sloshing this odd-flavored piece of candy around, like a circular spin cycle. It was taking some time for the distinct taste to fade, no matter how unique it was. And still, the coffee taste wouldn't leave! She squeezed it against her left cheek, trying to get a sense of the texture. Light, stringy, but almost stiff. Taking that as a challenge, she inhaled and pressed down hard once more.

The mage nearly felt his heart stop. He felt the cutting force of her jaw all around him, grinding down as if wanting to split him in half. He pounded against the enamel to no avail. The force of her inward breath shifted the pressure so much, it made his cheeks turn green. He felt his glasses fog more, before his vision itself began to fade. Lost. He was losing himself against the terrific jaw. Even before meeting with the garbage, he was sure his lungs would collapse from the shifting wind currents that escaped down her gullet. That, or the fluids that dripped like stalactites from the roof above would drown him. He felt the wetness drip down his ears, and his neck, soaking his robes. Panting for air, he searched his mind for spells - failing that, for his captor's identity. Ms. Solar? What a tragedy - his chewer would never know what was in her mouth, and he would never know the owner of the axe-like teeth.

There was a sudden pause in the continual motion. Pressure lifted gently. He suddenly realized how wet his whole body was - dripping with dampness. For a while, he had trouble telling if his ears were ringing - but no, that noise came from OUTSIDE the gorge of her mouth. The lunch bell! Wasting no time to take advantage of her pause, he pounded both arms against the molar sitting atop him. His fists flew into the hard enamel, before he started pushing. With his greatly-increased strength, he was able to pry the teacher's grasp on him a little looser.

Yes! He gritted his own teeth, strength regained. Making it back to Ruby - or another person he trusted - might be hard, but that could wait. First, he just needed to get out of here...

The sound of heels clacking on the ground sounded out. Compared to his old captor, these were slow - almost tired. Oh, no. Nonono. This woman couldn't be leaving the class now! He struggled more desperately, using the slight rattling against him from each footstep to pry himself out further.

The force of gravity changed with every motion, but he kept forcing on the tooth ceiling with all his might. He was able to wiggle slightly. The odorous saliva he'd been coated in served as a lubricant of sorts, reducing his friction. Realizing this, he rubbed some more of the instructor's fluids across his body. It made his face green, sure - but also seemed to loosen him. Squirming more and more, and pressing back against an attempted chomp, he finally squeezed himself free!

But with the reduced friction, and the force of the teacher's hard teeth, he basically launched himself out. With a quick incantation, the miniature mage tried to take control of his flight path. His words were slurred by the gross, sticky spittle entering his mouth. He sputtered it out, and watched in horror as he flew...
13121131.title: Chewed up until lunch

choices: Mrs. Weiss succesfully captures the shrunken Blake
Ruby shoves Mrs. Weiss aside, snatches up Blake and takes off running
131211311.content: As a few magical words left Blake's mouth he was flung forward out of Mrs. Weiss's. Blake barely caught on miss Weiss's lips but tipped forward and tumbled over the front of Mrs. Weiss's shirt. Walked out of the classroom Mrs. Weiss nearly choked as the gum, seemingly for no reason, fired out of her mouth, but she caught a glimpse of it as it fell forward and she couldn't believe what she saw falling away from her. Blake plummeted straight down, while he was unable to think of a spell to save him he grasped at the giantess's clothes as he fell past and was able to slow his tumble enough that when he hit the ground it was painful but not fatal. Just as Mrs. Weiss bent down to inspect the tiny form that had fallen to the floor at her feet the bell rang and suddenly a flood of students burst into the hallway as they made their way to their next periods. Mrs. Weiss searched the floor but it was difficult with all the students passing through, especially if she didn't want to draw attention to herself. After a minute of searching she caught a glimpse of the little figure pressed against the wall to avoid being trampled, Mrs. Weiss smiled to herself as she reached down to collect the little thing and...
131211311.title: Outside her lips

choices: She rushes to the ladies' room and throws up
She ignores the feeling and grabs some coffee
131211312.content:
Blake's eyes widened with horror as he found himself rocketing headfirst into the darkness of Mariella Weiss's esophagus. Perhaps due to his slurred speech from his science teacher's saliva, or just rotten luck...the tiny mage was swallowed down with an awkward gulp.

On the outside, Ms. Weiss felt her sweet treat suddenly plummeting down her gullet, swallowing the little thing by reflex. She rubbed her neck, struggling to get her candy all the way down, letting out a sigh when she felt the lump travel down past her chest, and into her gut.

Blake was forced through a tight sphincter before finally falling into the disgusting muck of Ms. Weiss's stomach. It smelt of her breakfast in here, and her body heat served to make the place feel almost like a sauna gone awry. The walls pulsated steadily, and a nearby greenish lake bubbled with acid -- a liquid that Blake wouldn't dare to even dip a toe in. Running to the nearest wall of his prison, the puny mage pounded on its fleshy surface repeatedly, yelling for help the whole time.

As she walked through the hallway toward the teachers' lounge, Mariella suddenly felt a bizarre sensation in her stomach -- almost like something she ate was alive and fighting for survival in there...
131211312.title: The Science Teacher's Stomach

13121132.content:
It had been barely thirty seconds when Ms. Weiss decided that she'd rather make do without gum than put up with this dumb new taste. Ms. Weiss didn't even pause in her lecture to the class as she paced by the garbage can and spat Blake into the bin. She didn't even notice that what she spat into the garbage wasn't gum and neither did the rest of the class, except for one pair of eyes that tracked the shrunken boy's descent.
Blake's landing in the trashcan probably would've been fatal if his fall hadn't been cushioned by crumbled papers and other refuse. Blake had some difficulty climbing to his feet in the unstable mess but as he did he found that he wouldn't be able to escape on his own as the garbage wasn't piled high enough for him to reach the edge of the trashcan. Blake found the least disgusting spot to sit in and try to think his way out of his current predicament. Blake hadn't made any progress yet when the bell rang to signal the end of class, however as students were rushing out of the room one peered directly into the trashcan. Blake looked up to see the face and descending hand of...
13121132.title: Ms. Weiss spits Blake into the trashcan immedia...

choices: Ruby forgets that she swallowed Blake
131212.content:
As Ruby arrived outside Opal High's athletic field, the other cheerleaders were surprised that she was so quiet today. It didn't seem natural. One of them even noticed a small budge moving around inside Ruby's cheek.

"Hey, Ruby," one of the girls, an African-American beauty, began to ask. "Don't you usually get rid of your gum before practice?"

The blonde was in a mental panic now. If she spat out Blake, his secret would be exposed! And she couldn't exactly instruct the others with her mouth full. So, Ruby let out a heavy gulp.

Blake was horrified when his captor's slimy tongue flicked him backwards and down into Ruby's tight esophagus. The tiny mage was unable to fight peristalsis and was helplessly shoved down the narrow tube and through a small sphincter before falling onto the spongy floor of Ruby's stomach.

Ruby, unable to rescue her internal prisoner in the middle of practice, began leading the cheer squad's routine, occasionally feeling slight cramps in her belly -- the struggles of tiny little Blake inside her. But she ignored these sensations as best as she could until practice came to an end.

Afterwards...
131212.title: Gimme a V! O! R! E!

choices: Ruby goes with her friends to eat
She decides not to go as her stomach is still bothering her
1312122.content:
Exhausted from such an exhilarating practice, Ruby started to gather her things to go home. All the while, these odd pangs tickled and bothered at her midsection, which confused her greatly.

"Ugh, what the heck is up with my stomach right now?" Ruby thought to herself as Blake threw a couple jabs at a fleshy, slimy wall. A resounding gurgle further puzzled the teenage girl and served to push Blake back, his body landing in a shallow pool of weak acids.

"Maybe I'm just hungry..." Ruby began to conclude. As if on cue, her friend, the same African-American girl from before, jogged over to her,

"Hey Ruby! Want to come with us and get something to eat?" A few more girls on the team were waiting to go as well.

"Oh my god, JUST LET ME OUT ALREADY!" Blake resumed his struggling efforts, cursing himself for trusting this absent-minded cheerleader and terrified of being crushed under the meal of a famished one fresh off of practice.
1312122.title: Ruby's Forgotten Snack

choices: Eat a ton - practice completely worked up her appetite
Eat a little - she's beginning to think hunger isn't the problem
Another jab from within jogs her memory right away
13121221.content:
The group of cheerleaders ride over to the local pizza place near the high school. All the while, Ruby tries her hardest to act like she's feeling completely fine, and save for the occasional weird stomach gurgle, she did a pretty good job keeping that up. Talking to her friends proved to be an effective distraction between her and her hunger pangs.

Only they're not just hunger pangs, they're mostly one shrunken mage boy named Blake, and since she's distracted from the one she's also not remembering the other!

"Come on!! Please!" Blake cried out. The less time he would have to spend inside this humid gastric cavern the better, especially since it was presumably about to become quite cramped...

When the girls arrive, what does Ruby decide to do?
13121221.title: ...Seriously Ruby?

choices: Yes, but will she try to help him?
131212211.content:
After ordering a couple medium pies, the cheerleaders sat at a booth near the window and chatted while their pizzas cooked. It only took minutes for the food to arrive -- talk about excellent service! Much to the other girls' surprise, Ruby, feeling especially hungry, dug right into her meal.

Blake kept pounding on the fleshy walls of Ruby's stomach, when suddenly something warm and cheesy fell right on him.

"Eww..." Blake reacted, before realizing the horrible truth: his captor was eating!

The tiny boy's organic prison quickly filled up with chewed-up pizza, and he tried to run and dodge the storm of masticated food, but in time, Blake was practically buried in the stuff. A loud gurgle shook the area, striking fear and panic into his heart.

While the other girls took their time to enjoy a slice or two each, Ruby had already devoured several slices. The blonde rubbed her satisfied belly with a smile, unaware of the hell her shrunken friend was enduring within. A soft growl was heard, and then...

*BURP!*

"Feeling better, Ruby?" The African-American girl asked her friend.

"Um, yeah..." Ruby blushed.

Struggling his way out of the food pile, Blake ran back to the stomach walls and pounded again, hoping to jog Ruby's memory and get her to puke him up. Unfortunately, it was not to be -- sickly green liquids seeped into his prison, eating away at his black shirt and irritating his skin. After mere moments of suffering from the acids, Blake blacked out.

...

Blake eventually awoke to a shocking sight: the outside world! Was he restored to normal? Was he free? ...Not quite. He tried to move around, but couldn't see or even feel any part of himself! The high-school boy was confused and scared.

After a fun day out with the cheer team, Ruby was driven home, waving to her friends before making her way into her house. Her parents were out for business, so she had the place to herself. Walking into her bedroom, the blonde set her belongings on the floor and stripped down to her crimson bra and panties, admiring herself in front of a mirror. For some reason, Ruby felt more energized than usual after her pizza meal. The cheer captain patted her belly happily.

Blake felt the force of Ruby's hand smacking him lightly, and it was a bizarre sensation. Then it dawned on him: he had been digested and absorbed into Ruby's abdominal muscles! The now-bodiless soul, unable to scream physically, tried to incite some movement to alert his unknowing consumer, but all Blake could manage was weak jiggling in the skin of her abs.

Does Ruby notice this?
131212211.title: Prisoner of Ruby's Abs

choices: "...Exercise, right? I gotta burn you out!"
1312122111.content:
"Huh? What's that?" She ran a hand gently across the area again, curious.

Success! Now he just had to find a way to communicate. With no mouth, Blake felt that his main option would be telepathy. His skills were rusty, but he had to try...

It took some time for the mage to concentrate. Every little gurgle and slosh from Ruby's stomach sent him shaking - thinking about the active, slimy tomb that encased his physical form. How long had he been churning in the waves, clutching to the mortal coil with sweaty, shivering palms? Had his family noticed he was missing - or sweet Aria...?

Chasing away the disturbing images, the mage pushed away an oppressive blob of muscular tissue. To think, this thing touching his formless shoulder was just a small part of Ruby's body, pulled by the strings of her subconscious thoughts. His vision was dark and fuzzy, but he could sense more. There were so much of the pinkish, wet mass around him. It was hard and exercised enough to push him idly as she wandered the halls - at the same time, soft enough that he felt his limbs and face sinking into the abdomens with each careless squeeze and twist. Or were his arms and legs just ghost sensations of body parts he once had, and had lost forever in the cheer captain's gut? Would he ever be able to hold a friend's hand again?

No. He needed to focus his magic - and connect his mind to Ruby, his current prison. Feel the slow drumming of her heart, pulsating across her. Sync his breathing pattern with hers. Let his mind fall away from the discomforting compression, bask into her fingers' twitching, heels touching the floor, eyelids blinking...

He breathed in deeply - unable to pick up much oxygen in the depths of his friend - and sent her a telepathic message: "Ruby, it's Blake."

Her neck twisted to look back, hair flopping over her slender shoulders. Blake? Here? On instinct, the blonde's arms snapped around her half-naked body and red undergarments. "Don't look! I'm not decent!"

The sudden movement made her whole body shake. Ruby's muscles squeezed him tighter, pushing his formless, minuscule body between the folds of her toned abs. The mage didn't need to hear her voice to know how surprised she was - the rapid, intense shivering through her stomach churned him further, and the throbbing through her veins and arteries cut into his brain. The most shocking thing, though, was her voice: how clear and powerful it was, against a background of bodily noises. He remembered these drips, breaths, and beats barely qualified as whispers to a normal person - when faced with these pipes, used to loud chants across fields, exerting power and energy even in its uncertain trembles.

To imagine Aria's sweet tones at this size...

Ruby spoke again, looking around: "Where are you? You can't just walk into my chambers without asking!"

"Your... Your abs, Ruby." He cringed, wishing he had something to cover his ears. "This is telepathy. You digested me, and - uh - I'm here."

The cheerleader stood still for a moment, scratching her scalp. "Waaait. You mean... Here?"

She poked at her torso. The cells struggled to fit themselves against the prodding finger, stretching and jiggling - and pulling their newest little speck of light into the transformation. He felt as if the whole world was being pulled into a black hole of all-consuming tension.

Within a second, her digit released. No answer. Curious, she then poked another segment of her abdomen. "Or here? This is freaky..."

"Please, no-!"

Again, the horrible jiggling started - compressing the boy into a metaphysical pancake. Just from a press, she had such easy control over him... He still felt the force against him after she let go.

"Oh, I know! Riiight here!" As predicted, this prod was on target! She could tell by his little mew as she pushed into her gut. Teasingly, the young woman spun her finger around, stirring it across the little field of flesh. "Hello there, Blake! I found you!"

Inside her, the little action was painful beyond comprehension! The mage's inaudible whimpers graduated to voiceless screams as he felt layers and layers of skin, fat, and muscle cells catch him in a red whirlpool. When he tried to push - a hard task, with no arms - he only felt the finger pushing back harder, squeezing him in place. He clutched and blindly groped, mind set on escape. "C-come on..."

Ruby giggled - despite her confusion, feeling a little bit of her passenger's movement was too much. "Ahaha, stop it! It tickles!" She switched from grinding to pinching - pressing hard on that warm spot in her abs.

This encased Blake in a cage of wobbling pink tissue that was tighter still. Despite not needing to breathe, he still felt as if he'd been deprived of oxygen by the strong walls, constricting everything and pushing it deep into him. When he stopped moving, it wasn't on command; he just had no space left to even tremble.

She let go - though not nearly soon enough for her digested snack. He didn't dare budge again, for fear of her index and thumb transforming the already-horrifying landscape into a tight cage of red once more. "Thank you kindly, sir. Now the question is, what are you doing down there in..."

It took her a good few seconds of silence for the day's events to come back. Finding her friend, putting him in her mouth, swallowing on reflex, spending lunch with her girlfriends without a clue about that odd tickle in her belly. Torturing that black-clad boy the whole time!... Disgusted with herself, she slammed a hand into her boiling forehead.

"Geez, this is sorta all my fault, isn't it? I wish you telekinected to me earlier!"

He spoke back through thought: "It's kinda hard with acid eating at you."

She got even redder, gently tapping her stomach in surprise. "Aw, what the heck was my body thinking? Digesting you like that... Bad stomach!"

She punched herself in the gut. The minuscule bit of muscle was pressed deep in by the sudden impact. It had enough strength to send Blake flying back. Another bit of the internal organs caught him, and catapulted him forward harshly. It created a tiny reverberation on the encasing layers of dermis, which Ruby spotted in her mirror. His whole body ached, but he had to keep concentrated to maintain the link.

He sent the titan a message: "D-don't beat yourself up over it. Seriously, please don't."

Rubbing the area she'd just struck, the blonde gulped. "You're right! I can't go on being such an idiot when you're in trouble!" She stepped a foot on the ground. Blake could sense a little of its impact wobbling across her, as if he was partly connected to the nerves across her legs. "We gotta stay positive! There's gotta be a way to push through this, if we keep smiling! Uh..." Now, he felt her heel rocking back nervously. "...Can you still smile in there?"

Blake felt for his mouth, only for his hands to slide through the incorporeal mass where it should have been. Like phantom limbs... He still felt dark bangs across his forehead, the frame of glasses on his ears, but nothing was there. "No. I don't have a face..."

In fact, it was easier to sense Ruby trotting along the floor, and picking something in her hand. A small cylinder. She brushed it across his spot on her abs, giving him another squeeze... It slid across the area in one long stroke, twisting his body, before finishing with two pokes. Even after it relaxed, he felt as if his remaining vision had become darker.

Hands on her hips, she grinned. "Alright, there you go! If you have X-Ray vision or something along with those brainy powers, try peeking out now!"

What had she done? How much did she know about his secret? He concentrated hard on the space before him, letting his mind traverse the mighty mass of muscular tissue...

Reflected in the mirror, Ruby stood huge and proud, an immovable statue of mirth and celebration. She had used a marker to scribble a tiny smiley face on herself, across the spot where he was trapped. With her quick breaths, it moved gently in and out. "Now you can smile, right?"

He sighed. Part of him felt like the girl wasn't taking this situation seriously enough. Like he should've just sprinted away when he saw her coming down the hall. He knew he'd be caught as the victim of her carelessness.

But despite that, she wasn't callous. To gain the position of cheer captain, she had to know how to - well - cheer people. Whether just below Blake's eye level, or high on the podium, he couldn't remember a moment when her smile was off. choices: ...And made clean it out of her mouth, completely safe!
...And crashed back into her soft tongue!
...And fell helplessly to the churning stomach acids below!
131321.content:
Ruby's eyes began flashing back and forth nervously at Aria's arrival. Blake took a moment to register the immense things' movement, seeing himself reflected in the dark ponds that consisted her pupils. He knew he was small, but actually SEEING himself staring back nervously, standing on a petite palm like it was a platform really put it into perspective.

With only a quick jolt below, something totally different replaced his view of her eyes: moist, white teeth arranged into a flawless wall. The sweet, rosy surface of her lips parted back, revealing more of the maw they once hid. The minuscule high-schooler yelped. The only reply was an echo from the chasm of her mouth as it shifted open. It was like watching a deep, dark cave suddenly rise from the Earth, swallowing the light. Speaking of swallowing, her hand began to tilt, and Blake's tiny feet started slipping. "No, no - Ruby, PLEASE, DON'T -!"

CHOMP!

"Hm?" Aria lifted a dainty finger to her own lips, curious. "What was that sound?"

Hastily, Ruby's head turned back, blonde hair flopping with the sudden movement. "Mmfng!"

The brunette looked carefully at her friend's nervous smile. If she didn't know better, she could swear she saw something moving there; an unfamiliar pushing and wiggling motion on the sides of the cheerleader's cheeks. "Are you sure everything's okay? I don't mean to pry, but..."

"Nmmp! Nh-hm!" Ruby shook her head quickly, closing her eyes in repressed embarrassment.

Inside her shut mouth, Blake couldn't predict the sudden movement. It tossed him back and forth between either side of her mouth. He crashed arm-first into her left molar; then hurdled towards her tongue, entangling him in a web of sticky saliva. He felt individual taste buds rubbing against his face and neck. He felt a gust of humid air rushing in from her gut waaay below - and quickly encompassing the entire wet, pinkish room. As she tried to speak, the mighty muscle under Blake's body twisted and squirmed; he tried to push back against it, but only found his shrunken frame pressed to the roof of her mouth.

He pounded on her teeth, tried pressing against the uneven ceiling or the rapidly-moving floor, shouting out to Aria; but it was no use. Without even putting any effort in, this girl had pinned him helplessly inside her. To think, this was the same tongue that she'd used to chat with him the other day - the same one that held the bit of chewed-up gum on it that the teacher asked her to spit out. Now, he was in the same position as the gum. Her nervous breaths made him rock back and forth, giving the situation a deeply uncomfortable sense of intimacy. Wherever he looked, there was only an unyielding barrier of mighty teeth or a moving valley of reddish skin and muscle.

Only pearls and ruby. Everywhere he looked, Ruby. And behind, a slowly-moving, endless chasm of Ruby below...

"Well, if you say so." Aria's head tilted to the side, forming a sympathetic smile. She blinked, and leaned in, her soft voice ringing out again: "You're so modest, I feel like you're keeping something trapped inside of you sometimes." The yellow-clad girl softly touched her friend's cheek, trying to calm her jittery motions. "If you ever need to, it's safe to let anything out to me."

Ruby nodded enthusiastically, trying her best to chase Aria away without being rude - or looking like she DID have anything to hide. The latter effort was hard, as she faced the continual squirms within...

Blake heard it. He heard the golden voice ringing outside, reminding him of a world beyond the pinkish cavern - which bobbed up and down as she nodded. His body crashed from surface to saliva-coated surface, his clothes starting to feel more liquid than solid. After hitting her immense tongue at an odd angle, he was at the side of her mouth. There, for just one second, he could feel it: Aria's hand. Even at its unspeakably immense size, and even with him still blocked from the outside world, he KNEW it was her. The touch was gentle, controlled; more careful than any fingers that size had any right to be. He reached his own shrunken arms out and pressed both hands to it. "Aria... Aria...! Aria!"

"Sorry, are you eating something?" The brown-haired girl stepped back, her eyebrows lifting.

Ruby's pupils shrunk to the size Blake's were. Her face turned uniform white, sweat drops leaking down from it. With only an instant to think, and the wiggling in her mouth preventing her from letting a word out, she hastily, almost subconsciously, tilted her tongue back. Her hands fluttered below as she gulped long and hard, eyes shut. Finally, she opened up: "Nope! Nothing in my mouth!"

Aria sighed quietly, stepping away. "Forgive me for interrupting your snack. Have a good day!"

"You, too!" She said, waving happily. When the other girl was out of sight, she started whispering: "That was close, wasn't it, Blake?" She chuckled quietly. "Well, don't worry - I'll protect you as long as you need! Now can you tell me why you're tiny?" She waited a few seconds for a response, before her actions' full weight fell directly on her cranium. "Urgh, stupid, stupid - Blake? Can you hear me? Do you copy? Blake? Blake? Blaaaake!..."

Every single word shook the shrunken young man - her last one the worst, by far. He groaned, scared to shout back - and risk her answering. The cheerleader's tongue had pushed him back, along with the all-powerful swallow; but with the strength gifted by the spirits, he managed to grab a hold of her uvula and stay on.

A drop of her maw's sticky fluids slid on his arm, and down to his neck. He winced, keeping his sights on the rows of powerful teeth in the distance. It slowly, almost painfully, slid down his back, falling off his feet - and it took a few horrifying seconds before he could hear it drip below. That sound was soon joined by growling from her stomach, the droplet's final destination - and Blake's, too, if he had to keep this up much longer. Raw power was one thing; but holding a wet, rapidly-moving internal organ while trying not to slip off was another thing entirely.

Finally, he screamed: "RUBY! Don't talk, I'm right above your throat!" He felt the winds of an excited gasp rush around him, blowing his shirt; followed by the breeze of a relieved sigh. Using the momentum from that, he began swinging back and forth on the uvula, like it was a vine. The motion around told him the young woman was trying to suppress her reflex to swallow - attempting to cough him out, instead. With that extra boost, he let go of her uvula...

to pull Blake out, she needed answers from him now

1313213.content:
It's now or never, Blake decided in his head. He did NOT want to die a slow, painful death in Ruby's stomach acids. Swinging on her uvula to build momentum, he eventually reached a speed that seemed like enough to save his tiny hide. With that, Blake released his grip as the uvula swung towards Ruby's pinkish tongue and...

...came WAAAAAAY short of the distance he had planned to go.

Blake reached his arms out in a pathetic attempt to grab onto the tongue of the cheerleader, but his gambit failed, and the tiny mage found himself falling into the tight vertical tunnel of Ruby's gullet. On the outside, Ruby felt her shrunken friend's form going down her throat, and was unable to suppress a reflexive swallow. Wide-eyed with panic, the cheer captain felt a squirming lump slide down her throat, past her chest area, and into her belly.

"Ohhhh no..." Ruby worried, placing a hand on her soft, flat tummy. Though she typically displayed a playful demeanor that bordered on carelessness, Ruby did in fact harbor a secret liking for Blake and couldn't bring herself to willfully deal him any harm. Unfortunately, she had now accidentally sent the tiny boy on a trip to what could be his final resting place.

After what felt like minutes of being squeezed down Ruby's esophagus by peristalsis, Blake was forced through a small sphincter before landing with a wet plop on the squishy floor of the cheerleader's stomach. The organ plagued him with heat similar to a sauna, and still maintained the odor of cereal Ruby had eaten for breakfast earlier. The walls slowly pulsated, and a nearby greenish lake bubbled with gastric juices -- a bath that Blake would NOT want to take. Taking extra care to remain in the (relatively) dry areas of his prison, Blake rushed over to the nearest fleshy wall and pounded on it repeatedly.

"Ruby! HELP! Get me out of here!!" Blake yelled as he desperately awaited salvation from this gurgling pit of death...
1313213.title: Into Ruby's Gut

13132131.content:
Blake kept slamming his fists again and again into his tiny sanctuary, watching them sink in. Slowly, he made an attempt at calming his tense breaths. He'd hidden that crystal ball in the janitor's closet - and it wouldn't be hard to teleport a few feet using it. He hoped. If Ruby could get him close enough. He pounded again, yelling for her attention; in response, a horrid tremor shook the ground. Blake found himself flying off his dry spot, right into the liquid.

Here he was: the final destination of all Ruby's food and drink. Blake felt the waves of digestive juices sloshing over him, like a raging sea of enzymes and half-digested meals. The stomach walls slowly, disgustingly flexed in and out, controlling the oceans below. Stray drops of the murky substance sloshed against the fleshy barricades; and now, this tiny boy was going to join that mix.

The sickly green liquid ebbed and tided around his legs. Ruby's latest snack could feel it seeping in through his clothes; it left an itching sensation where it went. He shuddered, black hair nearly going white instantly. His science teacher told the class, near the beginning of the year, to always wash quickly if you felt an itch; it meant bacteria might be eating away at your skin.

He couldn't believe it. His arms quivered, followed by his lip. Ruby. This was all going on inside Ruby, in the corner of the cheer captain's well-maintained gut! She had this sea churning inside her in the middle of their last class. During the basketball team's last game, this whole microcosm of green *ick* was hiding behind her bright red uniform and rosy cheeks. And now, whether she liked it or not, Ruby had caught him within this secret world.

The spirits' power couldn't save him from this fate forever - but they could stall it long enough for him to find some form of escape. He ran for one of the walls, wading through the juices. Suddenly, a rumble. A long, continuous shaking knocked him off his feet, plunging him face-first into the unclean waters. The motion shook him to his bones. In every direction, he could feel her, hear her. The overpowering lub-dub of her heart. The quick, shallow breaths, like typhoons through her body. The bubbling flow of liquids. Her muffled, booming-yet-feminine voice...

"Blake, don't worry! We-we can handle this! We can get you out of there!" The red-clad girl jogged in place, thinking that exercise might slow down her digestion. It was a little hard with pumps, but she knew Blake had to be having it far worse. She put a hand to her stomach, patting it slowly, as if he could feel it - and as if it would relax him. Mostly, it was to try calming herself down.

It did nothing. If anything, the exercise just added to her hunger and thirst. The last thing that slid down her gullet left a bad taste, but her stomach took it like an appetizer and asked for more. Clutching her belly, Ruby began fiddling with her bag. She pulled out a stick of gum - and remembered hearing something about chewing gum being indigestible. The girl tore off the wrapping, instantly popping it into her mouth. Cringing tightly, she forced it down her esophagus. Could that possibly help him? She doubted it; but the cheerleader had little left to cling onto.

Inside her bowels, the pause in her rapid motion gave Blake a chance to get himself back on his feet. He wiped his glasses of Ruby's juiced. Soon, the sloshing began again; but he pressed forward. He did his best to ignore the wet squishing underneath his sneakers as it sunk into the impenetrable stomach lining. He kept his gaze on that dry spot of coral-coloured muscle, like the shoreline of an island.

The aperture at the top opened up slowly, making a loud squelch. It deposited a giant blob from the ceiling. He sighed; was Ruby REALLY eating now? But as the food splashed down to the emerald seas, he recognized it. That sweet aroma. That pale colour. A piece of gum! He swam to it, clawing into the massive marks Ruby's teeth left - using them to scale it. At this size, it worked like a raft. Pushing his unremarkable weight to the front, the candy bobbed gently, then carried him forth...

With one last bound, he made it. The juices spread an itching and stinging sensation across every millimeter of him. When he looked down, his shirt had a few holes he didn't remember being there before. Ruby's body might accept him as energy any minute. The pattern of her breathing grew irregular. It had long, hard exhales, followed by quick intakes of air. He couldn't just hear it; he felt it. Was she... Was she sobbing? Jostled by this, the black-haired boy ran to the wall, and began striking it again.

"No... Please, don't die..." Her fingers trembled around her stomach, slowly twitching and fidgeting. She felt a shiver cross her wrist. The depths of her stomach let out a quiet groan. No matter how hard Ruby tried breathing slowly, she felt her flat belly fill up with every movement, and that reminded her of Blake, suffering inside. "I don't... I don't want to eat you, Blake! I don't want this!"

Just thinking of his tiny body in there, helplessly passing through her digestive system... Churned this way and that by her stomach acids as his body slowly burned with acid... Or fell apart, bit by bit... Or sunk in, losing himself as he broke into nutrients and fat cells... And she was the one doing it. Her short-sightedness was what got him into her mouth, and down the tunnel of her throat; and now, no matter how she protested, her stomach was finishing the job.

A few people tried getting her attention, or asking what was wrong - she started running. She ran, and didn't look back - dashing right into the janitor's closet for privacy. The whole situation made her want to hurl. The sense of exhaustion and hunger, mixing with the visceral mental images of her friend's slow murder, and the pounding in her chest.

...Wait a minute - that pounding. She froze. He was still alive! She tiptoed to a tree, trying to be quiet and not stir her passenger too much; but also knowing she had to act quickly. Once there, she whispered: "C-can you hear me, Blake?"

Another strong pound. It did nothing for her sickness - but brought a smile back "Okay, uh... I read this in a book once. Bang on my stomach twice for yes, once for no." She paused, feeling her gut. "Do you understand?"

Two little pounds inside of her. "Okay! Do you have any idea how to get out?"

A long pause. She felt him hit the side of her stomach twice. "Right! Should I head outside of the school?" One quick, hard impact inside her told her the answer clearly.

"Then - to class?" A single pound.

She thought. "I'm in the janitor's closet. Should I... just stay here?" She felt two pounds. And then another two pounds, as if the first ones didn't register.

"Okay! Hang on, I'll try to find something..."

Inside, Blake felt a low, slow rumble. He sat back, smiling despite himself. With Ruby so relieved, and no more giant waves or heavy breaths tormenting him, the environment was almost... Not quite comfortable. But if he squinted a bit, it was like he was at a coral-coloured beach, with a cushion-like seat that caressed him, squeezed around him him...

A prodding feeling from the side snapped him back to reality. He heard the cheerleader whisper gently: "I hope you can forgive me..."

He nudged the side of her gut slowly; he had to take a pause to regain his energy for the second one. No matter how she'd done it, Ruby was only trying to help. From the sounds outside, he knew she'd already understood what she did wrong; what's more, she was trying to fix it.

The voice rang out around him: "This string - will it help me?" He struck once, careful not to hurt her.

He could only wait - wait and experience this little world inside a girl's gut. If he knelt back just so, he could feel the floor vibrating in sync with her heartbeat - along with the steady pound of her footsteps. Like a soothing lullaby - he slapped himself back awake. The air was thick, humid, and stagnant, slowly permeating his nose and mouth. His little legs grew tired; he sat down, then lay, then began to close his eyes.

"Alright, how about this mop?..."

A voice inside of him was screaming in terror, trying to shake him awake. But it didn't seem to matter much, now. As breathing became harder, he focussed himself on that. His sense of smell, sight, and sound shut off slowly one by one. Everything he'd lived through before became like a dream; no, when he thought about it, it was like someone else describing their dream to him. Something was melting, but he didn't find himself caring much.

He sighed out. "Aria..."

Ruby noticed something; some sort of trapdoor. Pulling on it, there was a crystal ball lying in the hole inside. "This ball... Is this what you wanted?"

Nothing. Now she bounced up and down a little, trying to gain his attention. "Come on, Blake, wake up!"

Still no response. She froze for a second, feeling like ice was spreading across her body. A few tears started to well up in her eyes. Her fingers twitched again, fidgeting, clenching... Then flying into her gut as she punched herself.

She heard a tiny mumble inside of her - nearly drowned out by the stomach's protest. She held her breath. The orbuculum in front of her filled with a brilliant, glowing onyx, then a VantablackTM that swallowed all luminescence. Finally, a tiny body appeared in midair. He was lying back peacefully, slowly coughing and murmuring, his body dripping with what was left of her last meal.

"Blake!" Ruby caught him in both hands, her smile wider than it'd been at any cheer session or pep rally. She felt his tiny fingers pawing at her flesh - as if he couldn't believe he'd really escaped. Slowly, he took one long, deep breath. Even across his tiny face, the blonde could easily see his pure joy at just being able to inhale fresh air once again.

"I'm so glad..." She cooed. Suddenly, her face broke into a smirk. "But, y'know - you should probably..."
13132131.title: A Quick (and Hopefully Painless) Ride Through Ruby

131321313.content:
"So, why are you so small?" Ruby asked.

Blake was slightly afraid to answer this question; his heart belonged to Aria, and he didn't want to upset the giantess cheerleader. But then again, she DID just rescue him from digestion in her stomach...so the tiny boy sighed and decided to be honest with his heroine.

"W-well..." Blake began nervously, "I made a deal with ghosts to become tough enough to impress girls, but...I ended up shrunken as payment. I had really wanted to win Aria's love...but...now that I've seen this gentle, compassionate side of you, I...I kinda...like you..."

Ruby was silent for a moment. The school's most common target for bullies, having feelings for the popular cheer captain? It seemed too farfetched at first...and Ruby typically maintained a playful, modest exterior...the blonde parted her cherry-red lips to speak.

"Blake, I...that's...that's so sweet of you to say!" Ruby felt tears of joy start to flow down her emerald eyes. "But are you sure you're not after Aria's affections anymore?"

"She hasn't saved me from a life-threatening experience..." Blake replied.

"But that was my fault!"

"Don't worry about it. You saved my life, and that's what matters."

Ruby couldn't help but smile. "Gosh, I...if you're alright with a giantess girlfriend...I'd love to go out with you!"

Blake saw his new girlfriend's lips coming towards him again -- but this time, for a quick kiss. As the red lips backed away after pressing onto him, the tiny mage felt pretty much his whole body covered in Ruby's lipstick, and a bit of saliva. Still, it was a pleasant feeling.

Then the ringing of the school bell killed the moment.

"Yikes!" Ruby yelped. "I'd better get home...oh, right! Blake, do you want me to take you home?"

Blake wasn't sure what to do -- the spirits' spell would wear off in five days, but how would his sister Jade react to seeing her brother tiny and helpless?

After a minute of deep thinking, Blake decided...

Blake's voice caught in his throat before he could finish. He swallowed the lump resting on his vocal cords and looked down, unable to look the giantess in the eye, before he quietly mumbled under his breath. "... Y-You're lower half..."

Ruby pouted and tilted her head. Her tiny friend had said something too quiet for her giant ears to hear. She brushed her hair away her right ear and brought it down to him, so that the giant organ was only a few paces away from the mage. "Sorry, I didn't hear that. Can you say it again?"

Blake's face felt like it was burning hotter than a pool of volcanic magma. Wanting his embarrassment to end, he confessed again, this time just loud enough for the giant's ear to pick up, "You're lower half."

Ruby's eyes widened for a split second as she absorbed his confession, but quickly they morphed into a much naughtier look. "Oh. I see." She happily giggled as she shuffled over to a nearby chair. Gently she set him down upon it and stood straight up, leaving Blake just below her waist. Slowly she lifted the curtain that was her skirt, revealing to her shrunken friend the soft, white fabric of her giant panties. Blake found himself unable to look away, his eyes greedily taking in every detail of the underwear-covered neithers right before him. "Lots of boys at school do. You're just the one that actually gets to be close to it." Ruby cooed again as she softly swayed her hips from side to side. Watching the tiny boy stand there, utterly entranced by her body, was making the giantess heart beat faster and faster with pure joy.

"So, what part of my lower half do you like the most?" The question broke Blake free from his little trance, and he blinked rapidly as his mind struggled with an answer. What part did he like most? Her crotch, her rump, her legs, her feet? It was so hard to chose.

Ruby wasn't about to let him think in peace. A seductive smirk on her face, she swung herself around and brought her ass to jiggling stop right before the boy. "Is it this fat ass of mine?" She teasingly asked, dragging Blake back from his thoughts and into the now bootylicious real world. The mage watched as she bounced and swayed her famous cheeks so close to his face, almost as if daring him to reach out and grab it, yet his thunderous heart would not let him do anything else but watch. So he stood there and enjoyed the show, until Ruby finished up with a loud, playful slap to her right cheek that sent the flesh into soft ripples.

"So...?" She asked her tiny onlooker as she glanced at him over her shoulder with a teasing smirk.

Blake fumbled with the words to say for a few moments, before finally his parched throat allowed him to respond.

Dash to the book Indigo's grabbing onto

133.content:
Blake desperately lept up and down, praying to the spirits that this oncoming behemoth would take notice of him.

Boom. Her step forward resounded against the school's uniform tile floor. To any other person, it would be a simple clack from her heel. Blake was not any other person. He shouted for her, cupping his hands to his tiny mouth. "Ruby!"

THUMP.

He couldn't help but gaze in astonishment at the immense width her step traversed. It'd take him a long dash to get across a few tiles; her long, smooth legs, in shape for cheer-leading sessions, could cross it in seconds. At this angle, they were even more impressive. So many powerful joints and muscles flexing and relaxing on her command, all within either limb; each as polished, firm, clean, and overbearing as the great marble statues on pillars he saw in history class. Yet, more colourful - indeed, full of colour and energy, constantly on the move, as if she were still in the middle of a cheer routine and couldn't stand still.

At Blake's height, glimpsing her footsteps was like watching the entire ceiling shift. No; like watching a whole landscape of skin and soft cotton coming to life around him, not forgetting the hard, red material of her pumps. All of it springing up from feet away, shooting high into the skies... And coming down!

THWOOOOOM!

The minuscule mage shouted again, feeling a horrendous tremble from his toes to his dark-haired scalp. Was the floor shaking with THAT much vitriol from a mere footfall? Or was that just his nerves? Goosebumps formed on him in places he didn't know they could. The sky was a scarlet barrier. Ruby's foot just barely missed him, leaving him safely under the elevated sole.

He could see the heel in front of him, and the ball of her foot behind. In fact, he didn't just *see* it: he could feel the weight either part exerted on the ground as it slid forward. Without even daring to gaze upwards (both out of respect for her modesty and fear for his life) he knew exactly how she'd positioned her foot, and how she was moving it. He experienced it all: the heel slowly lifting; the pressure she applied to the front; the slight wiggle of her ankle; every soul-crushingly immense, immaculate detail.

Before Blake regained his breath, the cheer captain moved again - taking a nonchalant step right past him, uncaring of his pounding heart. The shoe went up in an arc once again, and - BOOM. That next footfall snapped him out of his trance. He screamed out her name again; this time, running after her. The backside in the skies above jiggled slightly with her movement - but this was barely the time to stare up. He couldn't hope to keep up with the active pillars for long.

With one more scream - "RUBY!" - she suddenly stopped. Her body turned on her right heel; the sky transformed from a monolithic back to a towering torso. "Huh? Oh, wow!"

He did it! She was walking towards him! He started waving again, this time more out of joy than desperation. Her face showed no sign of confusion or skepticism; not as welcoming and sweet as Aria's, but he could still trust it. The blonde kept moving... And didn't stop.

She wasn't slowing down. She wasn't even looking at him. When he followed her line of vision, it led to the school's bulletin board - which Blake was right under. A paper attached up there grabbed Ruby's attention, not him! He tried running, but the floor's shaking grew stronger with each of her movements. It put him off-balance, leaving him to fall to the ground. The shrunken boy could only hope his screams reached her before her gigantic shoes reached him...

ThumpthumpTHUMPTHUMPTHUMP- STOMP!

His prayers were in vain.

The left heel descended upon his torso, forcing all his wind out. Unlike the close call seconds ago, this one left him totally disoriented. It was hard to think what he'd been thinking, do what he'd do next; harder still to imagine the immense scale of a whole school beyond this hall, full of students able to crush him just like this; impossible to picture any sensation more intense and real than the panic shooting through his body. Her ankle twisted slightly, carelessly grinding the footwear into Blake's diminutive solar plexus.

But... he was alive. By some miracle, he could still feel his arms, and gasp for air. It slowly came back to him: the spirits! They'd made his body hyper-strong! Once his head finally stopped spinning, he looked up to the skies to thank them.

Like distant clouds, Ruby's blonde hair bobbed slightly above. Her face kept pointed to some announcement on the board. With that cheerful visage, and the excited eye movement, she didn't seem nearly as intimidating. His little body bursting with renewed confidence (or was that blood rushing to his head?), he grabbed a firm hold of the red pillar near him and pushed.

Some of the crushing force on his chest lifted. He felt the footwear move. "Yes! It's working!" He breathed in a long breath, letting his lungs fill, before shouting: "RUBY!"

"...Huh?" She twisted around on her heel, looking behind her. The sudden rotation loosened Blake's grip on the scarlet shoe. Once again, it drove into him - this time, just narrowly missing his groin. He yelped with all his remaining breath, listening it fade into a pathetic whimper, inaudible to even a mouse.

The cheer captain stayed turned, looking for whoever called her name. Indigo was passing through the halls - could it have been her? Didn't sound like her voice - but the blonde waved anyways. The other girl nodded back, arms too full of papers and binders to wave. "Hi."

Below, Blake noticed the footsteps on the other end of the hall. Another titan, shaking the tiled floor with the same strength, served as a reminder to how tiny the teen was. Utterly unnoticeable, pinned under this girl's pump. The new shoes were completely blue - a stark contrast to the ones that pressed on him now Shaking his head, he tried again - this time, his fingers clutched firmly to the smooth red heel. He pushed up, slowly, steadily. Soon, he was able to regain his progress. With a little more freedom of movement, he put his back into it; he wrapped his arms in close to avoid slipping again. Little by little, the shoe moved from the floor.

Ruby smiled, pointing to the bulletin board. "Indy, you got great exam marks!"

"Huh. Who'd have thought." The studious girl spoke in a dry voice, fidgeting with a book. Her purple skirt fluttered gently. "Did you see the game schedule?"

She nodded, hands to her hips. "Yuh-huh! And I'm already boiling up with schooool spirit!" The young woman in red and white performed a high kick, to show off that energy; not really looking where she aimed it. The toe end of her left shoe collided with Indigo's book pile, knocking it out of her hands. "Gah! Omigosh, I'm sorry, I'm sorry..."

"It's fine," she said, kneeling to the ground with a little sigh. The papers fluttered to the ground in a mess. "Just help me pick them up."

Blake was putting in such an effort to keep hold of the heel that his arms froze in place. The lift was followed by relief, then jaw-dropping fear, then an acute loss of his sense of gravity. He nearly flew up as the gigantic girl kicked - the impressive length of her smooth leg just adding to its heel-bound passenger's panic. Ruby's sudden movement gave him a beautiful view of the flooring the two had traversed; now, a looong drop down. And just as suddenly as it lifted, the marble pillar of a leg dropped again, loose papers flying around.

BOOOOM!

This was the worst rumble yet; the quake was enough to make him nearly airborne again. But when it stilled, he was safe again. The shoe no longer pressed down on him. He'd made it out!

Blake's first thought was to get as far away from Ruby's towering pumps. But then he noticed Indigo. Ruby and her were grabbing up papers from the ground - though it looked more like giant, heavenly hands shaping the earth. This was a chance. He could grab their attention while they had their eyes to the floor. Then again, the blue-shirted student looked like she was suspicious about him lately... And with her brains, she could probably figure out he'd been dealing with spirits. But then again, she was more level-headed than the blonde, who could take things a little too far with her playfulness. Would it be better to get help from either one? From both?

He gulped, wondering what to do.
133.title: Crimson Crush

13323.content:
"Be honest." Indigo broke her silence with that simple utterance. Her fingers tapped the side of her mouth slowly, her lips staying in a completely stiff, flat line. Her eyebrows, too, remained parallel to her narrowing eyes. It felt like she was shining a spotlight on Blake's diminutive body... No, he felt like he a specimen under a microscope that she'd been assigned to study. A disgusting specimen with a simple single-cell structure and no brain that his friend could see right through.

He rubbed the side of his head, fidgeting with his glasses frames - forcing himself to maintain eye contact. "Look, I know it's hard to believe - but have I ever lied to you?"

The young woman kept walking, keeping a careful balance over her handheld passenger. Her fingers wiggled slightly to the side, as if to make a cage around the shrunken boy. "Aria doesn't strike me as a person who'd particularly be interested in tiny people."

"That part was an accident!" He shouted up, before covering his mouth. He couldn't be too reactive. Indigo might not believe him. Coughing inaudibly, he paced slowly around the palm, murmuring: "Y-yeah, the spirits I called on..." He glanced back and forth, making sure nobody was there. The hallway was still the endless expanse of tiles - only now, he was looking at it from a new perspective, moving at an uncomfortably fast pace. "...they said it was the 'cost' for what they gave me. Strength. I mean - upper body strength."

That got a reaction. Her footsteps halted for a moment, and her slanted eyes widened. She moved her face closer to Blake's teensy body. "Huh, not unlike an ant's exoskeleton. That's a smart way of doing it." Her eyes wandered upwards for a moment, chin tilting to the ceiling lights. Their reflection on her face looked intimidating; like she was some sort of holy figure bathed in light, passing judgement on a boy who dealt with forces beyond the mortal realm. "I don't often get into this mythological stuff - but in China, ants are considered a symbol of hard work and diligence. They're called 'The Righteous Insect'. It's almost ironic, isn't it?" She let loose a sardonic smile, one side of her mouth just twisting upwards slightly. "You wanted to skip that hard work and righteousness part, to get your power. So you became an ant."

That last word slid right over Blake and engulfed him, crushing his diminutive chest. "H-hey. You know how I am with bullies."

At that, he heard some rowdy chatter at the other end of the hall. Someone was coming - no, multiple someones. Indigo tucked him quietly in her own chest. His first instinct was to yelp; but he quickly suppressed that, just falling back into the cushion-like fabric.
