choices: Jade starts to worry -- she doesn't want to digest you
Jade shrugs it off -- you'll probably survive with magic or whatever
142231.content:
"Jade? Jade?! Is Aria out there yet?" Blake yelled to his gigantic sister, as he sloshed thigh-deep in milk, mashed potatoes, and stomach acid. Booming groans denoting the start of the young teen's digestion of her lunch rocked the gastric pool, splashing some tingly liquid onto her brother's tiny body. It's...a little terrifying, to think about being a part of Jade's digestive process, even if he could survive it.

"Ooh, those look good!" Jade went to get more food, which sloshes Blake and his boiling foodstuff companions around in her belly, still rumbling with hunger. She came back to her seat with a burger and fries and began to scarf it all down.

"Jeez, you're really hungry today!" Blake shouted to Jade, but as he expected, she didn't respond. Welp. She's not paying attention to him anymore, instead more focused on filling up her stomach. Blake tries to dodge the raining globs of freshly-eaten lunch but he isn't very successful.

After several minutes, Jade is patting her bloated gut and licking her fingers clean. The slight distended roundness of her tummy pushes up against her shirt, and the packed-full feeling within is amazing to the satisfied teen.

Not so much to the other teen that is actually within her cramped stomach. Blake tries to scream for Jade's help but is met every time with a small disgusting mouthful of digesting food. He is neck-deep in a thick sloshy bubbly lake and surrounded by a cacophony of weird guttural noises.

"Hey bro, Aria's here!" Jade says as students including Blake's crush file into the cafeteria. *BUUUURRPP* Jade lets out a mighty belch as her food settles.

Then...it suddenly occurs to her.

"Uh-oh."

She may have eaten too much to make letting you out now a feasible process.
142231.title: Jade gets even hungrier, and fills up her gut

1422311.content:
Blake nearly drowned in the depths of his sister's meal as it settled inside her stomach. Struggling to climb up the hill of dissolving foodstuffs, the puny mage screamed for help one last time.

As she sat looking down at her full gut, Jade finally decided that she had to get her brother out now, no matter the cost. She got up and sprinted to the nearest trash can, preparing herself for the disgusting process of puking Blake up.

Blake's prison gurgled and groaned in apparent discomfort as Jade reached a hand to her uvula in an effort to make herself throw up. The tiny high-school boy felt uneasy. Would Jade even be able to rescue him from an acidic fate?
1422311.title: Saved from Digestion?

choices: Blake gets dropped on the floor by his sister she wipes off her hands and cries
She is very sorry for what she did and explains what happened
14223111.content: Right into her hands Blake is covered in his sisters spit she she stares at him with her mouth open.
14223111.title: Yes, she spews him out!

choices: Jade falls and Blake is smooshed in between her cleavage.
Jade bends down and Blake climbs the back of her shorts.
Jade steps on Blake but somehow he is invincible and is stuck to her shoe.
1423.content: What will the story go next?
1423.title: Reader's choice

choices: Jade (she knew he was there and was mad at him for invading her bag)
144.content: Jade put down her backpack to grab something. The force of it landing on the ground caused Blake to fall on his bottom. He struggled to get up and ran over to her backpack. He started climbing when he was accidentally knocked in. Jade pulled out a granola bar and zipped up her backpack, trapping Blake inside. It was a little darker than before but he could see a lot of things. There was a blue textbook and a couple of folders. Unfortunately, there was also a lot of food, like bags of chips and candy. Jade almost always had food in case she got hungry. Jade walked on, eating her snack. She made her backpack shake, making it impossible to stand. Blake was eventually knocked into a open bag of pretzels and got knocked out unconscious. When he woke up, it was brighter and louder than before. He looked around to see he was on a plate. Jade, Aria, and Indigo were sitting at a table eating lunch. He was stuck in macaroni and cheese. He saw a couple of pretzels on the same plate and the original bag that he was in. Suddenly, a giant fork came from above and scooped up some mac and cheese next to him. The person using his plate was . . .
144.title: A sticky situation

choices: He waited until she scooped him up and tried to get her attention that way
He decided to try and climb her.
He decided to try and climb her. As he started though, Aria suddenly got up.
Indigo suddenly noticed him and pointed him out to the others
1441.content:
Blake watched as the giantess brought her fork into her mouth. Her mighty teeth tore the macaroni apart. Had he been just a few inches over to the left, Aria would currently be chewing him up. Just thinking about it made the tiny boy shudder.

However, fear wasn’t the only thing Blake was experiencing. Being small in front of Aria was actually a bit interesting and exciting. She was always beautiful to him but now her size seemed to double that. Her whole body and magic were now much stronger than him. Blake couldn’t help but smile a little at the thought.

He watched as Aria grabbed a pretzel and pulled it into her mouth. Like before, her teeth chewed it up like it was nothing. He looked at the others and watched as they chewed up their food. Though he really didn’t want to be eaten, he was at least glad he was on Aria’s plate and not someone else’s.

Blake took a deep breath and thought about what he could do. One option, though not the best, was to wait for Aria to scoop him up. He admitted it sounded pretty dumb but if she lifted him up, she might be able to hear or see him a bit better.

Another idea he thought of was to try and climb her. It would take a while and a lot of energy but it was technically safer than waiting to be scooped up. He thought about trying to use magic to help but something like a levitation spell was no easy feat and it would take a quite a bit of energy to accomplish. Even then, there was no guarantee it would work.

Blake knew he had to decide fast if he didn’t want to end up as nutrients for the girl he loved. After a moment…
1441.title: A Girl Standing Tall And Beautiful

choices: "Tough luck, Blake! You're my lunch now."
1443.content:
As the giant fork scooped up some of the mac and cheese next to him, Blake was relieved to not have been scooped up with it. The tiny mage saw the fork deposit the food in Jade's mouth, the utensil coming back out empty. The giantess chewed for only a moment before swallowing the soft stuff. Unfortunately, the great fork dug into the macs under tiny Blake, and he found himself raised up to his towering sister's face, anger clear in her emerald eyes.

"So, bro, you think you can just invade people's backpacks?" Jade accused her shrunken brother. "Well, my stomach and I beg to differ!"

"Jade! W-wait!" Blake pleaded. "I can explain...I made a deal with ghosts to toughen myself up and impress Aria..." Aria's eyes widened, surprised at these words. Indigo, on the other hand, was too focused on her own lunch to really know what was going on.

"Sis, I'm only tiny because the spell cost me my size, in return for my toughness...Jade, please! Don't eat me! I don't wanna die!"

Jade was momentarily speechless. Blake did make his way into her backpack without her knowledge...but he was still her older brother.

What will Jade decide?
1443.title: Jade is NOT happy with her brother.

15.content:
So many questions raced through Blake's mind as he stood in the vacant school hallway, now at half an inch in size.

That is, until he saw...
15.title: Someone else

choices: Vixen doesn't hear him and gets step on, but survive
Vixen hears a voice from below and looks down to see a tiny person/bug
151.content:
Blake immediately recognize the giantess that is walking towards him and was actually glad to see her...especially what she's wearing - light blue tube shirt with matching skirt and ballet flats. Beside Aria, his crush, there was another girl that recently came to his school and become fast friends with the mage and his sister, not to mention she's quite attractive and smart.

"Vixen! Too bad it's not Aria...But I'll take my chances with her." Blake thought.

Blake then started to blush as he remembers Vixen will sometimes teases him, saying 'so cute' when blushing and even tires to...sit on his lap during lunch and hugs him, announcing the whole student in cafeteria that Blake is her boyfriend, really making Blake's face turn bright red like Christmas light. But lucky she denounces that they aren't a couple...though he kinda admit it, it was actually enjoyable...

The tiny mage snaps back to reality when a shadow of Vixen's foot hovers above him and quickly yells out her name, hoping to get her attention....
151.title: Vixen Vex, the New Girl

choices: Blake climbs into Vixen’s ballet flat, and sees what it’s like in there.
Blake climbs to the top of Vixen’s desk, so he can be discovered easier.
1511.content:
Blake freezes once he realizes that Vixen didn’t hear him shout for her. Although if he was being honest, he didn’t really expect Vixen to hear him from all the way down here. But when her foot came down upon him, it didn’t completely crush him even though it also kept him pinned beneath her had ballet flat. “Man I really am durable, huh? I guess I should thank the spirits later!” Blake thought as he was immobilized. But then he felt the pressure ease up a bit, and he took that opportunity to crawl from under Vixen’s shoe.


When he finally escaped, he saw an impressive sight. Vixen slipped her foot out of her ballet flat somewhat, and was resting it near the heel of the shoe. He looked farther up, and he realized that the ends of the desk were somewhat climbable, if he put in enough effort. But then he looked back at the front of Vixen’s flat, and he had an interesting idea. He always thought that Vixen was very pretty, and he liked her a lot, although not quite as much as he liked Aria. And this could be a great opportunity to get to know Vixen better. And he couldn’t deny that he always found something enticing about how Vixen wore those kinds of flats and played with them. But he would also have to deal with how Vixen would most likely treat him if he was found. She always treated him like a cute little kid, and teased him frequently, but he did enjoy that treatment, even if he wouldn’t admit it to her. But he knew that Vixen would tease him even more mercilessly if she saw him like this. So eventually, Blake decides to:
1511.title: Stepped on Like a Bug; but Still Okay

choices: Vixen goes out to get some after school food.
Vixen goes to the library for some course books, as well as some magic material.
15111.content:
Blake started to climb the outside edge of Vixen’s ballet flat, and he was surprised that it was so easy to climb it. I guess that those sprits really made me stronger! I can’t think of how I’d make it through this venture without it.” Blake said to himself. And once he got to the top, he hopped into the flat, and landed right in the toe section. He landed right on his feet, completely fine and everything, and it seemed like his reflexes were also better than usual. He looked down, and he was surprised to see how darkened the imprints under him were, but then he remembered how frequently Vixen wore these flats. And he looked forward, and saw a set of 5 impressively massive and powerful toes wriggling and writhing about. But then they started to move closer to him, and he ducked down in fear of them pouncing on him, but they luckily stopped a few feet away from Blake.


Blake continued to think about what he should do next, and if he should have taken the smarter route of going to the desk instead. Although it was hard for him to focus as Vixen’s toes continued to give Blake a loud and mesmerizing show, especially now that they were a lot closer to him. They continued to wiggle about, and he could see little bits of dirt fling around from the wild movement. She would also curl her toes up and down, making sure to keep them moving. And the most terrifying and awe-inspiring action that these incredible feet would make, would be when Vixen would remove her other foot from its flat completely, and then begin rubbing both of her feet together within the flat that Blake was in, and wildly wiggle all 10 of her colossal toes against each other at the same time. Blake made sure to stay as far as he could at this point, because it looked more like a terrifying monster that could crush buildings with ease than a person’s foot.


As Blake thought of a plan, Vixen’s toes went forward unexpectedly. To Vixen, she was just stretching her toes a little bit. It was a harmless action to her, but for Blake, it was the complete opposite of harmless! Blake was grabbed by Vixen’s 2nd and 3rd toes, and they squeezed him tightly. If Blake was not gifted this great durability, he probably would have popped. And it seemed like the super strength he was gifted with made it not very painful either, and it felt more like getting a tight hug, although it would be more accurate to describe it as a hug from something that was more than a few times his size. The snaky toes gripped him, curious to know who they were currently embracing. As uncomfortable as it currently was, he found it extremely satisfying to be used like this by these beautiful toes.


Up above, Vixen sighed as she stretched her toes. She thought she felt something in-between them, but she quickly ignored it. She had more important things to think about, and some poor unfortunate pebble getting caught by her toes was the least of her concern. Although she did not consciously think anymore about this sensation among her toes, her toes were having a ball. They continued to squeeze Blake against their soft toe flesh, and his face was shoved deep in the flesh. After the 2nd and 3rd toes squeezed him enough for their satisfaction, they passed Blake to the other waiting toes to repeat the process.


Blake found himself stuck in-between her 3rd and 4th toes when the class ended. Vixen quickly wormed her bare feet back inside her flats, and Blake was caught for the ride. Even these relatively smaller toes could use him however they wished. Blake felt her 4th toe start to rub against him again, and it seemed like it wanted his attention, so he started to rub it vigorously. But as he was satisfying that toe’s curiosity, it seemed to make her 3rd toe more jealous and pushed into him harder, smothering him between both playful and possessive toes. And these antics were starting to bring Blake back to Vixen’s conscious mind, and she quickly did something to stop her irritation. But instead of Vixen checking the flat to see what was bothering her, she decided to harshly scrunch her toes from within her flats instead. Blake was shoved even deeper into her unyielding but intoxicating toe flesh, and it seemed to satisfy Vixen’s curiosity for the time being.


After Vixen stopped paying attention to the small pebble consciously, her toes went back to their actions. They started rubbing him rhythmically, almost like a loving massage. Blake was really enjoying this toe treatment he was getting from Vixen, even if she was not consciously aware of her toes’ friendly behavior. Something about being played with like an inhuman object by these powerful and titanic toes excited Blake, and he wondered if this was why he was shrunken down to this size. There was a part of Blake that didn’t even want to be discovered by Vixen, and it was beginning to affect his levels of affection for Aria and Vixen. But then he rationalized it, saying to himself, “I’m sure I’d be feeling the same way if I was inside Aria’s shoe. I shouldn’t give up on my love so soon!”


Blake was a mere plaything to a set of physically imposing and highly possessive toes which found no greater pleasure than to use him thoroughly. And Blake wondered how Vixen would treat him if she knew that he was this tiny. She was always very playful with him and teased him a lot, so she might do things like this to him anyway if she found him. But no matter how playful she was with him, she would still consciously hold back, because she wouldn’t intent to actually harm him. So while he was undiscovered, he would receive the completely merciless treatment that these toes offered to him. And that alone was pretty dang exciting, and he hoped that he wouldn’t be discovered for awhile. But then Vixen’s 3rd toe simply pinned him down, as she focused on some school work up above, and he realized that he was completely immobilized for now.


Now that Blake was pinned among these god-like toes, he began to notice an odor emanating from them. It seemed like a mixture of berries and foot sweat. She probably put a sweet smelling lotion on her feet and the sweat was beginning to wash it away. It was not a bad smell to Blake, in fact he kinda liked it, but his current size and the size of these toes made the smell somewhat overpowering. But Blake was starting to like the overpowering smell that was surrounding him. Maybe it was because of the constant massaging he was receiving and the playful nature of these amazing toes. Or maybe the smell was getting to him. Because to be fair, he never had this intense of thought about feet before, he would only glance down every once and a while.


But then the last period ended, and the students started to file out of the classroom. So Vixen stood up and prepared to go to her next destination. She was feeling pretty hungry, and she had a good idea on where she wanted to eat now that school was done for the day. But she also wanted to head to the nearby library, so she could get a few books she wanted. And she also found out that there were a few old occult books that could be useful for magic training, so she’d grab them once she got there. Where should she go? And wherever she chose to go, Blake knew that he would be dragged along for the adventure.

(This is a bit of a retelling of one of the old chapters I wrote from the original Small Bargain. I figured that it'd be good to re-insert it here)
15111.title: Quality Time with Vixen's Toes

choices: Blake falls into Alena’s sweaty and well-worn moccasin.
Blake remains with Vixen’s heavenly toes.
151112.content:
Vixen decides that she should try and go to the local library first. There were a few really useful occult materials that would speed up her studies and plans greatly, so she wanted to get them before anyone else got to them first. She knew that there weren’t very many mages around the area and the school, besides her Blakey and her friend Alena Scaria, but you could never be sure who else was a mage, or if they were a less easily detectable type like she was. And Alena was actually a Nether Mage too, just like Vixen was, and they frequently bonded over similar training and studying methods. As she thought this, she reflexively scrunched her toes, which gave Blake a heavy smothering, and she wondered if she should tell Blakey that she knew about his status as a mage. It would be an easy way to get him to like her better, and maybe even get him to get over that silly crush he has on Aria. But she stopped daydreaming, and texted Alena, writing “Hey Alena, can you come to the library in a bit? I think they’ve got some useful occult stuff that we could use for magic training. Let me know if you can come!” And as she waited for a response, she headed towards the library to ask the librarian at the front desk about where the book was located. As Vixen walked, Blake was continually pounded by these toes that seemed to love him so much, and Blake was actually enjoying the experience under Vixen’s heavenly toes. And because he was deep in-between her 3rd and 4th toes, he was protected from the worst of the impacts caused by Vixen’s walking. Although, because of his spell, he’d probably be okay even if her was directly under her big toe, or even her heel.


Once Vixen reached the library, she went to the front desk. She asked the librarian where she could find the occult book she wanted. The librarian, thinking that she was a normal high school student, started telling her about all of the library’s policies and how to locate the books. Vixen appreciated the gesture, but she really didn’t need to know much else besides where her special book was, especially since she was a mage, and not a regular student. As she listened to the old librarian drone on, she wanted to look attentive and polite even if she was dying on the inside, she started taking her right foot out of her flat to entertain herself. Blake was brought out of the flat and he could see that he was now inside the library. She started cracking and stretching her toes, trying her best to look like she cared about what the librarian was telling her, while messing around with the strange pebble that was in-between her toes. Blake was crushed more and more as Vixen used him as a stress toy. She also shuffled her right flat around and pushed it about with her foot, further disorienting Blake. And she would sometimes try and grab at the front desk wall, kneading Blake with her powerful and huge toes.


While the librarian kept on lecturing, Vixen heard her phone go off, and used that as an excuse to leave, saying “Oh I’m really sorry sir, but I just got a message from my mom. Thank you!” The old librarian just waved her off, and Vixen quickly shoved her flat back on, brutally crushing Blake under her mighty toes, and ran off to a different section before checking her phone. Vixen saw that it was from Alena, and she wrote “Oh wow! I’m coming right over. I should get there in a minute. Don’t look for the book without me!” Vixen smiled, and sat down at a nearby couch chair and simply browsed with her phone until Alena arrived. As she checked her messages and her social media stuff, she popped off her flats and shuffled them around, making Blake feel very dizzy. And after a few minutes of this, Vixen saw Alena walking over to her, and she quickly slipped her feet back into their flats, and stood up to wave. She excitedly started jumping up and down as she waved at Alena, harshly and repeatedly crushing Blake under her uncaring and monolithic toes. Alena simply said to Vixen, happily and energetically, “Let’s find that book!” And with that, the two titanic Nether Mages happily go up to the 3rd floor of the library to unravel the secrets of that book. And Vixen treaded on Blake unknowingly the entire time, of course.


Alena was a Middle Eastern girl and was about 6’1”. Alena was a kind, playful and a bit mischievous person, and sometimes used her magic to pull crazy pranks. But she never used it to actively harm others, although she has sometimes done a few pranks that went too far, but she never intends for them to actually harm others. Alena is the same age as Vixen is, but she goes to a nearby private school, so Alena doesn’t know any of the gang except for Vixen. She has dark black hair and a tan, almost dark, complexion. She also has light brown eyes. She decided to wear a pair of sweatpants, a simple T-shirt, and her favorite pair of tan moccasins. She also did not wear socks, because she never liked the feeling of socks on your feet, even if she was wearing sneakers. She did not care if it made her feet smell, because it wasn’t like anyone would even smell them. She also had fairly large feet, and they were a good few sizes bigger than Vixen’s.


After a little while of walking, which kept Blake thoroughly crushed and pressed against Vixen’s large and powerful toes, they finally found their targeted book. They looked for a table to rest their feet for a bit and chat, and more importantly to go over that book to see if it will actually be useful to them. Once they found a nice table that was pretty secluded from too many others, they both sat down. Alena started reciting a magic spell and a small forcefield-like thing surrounded them and the table, and she explained “This way we have a bit more privacy! Nobody can see what’s in the sphere from the outside. Great idea, huh?” Vixen agrees, and then they both removed their shoes to get more comfortable. Since Blake was stuck under Vixen’s toes, he had no way of noticing the spell that Alena just cast. Now that Vixen had freed her feet and toes from their flat prisons, Blake tried to identify where he was in-between the wiggling and cracking that her toes did. He looked right in front of him, where he was attached to Vixen’s 2nd toe, could see another pair of feet. And this pair was even bigger than Vixen’s beauties. It was dark tan colored and it looked damp, and it almost seemed like it was glistening, with sweat. He could also see a pair or large tan moccasins discarded near her imposing feet. She was currently rubbing her feet together, savoring their new found freedom. As the titans conversed above, the feet and toes had their own little play-date down below.


Vixen stretched her feet towards Alena’s moccasins and dipped them inside of them. As Vixen did that, Alena started playing with Vixen’s smaller flats. Vixen shoved her feet deep inside of the moccasins and shook them about, and Blake could already tell that these shoes had a terribly strong odor. She dragged them closer to her chair and began wiggling her toes as she worked her feet into the larger moccasins, wanting to rub her toes and soles against the fluffy cotton insides. Vixen’s feet started to sweat profusely, and Blake was getting drowned in it. Blake couldn’t even fight back, because she was playing even more rigorously and ruthless than before. It was probably because of how much of a good time she was having chatting and researching with Alena, and how much of a good time her feet were getting to know these moccasins, and of course making sure Blake was thoroughly included.


As that was going on, Alena was flattening Vixen’s flats and dragging them about. Her larger feet were trying their hardest to work their own personal magic on Vixen’s flats. They overpowered them only how a pair of feet that much bigger could. And the sweat covering Alena’s huge toes were beginning to coat Vixen’s flats slightly. It probably wasn’t something that Vixen would notice consciously, but it would make her feet sweat a lot more than usual, which would have a significant impact on Blake. Both of their pairs of feet were having the time of their lives, and Blake was caught in the middle of it. But Blake was actually enjoying this experience even more than before, and he was silently thanking the sprits for interpreting his request this way.


As Vixen played with the moccasins and as her toes wiggled about vigorously, Blake could feel himself slip little by little. It seemed like the sweat was beginning to finally dislodge him from these powerful and possessive toes’ grasp. And although he would enjoy being freed, he was not so sure of getting stuck in this pair of moccasins. They were badly sweaty, and they really made the experience a lot more intense. If he got dislodged from his current location, then he would be at the mercy of Alena instead, and he didn’t know her at all! And he had grown to love Vixen, and her majestic and godlike toes, so he didn’t want to be separated from his personal paradise.


And as Vixen and Alena both prepared to leave to go home for the day, Blake continued to slip. Does Blake slip away from Vixen’s toes’ grasp, and get forced to get to know Alena’s feet instead? Or does he somehow hang on and remain with his new goddess Vixen?

(I changed Alena into a Nether Mage too. I figured that with the increased focus on magic stuff in the current version of the story, it would be better to build on that theme too. Hope it makes sense to everybody!)
151112.title: Fun (Feet) Times at the Library

choices: Alena goes home for the night
Alena gets some food first at the diner
1511121.content:
Blake tried to hold onto Vixen’s gigantic toes, but he still could feel himself slipping. Vixen then wiggled her toes one more Blake before removing them from Alena’s moccasins, and it seemed like that final toe wiggle was what finally dislodged him. Blake landed in Alena’s right moccasin with a plop, and he could tell just how sweat soaked this shoe was. He found it hard to move because it was so sticky in there, and the fluffy interior did not help Blake move around.
Blake also noticed the smell that emanated from within the moccasin, and he could feel it completely engulf him. It smelled like the strongest scent he had ever experienced, and he could barely describe it because of how overpowering it was. It was as if he was in a miasma of Alena’s foot sweat, and it was beginning to make his head hurt. It was nothing like Vixen’s heavenly toes that played with him so affectionately and lovingly, but part of Blake was still excited to be brutalized by Alena’s massively titanic and sweaty toes. He also looked at the top of the shoe, near the tongue, and he saw the number 12 printed on it. He realized just how much larger Alena’s feet were, when compared to Vixen’s.


Blake began moving into the toe section, knowing that even though he was made invulnerable, he wasn’t immune to pain, and being smothered and crushed by Alena’s heel or sole would be very painful indeed. As he started to move to the toe section, he saw Alena hover her right foot over the mouth of the moccasin, and she balanced her upper sole on the back end of the moccasin’s opening. She began cracking and wiggling her toes wildly, which caused the whole shoe to shake from their terrifying strength and size. She also bumped her toes into the upper inside part of the moccasin occasionally, shaking Blake up in the process. She even started gripping the shoe’s opening with her large sweaty toes, making sure to squeeze them tightly, almost as if they were taunting Blake and his tiny form. She then started lifting the right moccasin with her right foot, grasping it with her dexterous toes. The angle she caused the moccasin to rest at made Blake start tumbling faster down into the toe section. As he fell, he was covered with Alena’s foot sweat and fluffy cotton debris from the shoe, which made discovery an even greater challenge.


If he thought that the smell was strong near the heel, then this was something on an entirely different level. He could actually see the fog that formed because of the odor, and the entire area felt incredibly humid. He even saw small droplets of sweat fall from the top of the moccasin, which exemplified just how sweaty this shoe was. He was beginning to wish that he was able to hang onto Vixen’s perfect toes, because they would have been a much more favorable mistress than Alena’s toes probably would. He then saw the one thing he wished he wouldn’t, but knew that he would eventually. Alena lowered her foot into the moccasin, but she realized that she needed to do a bit more homework. She said her goodbyes to Vixen, saying “See you later Vixen! I’m gonna stay here for a bit. I need to do some ‘real’ homework before I head out. Bye!!”, and prepared to do some studying. Vixen gave her a light hug, and replied “Take it easy Alena! Glad you could join me for our magic pow-wow.”


When the foot made contact with the sole, Blake saw 5 impossibly large toes face him. They wiggled about excitedly, prepared to return to their smelly home. And Blake was currently residing in their resting place, and he hoped that they would treat him as a guest, and not as an unwelcome pest. Alena wormed her feet into the moccasins, until they were snugly situated inside. For Blake, her 2nd and 3rd toes just barely touched him and he could practically feel the scent radiating from them. They were less than a few inches from Blake, at least from his perspective, and he tried to remain still as to not alert them to his presence. And he watched nervously, as Alena’s toes kneaded the fabric in front of him and wiggled against each other. But sadly, Alena lifted her feet up so they balanced on her heels, which sent Blake tumbling towards the waiting behemoths that were Alena’s toes.


Blake quickly gets grasped by Alena’s 2nd and 3rd toes after colliding with them, and her toes did not plan on letting their new capture get away easily. The tiny mage took a moment to breathe deeply and fight his depressed feelings before speaking again. "I...I'm sorry...I was so desperate to win your heart, but I was so nervous at the same time!"

"I can understand that feeling...but shyness can cause you to miss out on life's joys."

"So...it's a different kind of courage you want in a boy?"

1513111222.title: More options

choices: Vixen was heading to her next class, with Ms. Weiss.
School was over, so Vixen heads to an empty room to fish Blake out of her flat.
15131112221.content:
“Are you sure you don’t want to hide away in my mouth, Blakey?” Vixen said “I’ll have you know that I practice great oral hygiene!” But Blake says “I’ll take your word for it, Vixen. But I’d really rather not. What if you swallowed me?” And Vixen retorts with a smile, saying “I’d be careful with my tiny buddy, Blakey! But I won’t press the issue any more, if you’re so against it.”


Then Vixen started to think of where she could stow away Blake, and she started to shuffle her flats while she thought, and Blake couldn’t help but glance down at the show that was unfolding. Sadly, because of his size and the sheer distance he was from her feet, Blake really couldn’t see anything down there very clearly, but Vixen catches his glance nonetheless, and she grins. Then Vixen says “I’ve got a perfect idea, Blakey!” Vixen’s sudden announcement nearly made Blake fall over, in an attempt to hide the fact that he was staring down at her feet.


Vixen continues, saying “How about I place you in one of my flats, Blakey! You’re small enough to fit comfortably, and I wouldn’t mind having an adorable pebble to get me through the day.” She winks and giggles at Blake as she sees his face turn beet red, and he starts to stammer, saying “Well… I don’t know Vixen. I’m super durable now, but I don’t want to take any more risks.”


But Blake realized that he just blabbed about his magic background, and he was worried that Vixen would judge him or something, but she casually says “Durable, huh? So you really are a mage, Blakey! I had a feeling about you.” Vixen smiles, and Blake gets a bit flustered, and says “You’re crazy, Vixen! Magic and all that are fantasy nonsense. And just forget I said anything about being durable. My head’s still all shaky!” Blake felt bad about lying to Vixen, but he still couldn’t be sure about how much he could trust her, but he never expected to hear what she said next.


Vixen says “Well that’s a bold claim, Blakey, because I’m a mage too!” She winks as Blake’s eyes widened, and he says “What?? But… but how? I never felt anything magical about you.” And Vixen grins, and says “Well, that’s because I’m a Nether Mage, Blakey! We’re really good at hiding our magical attributes and auras, although it’s more of a natural ability than a skill. I’ve had my suspicions about you, but I didn’t really know how to just bring it up. But I’m sure you get that too.”


And Blake calms down, and says “Yeah, I wouldn’t want to tell other people about me being a mage, because I don’t want them to see me any differently. And I still don’t know all that much about the magical world, so I have no idea what could be dangerous or not.” But Vixen changes the subject, and says “Would you mind making a decision though, Blakey? I’m really gonna be late to Ms. Solar’s class if I don’t hide you somewhere soon. And I already know about how much you like you stare at girls’ feet, so don’t waste anymore time trying to hide it. I’m sorry about being blunt Blakey, but I really don’t want to be late again.”


Blake’s cheeks get red again, and he says “Well, if it means getting you to class on time, then I can handle riding in your flat, Vixen.” So Vixen cheers, and says while popping off her left flat “You’re the best little buddy a girl could ask for, Blakey! I promise I’ll treat you right down there.” She winks at Blake as he starts to cough from embarrassment, as Vixen adds “Just kidding, Blakey!” And with that, Vixen lifts her left flat up towards the hand that was holding Blake, and carefully slides him into the shoe.


When Blake lands in the flat, Vixen tilts it so he rolls down into the toe section, where the unique aroma of her feet was a whole lot stronger and distinct. Vixen teases Blake, saying “I figured you wouldn’t like being stuck under me boring heel for the whole class, Blakey. I’m such a thoughtful friend!” Blake didn’t really have a chance to confirm or deny Vixen’s claim, because soon she placed the flat back onto the floor and wormed her foot back inside.


Blake looked ahead of him as her completely massive foot slowly entered its home, and he hoped that her toes wouldn’t mind him sharing their living space. And as her foot came closer to Blake, he noticed just how much larger each of her toes were, especially now that he shrunk even more than he originally did. And once Vixen was able to get her foot all the way inside, Blake looked up to see her absolutely huge 3rd toe staring him down above him.


Blake braced himself, as her toe quickly slammed down into him, and he felt his body contort to its shape completely. Vixen immediately felt him under her 3rd toe, and she skillfully moved him between her 3rd and 4th toes, not wanting to harshly tread all over him on her way to class. Once Blake was deposited between Vixen’s toes, he took the moment to appreciate how it felt and smelled. He noticed that she used a sweet banana scented lotion, but her natural foot scent was already in the process of overpowering it, because of the hot school day.


Once Vixen felt that Blake was nice and secure, she quickly started running to class, knowing that she had less than a minute to get to Ms. Solar’s classroom. Luckily, Vixen was able to make to class on time, thanks to a few skillful uses of short hasting spells. The moments of increased speed caused the toes that neighbored and hugged Blake tightly to squeeze in even more in response to the increased force and pressure.


Thankfully, Vixen reached her desk before the bell rang, and slipped out of her flats instinctively. Then she started to forcefully squeeze her toes, which crammed Blake deeply in her strong smelling toe flesh, but then she realized what she was doing, and she immediately stopped and separated her toes. She silently mouthed a ‘my bad!’ at Blake while smiling guiltily, and he tried to give her a thumbs up as best as he could, while his body was harshly contorted among her toes.


Then she shuffled back on her flats, wanting to try and focus on the lesson. She quickly took down notes, making sure that they were detailed and specific. Since she happened to have the same classes as Blake this year, she felt that it was her duty to review all of the lesson material with him after school, now that he was the size of a tiny bug. And her feet remained fairly still for the moment, and Blake took the chance to admire the tantalizing toes that lovingly embraced him.
Vixen’s toes were beginning to sweat a little bit, but Blake still enjoyed being wrapped around them, and he thought about what she said to him before they left. He had to admit he has taken glances down below the desks at school, especially if a cute girl was playing with their shoes.


Sadly, Aria usually wore sneakers, so he didn’t get to see her play with her shoes very often. And it was annoying because Indigo also wore sneakers frequently, and Blake would see her shoes off constantly, and he even saw her take off her socks once or twice. But Vixen almost always wore the same pair of flats, so she constantly shuffled and played around with them, and he almost couldn’t believe that he was able to join them in their crazy fun.


But as much of an effort Vixen made with keeping her feet still for Blake’s sake, some habits were more challenging to break, so she slowly started to play around with her flats again. She starts by popping her feet out of her flats, and gripping the backs of the shoes, treating Blake to a vigorous massage session. Then she started to spin them on the floor, back and forth, which began to make you a bit dizzy and confused. Then she placed both feet onto a single flat, and she started to rub her left set of toes with her right foot, causing you to be affectionately poked and prodded at.


Suddenly, Blake heard a piercing noise that he quickly identified as the school bell, and his thoughts were interrupted when Vixen scrambled to put back on her flats. She shuffled her feet inside, without looking down, but she realized that with all her shoeplaying, the flats were backwards. So she swiftly turned them around, and planted her feet inside right afterward, smothering Blake among her heavenly toe flesh.


Where was Vixen going next?

She is quite beautiful with very long red hair that reaches her thighs with black colored highlights at the end, amber colored eye with her right eye covered in bangs and she's seemly smiling...at the tiny mage.

The tiny mage senses something not right about her and tries to run away, but he felt his body being wrapped around by the girl's fingers. Blake was shocked of how he was caught by this girl, he does have the advantage of running away by the distance, but she was able to catch him at such speed...His thoughts were interrupted when he was raised up to her face, still grinning at him.

"Well well well...Look who I caught. Little Blake who made a deal to the spirits...Not a very smart choice I would say." The mysterious girl said, poking Blake on the head with her finger.

"Wh-Who are you?" said Blake

"Call me...Prosperine Vaulder. Or 'Rine' for short and I have been looking for you, mage...I'll have my little fun with you before that annoying woman, Raven, comes to take my plaything."

"Raven? How did you-" Blake tries to talk to the mysterious girl, but he was quickly silence when Rine shoves the tiny mage into her cleavage.

"You stay put and don't try to escape...Or I'll make your life a living hell..." The woman threatens the tiny mage, feeling his struggling comes to a stop,,,thought she was actually enjoying it. She quickly heads out of school, making sure no one is following her or seeing her before disappears into thin air...
155331.title: The Mysterious Student...

1553312.content:
Rine arrived in what appeared to be a luxurious-looking bedroom of some sort, tiny Blake now asleep in her cleavage. The mysterious woman carefully plucked her tiny plaything out from between her breasts, and Blake quickly awoke, almost as if from a nightmare.

"Whoa!" Blake panicked. "I had the worst dream of my life!! I was shrunk to half an inch tall and kidnapped by..." He then looked into Rine's amber eyes, his heart sinking. "Oh crap...it's true."

"Hello, my little toy," Rine teased, "did you enjoy your stay in my cleavage?"

"N-no...it's scary being taken prisoner by a giantess...I just want to go home!"

"Tough luck, bug! You're mine now. But...I need to leave for a moment to set up our first 'game'. Until then..."

Rine walked to her dresser and took out a small (well, large to Blake) wooden jewelry box and dropped the tiny mage inside.

"You'll be dorming in there," Rine smiled. "And if you try to escape..." At the worst possible time, the giantess's stomach rumbled. "...I'll make you part of me...FOREVER. So be a good slave and stay put!"

Rine then closed the jewelry box, trapping Blake inside and leaving the keyhole as his only means of obtaining breathable air, before the woman left the room to prepare for those "games" she'd promised.

Blake, meanwhile, was in disbelief. All he wanted was to confess his love to Aria, and now he was stuck inside the jewelry box of a woman he didn't know or trust. He had to get out of here, no matter the cost! Then he remembered something incredibly useful...he had magic!

Concentrating his willpower, Blake uttered a mysterious series of chants and was then enveloped in a purple aura before disappearing from his box prison...and teleporting onto the floor of Rine's bedroom! Whew.

Blake then made a break for the door -- his only ticket out of a long, torturous day...
1553312.title: Boxed In

15533122.content:
Rine opens the door as she looks down to see her tiny captive at near the door as she kneels down to his level and smiled at him with a bit of hunger in her eyes.

"Oh um....." Blake said. "Hi Rine what are you doing here?" He then backs away slowly hoping he wouldn't get caught so easily and knew what would come next for him.

Rine didn't say nothing but slowly reached for her captive as her tummy began to rumble loudly she then smirked as Blake walked back more but tripped over his own feet. "Gotcha my tiny." With that said Rine grabbed her soon to be snack and brought him up past her rumbling tummy up to her face.

"Please don't eat me I'll do anything." Blake said as he tried to get free from her grasp but it was no use as he was brought closer and closer to her mouth as he saw Rine open her mouth.

Rine licked him and closed her mouth. "Mm yummy soon you'll be in my tummy." She then giggles as she opens her mouth again and continues to proceed her tiny to her mouth.

Blake wiggles and squirms trying to break free but he couldn't he then tries biting Rine's hand but doesn't effect her as he was drawing closer to her mouth. Rine then tosses him into her mouth as he landed on her tongue with a wet plop, she then closes her mouth and swishes him around before tilting her head back.

Blake felt himself sliding back as he tried to grab onto her tongue but was soon swallowed with a mighty gulp. Rine giggled as she traced her snack's path down her throat, a bulge is visible as it then vanishes behind her collar bone.

Blake then arrives at his next location the belly of the beast as he stood up he began to bang on the walls. "Let me out! This isn't funny!"

*URP!* Came from Rine's mouth as she giggled again and patted her stomach. "Oh yeah that's good stuff my tiny *URP* snack making me belch a *URP* lot." Rine then lays down on the floor as she felt the tiny pounding on her stomach walls.

"No no no let me out!" Blake yelled as he was thrown about from each burp Rine did he continued to struggle to make her sick but it was no use. "Great just great now what am I gonna do?"


What happens? Does Rine digest him or does he find away out?
15533122.title: Here's Rine

155332.content:
How about a character called Heather?

She is Aria's older cousin and goes to a different class. She's also seem to find Blake's crush on her cousin somewhat comical and mostly likes to tease him, but still has a nicer side as well.
155332.title: Another one

choices: Heather looks down and sees tiny Blake
1553321.content:
Blake was surprised to see the towering figure of Aria's older cousin heading his way. The tiny mage could see her brown hair, blue shirt, green skirt, and white boots, quickly realizing who it was.

"Heather..!"

Sometime the past year, a neighbor's dog, annoyed at Blake for some reason, gnawed the mage's grey pants off, leaving him blushing in his underwear in front of Aria and Heather! Worse, Heather carelessly blabbed to the whole school about the incident, embarrassing poor Blake for three long months...

Despite this humiliating memory, Blake felt that Heather would be his only chance to get to Aria, and so he yelled and waved for the giantess's attention.
1553321.title: Aria's Cousin

choices: "A tiny boy?" Heather picks him up
"Nah, just a bug." Heather walks away
15533211.content:
Blake yells at the top of his lungs "Heather I'm down here! Hello? Hello?" At first, he thinks that no matter how loud he call out to her, she would never hear him. Unfortunately, this was all true as Heather carries on.

Blake watches in horror as the sole of her boot slowly comes down like a giant meteor approaching a planet. There's no way he could avoid it by now and just sat there, waiting for his doom.

"Huh? What's this?"

A miracle shines on Blake as Heather's boot stops in midair. Did she saw him already? Yes she did! He saw her face looking down at his exact spot.

Blake jumps up and down for the last time to further seek her attention. Heather noticed this and swat down to get a closer look at the sight below her.
15533211.title: Getting her attention

155332111.content:
“A tiny boy..?”

Heather leaned down to scoop up the tiny boy into her hand, raising him to eye level for a better look.

“H-hi there, Heather...” Blake blushed. “It’s me - Blake.”

“...BLAKE?!” Heather’s reaction was sudden and shocked. “Why are you so small?”

“W-well...I made a deal with ghosts to try to impress Aria, but I ended up shrunken. Please, you have to help me find Aria!”

The colossal girl stared at the little mage atop her palm for a good minute before replying...
155332111.title: Heather’s Little Guy

1553322.content:
You know, it's not every day you read about a witch hunter in a shrinking story. How about this one:

Sylvia Steel
Age: Thirty-something
Height: 6'4"
Typical wear: White dress shirt, greyish-white pants, grey boots
Hair color: Pale grey
Eye color: Pale grey

Sylvia is a cold, calculating Witch Hunter. She has been spying on Blake for a few years now, but has not had a chance to eliminate the mage. But now that he's shrunken, she might catch him...

The whole mess started during the last century's Witch Hunts, when countless innocent mages were killed due to spreading fears of supernatural practices. The surviving mages either fled the country, gave up magic, or continued their mystical careers in secret. Nowadays, most people don't care whether someone casts spells to improve lives.

Sylvia is not most people.

So...how about it? Will Blake encounter Sylvia?
1553322.title: Up for another witch hunt?

15533221.content:
Blake paled as he saw a towering woman with pale hair, grey eyes, a white dress shirt, pale-grey pants, and grey boots. (Try saying THAT three times fast!) The tiny mage recalled that the Witch Hunts were history by now, but this giantess apparently felt the need to finish the job.

"Sylvia Steel..!" Blake panicked mentally, trying to calm himself down. "I'd better get out of here before she sees me..."

Sylvia peered back and forth, in her search for any remaining practitioners of the spooky arts. The witch hunter huffed when her search seemed to reach an annoying halt. However, her gaze suddenly turned to something black moving on the ground. It kinda looked like a bug...or...a shrunken mage?!
15533221.title: The Witch Hunter

choices: "...I'll swallow you and keep you in my stomach!"
155332211.content:
Very suspicious of the tiny figure running away from her, Sylvia leaned down and snatched it up with her dainty yet mighty hand. Raising her enclosed fist up to her face, the witch hunter opened her fist and made quite the discovery.

"Blake?!" Sylvia reacted. "You're so tiny! I figured a mage would be so foolish..."

"Mage?! Me?!" Blake tried to cover up his greatest secret. "You can't be serious."

"Don't try to fool me, kid. You're coming with me for questioning, whether you like it or not! But...it'd be strange for puny little you to be out in the open at half an inch tall. So, to keep you secure and unable to escape..."
155332211.title: The Act is Up

choices: Follow Sylvia as she heads to take Blake in for interrogation.
1553322111.content:
Blake froze and began panicking, attempting to hold on to anything that would keep him from falling into the maw of one of the magic world's worst fear. The cold woman let out a dark laugh, "It's fun to see you struggle. Please continue as you head into my gut."

With that, she opened her mouth wide, showing the tiny mage his destination; her throat. Sylvia flicked Blake inside and hummed as she tasted him. "My, you're quite the wriggly one. Good." She said, as she pinned Blake to the roof of her mouth with her tongue.

"I wish there were more of you. You taste so great, I'm almost tempted to digest you!" She grinned as she tilted her head back, humming as she felt the mage's pathetic struggles reach her throat. And with a loud and satisfying gulp, Sylvia grinned as she felt the boy's struggles in her esophagus and into her stomach.

"Have fun in there. And try to stay alive. You're still of use to me, even at your pathetic size." Sylvia said as she walked away, rubbing and patting her stomach along the way.
1553322111.title: "...I'll swallow you and keep you in my...

choices: Sylvia ends up coughing Blake out and into her cleavage. She's pretty pissed.
Sylvia teases Blake by giving him false hope, only to swallow him down again.
15533221112.content:
Inside the terrifying woman's stomach, the mage sat down, his head aching as he thought of a way to escape his fleshy prison. He was not going through the back exit nor could he wait. So, he only chance was to climb up Sylvia's throat.

Biting his lip, he casted a spell to help him climb the slippery surface of Sylvia's muscles. Afterwards, he began climbing the woman's gut, before heading through the sphincter to her esophagus. 'Almost there.' The mage thought, as he continued to climb upward towards the woman's mouth.

About half way up Sylvia's esophagus...
15533221112.title: Heading Up.

1553322112.content:
Blake cowered in the giantess's firm grip as Sylvia walked out of the building with her captive. The tiny mage suddenly felt a question run through his mind: how did this witch hunter even infiltrate Opal High without being witnessed?

"P-please, let me go!" Blake begged.

"Oh, I'll let you go, alright..." Sylvia taunted. "You'll go right into..."
1553322112.title: Should choice chapters even be this long?

15533222.content:
Howsabout Blake encounters one of his bullies?

Nora Comet

Age: 16
Height: 5'7"
Typical wear: Purple T-shirt, blue jean shorts, purple sneakers
Hair color: Black
Eye color: Blue

Nora is slightly chubby, but surprisingly strong. She regularly torments Blake with rude nicknames, brutal beatdowns, and everything in between. But could she have a good heart underneath that rough exterior? Probably not.

So, how about Nora?
15533222.title: The bane of Blake's existence

choices: "...I'm going to chew you up like gum!"
155332221.content:
A large hand suddenly grasped Blake's miniscule form, and the mage boy was raised up. As the hand opened up, he was relieved of its tight, unsettling grip, and looking into his captor's sapphire eyes, Blake's heart sank.

"Nora..!"

"Hey, pipsqueak!" Nora teased. "I knew you were weak and small, but THIS is just ridiculous!" The bully burst out laughing. "Imagine all the things I could do with you now..."

"Nora...p-please..." Blake trembled with fear. "I just want to see Aria!"

"Aww, too bad! You're my personal plaything now. Get used to your new life, because..."
155332221.title: The Nightmare Begins...

choices: Nora sticks the gum - and Blake - to her shoe sole
Nora asks about how he got so small - and if he can do more tricks...
1553322211.content:
"...I'm going to chew you up like gum!"

With that declaration, Nora reached into her bag, her pudgy fingers fishing around rapidly. Blake shuddered. Her grasp felt oddly cold. He easily sunk into the fleshy mounds of her palm, which nearly engulfed his limbs. Her eyes darted around quickly, her lip rubbing gently. What was she planning? Was she serious?

The towering terror tugged out a piece of gum. Not only that: USED gum. Off-pink, molded in the shape of gigantic molars... and, as she removed it from its plastic bag, the minuscule mage noticed that it smelt of her breath. He nearly squealed, reeling away from the chewed wad. His hands clawed across the wrinkles in her skin, tickling her gently.

"What's the matter, shrimp?" She taunted above, after making sure nobody was around. "Are you THAT scared of a bit of candy?" It wiggled teasingly in front of his face - so close he could almost taste the wet surface.

Without a second thought, she plunged him in, back-first. Blake bit his teeth to withstand the pressure against his chest. The great pillars of Nora's fingers squeezed quickly, brutally mashing him into the wad. Within a few idle twitches of her digits, the shrunken black shirt and pants were indistinguishable from the snack. No matter how hard he tried to move his arms, the rosy wet mass stuck to them - immobilizing the boy completely.

A smirk slid across her face. Nora slid her tongue out, opening her jaw - salivating intensely as she swept it over her victim's exposed face. Her lips closed teasingly around the gum piece, cutting him off from all light - and she started sucking. Blake felt as if his head was about to be torn off.

She quickly tugged him back out, cheeks spread in a mockingly-innocent smile. "How does it look like in there, smallstuff?" One finger picked her nose. "Like an inescapable cave? Or... like a red carpet, welcoming its guest? Maybe like a graveyard of my last few meals?" She bit the air in front of him, nearly nipping off his nose. Her stomach groaned softly.

"Please! Please don't eat me!" He wailed, unable to wipe the sweat from his body.

The swimming pools of her eyes narrowed to laser beams. "Eat you? And clog my system with a sniveling deviant like you?" She laughed loud and hard, spew flying from her mouth out at Blake's face. "I'd rather swallow down a turd! But if you REALLY insist..."

Ignoring his protests, she opened wide - and carelessly flicked the gum wad in, along with Blake. He landed on her tongue, splashing into a pool of her juices. The muscle instantly began flipping his squishy prison around. It alternated between a perfect view of her throat, and a faceful of her drool. Then, she lathered him with wave upon layer of spit, soaking his clothes. He kept pushing back, trying to bear the pain - but it was no use, the nightmare of a girl had him completely at her mercy.
That's when she decided to start chewing.

Nora's tongue tossed him brusquely onto her right molar. He knew what was happening, and cried out for a shred of compassion one last time. His answer: the full force of her upper jaw squeezing down on him. With a horrible CHOMP, she ground her teeth together. Blake felt his limbs twist into impossible positions with every motion she made. When the two while walls separated once more, some of the pink candy clung to it - he could see the thin traces of moisture running across it.

In an instant, her tongue grasped him again - tossing his body to the other side of her mouth. He could see Nora's cheek curl up in a smile, even from the inside. It disgusted him. Blake's back felt to brunt of her molar's assault, compressing him tighter into the candy - and pushing his mind closer to breaking. He hated it. That smile - it looked so innocent and unassuming from a distance. Almost sickeningly cute. But whenever she put it on, it was followed by a taunt, or a threat. As the teeth kept driving into him, like fierce daggers jabbing into him, it was all he could think of...

Nora chuckled softly. By now, she'd walked a fair distance with this tiny boy in her mouth. Finally, the school would be free from his stupid looks, his weird murmurings, his stupid whining. Her mind ran free with possibilities, dreaming about new ways to torment him. Until one enticing question popped into her head. How did he get so tiny? People didn't just shrink, no matter how weird they were. Did he build a shrink ray? If he knew how to do that, he might know other things. Things she could use. Things with which she could terrorize him even more.

Having felt enough of his pointless struggling, she started to blow a bubble.

She spread him across the roof of her mouth, pressing hard. The ridges drove into his chest, making him cry out in terror. When it was flat enough, her lips puckered out. The gum moved, pulling Blake with it. It expanded. The pink surface was weak enough for Blake to get free from, now - only for the minuscule mage to face a hurricane of her breath against him. He forced back, but his legs were still numb from torture.

Soon, he was hurdling to the bubble - a pink globe that just kept getting bigger. He landed on its side, not leaving even an indent. Across from him lay lockers and classroom doors he recognized. Below, way down below, the floor tiles spread out in a hypnotic pattern - should he drop, it'd be a harsh impact. And behind him... Nora. Still smiling as wide as ever. Her hands planted firmly on her hips. With a wink, she blew a little more -

POP.

The little speck of a boy fell through the air - only to land right back into his captor's palm. She peered down, licking her lips clean of the pink gum surrounding them. He quivered, nearly bowing to her.

"Stop! I'll do anything!"

She laughed. "I'm sure you will. If you don't... I might just decide you taste good after all." She rubbed her cheek. "Now, how to break you in next..."
1553322211.title: Bull-ly-ing!

choices: He's staying in for a while...
Nora forces him out for something else
15533222111.content:
Nora's looming face peered in closer. He got a full view of the flesh mountains that formed her nose and cheeks. The crashing bangs across her head were like branches swept in a storm. Her other hand lifted upwards, index held behind her thumb - in a flash, she flicked Blake. The force made him fly halfway across her palm.

The cruel girl's laughter boomed in his ears - followed by her gum-chewing. This couldn't be it. There HAD to be some escape route, some way to talk her out of this! He gulped, gathering his words - but she cut him off.

"Now, I've got a few questions. How did you make yourself a bug? Not that you weren't pesky before, but seriously."

Blake shook his head. What a girl like Nora could do with his secrets... He didn't even want to think that. "No idea! I just woke up like this!"

She glared down to his tiny eyes, brow falling down. "You're a pathetic liar. A pathetic everything, really." Her face twisted upwards, scooping him up with her nose. "Spill. Spill it. Did you get caught in an embarrassing science lab accident? Get caught in the clothes dryer?" She tilted her head slightly, making him slide down the ridge. He could feel her heavy breathing underneath.

"I told you! I don't know!" He started running - leaping off her face.

"Beeep! Wrong answer." She called out, snatching him from the sky.

He found himself in her fingers again. His owner spat her gum out, and began sticking it to him again - this time, tying it like a rope around his arms and legs. He froze, unsure what she'd do if he struck back. By the time he was fully tied, there was still a bit of stringy gum hanging behind him. Nora pulled him up by that - dangling his body back and forth like a pendulum above her mouth. "Maybe a few hours trapped in my big, bad belly will jog your memory?"

"You... You wouldn't!" He gasped. The mouth below had red, glistening walls, leading far down below. "You're going to kill me!" Of course, he was halfway bluffing - she didn't know about his super endurance. But maybe, if he could appeal to her kinder side-

She bounced him slightly, using the candy like a bungee cord. "Gum doesn't digest, stupid." She rubbed her stomach, calming its slight gurgles. "At least, I'm pretty sure that's how it works. I'd like to find out!" Her pink lips parted, as she dangled Blake's trapped body a little more.

No! Nonono! This couldn't be happening! His mind went over every spell in his books, trying to come up with something. But - to reveal himself here, like this? He couldn't take that lightly - but he couldn't go hurtling into her mouth! This was NORA, for crying out loud! Finally, he swallowed, and yelped out: "WIND!"

A great tornado took him - a gentle breeze to the titanic girl. The wind's strength snapped through the thin strand of gum - and sent him pummeling down into the hungry gullet. His senses were overtaken with Nora's breath, the feeling of her saliva against his face, the mocking laughter that erupted all around.

Slowly, her esophagus forced him down. It masticated him with the gum. For a second, it froze, struggling to bring the mass down. A like poke from the titanic finger on the other side of the throat pushed it down - and he soon found his free-fall continuing, down into the murky depths of her gut. He splashed into an off-green sea of acids.

The micro mage could barely look. The place was like a lost world of half-digested snacks, meals, and muscle, spreading out everywhere - slowly sloshing. Sure, he'd seen anatomical diagrams of it. But they always looked so clean, so formal... They didn't have the rhythmic movements that sounded out here, the foul smell of digestive bile, the sound of juices mingling and a frozen heart thumping...

A soft stomach wall to his right hit him, hard. Blake knew Nora was patting her pudgy belly. It made the waves of liquid and food around grow wilder. Even worse than the sounds of her body processing food, her voice boomed around, in every direction: "Wind? What the heck was that? Some sorta magic? Well, best hope you're better at escape tricks."

Even with the horrors around him - even with the girl having seen proof of his best-hidden, most potentially destructive secret - Blake tried to stay calm. He focused his strength, whispering mage chants. With the way she'd wrapped the gum, he didn't actually have much trouble moving this time. Though gross, it made a suitable armor against her enzymes.

The teensy mage took a long moment like this - just thinking of potential ways to leave. He slammed his shoulder into one pulsating pink wall - only to stick to it. He unglued himself, and rammed into it again - with greater strength. It only bounced back at him, like a boxing weight - forcing him to the liquid again. When he got up, some minuscule crumbs from crackers and cheese had gathered across his face.

Another sudden roar sounded out - this one from the outside. Shortly after, Nora's voice rang in his ears. "You're probably lonely there, huh? No friends, no way out... Don't worry, I'm sending you some company!"

The little mage's mind raced. What company? Was someone else tiny? He held his neck up, meeting the new arrival - a stream of clear soda that sputtered against his face. Some slid between his lips, which he immediately spat back out. He was willing to endure many things to keep his magic a secret from evil. But he would NOT swallow anything his old tormentor had already slurped down. He remembered that she'd usually order this drink with his lunch money - and always almost accompanied by-

SPLORT.

That. He could barely dodge before a glob of curry pinned his legs down. The orange sauce crawled down like toxic ooze; its strong, meaty odor mingling with the bazaar of other scents in the realm of his bully's protruding gut.

And now, she poked her navel - squeezing the walls in again. "I've ordered a nice, big portion in case a certain little parasite down there gets hungry. Be thankful!"

Another forkful fell down, spreading out before Blake like an island in the murky, warm sea. Her stomach growled, which came out to Blake like the sound of twelve lions about to devour him. The immense trembling made acid fall from the ceiling, and churned all the contents around - tossing Blake to the other end of the digestive organ. She slid a hand under her shirt to rub her belly, deliberately being as slow and hard as possible - wondering what sort of torment it was sending her plaything. "You really should try some, this stuff's great. But it always upsets my stomach..."

She punctuated that with another sip of her soda. Nearly immediately after the waterfall of liquid descended, the mage made out small bubbles ascending to the roof of her mouth... And soon, another earth-rattling sensation came forth from the depths of her stomach.

*BUUURRRP!*

The belch blew him of the squishy ground, and shook the whole miasma-laden microcosm. Blake remembered a time he was on a water park ride like this - safety inspectors had it shut down not long after. Nora's stomach, though - it made that whole thrilling experience feel like a playground slide in comparison. It was like being caught in a whirling, violent tempest of gunk and juice, lathering his gum-coated body again and again in thick coats.

And she didn't stop. No - she went out of her way to buy refills, salads, side-dishes - everything she got her hands on, she instantly stuffed in her greedy mouth. And everything that fell down added a new, unique sensation to Blake's pain. The strong mingling of ketchup and mustard. Floods of energy drinks, sweeping across the biological prison. Whole tectonic plates of masticated chips, smothering out the breathing space.

As time went on, moving became an impossible dream, so heavy his body felt with the foodstuffs hanging over his body. And each moment it seemed like the storm would stop - that the rumbling and burping would slow down - that maybe, he could have a moment yo rest from the violent sloshing... She got up for more. Her movements were wide, exaggerated, as if to make sure her body kept stirring the snack of a boy inside. Sometimes, she seemed to just stand up to stretch, or jog in place - tilting Blake's center of gravity this way and that, and leading to more wails from deep within her inescapable body. Every attempt he made to escape just had him fall back into the acids. And every time, there was more of her food and drool clinging all over his body, making him nearly indistinguishable from the other contents.

Hearing one muffled scream from deep within, Nora rubbed her shirt again, smiling. What would people think if they knew he was in there? Well, that didn't matter - nobody could see him. Nobody could help him. He was truly stuck.

She snuck in another whisper down to him when nobody was listening: "Welcome to hell."
15533222111.title: The Bully's Bowels

choices: Nora notices, but will she bother to help him?
Nora doesn't notice; Blake resorts to telepathy.
155332221111.content:
Within the unbearable conditions of his tormentor's stomach, Blake tried his hardest to get up, but the masticated food coating his body made his body too heavy for a weakling like him to lift. Even his magical chants wouldn't save him now - sickly green liquids seeped into the tiny mage's organic prison and met the foodstuffs that were immobilizing him with a sizzling hiss. In nearly a minute, Blake's chewed-up shackles were dissolved completely, allowing him to wade to the fleshy stomach walls and pound repeatedly, yelling for help as he did so.

It was futile.

Seconds into his vain struggles, Blake felt a sharp irritation in his legs and feet...followed by an even worse burning sensation. Nora's stomach acids were slowly eating away at the shrunken boy's skin, bringing his pain to even more intense levels. In about three minutes, Blake figured his feet were completely digested, and in six...he blacked out, sinking into the boiling lake.

Nora looked down and rubbed her tummy, no longer feeling the annoying efforts of her little snack to fight for his life.

"Finally, the little runt stops squirming," Nora said to herself, "I bet he'll go right through me in a matter of hours!"

Soon, the bell rang -- lunchtime was over. Nora got up and grabbed her things before making her way toward Ms. Solar's homeroom for her next class. She managed to hide her amusement at the idea of Blake ending up in the toilet, and later, the sewers. But such was not the case at all...the poor boy had suffered a fate far worse.

Blake slowly and groggily awoke to a startling sight -- a classroom? But how? He tried to move around, but came to the shocking realization that he couldn't budge! He then peered around in place to discover that he couldn't see his arms...his legs...or his body! The only things Blake was aware of were a low growl behind him and a hand rubbing him...then the horrible truth dawned on him - he had been digested completely and converted entirely into muscle for Nora's abs! Blake panicked, yelling to his host for help...well, TRYING to, anyway. He couldn't speak out loud in his new form, so he had to come up with some other way to get Nora's attention. What did he have left to lose? The bodiless soul concentrated deeply, but all he could manage was weak jiggling in the skin of his bully's chubby abs.

Hopefully Nora would notice this...
155332221111.title: Stuck in Nora's Abs

choices: Keep trying to burn him off
Leave the gym to get a belly button piercing.
1553322211111.content:
Sitting in class, Nora felt a strange movement coming from her abs. She poked herself roughly, only to feel the movements continue. "Oh...My...God. This is perfect." Nora said with a wicked smile. The sadistic bully knew that Blake was trapped in her abs, unable to escape.

Nora slapped her gut, letting Blake know that his captor was fully aware of his situation. "I'm going to make your new home a living hell once I get out of here." Nora whispered as the bell rang, gathering up her things and heading to her car.

Now alone, she lifted her shirt and smacked her abs once again, "That's what you get for lying little shrimp. Now you get to be a part of me forever. You get to be part of my fat!....Oh...I wonder then....If I could workout and burn you away, getting rid of you like body fat."

Blake's heart turned to stone, "Oh god no, this can't be happening!" The mage tried to yell up, only causing protest jiggles. "What's that Blake? I'll tell you what, if you can say anything to me I'll let you go. Go on, say something?" Nora taunted, knowing he would have spoken by now.

Blake jiggled and wiggled all he could, but not a sound was made. "I guess your getting a workout then Fatboy." Nora laughed as she drove off to the gym with a smile. Blake shook in fear as Nora soon arrived and changed into a one piece workout outfit

Stepping out onto the workout mats nearby, Nora laid down into a plank position, lifting herself up and holding her body up. Blake could feel his prison tighten and strain. It felt like he was being squeezed and strecthed at the same time. The pain only grew as Nora held longer and longer.

"This is....Some workout.... Fatboy....You'll be gone in no time." She threatened, feeling Blake shake her tighten and. The pain was getting worse for Blake, would he actually burn away? Nora finally collapsed onto her gut, pressing hard with her stomach to torment Blake.

The tension started to lessen, but it still felt like Blake was being pressed in-between to pains of glass. "Alright Shrimp....i...Might keep going.....Just to burn you out....Otherwise....I'm going to make sure....Everyone sees your brand new ...Home " Nora said, a bit exhausted as she pressed Blake into the mat.

Blake wanted to cry, he felt like every inch of his body was constantly bring strecthed and flattend. But little did Blake know what Nora was going to do to him next.
1553322211111.title: Noras ABnormal out punishment

"Think, Blake, think!" Blake thought to himself. "There has to be a way I can get out of here...if only I could remember the separation spell!"

"Well, shrimp..." Nora sighed. "I guess I can't burn you away. So I'll just make your new home more appealing...to everyone else! And I'll do that by getting my belly button pierced!"

As Nora changed back into her normal clothes and exited the gym, Blake suddenly remember another important aspect of his seances -- he had psychic powers! Perhaps he could use telepathy to speak into his captor's mind, and maybe even convince her to help him out.

I don't want to die because of some worthless lump in my abs." Nora said, sitting down in her and making the quick trip to the tattoo and piercing shop.

The woman quickly came back with a piercing that was shaped like a tiny key, oh irony. "That's perfect!" She exclaimed, rubbing her gut to tease the tiny mage in his frantic search through his brain. Thank you, I imagine this will make a special little guy very happy." Nora said as she paid for her new piercing. 155332221111122.title: Nora gets a piercing

1553322211111221.content:
The metal seal kept Blake from doing anything, stuck deep inside his bully's abs just to keep her happy. Each step Nora took bounced the tiny mage around, letting him get a good look at the outside world from her crop top. People walked by, either paying no mind to the two of them at all, or staring right at her gut and the cute belly piercing. No one would ever think that a tiny mage was sealed inside, crying to the world for help.

"Nora, get me out of here, I need help!!" He screamed, wondering if she would even be able to hear him over the jiggling protests. Nora quickly slapped her abs, silencing his moves, "Stop squirming down there, if you wanted to get out so bad why don't you just do it?!" They both were silent for a minute, and that's when she realized what was going on. "Wait a minute.....you can't get out can you?! The piercing is holding you inside like a lock! Bwahahahahah!!!!!" She laughed, tightening her gut and getting tears in her eyes. "Oh that's perfect! You can't get out unless I let you! I think school will be interesting tomorrow for you." With that said, Nora continued on her way home, paying no attention to Blake as she traveled back to her house.

"Nora no! T-thats not true, I can get out, I....just want to be able to do it when you least expect it!" He tried to lie. The whole trip home, Blake was trying to think of some way out of this, but every option was useless as Nora kept slapping him, as if to reject the idea. Before long, she had made it back home and flopped onto her bed, getting ready for a well earned rest. "Night gut, see you tomorrow for a day of humiliating torture!" She laughed, wiggling in bed before going to sleep.

Blake cried silently the whole night, praying he could get some sleep as the hours ticked away. He thought about life as Noras abs, being forced to see everyone and everything he knew and loved, but not being able to interact with them. Stuck with the person he hated the most until she decided to take the piercing out. The night went by slowly, but eventually Nora was up and about, getting ready for school and not even giving Blake a thought.

The halls were filled with their fellow classmates; and it seemed that everyone was in love with Nora's new piercing. Usually, people didn't look at her much, but it was like the new accessory took the weight off of her. "Looking good Nora, love the new you." Came the happy voices of students. "Hey Nora you're looking great today....Uhm....I have a strange question...have you seen Blake, he's been a bit.... different lately." She said nervously, wondering if she knew what she meant. Blake was screaming for help, thrashing and jiggling around. The look on Nora's face was one of fear, knowing that she couldn't slap him or she would be caught. She could feel her abs moving, but the question was, did Aria notice?
1553322211111221.title: Trapped for Nora's amusement
