"Well..." Aria replied, "Blake hasn't shown up for school in days! I'm starting to get concerned...hey, Nora, why's your stomach acting up?"

The bully blushed, nervously trying to come up with some excuse to keep her jiggling prisoner hidden. "Um...dietary changes?"

The brunette gave Nora a skeptical glare. "I thought dietary changes would solve stomach problems rather than CAUSE them..."

Nora seemed to have run out of rationales. Aria had her cornered. "Ugh, alright! Blake shrunk himself, and I found the little squirt on the floor. He wouldn't tell me how he got so tiny, so..." A low gurgle from her chubby stomach interrupted her...and made the truth apparent to Aria.

The color faded from Aria's face. "You didn't..!"

"I mean, it's not like we can do much about -- " Nora was cut off by Aria's hand grabbing her throat.

"You monster!!" Aria screamed, anger and tears in her eyes. "How could you do that to someone as nice as Blake?!"

"Aria..!" Blake yelled mentally, praying that his voice would reach her mind. "Please, let go of Nora...this won't get me out!!"

The yellow-clad girl released her hold on Nora's neck, allowing her to breathe again. "Blake..?" Aria reacted softly, still fighting her sadness. "You can get out of there? How?"

"First things first...we need to get this piercing out of Nora's belly button. Then, one of you needs to recite a separation spell!"

"So how do we work this magic, then?" Nora asked, more concerned with saving her own self rather than Blake.

"I have a spellbook at my house," Blake explained, "it should be on the nightstand in my bedroom! Just ask Jade, she knows for sure!"

Aria was starting to perk up. "Alright, Nora...let's get Blake restored to normal!"

Rubbing her pudgy gut for a moment after hearing Aria's words, Nora...

You cant just do this to me!!!" he tried to scream out, hoping for some change to his situation to occur. 15533222111112211222.title: The Cheerleader Arrives

155332221111122112221.content:
Nora smirked to herself at Ruby’s question and spared a quick glance down at the mage in question’s gurgling prison. She was feeling on top of the world with her complete domination of Blake. Her pride just couldn’t be contained, and she needed to show off her little victory.

“Obviously, I gobbled him up!” She proclaimed proudly, giving her flab a jiggle and then a hard slap that sent a jolt of pain through the trapped Blake. “He’s nothing more than pudge on my fat gut now! That’s the fate of tasty little brats like him!”

The cheerleader’s eyes went wide, as if she believed every word. The expression made the color drain from Nora’s face, and she slapped herself internally. Ruby was Blake’s friend, so who was to say she didn’t know about magic and what it could make possible.

Ruby was quiet, her shocked expression unchanging as she stared down at other girl’s fat.

Nora internally sighed with relief, happy that she got to keep her little bit of living belly fat. “Alright, I will.”

The bully said her goodbyes to Ruby, paid for her lunch, and exited the restaurant before giving her pudge another jiggle, which briefly made Blake dizzy.

“C-come on, Nora! Let me out! Please!!” Blake begged psychically as his captor’s satisfied stomach gurgled behind him. His pleas were quickly met and silenced with a painful smack.

“Sorry, gut boy...” Nora taunted the digested mage, kneading his prison around with both her hands. “But you shouldn’t have rejected my affections back in middle school. And now you get to stay with me forever, on MY terms!”

With a few more pats to her chubby gut, Nora made her way back to school to tough out the rest of the day. Hopefully the time would fly by fast...

Blake, meanwhile, struggled as much as he could within the cramped tightness of his tormentor’s abs, despite his failure to telepathically relay his message to Ruby. But there had to be someone else who might help him. Focusing deeply, the bodiless soul sent a psychic signal to...
1553322211111221122211.title: Plan B

choices: Blake manages to jump to Indigo’s breasts.
Blake accidentally jumps to the librarian’s ass.
15533222111112211222111.content:
“Ind---!”

Indigo’s eyes flicked up from her book, responding to the minute and strange noise she had just heard. All that was there was one of the school library's many bookshelves, packed to the brim with all sorts of books to catch the eye of any curious onlooking student. While many a student would find it boring beyond words, it was an extremely calming sight to the bookworm girl, who vastly preferred the company of books to that of most people.

Deciding whatever she had heard was nothing more than a small trick of the mind, she quickly returned to her studies.

“Ind-go! -leas- he--!”

Again she heard the noise, much clearer than before and easily discernible as a voice, and this time Indigo pulled her head up from her book to scan around the room. To her right there was nothing but two lines of unoccupied chairs following the rest of her table, till it came to a stop a few spaces before a tightly shut window. To her left, across the small gap between the table and the main desk, the librarian appeared completely absorbed in her adult-fantasy book, as she had been for the last half hour or so. Indigo doubted the source of the weak call could have been her in the first place, for the voice had sounded younger, male and somewhat familiar…

Slowly, with a shake of the head, she returned to her work once more.

“Indigo! Please help me!”

Indigo blinked rapidly. That voice was… “Blake?”

The boy’s voice boomed in her mind, emboldened by a tone of hope. “No time to explain! Listen, I need you to open yourself up to me!”

Indigo’s face contorted in pure confusion, and she couldn’t stop herself from shrieking. “What?!” Her outburst was loud enough for the librarian to break away from the depths of her story to sternly shush the student, her eyes scalding the girl from behind her glasses. Indigo awkwardly nodded at her in apology, and the librarian quickly returned to her book.

“I know it sounds weird, but please! I’ll explain everything when I get there, but right now I-”

Suddenly, there was a loud smack accompanied by the what sounded like a distant, disgusting belch and indiscernible taunting from someone else. Blake whimpered in pain, sounding too much like a kicked puppy for Indigo to possibly ignore. “I-Indigo, please!”

Quietly, so as not to angry the woman across from her, and through gritted teeth, Indigo snarled in agitation. “… This better not be some kind of stupid joke, Hart!” She closed her eyes and released, letting go of any kind of internal resistance as she awaited whatever it was Blake was doing.
15533222111112211222111.title: Indigo and the familiar voice

choices: He jumps to the librarian’s rear.
He’s utterly trapped in Nora’s abs...
155332221111122112221112.content:
Does Blake actually end up jumping to the librarian’s ass?

Or does the piercing keep him trapped in Nora’s abs?
155332221111122112221112.title: Before we continue...

choices: "...and undo the magic that has been done!"
1553322211111222.content:
The next Monday, many students at Opal High School stared in amazement at Nora's new belly button piercing as she walked by in a purple crop top. Her pudge didn't seem to bother anyone -- they were far too dazzled by the tiny adornment on her navel to notice it...or the fact that Blake had been missing for several days now.

Speaking of Blake, the poor mage sobbed softly as his captor showed off her piercing. Whenever he would try to jiggle her abs and get someone to notice his plight, Nora would slap her gut, sending a brief surge of pain through Blake. Unfortunately, with the key-like object pierced into Nora's navel, he couldn't cast the separation spell, and thus he couldn't return to his normal self. He was stuck.

...

That Friday afternoon, however, Nora had already forgotten about her little prisoner, having a new problem to deal with -- she had come down with a bit of a stomachache! She figured the piercing may have gone a bit too deep into the skin of her abs. The chubby bully put two fingers to the cold metal and, with some painful effort, managed to remove the piercing from her belly button before heading out of her room to fetch some medicine for her aching tummy.

Now was Blake's chance to escape! The mage sighed and concentrated deeply, preparing the spell that would get him out of his tormentor's abs.

"Take these two that are now one..."
1553322211111222.title: A Chance to Escape Nora's Abs

choices: Blake tells the truth about his magic
Blake casts a spell to escape - but does it work?
15533222112.content:
Nora chuckled, walking over to a bench - resting her large buttocks on a spot where she'd carved her initials. She tossed Blake up and down in her palm. At the sudden changes in gravity, pulling his messy hair up and down, he desperately screamed out - his voice only a faint whistle to the rest of the world, but like a wonderful solo performance to the bully's ears.

Some curious students turned their heads to check the noise's source. With a few dark-intentioned stares, and directions from her hand, the bully warded them off. She kicked her feet out, looking at her purple sneakers. Ages of abuse had made the laces brown. They presently hung next to the treads across the bottom, the spongy grips like the walls of an ancient ruin. An idea came into her head.

Suddenly, her open jaws chomped him in midair, like a shark grabbing prey from above. The mage was subjected to a few more excruciating chomp cycles. They drove him back into the gum wad, and deep, to boot. Nora had to make sure it had been softened up enough, and was soaking wet - that would help bring out the old gum's stickiness. Suddenly, her lips fell close together in a pucker - and she spat him out, hurdling the half-inch body to the floor tiles at exit velocity.

Blake lay aching below, a pathetic black dot in the pink mass. Thankfully, his superhuman strength - and the fruity candy's padding - protected him from any injury. But under Nora's laughing - the girl looking down through her nose in callous disdain - he knew more pain was coming . The wad constricted him, preventing all movement. Even if he could lift an arm, pull off a spell, Blake was too shocked by the sudden halt to make a move. He only sweated as he watched her scraped knees swing back and forth in the sky, making her shoe's sole a looming pendulum.

"Whelp. Your flavor didn't last." Nora didn't even try to lower her voice - she was skipping, and the halls cleared out quickly. She hovered her worn sneaker's toes over him, laughing at how easily she made him recoil. His head twisted back and forth to get away from the white-tipped, titanic footwear. It tapped his chest, releasing the wind from him in one swift puff. When he tried to breathe again, all he cloud grab was the slight musk from the gigantic, worn shoes that lay above him.

Then she stepped down. Her heel fell onto him, squeezing him against the ground.

The pink gunk slid easily between the treads, gripping onto them. They pressed deep in, the gum spreading further under Nora's foot pressure; it slid around Blake's arms and legs, gluing him in deeper. When her sole lifted, he felt himself rising with the leg. And as she leaped off the bench, he fell to the ground - hurtling onto the cold tiles, protected only by a tight layer of candy and a bully's disgusting spit.

He gasped. She'd just glued him to her right sneaker's sole! That filthy, worn footwear that gathered all sorts of bugs, dirt, and bacteria... He was a piece of gum stuck to it!

The bully took a step forward with her left leg. He heard the THWOOM in the distance, a muted echo - but couldn't see a thing. At least, not until she began lifted the other leg, showing him a blur of lockers and the familiar-but-dizzying wall paint. Within a second, she'd finished her step, slamming him to the ground.

He heard another deep noise forward - the only indication of direction in the void underneath her treads. Another step, sending the mage flying forward - and he was already praying for the end.

"The hall monitors will catch me if I stay in place for too long." She giggled, deliberately stomping as hard as possible. "But don't worry about them spotting you. You'll soon be so covered in dirt and motionless that nobody will be able to tell you from the gunk gathered on my shoe." Another harsh step - Nora bent down a bit to shift her weight to her right foot. "And if they can see you - well, who'd blame me? People step in gum all the time."

She now leaped forward, landing hard on Blake's body. This was a horrifying experience, sending him twitching in terror. Nora bore some very unique physical traits. One, tucked snugly under the T-shirt, was a rather chubby gut; it held an above-average amount of body weight, which the minuscule mage had to handle all at once. Another was her strong leg muscles - useful for kicking soccer balls, kicking people in the shins, and, as she'd just discovered, crushing and grinding little people into the ground.

This torture continued, her mind swimming with new ideas. Occasionally, she'd jump in the air, to see if she could hear his tiny shriek. At intersections, she turned on her heel, rubbing him across the brunt of her shoe sole. Once, she shuffled across a hall. He was smeared back and forth, unable to react to her rapid leg movements.

The terrified little boy made her feel huge; important. The floor tiled, lined neatly along the lookers, became like city blocks in her mind; the paste between them, like bustling streets. With her head lifted high, she continued forward, imagining in glee every bit of terror Blake was feeling. And that was only the start; she knew she could drill in deeper...

Finally, they reached the bench again. The girl lifted her foot up, to inspect the shrunken teen's mangled body. His gummy just as black as his shirt and hair. Blake himself was still breathing - loudly, erratically, in huge gulps. She laughed, resting the sole in her arms.

The shrunken mage calmed his chattering teeth, and gathered just enough thin air in his minuscule lungs to say: "P-please... Nora, stop..."

Her lips opened again, as if to speak - but then landed together again. Instead of words coming out, a liquid comet fell from her mouth. She just spat on him! The glob of saliva coated Blake's head, sliding into his own open jaws. This cured his catatonic state, if anything. He began struggling helplessly, brain yelling to unresponsive pink-covered limbs, helplessly sputtering out the bully's disgusting drool.

"Choking on drool? You've hit a new depth of pathetic." One of her fingers wiped a slimy stalactite from her mouth, before she licked it back in. "You should thank me. That's the only time you'll ever share spit with a girl. Now, how could a spineless piece of garbage like you survive chewing and stomping for so long?" She lifted her other shoe up, dangling it above his stuck body.

He didn't dare speak again - knowing that whatever he said would just dig him in deeper. Instead, he tried to clear his mind - ignore the shifting ceiling lights under the shadow of Nora's gigantic sole, ignore the faint traces of dirt raining down on him, and find a spell that would save him.

"Oooh, it's a secret." She chuckled. "I love squeezing secrets out of wusses."

Lazily, her left leg slid across the bench, and swung forward. The slanted shoe-ground erupted around Blake. All his thoughts were tossed out by a sudden surge of panic and pain. The bully was crushing his lower body between the tip of her left shoe and the heel of her right one. His eyes darted open, running across the tree trunk sized laces. He looked across them, up the smooth expanse of her half-bare legs, and into her own eyes, looking for a trace of mercy. Her chin rested in her palms, fingers puling up her cheeks - making her smile look catlike.

She rotated her ankle, drilling down into the gum wad - and grinding poor Blake's limbs and crotch into the worn-out, tough rubber. "Wow, it's fun just WATCHING you squirm, even if I can't feel you. I wonder how much more weight I can put on?" She slid the shoe further over him. In a disgusting display, the treads clung hard to her chewed-up gum, lifting it from the floor, and pulling with her sole. Now, his whole torso was being crushed by the sneaker's tip. And more of it crept forward, spreading the overwhelming mass over him.

A laugh filled the air. "Spill it. Spew it out. I want to know how you got so small, idiot - and how you survived." Even if she was grinning, the glare in her eyes and bared teeth reflected a boiling rage. "What have you got to lose? Your dignity? That's gone. Your chances at love were always doomed. What else - your life? Your friends? Come on! Five, four..."

He shook his head. This wasn't possible. The bane of his existence, towering over him... Trying to pry away his secret. This teenage girl, who he'd been trained to fear and avoid, had full control over his tiny body, the ability to mold him in any way. And she was seconds away from finding out his other life.

"Three, two... Time's almost up, shoe stain."

He felt naked before her, red with tension and pressure. Crying for help was useless. Worst of all, she was so happy about it - just getting so high off the ability to grind him into nothingness, send pain shooting down a human body with nothing but tiny flicks, twists, and steps...
15533222112.title: Gum on the Shoe

choices: ...into Nora's mouth and down her throat!
155332221122.content:
"WIND!!"

Blake had blurted out a spell. Almost immediately, a mighty gale (a slight breeze to Nora) blew in the puny mage's direction, powerful enough to free him from the constricting hold of his bully's shoe. The wind carried Blake like a fallen, lightweight leaf away from Nora as she stared in shock at what she'd witnessed. The little twerp had magic powers?

Unfortunately for Blake, he had no control over the direction or strength of the gust he'd conjured. Tossed and turned helplessly, the boy could only let the wind carry him through the halls of Opal High until it would wear off. But at least he was away from Nora and her astonishingly powerful shoe...still, where would he end up?

At one point, Blake collided with a thud into the ceiling as the howling gust dissipated. Dazed and uncertain, the tiny high-schooler quickly realized he couldn't stick to the ceiling, even after being stuck with Nora's chewed gum! And so he found himself falling, with no way to stop his course...

15533222121.content:
"Wha...what?!" Blake reacted with horror to Nora's words. Being stuck to the chubby girl's body like a mere tattoo? That was bound to be an unpleasant experience for the tiny mage. Before he could run, however, Nora flung Blake onto the floor, her victim landing right on his face with a thud.

The pudgy bully slowly removed her jean shorts and lowered her panties before smashing right onto poor Blake butt-first. Nora then pressed her butt cheeks into the shrunken boy's body for the next minute. While not physically painful, Blake was emotionally drained by his tormentor's rear squishing him like a bug.

When she felt she was done, Nora stood up and looked back and down at her backside to a sight she found hilarious -- Blake was now flattened and adhered to her rear end! The cruel giantess put her lower clothes back on, ensuring that her prisoner was out of sight, before heading on her way to biology class. Blake did try to scream for help, but his pleas went unheard from the walls of elastic and denim.

This was humiliating. Plastered to the behind of a girl he feared, and unable to do anything about it...or was he? Blake closed his eyes and focused deeply, in an attempt to will himself off of Nora's skin...
15533222121.title: Stuck on Nora's Ass

Nora reaches her destination and sits right back down on him again.
155332221211.content:
There was something downright infuriating about being stuck in a situation like this one. He wasn't in any physical pain, nor was he in much real danger, but despite that, Blake was still totally unable to escape under his own power. He was simply stuck fast to Nora's backside like some meaningless stain, restrained by little more than a few layers of fabric.

... He needed to relax. This wasn't really inescapable, was it? He ought to be able to free himself with the right method. The first step was to calm down. He could handle this once he was relaxed.
"OK..." he muttered to himself once he felt confident. Testing his movements, he found a few spots where he wasn't quite so firmly stuck. By taking advantage of those...

"... Yes!"
He'd done it. He was loose from Nora's skin now, so all he had to do now was move himself out of this hellish prison.
Nora's rear shifted uncomfortably with her footsteps. Wherever she was headed, it was reasonable to assume that she would be sitting down again once she arrived. That meant that where was a fairly limited window of time for Blake to get the hell out of here before he wound up trapped under all her weight once again.
He couldn't do much more than wriggle, but he was making progress, at least. Moving down was easier. He just needed to get free of Nora's jean shorts, and he'd be home free.
155332221211.title: Short time to escape

choices: He holds onto Nora's shorts for now, waiting out her journey.
He's done with Nora. He drops free right away.
1553322212111.content:
Compared to flying, wriggling wasn't a particularly fun means of travel. Still, the motivation to not end up flattened under Nora's ass a second time kept Blake going. He was definitely tired of being in here, and he welcomed an escape, so on he went.
Inching along, he had a persistent worry in his mind that Nora might figure out what he was up to. There was no way that she couldn't feel him tickling her down here. Still, she hadn't stopped him just yet, so he wasn't planning to stop.

 

As for Nora, her walk was a fun experience. Her mind was running wild with devious thoughts about what she could do to Blake later on, when she had some more free time. The puny little tickle he was producing as he struggled pointlessly against the weight of her ass was a perfect compliment to her plans.

She didn't have any idea that he was working his way toward escaping her as she continued on her way, a thin smile on her face all the while.

 

Blake's confidence increased once he was clear of Nora's panties. With one less layer in his way, he was moving slightly faster. Dim light could be seen now, piercing through his captor's jean shorts.
"Almost... just don't sit down yet..."
He found a slightly more resistant section in the denim. This had to be the end of his trip. He took a few breaths, trying to ignore the slightly unpleasant smell in the area, and pushed hard against the wall of fabric.
"Wh-whoa-!!"
He'd made it. He barely secured one hand on the outside edge of the shorts, finding himself dangling in the open air. He felt like cheering for himself, but doing so would only slow his escape.
So, what to do now...? He was finally outside of Nora's shorts again, but would it be better to drop away from her and run for it now, or hang on until he had a better idea of what she was up to?
1553322212111.title: Timely breakout

This escape wasn't going nearly as well as Blake had hoped for. He'd been too optimistic. Sure, he'd managed to start his way out from the interior of Nora's shorts fairly well, but he couldn't maintain that speed for long.
"Ngh... n-no, c'mon..."
He was stuck again. He stopped, trying another approach, and then another, but it was no good. He couldn't move. Nora's ass continued shifting to and fro with her steps, swaying gently and keeping him firmly stuck despite his best efforts.
He wasn't ready to give up, but things were looking worse and worse by the second.

 

Nora, on the other hand, was in a very good mood. She couldn't help but grin, wild streams of ideas for what she might do to Blake later on swirling around in her head. He was so puny that he really didn't have any chance to fight back against her, no matter what he tried. She could do anything she wanted to him...
The thought alone made a tingle creep all the way up her body. This was going to be very fun.
She was almost at her next stop. A classroom door was hanging open, waiting for her. She could still feel the tiniest of tickles from her shorts, where Blake was continuing to uselessly struggle inside of her panties. She giggled at the thought; her ass had to be the size of a small house to him.
She couldn't wait to sit down again.

 

Sore and straining himself to budge even an inch, Blake was desperate. Unfortunately, his cause appeared lost. He still couldn't move, and by now he was too tired to even put in a decent effort.
Whatever was going to happen to him now, he couldn't stop it.
Nora's footsteps changed a bit, and she stopped. Had she arrived at her destination.
Blake's stomach seemed to shoot upward inside him as he dropped quite suddenly, Nora's ass coming down like a meteor.

155332221221.content:
Blake felt a chill creep down his spine as the next phrase hit his ears. “Well, runt, starting today..” Nora paused to further torment him with the suspense. “... you get the honor of being my personal love toy for life. You’re even the perfect size for that duty. I swear you probably shrank yourself to that exact size just for me to give you that role.” Blake just stared at the chubby giantess in fear and a hint of confusion. “Don’t play dumb.” Nora taunts Blake. Though her tone sounded weirdly sweet, her expression told him all he needed to know. This girl was dangerous. “I know nerds like you get a little clueless but I know you’re at least smart enough to figure out what I’m telling you.”

Blake was literally shaking in Nora’s tight grip. The thought of being a plaything for the pleasure of this monster crushed him emotionally much like her hand was starting to do to him physically. With a loud scream of pain Blake struggled futilely to fight back against the hand. “Good you do have some fight in you. You’ll need it for the job.” Before he could act she dropped him inside her panties.

Blake took this brief reprieve to think about his horrendous situation. Of all the people to find him it had to be her. “You better do a good job down there lover boy.” Her voice echoed above. The nature of this task brought to mind all the times Blake heard that sometimes bullies of the opposite sex secretly have an attraction to their victims. The thought of him dating Nora made him cringe a bit as he thought of the hell she put him through for his entire life. Never letting up no matter what... and yet, the faint hope that that story was actually the case did flash in his mind. The slightest possibility that she likes him enough not to kill him, or she’ll maybe treat him slightly better, especially when he’s like this. Of course, Blake wouldn't dare to bring this up with Nora herself. That would get him a whole day as her punching bag for even thinking about it.

But what exactly is Nora’s deal
155332221221.title: Love Toy for the Bully

155332222.content:
How about that washup of a reporter/writer of that crummy tabloid in Blake's school's newspapers that investigates paranormal activity, conspiracy theory schtick, and tastless gossip nobody wants to read?

What was her name.... uh... oh. Lotta Mira, of 'Daily Dirty Laundry'!
155332222.title: Give us Dirty Laundry

choices: Hitch a ride on that cursed boot!
1553322221.content:
“SWEET JE….ese and crackers!” Blake yelled off the top of his lungs as a huge brown leather work boot barely missed squashing and splattering his small iddy biddy body by mere centimeters! The strong gust of wind from the impact sent him flying into some nearby grass, but he's unharmed. He may or may not have discharged his bladder and/or bowels from the sudden near death experience, but he's still fine.

He also may or may not discharged his bladder and/or bowels again as he tipped his head upward to gaze at the ginormous tall tower of a woman whose sporting the work boots that almost grounded him to paste.

Above, way way WAY above, was a black-haired girl in thick glasses wearing a fancy executive shirt and tie that certainly did not go well with her dark blue jeans and fucking leather work boots that almost murdered an innocent tiny human being! Even if Blake wasnt dumbstruck by the incredible size of the girl, he'd be kinda dumbstruck by that unique ability she's got with her hands.

She's scribbling a note on a notepad with one hand while carefully applying a little mascara with the same hand. The other hand's holding said notepad AND a little compact mirror to help her guide her as she's applying said mascara… and on her pinky, she's holding a coffee cup she's drinking out of WHILE scribbling notes and applying mascara!
That's pretty impressive. And you know what they say about girls that know how to use their hands!

...Theyre very 'handy'! (what, did you think I was gonna make a perv joke?!)

“Uhhh… are we gonna film something yet?” grunted the big balding towering beast of a guy with said handy girl carrying a camera and a huge box of camera equipment. It looked like it all weighed a ton, but the guy was pretty muscley, so he looked like he could handle it.

“Almost ready! I'm almost ready,” the girl said as she applied the finishing touches, “There! Could you pass me the mic and hold the rest of these, please?”
“Um… I dont have any free hands,” the big camera guy stated, “cant you put them on the floor.”
“But they'll get dirty,” she stated but sighed, “ok, fine.” She crammed her stuff in the box of equipment and pulled out a microphone with a logo marked 'DDL'. Blake vaguely recognized the DDL from school. It was in the school newspaper, but he never bothered to read that part of it. Fanatical garbage was never his thing.

“Mic check. One two. Mic check one two. Ward, did you remember to turn the mic on?”
“Yep,” answered Ward the cameraman, “Kept it on since the trial run back at your place.”
“Kept it on since…?! That was simply to test the audio back over there! Why would you leave the battery running for a whole hour and a half?!” the girl got understandably perturbed.
Ward seemed unbothered, “You never told me to turn it off afterwards.”
“I seriously have to tell you to… ugh...” she adjusts her glasses and forcefully shrugs it off, “nevermind. How do my glasses look?”
“Like the bottom of my dad's old antique coke bottles?” if Blake wasnt terrified of his current state, he'd be exhaling hard at Ward's simple-mindedness.
“Remind me later to take your name off the credits.” Ward actually replied “Ok”!

“Ok! Turn on the camera and start the countdown,” she ordered.
“Then what?” asked Ward.
“Say go!”
“Go.”
“No! AFTER the countdown!”
“Ok. 3….2..”
“Did you turn on the camera first?”
“No.”
“Then why are you counting?”
“You didnt tell me to-”
“Good lord, Ward!!” And it pretty much went on from there. As the two bickered, Blake edged a bit closer to the humongous reporter. He contemplated heading over to the two and trying to get help from them considering theyre within range. However the thought of being inadvertently stomped by a leather boot fought strongly against that idea.

Finally after what seemed like an hour but was actually a minute and a half, the reporter and her lacky finally got her stuff together.

“Good afternoon,” the reporter smiled for the camera, “this is Lotta Mira, reporter/senior writer/producer/editor/director for Daily Dirty Laundry. Giving you the real gritty dirty details those big networks wont dare touch. I'm standing here near the corners of Williams St & Maddison Ln, investigating an alleged top-secret government experimental program that's causing the latest disappearances.”

Blake squinted his eyes, intrigued by the potentially exaggerated news report.

“Quite a few students of local schools rumored to have gone missing have been reported to have last been seen in this street,” Lotta said, “though a few sources claim that it's simply fans of the occult casting spells gone wrong,” How does she manage to say that so casually?! “One source says some of these students were tricked and manipulated by government agents posing as gypsy fortunetellers.”
Blake squinted his eyes! Gypsy fortunetellers, huh? Come to think of it, wasnt it THIS particular part of the street where Blake met a guy who sold him a spell book?

“The source claims that these 'spells' these phony gypsies peddle are actually shadow-government approved experiments meant to test unreleased prototypes using gullible occult-fans as guinea pigs to try them out on.”
Blake gasped hard. It couldnt possibly be true, could it?! All that time he spent learning 'spells' and 'tricks'… was it really the government just experimenting on him?! And even worse! Are there more like him?! He needs to know more!

“Could what seems like a disturbing but completely harmless past-time gone wrong really be something cold, deceptive, and inhumane approved by our very nation's-”
“Uh, Lotta?” Ward interrupted Lotta's report, “what does a little red blinking X-ed out tape mean?”
“It means there's no tape in the camera. Why do y-” Lotta's eyes widened behind her big glasses, “Ward, did you seriously forget to put tape in the camera?!”
“Uh… probably,” Ward dumbly answers, “...was it supposed to that one sitting on the table back at your place with the letters 'DDL' on it?”
“Obviously!” she remarked, “where is it?”
“...Sitting on the table back your place.” JEEZ! HE'S REALLY THAT DUMB?!
Surprise to no one, Lotta's jaw dropped at the shock of pure dumbfoundedness before her!

“HOW COULD YOU HONESTLY FORGET-ugh!” she took off her glasses briefly to rub your aching head, “well, let's get start heading back! Thanks Ward for sabotaging my ginormously big scoop!”
“Youre welcome.” And with that, the two gathered their things and got ready to head home.

Blake still contemplated following them finding out more about this whole secret government experiment schtick. His biggest opportunity came in the shape of that colossal boot that almost crushed him. He could hitch a ride and find an opportune time to introduce himself to Lotta.
Provided he doesnt slip off and ends up getting crunched underneath that boot, first! His fear of such a horrific death were overshadowing discovery and potential (hopefully) help.

Despite his fears, this was opportunity and opportunity was about to leave.
1553322221.title: Kick 'Em When Theyre Up, Kick 'Em When Theyre Down

15533222211.content:
Now or never, Blake decided. The tiny mage took a leap of faith and grabbed onto the back of Lotta's boot, causing the giantess to pause in her tracks.

"Something wrong?" Ward asked.

"Huh? Oh, it's probably just a bug or something trying to climb up my..." Lotta looked down and shook her boot, causing puny Blake to lose his hold and fall to the ground. The towering reporter's eyes looked upon him as he got up and waved meekly to her.

"Oh...my...gosh..!" Lotta scooped up the miniscule boy into her hands. "C-could it be...an actual tiny person?!"

"Y-yeah..." Blake stammered shyly.

"Ward, I'll catch up with you later..."

Ward nodded and continued on his way, still carrying the news equipment.

"So it's true..." The reporter began to speak. "I can't believe I'm actually talking to a shrunken person right now! The world needs to know about this infernal government experiment!"

"Actually..." Blake sighed. "I don't think that's such a good idea. What if I get captured and subjected to more tests? Besides, I really need to get to Aria -- "

"Well...I guess you have a point there...it'd probably bring the Dirty Laundry ratings down, anyway. In the meantime, I'd best keep you on my person. I'll put you..."

"Of course," the gigantic goggle-eyed sorry excuse for a fake news reporter exclaimed, "My hands will be tied and I wont have any free pockets cuz I'll be busy carrying the rest of the stuff that idiot didnt lug with him." After seeing her carrying around all those things in her hands earlier, he's inclined to believe her.

"What about one of your sleeves?" Blake asks, "I'm sure I can hold on snuggly in one of them."
"I'm carrying a couple of rolled up notes in these," Mira stated, "sorry."
"Well... what about your hair?" he pointed up above her hair, "surely, I could hole on your hair strands and-"
"Of course not!" Lotta quickly turned that idea down, "I spent almost an hour trying to perfect my hair for this moment! Do you know how much hair spray I had to use to keep it so well conditioned like this?" Cant really argue over it at this point. Blake knows how women are with their hair.
"Uh... um... how about um... your... uh.... blouse?" Mira gave Blake a cold stare after that suggestion, "...I'm just kidding! I'm just kidding!"

“Look, you have nothing to worry about Mr. Summers.”
“That's not my name!” Blake interjected.
“It'll be your alias name for when I give you a silhouette interview,” Lotta explained despite you not even agreeing to any interview whatsoever, “anyways, Mr. Summers, you have nothing to fear. I use flouride-free toothpaste and gargle with herbal antibacterial mouthwash, so you have no chance of contamination in my mouth.”
“THAT'S NOT EVEN WHAT I'M AFRAID OF!” he shouts his objection.

“Anyways, just remain under my tongue and try not to squirm too much,” the fake news anchor says to the tiny man she's about to cram in her mouth, “see you at the discussion table, Mr. Summers!” She gave little Blake a quick energetic smile just before her lips parted and little Blake could see a dark reddish slimy abyss his poor little insignificant body was being dragged towards!

“W-W-W-WAIT STOP DONT I DONT WANNA-” his screams fell on deaf ears before he was dropped into Lotta's mouth. Fortunately, her long slimy tongue lifted giving space for the new passenger to land on the wet gummy floor underneath. His screams quickly got muffed as soon as the tongue pressed down on top of him, trying it's damndest to keep him at bay. It was the only thing keeping him from slipping away to her throat as she gathered her remaining things and rushed off to catch up with Ward!

Blake attempted to scream for Ward's help, but there was no chance he could hear him. And even if he could, there was most likely an even smaller chance he could save him.

“Uh… Lotta?” speaking of which, Blake heard Ward's voice call out from outside the pearly white flouride-free washed cavern.
“WHAT IS IT, WARD?!!” Strong storm forced winds shot out from the direction of the throat and the large tongued constantly shifted and turned over Blake's body as Lotta replied back.
“I kinda sorta… got to thinking,” the big bald dope mulled, “if this report really is real, and that the government is using it's governing for evil running a human guinea-pig lab… what if they find out about the report? Wont they try to hunt us down or something?”
“Of course they will,” Lotta answered, “they probably got bugs hidden all across the block. I wouldnt be surprised if theyre trying to record our conversation right now.”

“They are?!” Ward got a bit spooked, “UH! MR. OR MRS. GOVERNMENT PEOPLE! IF YOU CAN HEAR US, PLEASE DONT KILL US! WE DIDNT EVEN GET TO GRADUATE HIGH SCHOOL YET!” Blake groaned under the weight of the abominable tongue.
“Dont worry Ward!” Lotta assures him, “they wont be able to hear us. I've put special chips on every single piece of equipment we're carrying that blocks off any and all verbal surveillance from unsecured sources! I could shout out the combination to your dad's vault safe and they wouldnt hear a thing!”
“Uh, please dont. He'll kill me. Oh! Uh, I DONT MEAN LITERALLY, MR OR MRS. GOVERNMENT PEOPLE! HE DOESNT KILL PEOPLE LIKE YOU DO! ...Ah crap.”

“This is gonna be a long walk isnt it?”mumbled little Blake.

“Anyways, I got another question,” Ward speaks up again.

“SPIT IT OUT!” the combination of the winds and tongue pummel Blake a bit, making him wish SHE would 'spit it out'!
“If our report does get big attention, I mean like BIG big attention,” cueball corrects himself, “how are we even gonna prove all this stuff is happening? Ya know, Principal Ashwynn said he was gonna expel us if we cause another big scandal without any evidence.”
“Oh ho ho. I got proof,” Lotta chuckled. Unfortunately, that little chuckle was a big mistake. For that little chuckle rattled her tongue a lot, lifting it's massive weight off Blake as he bounced around the dark cavernous room with absolutely no protection! Sadly, his screams fell on deaf ears.

“You do?” Ward jerked his head to her in full attention.

“YEP!” Lotta quipped as the 'Yep' sent him flying towards her teeth, “YEP I DO!” Blake barely managed to miss the molars which wouldve no doubt crushed him into paste in just three simply syllables!

“What do you have?” Ward asks.

Lotta tilted her head a little smugly… causing the mouth chamber to tip downwards and sending Blake toward the dark abyss! He ran like the dickens across that wet slimy tongue desperately trying to keep away from the throat of no return… but then her tongue constantly bounced him around as she continued talking!
“It just so happens I've discovered what may very well be the most compelling evidence anyone's gonna find that's guaranteed to put our story all over national television!” Blake got chucked around, twisted, spun, and rolled about repeatedly via Lotta's simple bragging.
“What kind of compelling evidence?” Ward questions.
“VERY compelling,” Lotta's 'Very' was emphasized so hard, her tongue flung Blake up in the air and he hit the roof her mouth! “Like SUPER!” Fling into the cheek. “ULTRA” Fling into the other cheek. “ONE HUNDRED PERCENT!” Fling fling fling FLING everywhere, “Completely undeniable evidence!” Fling fling fling HOLY CRAP WATCH FOR THAT MOLAR Oh thank god! “I cant wait to see what kind of B.S. explanation the CIA or NSA has to come up with to explain what I got right here!”

“FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS HOLY, JUST SHOW HIM WHAT IT IS!!!” Blake screamed off the top of his lungs. By the time that bouncy ride had ended, his poor little body was left hanging way too close to the back of the mouth. His hands and fingers scrapped across the tongue trying to get away from the gaping throat!

“Alright alright! I gotta know!” Ward got interested, “What is it? Tell me!”

Blake hoped Lotta would show instead of tell, because he didnt think he could last much longer at this rate… his grip is slipping… and that pit behind him is opening!
155332222111.title: Receiving An Oral Thrashing
