1553322221112.content:
"No, no, NO!!"

Blake entered a state of panic as he lost his grip on Lotta's tongue while the giantess reporter continued to talk on and on about this great scoop. The tiny mage slipped helplessly into the abyssal throat of his captor and was swallowed whole with an accidental gulp.

"You OK?" Ward asked as Lotta put a finger to the squirming lump sliding down her esophagus.

"Ward, I...I think I might have swallowed our evidence..." Lotta replied sheepishly.

"What was it supposed to be? A tiny person or something?"

"Actually...yeah, kinda."

Blake was forced through a tight sphincter before finally falling into the depths of Lotta's stomach with a wet plop. It smelt of Caesar salad in here, and the heat made Blake feel like he was in a deadly version of a sauna. The walls of his organic prison pulsated steadily, and a sickly green lake bubbled with acid close by. Now more terrified than ever, the shrunken boy rushed to the nearest wall and pounded on its fleshy surface repeatedly, screaming for help.

Back in the outside world...

"This...isn't good..." Lotta stated with embarrassment.

Ward placed his ear to the reporter's belly and heard tiny cries of distress coming from within. "Guess you weren't kidding...I think I have that ipepac syrup with me, so you can puke the little guy out."

He quickly fetched a small bottle from his bag, which Lotta grabbed almost as fast before downing the contents of said bottle.

Blake turned as he heard a liquid splash into the stomach, which he recognized as...
1553322221112.title: The Inside Scoop

15533222211121.content:
He recognized the familiar incredibly strong putrid smell that made whatever Lotta hadnt finished digesting in her stomach seem pleasant in comparison! The foul odor quickly tortured his nostrils and came incredibly close to triggering his gag reflex! It was no doubt ipecac syrup. Just the harsh nauseating stench gave him flashbacks of him swallowing a spoonful of that crap on a triple dog dare a few years ago. He NEVER took another triple dog dare in his life after that no matter how much he was called a chicken!

And Blake wasnt the only one who disagreed with the stuff. Lotta's belly rumbled and groaned harshly, almost painfully! It didnt want that nasty ass stuff inside it anymore than Blake did! With the rumbles and groans came the rough earthquakes that shook the chamber about, tossing the poor little guy and whatever leftover undigested breakfast all across the organic bounce room!

Outside, Lotta was clenching her stomach painfully.
"Ouuuuuchh..." she groaned in pain, "oh god... I... I think it's working! Ward, quick! Get a wastebasket!"
"Ok. Then what?" Ward asks.
"B-Bring it over here!"
"Ok. Then what?"
"JUST DO IT!"

By the time Ward finally put his remaining brain cells to action, tiny little Blake was already being forced up the endless tunnel that was the esophagus with leftover chunks of pancakes, bitter coffee, and noxious barf-juice following him. No matter how many showers he'll have after this whole episode is over, he'll NEVER feel clean ever again! He'll be lucky he doesnt suffer a case of PTSD after this is all over!

"Oh god! URP! OH GOD! How could it possibly work so fast?!" Lotta was retching, "Urkkk!! Jesus... Christ... Ward where's the damn wastebasket?!"
"Got it here! Got it here! Hang on! Hang on!" Ward finally rushed back to the room with a wastebasket in hand, "Ok, let 'er rip."

Blake didnt get time to admire the creepy cavernous mouth one more time before he launched at mach speed out of Lotta's body along with the contents from her stomach being spewed out both her mouth and threw her sinuses.

"Graaacchh GRRAAAACCHH!!" Lotta didnt just spit up her vomit. It burst out of her insides like a puke-breathing dragon! Everything that came out was wet, chunky, slimy, and unrecognizable! And poor little Blake was caught in the middle of it, drenched head to toe in pure yuck at the bottom of that wastebasket! He was relieved to be alive and out of that two-bit reporter's stomach, but he certainly wasnt happy.

Speak of the devil (and she shall appear), up in the sky he spotted the colossal coke-bottled glassed accursed reporter he was previously crammed inside gazing down at him with her bald-headed lummox of a sidekick staring down as well.

A moment of awkward silence (besides the faint gurgles of Lotta's gut) passed before finally the failed reporter's assistant opened his mouth.

“Uh… is THAT guy the compelling evidence you were talking about?” he dumbly asks.
“No Ward. I was talking about the OTHER shrunken guy I found on the ground and accidentally swallowed,” she responds sarcastically. Ward peered into the wastebasket.
“I dont think he's out of you yet,” spouted the colossal morning, “want me to get the ipecac again?”
“WARD… ssss...” Lotta breathed heavily, counted quietly to three, and regained herself, “just… just sit over there in the corner, ok?”
“Ok. Then what?”
“Then stare at the freaking wall. I dont care.”

So Ward went over to the corner and stared intently at the wall, leaving Blake and Lotta alone. Despite the little humorous scene between the two, Blake was in no mood to laugh. He was pretty darn pertubed. He had just been carelessly stashed away in that humongous reporter's mouth, accidentally swallowed and nearly digested in her stomach, then puked back out, drenched head to toe in foul smelling godknowswhat.

“So...” Lotta attempted to break the ice, “how are you feeling?”

“Like I wanna jump back down your throat and rip you open from the inside,” Blake answered truthfully.
She nervously laughed. “Heheh. Sorry about that. Guess I got a little carried away, there. I mean it's not every day somebody just randomly stumbles upon a once in a lifetime miraculous discovery that could very well change US history as we know it!”
“I just came out of your stomach!” little Blake gave zero fs, “I have your predigested breakfast all over me!”
“Alright, alright. Dont panic. We'll get you cleaned up in a jiffy,” Lotta assures you, “anyways, Mr. Summers, before we get started with the interview, there's a few things we need to go over.”
“Well you can forget about it, Lotta,” Blake cut her off, “because I aint doing an interview.”

“What? B-But you agree to do it earlier!”
“No, I never said I did,” Blake had a good memory, “and even if I did, I dont anymore!”

“You cant just cut out,” Lotta tells him, “this is an investigative emergency of utmost importance! A lead to potential inhuman experimentation of innocent civilians by their own government! If we dont get the news out, more people like yourself will fall victim of this!”
“I'd play you the world's smallest violent, but I think it's still stirring in your gut,” the shrunken puke-covered boy did not care, “just let me go and I'll pretend none of this ever happened.”

“You cant leave,” she says, “not after what you just witnessed. You know too much. Youre a target now.”

Blake eyed that cocky giantess eerily, “Are you threatening me?”

“No, the government is!” Lotta explained, “you think theyre just gonna let one of their victims wander off and run the risk of exposing their nefarious plan to the public?” She shook her head, “Nope! They'll hunt you down and do whatever is necessary to silence you!” Blake glared up at the two-bit reporter and… got to thinking. What if, and it's a BIG if, she's right? What if this whole bogus story she's spewing along with her breakfast is actually TRUE? That's… ugh… he couldnt believe he's actually considering it!

“However, with a little help from Ward (VERY little) and a couple of my most trusted sources,” Lotta offered, “we could offer you the protection and sanctuary you need until the crooked Deep State mafiosos are finally exposed and put in their place! Provided you agree to the interview, of course.”
Blake wanted to say something… but he couldnt. He just let her keep talking.
“Also,” she added, “once this story makes the big time, I promise you a good share of the revenue for your cooperation. A big fat 20%! How's that sound?”

Blake thinks, reluctantly considers it, weighs the pros and cons in his head, then finally makes his decision.
15533222211121.title: Regurgitating Old News

choices: ...swallow him again! But this time, she won't puke him out!
155332222111212.content:
"I'm sorry, Lotta..." Blake decided with a sigh, "...but I won't be doing an interview today."

The giantess reporter stared quietly for a moment, taking a good minute to process the tiny boy's refusal of her offer. Her soft smile gradually turned into a disappointed frown.

"Look, Mr. Summers," Lotta said firmly, "I'm going out of my way to get you the protection you need from those Deep State goons!"

Blake was beginning to lose his cool. "For the last time, my name isn't Mr. Summers!!"

"Whatever. You're less than an inch tall, and you can't protect yourself from an army of agents much bigger than you!"

"Whoever said I needed protection? I'm a growing young man! Your story is nothing but a lousy hoax, anyway!!"

Blake's words hit Lotta harder than any insult she may have ever received before. She was used to being called out for dressing differently from other students, but calling her big scoop a hoax? Not once had the reporter dealt with such a thing. Normally, Blake was the one to be pushed around, but this time, HE was the one who'd stooped low. After a momentary pause, Lotta spoke again.

"...you know what? Why should I believe what someone your size has to say?! This is my biggest scoop yet, and I'm sticking to it! So GET USED TO IT!!"

Witnessing Lotta fill with rage, Blake's own anger quickly turned into fear. "I-I'm sorry, Lotta! I didn't mean to -- "

"Shut it! Like it or not, I'm keeping you in my custody. This is for your own good..."

The shrunken mage cowered as the towering young woman snatched him up, before proceeding to...
155332222111212.title: Never diss a giantess. EVER.

choices: Tell Lotta to stand on her head.
Tell her to start up the interview.
Insist that Blake's going out the natural way!
15533222211123.content:
Lotta felt awful concerned that she was feeling a gentle cooling sensation in her stomach. That's completely opposite of what she SHOULD be feeling after swallowing ipecac! In fact, it's concerned that she's not so much as dry-heaving at this point! Combined with that the rather minty chalky taste she was still tasting on her tongue and it all added up to one thing: Ward is a fucking idiot.

Ok, TWO things! Ward gave her the wrong drink AND he's a fucking idiot!

The veteran rookie fake-news enthusiast kept her cool facade going. She let her face go blank, nearly emotionless, she took a deep breath, took off her coke-bottle glasses and rubbed her eyes a bit, then turned her attention to her partner.

"Ward... are you absolutely sure what you gave me was ipecac?"
"Uh.... yeah?" Ward answered in the form of a question. That casts doubt in his alibi.
"Are you absolutely 100% without a reasonable sure, as God as your witness?"'
"I.....um.... think....?" and he's even more unsure, ".....either that.... or it could be dad's old bottle of Mylanta-"

*TINK!!*

That loud tink meant Lotta chucked the bottle in his face! Even Blake from deep down inside Lotta's minty milk pool-filled belly could hear that bottle bounce off his thick skull! Of course it wasnt surprising that he was feeling Lotta's body shiver with anger what with the tremendous earthquake going on within the chamber that was causing massive Mylanta tidal waves!

"YOU. FUCKING. IDIOT!!!!" Blake not only heard his swallower's echoing roar, he felt it amplify all around, still tossing him back and forth in the uneasy Mylanta Ocean! "Are you not already aware that your horrendous screwup is putting my potential interviewee's life in jeopardy?!"
"Er.... no?" Blake could even hear Ward's slightly nervous response in the distance. On the plus side, the digestive acids that wouldve no doubt melted down his body into nutra-paste by now have completely calmed . No bubbling, no outrageous heat, just mellow sticky fluid now drenched in antacid.
Granted, it's still not a very pleasant experience for him. Now he's soiled head to toe in chalky white stuff and the chamber reeks of rotten food and altoids! But he had to admit, he just dodged a much MUCH worse situation. Also, he accidentally swallowed some of the antacid which is actually helping ease his upset stomach!

"Honestly!! How do you manage to screw this up?!" he overheard Lotta continuing to vent at her side-kick, "It almost seems as if youre TRYING to sabotage my story! Almost as if… you could be a mole!”
“I aint no mole, Lotta! I swear!”
“Yeah youre right… nobody would wanna hire a mole THAT dumb!”

“Sheesh, get off his back, girly!” Blake could mutter to himself, feeling a little bad for Lotta's mistreated lackie. Despite having it far far FAR worse than the big balding dumdum outside the chamber of muck(raker), he couldnt help but share some sympathy for the big lug.

“Ahem… Uh… Blake? Are you still there?” no time for that now. He just heard his ginormous chamber owner call out to him, “if youre still alright, PLEASE give me a sign! Anything!”
“Yeah! I'm still alright!” Blake shouts back, “I think the antacids kinda saved me. Still dont enjoy being inside you, however.”

“I am really REALLY sorry about this!!” Lotta apologized, “my idiotic partner said he had ipecac for me to spit you back up but it turned out it was just Mylanta.”
“Well to be fair, your idiotic partner wasnt the one who thought carrying me in his mouth was a good idea!” Blake had to remind her.

“Thanks, Blake,” he could overhear Ward thank him in the distance.

“WARD!” Lotta raised her voice again for a moment, but quickly gathered herself, “just stand over there, watch the camera equipment, and dont say another word!”
“Then what? ...OOPS! Right...”

That concluded the Lotta and Ward's Duo Comedy Bit for an undisclosed period of time. In the meantime, the attention focused between the interviewer and the tiny interviewee still trapped inside the belly of the interviewer.

“D-Do not panic! This is just a very small minor setback!” Lotta assured Blake, “I'll figure another way to get you out of there safe and sound! Then we'll get you washed up and prepared for our interview that'll uncover the biggest governmental coverup since Pizzagate!”
“Pizzawhat?”
“Story for another time!” the colossal reporter changes the subject, “anyways, since Ward's clearly no help, I guess it all comes down to me getting you out of there.”

“Ok,” Blake bites, “what's your plan?”

“…..Well….” Lotta thinks, “we're kinda short on PROPER medicine. And I'd rather not swallow something rotten and risk making myself sick for real. Hmm… do you think you can climb out by yourself?” And WARD is the stupid one?! Blake cant even see the tight opening up in the ceiling he was expelled through, let along can he climb the squishy gummy and definitely unclean walls to reach it!

“No,” was his polite answer. “it's way to high. And climbing is out of the question.”

“Ok, what if I were to stand on my head?”

“HUH?”

“You say it's too high, right?” Lotta explains, “so if my stomach were just upside-down, obviously you'd reach the opening to the esophagus because it'd be BELOW you instead of ABOVE you! So alls I gotta do is stand on my head, let gravity take it's course, and you just squirm out of my throat and bingo! Youre out of me! ...Sheesh, it seems so easy, how come WARD couldntve thought of that idea?!”

Yeah, it seems pretty easy. But something told Blake it aint. You know, what with the muscles in the esophagus moving food downwards and stuff… but it could be worth a try.

“Um… I dont know...”
“Well… I… kinda dont want you coming out of me the OTHER way,” she says with obvious embarrassment on her face, “and I'm pretty sure you dont either…. you get what I'm saying?”

“Saying what? You talking about pooping him out?” asks the tactful Ward.

“WHAT DID I JUST TELL YOU ABOUT SAYING ANOTHER WORD?!!”
“DONT say another word? ...Oh, right. Sorry…. uh, do THOSE count?”
“SHUT UP!!”

Even without Ward's interference, Blake certainly understood what she was saying. Though to be fair, the thought of exploring the human body did kinda interest him. It's like that one episode in the Magic Schoolbus, only the trip WOULD be finished! Sure, he'd be getting pretty dirty, but he's kinda already dirty! He's already covered in stomach muck, expired stomach acid, and antacid milk. How much more filthy could he get!

“Or heck! Why dont we wait on getting you out and just do the interview now?!” Lotta spoke up, breaking his train of though.
“Wait! Now?!”
“Yeah! I mean, I'm sure I could write up a good backstory to cover the incident!” she insists, “on your search for help, you accidentally slipped and landed in my bowl of cereal through no fault of mine and it wasnt until I heard your tiny squirming for help inside me that I conveniently discovered a victim of a huge governmental experiment I was investigating for so long! See? It writes by itself!”

Blake was not amused by that idea. It also sounded pretty dang surreal to be true even if he WASNT the particular victim she was talking about!
“I'm not sure that's a good idea.”
“Are you kidding?! It's a perfect idea!” Lotta disagreed, “but ok… as a proper apology for my assistant's foolish behavior, I'll let YOU choose what we're going to do.” Oh how fucking generous! And WARD's foolish behavior? “Personally, my professional opinion is to just get the interview over with now while I still have a great idea in my head, but it's up to you!”

You heard her, Blake. What's your choice?
15533222211123.title: Good Help Is So Hard To Find

choices: “I was hit with a shrink ray!”
“Some goons put me in a weird dryer!”
155332222111232.content:
With a heavy sigh, Blake gave the reporter his answer. “Alright...we can do the interview now.”

“Sounds like a plan!” Lotta responded before grabbing a microphone and tape recorder from...well, her interviewee had no way of knowing where they came from, given he was currently in her stomach! She started recording and held the mic close to her midsection. “Testing, testing...1, 2, 3...Mr. Summers, can you hear me in there?”

That name again?! Well, Blake was in no position to object, either way. “Yeah, I can hear you! Can you hear me?”

“Loud and clear! OK, first question: what exactly was used to shrink you down to size?”

Aw, man...throwing out the big guns already! Blake quickly became nervous and jittery, but he also knew he couldn’t keep Lotta waiting too long...
155332222111232.title: Starting the Interview

155332222112.content: Where does she put him?
155332222112.title: Other options

1553322221121.content:
Lotta, the two bit news journalist ended up dangling our poor little protagonist's tiny body behind her. Or rather, dangled our poor little protagonist's tiny body over her behind! Blake didnt get much chance to admire how round and shapely Lotta's backside was mainly because he was staring nervously at what was waiting for him down below in her back pockets! A lot of pencils and pens sticking out of those back pockets! Conveniently with their potentially jagged pointy ends facing upwards like pikes ready to impale the poor little shrunken boy and display him as a warning to any evil government agents plotting to invade Lotta's impenetrable posterior of justice!

He cringed with fear of such a terrible thought, then looked up at the colossal news reporter who was looking back with a nervous blush.

"S-Sorry," she apologize, "I think that's the only place that still has room for you."

"W-w-w-well, in any other circumstance, I definitely wouldnt be complaining," Blake had the audacity to stutter like the closet perv he was, "b-but I-I dont think this is a good idea! I mean I'm not saying I dont like it. It really is nice to look at! But... But at the same time, it doesnt look safe!"

"Look it'll only be until we get back home," she assured him, "I promise I'll be very careful if I have to sit down... now relax and hang tight!"
"No wai-OOPHH!!" Lotta rudely crammed little Blake deep in her back pocket riddled with pencils and little eraser heads! His tiny body was shaken around as he was shuffled somewhere in the tiny pile of eraser heads. On the plus side, Lotta was careful not to prick him on any of her pencils. On the minus side, it was dark, humid and uncomfortable what him Blake being pressed against a firm and squishy wall! Even at his size it was pretty cramped.

"Try not to move around too much or make much noise in there," Lotta held her pocket open with a finger to warn just before snapping it shut, "p-please dont tell anybody I put you in there. ...And if you say ANYTHING about it smelling, youre gonna wish I hid you in the OTHER place!"

"Lotta? Why are you talking to your ass?" Blake overheard Ward overhear.

"ERRPP!!" Lotta flinched and cringed, causing the tight space Blake was trapped in to squeeze up incredibly tight against the firm and squishy wall! "N-Nevermind that! Why are you still here? I told you to go on without me!"
"I kinda forgot the way back to your place," Ward shamelessly admits, "and my phone died so I cant use GPS."
Lotta sighs and relaxes her body, which in turn relaxes her glutes, which in turn relaxes the damp uncomfortable chamber in the back pocket Blake was in! "Alright, c'mon." And she walks with him.

As she walks with a rhythmic sway in her hips, the back pockets rocks back and forth to the tune of her sway, shifting the items inside rapidly with the pace. It wasnt long before Blake got sick of being knocked back and forth between pencils, erasers, and the pant-wall just in front of her ass! It wasnt a pleasant ride by a long shot. Erasers kept moving around, burying him in the pile until the sway sent him smacked against the pant-wall and back again. Lotta and Ward had a conversation to pass the time, but because Lotta wouldnt stop walking (or at the very least stop swaying her backside like she did!), Blake couldnt overhear it what with the sounds of rustling pencils and erasers!

It was also pretty humid. The heat Lotta's butt was giving off was seeping into her back pockets, warming up her tiny passenger like a hot sauna! And Blake kinda had a bit of a sweating problem when it came to hot temperatures. Mix harsh sweat with strong smelling eraser material and well... it's not a pleasant smell. Whether Blake even wanted to help the gigantic reporter in the first place didnt matter at this point!

"To hell with this!" he muttered as he climbed out of the eraser pile and attempted to climb up one of the longest pencils in there. It wasnt an easy climb, cuz the pencil shifted side to side every once in a while cuz of Lotta's walking. Still, he continued his trek up until he finally felt the cool fresh air of the outside world hit his face again!

Too bad the brief relief lasted no more than a second before he saw how high above the ground he currently was! As soon as he looked down, he silently gasped in horror and almost lost his grip! He quickly turned his head to alleviate his fear of heights and focus only on the sight on the gigantic reporter he was behind and her enormous ass in jeans in which he was currently in the back pocket of, and the tantalizing rhythmic side-to-side sway that her jean-clad ass was moving that was rocking him back in front in the back pocket!
The perverse arrousal did a good job taking his mind off his fear, but it didnt make him any safer!

"For the last time, stop worrying!" Blake overheard Lotta shout to her cueball companion, "We wont get expelled for this. My research is 110% legit!"
"But I dont think it's possible to be more than 100% legit," Ward complained, "also, dad said that if I get kicked out of school he'd send me to join the Marines."
"And did you ask him what kind of dad would leave his kid's fate in the hands of the Military Industrial Complex?" Lotta remarked.
"Uh... no... I figured this whole report is uh... complex enough."
"Well, I swear on my honor as a proper journalist you dont need to worry about any of that," she assures him, "I've already acquired proper evidence to nail the Deep State mafiosos for good!"
"What is it?"
"I cant tell you right now."
"Why not?"
"Cuz out here, the agents could be listening in our conversation as we speak!"
"Oh. Uh.... ok... do you think any of them heard the conversation with your ass?"

Speaking of which, Blake, overhearing said conversation from said ass, was making the most cringiest face he possibly could. Was this girl for real? He was heavily beginning to doubt this conspiracy theorist whacko. What was he thinking actually believing for a second that all that bullshit about government agents disguising as gypsies to experiment on people and disguising it as magic?! At this point, MAGIC made more sense!

It was at this point, he picked the absolute 110% (SHUT UP, WARD!) wrong choice to come to THIS girl for help! He'd be better off leaping out of her back pocket and find someone else's curvy jean-clad ass to swing from!
However, that was easier said than done. It was an awful long way down and Lotta seemed in no mood to stop walking until she reached her destination! The risk of going splat seemed to heavily outweigh whatever Lotta and her bumbling camera guy had in store for him.

Then again, Blake has no clue whatsoever the conspiracy nutjob has in store for him! What if when she interviews him, he doesnt tell her what she really wants to hear and gets suspicious or even suspects HIM of being an undercover 'Deep State mafioso'?!
Maybe the climb down wont be so bad. And she most likely wont notice he's out of her pocket what with damn near everything else in there she's feeling!

Blake took one hard look down at the several dozen foot drop, then took one hard look at the back of the news anchor, then one hard look at the swaying behind in tight jeans he was currently riding.... then made his decision.
1553322221121.title: A BEHIND the Scenes Look

choices: "Go ahead. We're in the clear right now."
"I'm afraid we don't have enough time."
15533222211212.content:
Despite the spirits' gift of immunity to physical damage, Blake ultimately decided to stick around in Lotta's back pocket. Better than being completely lost, right? The tiny mage endured the whole cramped ride to Lotta's place, even as pencils and erasers poked at him (thankfully non-lethally). It didn't take too long for Lotta and Ward to arrive at her pleasant-looking middle-class house. Not one car was parked in the driveway, so Blake figured that the reporter's family were at work...or something.

Lotta fetched her house key from her other jean pocket, opening the door for herself and her assistant to enter the living room before swiftly closing the door behind them. Closing the blinds to conceal the group from any suspicious eyes, the fake news anchor reached into her back pocket for her little bit of evidence.

Blake briefly flinched as Lotta's lithe yet enormous hand reached into his prison, but the shrunken young man quickly realized that his captor was his only salvation for the time being. Steeling himself to be revealed, Blake allowed the towering woman to scoop his puny form out of her pocket and into the open, Ward's eyes widening as Lotta displayed the tiny, live evidence atop her palm. Said evidence waved meekly.

"Wow..." was all Ward could manage to utter.

"Those Deep State goons are TOAST!" Lotta smiled. "Now, let's get this interview started..."

"W-wait!" Blake chimed in. "This is all happening so fast!" Interviews always did frighten the poor guy. "C-can I have a minute to practice?"

Lotta pondered momentarily, wondering if she should allow her tiny subject to rehearse before his big moment. On one hand, a well-practiced interview would boost Daily Dirty Laundry's ratings...but on the other, what if those Deep State mooks are in New Opal already, snuffing out all who dare to expose their plans?

Making a decision, the reporter spoke at last.
15533222211212.title: Prepping for the Interview

choices: ...hops off and makes a break for it!
...freezes as soon as he ears the sound of a car enter the driveway!
155332222112121.content:
Fortunately for Blake's sake, Lotta considered that giving her special guest interviewee some time to practice was more beneficial than forcing him to get the interview over with as soon as possible. In actual professional interviews, the special guest being interviewed is given time to look over the questions he/she is about to be asked and for quality sake, retakes and editing in post-production was a must. If she wanted this big scoop to be just that, she needed to ensure quality, otherwise no one would tune in and all this nasty business would be swept under the rug and the Deep State would win. Like it ALWAYS does.

Not to mention, perhaps she could use some extra time double-checking that the room is absolutely 110% leak-free!

"Ok, go ahead," Lotta answered Blake's request, "We're in the clear right now... might as well spend a little extra time making sure we stay that way." With that, she rustles through her pockets, rummaging for something. She sticks her hand in one pocket... then another... then a back pocket... "Ow!" then nearly pricks her hand on one of the pencils that almost impaled you... then she checks under her shirt... "Here!" and finally pulls out a stack of note cards from her bra! Little Blake blushed, hoping she didnt notice him staring a little too hard, but since she pretty much gave him an up close experience with her ass, what difference does it make?!

"These are the questions I'm gonna ask," Lotta placed a few of her note cards on the table, "use the time you have to study them. But dont study TOO hard... I might not use some of the questions. Heck, I might think of one or two last minute, so be prepared for that, ok?"
He eyed one of the huge note cards uneasily, "O...ok."

"While youre doing that, Ward and I will be leak-proofing the room," she insists, "Ward, go get the aluminum foil!"
"Huh? What for?"
"I need you to foil all the windows."
"Uh... why?"
"So their waves can seep in!"
"Waves? What waves?"
"The radio frequency waves! How else do you think theyre able to spy on us?!"
“Uhhhh… maybe… hidden… cameras?”
“...Hm. We should probably check for those too.”

Lotta rushed over to her comrade in arms and a long frustrating explanation regarding secret agents and radio frequency that quickly made Ward looking almost as uneasy as Blake did.
As for Blake, he was still contemplating sneaking out of the house and trying to find someone else to help him out. This was not gonna be a fun experience for him. As if the journey to the house of this two-bit conspiracy theorist posing as a reporter wasnt awful enough (Blake took hate-filled glances at Lotta's backside while she drilled her associate, loathing the time he spent being smacked against it deep within her jean pocket, remembering with dread the repeated agony it gave him with each sensuous sway back and forth, being brutally pummeled from inside the confines of her backside that swung so rhythmically eye-catching to any onlooker from outside... ok, seriously Blake! Seek help!) but to be subjected to such mind-numbing drivel written on the huge note card is something else!

Some of the text was a little hard to read what with Lotta's fancy cursive trying to look too much elegant and not enough LEGIBLE... but the stuff Blake could read left a nasty feeling in the pit of his stomach. A whole lot of questions he not only not knew the answers to, but questions he had a feeling he shouldnt be taking the time answering.
Undiscovered types of experiments and torture methods that the government is allegedly involved in.
Names of people in high ranks of the government who would no doubt sue Blake and his family for libel after hearing the allegations asked.
A damning allegation stating that the mayor knows of the disappearances but is blackmailed into silence because an agent caught wind of his affair with a high school student!
Something about the Sword of Jerusalem and Rods from God but you couldnt make out much from the fancy cursive.

"...Charlotte Heart?!!" Blake managed to read out a very familiar name in the middle of the fancy cursive gobbledygook, "how does she know my grandma's name?! ...What does grandma have to do with all this?!" Alright, THIS was getting a bit too personal! Poor little Blake had no idea how this conspiracy nut would know anything about his family or how much she knows about them and at this point, he'd rather NOT know!

If Blake needed any more conclusive reason not to go through with this stupid interview, he'd be brain-damaged! The only thing remotely close to convince him to go through with it at this point would be to compensate him with another free ride in Lotta's back pocket but WITHOUT all the pencils and pens crammed in there first!

And knowing such a tempting offer will most likely not be offered, he's pretty much already looking around for a quick escape. The front door is locked tight (not like he could open it himself) and it didnt look like he could squeeze through the crack underneath. Maybe there's an alternate way out down the hallway not too far away. Hopefully he'd at least have plenty of hiding spaces until he can find a way out. The coffee table he was standing on wasnt too high and the soft carpet is sure to cushion his fall.

Taking a deep breath and giving that voice in his head a nod, Blake...
155332222112121.title: Practice Makes Perfect!

1553322222.content:
Every evil doers sometimes needs a helper, so let's introduce Raven's silent student: Shysie Tacita

Shysie Tacita

Age: Unknown (Possibly 17)

Height: 5'10"

Appearance: Shysie is an average tall, slender mysterious mage girl who dressed in long black dress with hood to conceal her head, a mask to cover her face, gloves, black stockings and heeled boots.

Personality" Shysie is a very quiet and silent girl who follows orders from her master and doesn't seems to have no emotions...that is until meeting Blake, she starts to show little emotions.
1553322222.title: Accomplice/Student of the evil Raven

choices: Yes, and she scoops him up!
15533222221.content:
Blake became nervous when a mysterious giantess walked toward him -- she wore a long black dress, black stockings, dark heeled boots, white gloves, a hood that covered her head, and a dark mask that brought masquerade balls to mind. This combination of clothing could only mean one thing...

This was Shysie Tacita, the apprentice of the evil witch Raven!

"Oh crud..." Blake said to himself. "I gotta get outta here before Shysie sees me!"

Suddenly, Shysie stopped walking and looked around. Did she hear something? Like...a certain mage's tiny voice?
15533222221.title: Raven's Quiet Apprentice

choices: Aria and Vixen, good chance to get their attention!
155332222212.content:
Blake's heart just stop when Shysie heard his voice and looks around to locate the voice. When no time to thinking what to next, Blake quickly dive under the door which leads to a library before her booted foot stamps down where he used to be, haven't seen the tiny mage yet.

Scurrying across the carpeted floor, the tiny mage spotted a giant size furniture filled with books that people who work here roll the books to its sections and it may be a good hiding place for him until that woman calls off the search...

As Blake begins climbing up to the first self, he heard the door open, causing the mage to climb faster and hid behind a large book once he makes it. Blake peers his head around the edge of the book and find to see...
155332222212.title: Hidden from Evil

1553322222121.content:
Just when he thought the coast was clear, Blake felt a dainty yet large hand grasp his tiny form. The mage squirmed and struggled, but was helpless as he was brought toward the face of his captor.

"Shysie..!" Blake panicked.

"Hello, little mage..." Shysie said, coldness in her voice. "Did you honestly think hiding behind a book would save you? Well, you're in for it now! I think I'll..."
1553322222121.title: Shysie Always Catches Her Victims...

15533222221211.content:
"...Dispose of you."

Even at Blake's diminutive height, even right next to the chill of her lips, her whisper was barely audible. She'd made no sound as she swooped him up. The bookshelves just swooshed past his gaze as she pulled him up. Even with her eyes shaded by the mask, he felt as if her gaze was piercing through him. How did she track him down here, behind this book, in this library? Why was nobody else around? And how was her grip too firm for even his specter-enhanced strength to escape? He screamed out, but found his mouth covered by the gloved thumb. Soon, the delicate phalanges tightened around him. They squeezed his tiny limbs on every side, and snuffed out all the library's warm lighting.

Shysie Tactica was curling her fingers into a fist, trying to squeeze her target to death.

The miniature mage resisted, all four limbs forcing back. He found each end sinking into the white, leather-clad expanse of her hand. Blood pulsed through his miniature veins, each working against the compression. Ever twitch of her titanic wrist or immense fingers, even the pinky, dug deep into his bones. His mind flashed back to biology classes, where he learned how intricate human hands could be with their movements. And by the way the digits flexed here, each dainty thing making precise movements to hit his weakest spots, he could tell that his captor was trained in using them for intricate spells and rituals.

The immense fist uncurled. Blake was still in one piece. Panting desperately, sweating like a pig, but completely intact. Far from the red speck that she expected to see upon opening her hand. In fact, from the widened eyes, he looked even more surprised at his survival than her. Shysie's lip remained a flat line.

The glasses-clad mage called out: "P-please... You don't know what you're doing!... This isn't..."

Again, her fingers curled. Blake felt his torso pressed harshly into the tip of her middle finger, while her ring finger held his legs in place. Together, they pinned his back into her palm. His teeth gritted. The apprentice's thumb sunk onto his head, ruffling his dark hair into the material. It pushed deeper on him. Then pulled off, and pressed on. The twitch from her thumb bore all the emotion and ceremony of someone clicking the button on a retractable pen. Squeezing down, she twisted his head in a circle, the unbreakable hold on his chest still compressing his breaths. Like a weight on his lungs...

Shysie had moved to a new disposal tactic: trying to snap Blake's tiny head off his neck. He saw the library's distant ceiling lighting fly by his specs, followed by the carpeted floor, the books, and the dark robes. Her digit's spirals became larger, faster - but still carefully controlled and timed. The miniature captive felt as if something would crack any second; but each time it came close, something held it back. Something kept his body in place.

It was, he realized, the curse from the ghosts. Their spell gave him flexibility and firmness that spared him from a quick, snappy death. His neck would stay on. But Raven's student wasn't relenting.

The library door swung open. She paused. Her whole body turned to face them, hood not even folding slightly. A crowd of students bustled in. Probably people looking to study.

Shysie's whisper was still barely audible: "Shade." She opened her palm, and threw her arm to the ceiling. Blake flew out of the glove, along with a murky ball of mist. The woman before him then slammed her hand down, as if smashing an invisible table before her. He barely dodged her fingers. The swirling magic above spread out over them like a curtain unfolding as he fell.

Thankfully, the carpet permitted Blake a soft landing. When he looked up, the mist had shifted to magic runes surrounding the two in a dome. He could see the incoming people at normal size spreading around; a mix of familiar faces and feet, parts of his natural background, all towering above him. The boy screamed out. Nobody heard, or even looked towards them. The Shade spell hid both Shysie and Blake from prying eyes and ears.

He got up and broke into a sprint forward, only to be met with crushing pressure on his back. Even her stomps were silent; she used only her boot's toe section to squeeze down on him. All the wind exited his lungs in a single puff, pushing him against the floor. He made a valiant attempt to crawl away, which was thwarted as his hunter pulled her leg back. It brushed his face against the carpet fibers, tickling him The muscles in her towering, slender legs, kept pushing the witch's entire weight on him. Back and forth, the stockings swayed, heeled boot below manipulating the smaller magician with the greatest of ease.

Gasping for air, the miniaturized teen had it all pushed out with every tap, jab, push, and tilt of her ankle. Nobody could even see them - some people were gathering around bookshelves, walking right by, or staring right at them without spotting the cloaked girl and the tortuous motions. It became a rhythm, the black heel grinding him into the ground. Soon, he got a feel for the painful, precise tempo. Taking advantage of a pause in Shysie's twists, he took a shallow breath and screamed:

"Quake!"

The "Quake" spell wasn't one he had much practice with. Casting it made books drop from shelves and knocked everyone nearby on their backsides, even at low levels; not things that helped him hide his identity very well. But as long as he was in Shysie's veil from the "Shade" spell, nobody would be affected but the black-hooded titan herself. And she took the full blow of it; having only one heeled boot to balance on, it knocked her right off her feet. Her bosom hurdled down towards Blake, catching it in her shadow.

He took a hard gasp, and dashed forward. Noticing a shadow before him, he made a sharp turn - just as his opponent's hand hit the carpet, breaking her fall. It was so close that he only just squeezed between her gloved fingers, shaken up by their impact against the ground. They would have squashed him again had he not made the sidestep.

Her other hand loomed above, ready to grab. No time to wait. Blake's little feet hit the ground. His arms pumped. He cast a gale spell, dodging her snatching palm - and flying in the air. Right next to her face, keeping its neutral expression. He just had to position his fall right, to escape the cone, get help from one of the others...

"Freeze."

He stopped. Right in midair. Gravity had no control over his body. His arm muscles, which were just repositioning themselves, felt as if they were paddling through molasses - then concrete. He froze completely, unable to move.

She took one glove off. Her bare finger brushed across him slowly, feeling cold to the touch. It lifted goosebumps across the back of Blake's neck. The prodding mass kept pressing at different spots, as if teasing him. And there was nothing he could do but hold his breath.

Shysie finally spoke. "A protection spell." Her hands flew out in a series of complex motions, tracing pentagrams across the little boy. "Shatter."

A magic arrow with inscriptions in a foreign language pierced him. He felt nothing. She squeezed the boy again, testing his strength. The bare fingers made him shiver again, his mind shouting out telepathic messages to try and reach anyone.

Another few words from his captor: "No changes. Too strong." She sounded about as fascinated and alarmed as someone discovering that the price of cafeteria lunches just increased by five cents.

A stronger wind pulled him in from behind. Shysie was sucking in, pulling the boy closer to her mouth. The gaping mouth came closer and closer, about to snatch him from the skies. He squirmed harder, almost feeling one finger getting less numb. Her teeth glowed gently in the library's light. His neck and eyes failed to move much, forcing him to see every detail of the mouth. Clean, empty, the tongue resting carefully between teeth. If only he could move. Darkness came over him... A single jaw muscle budged. Just a bit more...

Blake mentally shouted: "Beam!"

His hands, still frozen, couldn't aim the light that emerged from them. It flew at her mask. The ray had enough strength to tip the dark mass off her face. Shysie's facial covering pushed him down, knocking him from out of the air, sending him crashing to the ground. And it covered him completely.

Suddenly, he heard a soft moan. His arms regained feeling.They could grab the carpet fibers. That surprise attack must have broken the spell! He looked above to see the mask as a ceiling, fitted perfectly to cover Shysie's face. Through the eye hole, he glimpsed his captor covering her face with one cloaked arm. The other grabbed below for her mask.

"Don't look. Don't look, please." She was still whispering, but now - there was a shiver in the way her breath released itself.

He ran out, trying to escape the Shade cone once again. Her hands crossed the floor haphazardly, in an unpredictable pattern. As it crashed down, one finger tapped Blake's face, knocking his glasses clean off.

Darn it. He couldn't lose those. He felt around on the ground for them, almost thankful for the cone hiding them. None of the people studying would be able to see the mages each fiddling around on the ground for their eyewear.

Blake found his first - not having such bad vision. But as for Shysie... Her movements were much quicker. She knocked down some books, pounded the ground again and again, and pulled the hood further on her face. "My mask... My mask..." It was obvious she was having trouble expressing herself. "Raven... Raven..."

He realized that his legs weren't moving. He'd been gawking over her cloak twirling and twisting. Seeing her so desperate was odd. Then again, the whole situation was strange, having just faced death and came out unbreakable. Still, he had no idea what other spells she could try; so he ran for help.
15533222221211.title: Silent Executioner

choices: "...I have two teenage daughters who'd enjoy you!"
15533222221212.content:
Blake's heart sank in response to Shysie's words. She planned to bring the little mage right to Raven, the witch who'd been out to get him for a few years now! Before he could even protest, though, Shysie conjured up a mystical purple smog that slowly dizzied tiny Blake until he blacked out...

...

The shrunken boy slowly awoke in the palm of someone's hand. Once fully conscious, he took a good look at the person holding him...purple dress, pale skin, dark hair...

Blake gasped. "Raven..!"

"That's right, little man!" Raven teased. "You're mine now. I hope you don't have any plans tonight, because..."
15533222221212.title: Blake's Eternal Rival

155332222212121.content:
“...you look delicious at your size!”

Raven’s words made tiny Blake’s heart sink. She was plotting to dispose of the mage...by swallowing him alive?! Fearing for his life, Blake tried to run, only for his giantess rival’s fingers to curl into a fist, trapping the boy in their grip.

As Blake squirmed and attempted to escape, a thought suddenly occurred to Raven - her pet octopus, Inky, hadn’t eaten very much today. Nothing but boring old crabs. Perhaps a more lively meal in her tank would have her kraken up...

Heh...kraken. Get it?

Chuckling to herself at her joke (and Blake’s struggles in her fist), Raven walked closer to Inky’s tank, torn between who should have the honor of ending her enemy’s life...
155332222212121.title: Whose Meal Is He, Anyway?

155332222212122.content:
Blake couldn't mask his fear any longer. If Raven herself was dangerous, he could hardly imagine how perilous it would be to end up stuck with one of her teenage daughters!

From what the mage recalled, the elder of Raven's daughters, Crystal, was 14 years old, had dark hair, and wore a light blue dress. She would occasionally throw fits but was more mature in comparison to her sister Gemma -- a 13-year-old brunette who wore a red dress and had...special ways of making her mother's foes disappear.

Poor little Blake futilely squirmed in his captor's grip as she walked upstairs toward her daughters' bedrooms. He shuddered at the thought of falling victim to Crystal's exhausting demands or Gemma's voracious appetite. Raven made the tiny boy's fate clear when she called out to...
155332222212122.title: Crystal and Gemma

1553322222121221.content:
"Oh, Crystal!" Raven called to one of her daughters. "Mommy has a special little something for you!"

A dark-haired 14-year-old girl in a light blue dress rushed from her room all the way to where her mother was holding tiny Blake in her fist. Raven opened her hand, which gave Blake a chance to finally breathe, and lowered her captive so that the teen could get a better look at her gift. Squealing with delight, Crystal let out a series of rapid thank-yous before swiping Blake and talking him into her bedroom. The bedroom had a regal appearance to it, with blue wallpaper and fancy-looking furniture -- the bed looked especially luxurious.

"So, now that you're here..." Crystal smiled, placing her prize on her white, wooden nightstand. "My name's Crystal, and you belong to me now!"

Blake couldn't help but quiver in terror. "P-Please, Crystal...I just want to see Aria!"

"Tough luck, little man! My room, my rules. So you have to do what I tell you, WHEN I tell you to do it. First things first, I want you to..."
1553322222121221.title: A Teen’s Tiny Slave

choices: "You gotta be out of your mind!"
15533222221212212.content:
A huge empty growl emits from Crystal's stomach, giving her a snickering smile as she realizes what she could have Blake do first...

"We're gonna have so much fun in so many ways soon, but I'm starving right now, so you're first order as my new slave is to feed yourself to me!" Crystal sets her mouth next to the edge of the nightstand and opens wide. Her warm breath washes over Blake as he sees her salivating tongue eagerly waiting to taste him.
15533222221212212.title: Serving as Food

155332222212122121.content:
As if the gurgles of Crystal's stomach weren't frightening enough, Blake trembled before the teenage giantess whose mouth was wide open and ready to get a taste of his tiny body. He could see the pitch-black darkness of her throat, the glistening of her saliva, and even the taste buds atop her eager tongue. Needless to say, the tiny mage turned and made a run for it.

Unfortunately, Blake crashed into something that immediately halted his escape. An invisible barrier. Crystal had erected magic walls to trap the shrunken teenage boy in her possession. He pushed and pushed, but was unable to thwart the transparent barrier. The only way to go was into Crystal's mouth...to his doom.

Nervously treading onto the giantess's slimy tongue, Blake briefly reeled from the warmth of her breath. As he made his way closer to the lightless pit ahead, Crystal closed her lips to seal the tiny mage in darkness. The slippery beast of a tongue proceeded to toss his puny body around his captor's mouth like a piece of Halloween candy. After roughly a minute, however, the girl grew bored and tilted her head back.

Hearing a delicate gulp, Blake panicked as he slipped into Crystal's gullet, whole and entire. His tiny, tasty form was squeezed through the tight esophagus before being forced through a small sphincter and finally falling into his tormentor's stomach with a splash. If Crystal's mouth was warm, her stomach was like a corrupted sauna! It also smelt of dissolving candies in this organic prison. Though it was hard to see in here, Blake could barely make out the pulsating walls, as well as a bubbling, greenish lake of acid nearby.

On the outside, Crystal gave her belly a few good pats. "Mmm, that was SO good! I wonder what I can do with him next..."

What happens from here?
155332222212122121.title: A Reluctant Snack

choices: Blake tries to get Crystal to burp him back out
1553322222121221211.content:
Blake traversed the cavern of Crystal's belly. Amidst the acid lake, he could almost make out the forms of very-melted candies...Raven's girls did have a great affinity for sweets.

But, he can't be one of them! There must be a way out. The tiny mage punched and kicked at Crystal's stomach walls, hoping for some sort of reaction that would lead to his escape.

*BUUURRP* Crystal burped as she thought up new ways to have fun with Blake. She could feel him moving about in her belly. It gurgled softly.

"Havin' fun in there, huh?" The girl teased, "Think you can get me to burp you out or something? Ha! I'd like to see you try."

Blake, at first disappointed that his struggles produced such a rude and unhelpful result, suddenly became intrigued...if Crystal is indeed suggesting a challenge, could this be part of her game...and potentially mean ejection from this sauna from hell?
1553322222121221211.title: Confined Within Crystal

1553322222121222.content:
“Oh, Gemma!” Raven called to one of her daughters. “Mommy has a special present for you!”

A brown-haired, 13-year-old girl in a red dress rushed from her room all the way to where her mother and Blake were. Raven handed the tiny mage to her preteen daughter, who squealed with joy before letting out rapid thank-yous and taking Blake back to her room.

Gemma placed her tiny prize on her nightstand a put a finger to her lips. “What could I do with you..?” She mused, before hearing a low gurgle that startled little Blake. Gemma put a hand to her taut little belly, before looking back at the shrunken boy.

“You’re...you’re planning to eat me?!” Blake panicked.

“Well, of course!” Gemma confirmed to her snack-to-be, much to his horror. “But, not in your current state. I want something...sweet. Ooh! I think I’ll turn you into...”
1553322222121222.title: A Teen’s Tiny Treat

choices: Blake is digested and absorbed into Gemma's abs
Somehow, Blake survives Gemma's system the whole way
15533222221212221.content:
Blake's heart sank in response to his teenage captress's words. She was going to turn him into gum for her to chew?! Fearing for his life, the tiny mage turned and ran, only to be hit with a paralyzing hex as Gemma waggled her finger. If he weren't numbed by the spell, Blake would feel the most bizarre tingling sensation as his limbs vanished into his body, which gradually turned a light pink. In little time at all, his human features were no longer visible -- he was now a helpless piece of gum.

"That's more like it!" Gemma smiled, plucking up the little gumboy and raising him toward her lips. "Alright, in you go!"

Without further ado, the red-dressed girl tossed her transformed prey past her parted lips and onto her moist tongue. Despite lacking noticeable eyes, Blake was still very much aware of what was happening to him -- Gemma's tongue eagerly moved his sweet form onto her teeth, which proceeded to squish and crush him again and again, until he was little more than a mashed-up, whimpering wad of gum. Soon, Gemma grew bored of the gum's flavor and tilted her head back, swallowing poor Blake with an easy gulp. She felt him slide all the way down her neck, past her developing breasts, and into her needy belly, which she gave a few happy pats.

Blake was unable to resist as he descended down Gemma's esophagus before landing in her warm stomach with a splash. The fleshy walls pulsated steadily, and the greenish sea of acid began to bubble. Digestion was starting!
15533222221212221.title: Yummy Gummy in Gemma's Tummy

choices: Gemma works out her abs, making Blake unable to focus
Gemma puts in a navel piercing, sealing Blake in her abs
155332222212122211.content:
Despite Blake’s best efforts, he was not able to defend himself against Gemma’s stomach, and he rapidly began to dissolve, beginning to black out. This wasn’t fair. No way… It couldn’t end this way… could it? Before Blake could think any further, his vision went black and he passed out.

When he came to, something was very, very different. There was dim light filtering through… something. He wasn’t sure what it was, but the environment was very different from the complete darkness of Gemma’s belly. Blake tried to move, but found he was completely unable to. A moment later he felt something smack against him.

“So you’re awake huh?” That sounded like Gemma’s voice. It was coming from somewhere above him, but he wasn’t sure where.

“You’re probably a little confused, so let me show you what’s going on…” Blake saw whatever it was blocking his view lift up, and he saw Gemma’s reflection in a mirror. He didn’t see himself though. All he could really see at about his eye level was--

“You’ve merged with my stomach!” Gemma giggled wickedly, lifting up a hand and patting Blake several times. Blake stared in horror at Gemma’s abdominals. That was him? That was where he was? No way! He had to find a way out! Blake tried to struggle with all his might, but aside from the most minute of muscle twitches, couldn’t budge Gemma’s abs an inch. A grin spread across the girl’s face.

“There’s no use trying to escape. You’re merged with me now. You’re just a part of me.” Blake felt Gemma press her hand against what was now effectively his face, and begin rubbing it in a circle. Blake begged to differ. He could always use magic to free himself, right? It might take a little to gather it up, but he was sure he’d read a spell to escape his current situation! But before he could think too much about it, he heard Gemma start to speak again.

“And if you’re thinking about using magic… You’d better do it quickly. I’m not an ordinary girl after all. Mom taught me a few tricks. You see….” Gemma paused. “Hmm… Should you even have a name anymore? Nah. You’re just my abs.” She told him, with a grin. “But… now that you’re part of me, I can absorb your magic. It’ll take me a little while… about as long as it will take to finish digesting what’s left of you. But once I do that, you won’t be able to tap into your magic anymore. No escape. You’ll be a conscious part of my belly forever~ And making me even stronger. So…. Thank you!”

And with that, Gemma pulled the top of her dress down in front of Blake’s view, hiding him from the world again. He felt her beginning to walk off again, with a skip in her step. So this… this was the fate that had befallen many of Raven’s other rivals? Turned not just into nutrition but into a sentient power boost for her daughter? Blake knew he didn’t have long to figure out the counterspell if what Gemma had told him was true. He devoted every inch of his mental focus to trying to escape this scenario!

But was Gemma going to make it that easy for Blake?
155332222212122211.title: Soul Trapped

choices: Blake manages to recite the spell
Gemma gets hungry, puts the ring down, and eats some sweets
Too late - Gemma puts the ring on her belly button
1553322222121222112.content:
“Gemma, let me out of here! HELP!!” Blake screamed desperately, squirming within the girl’s abs and causing more tiny goosebumps in the skin of her stomach.

Gemma simply slapped her dress-covered belly, silencing the movements of her internal captive. “Stop wiggling around in there! You’re not getting out of my abs anytime soon. In fact, I’ll make sure of it. And what better way than with a belly button piercing?”

Blake’s heart turned to stone at the latest words to come out of Gemma’s lips as she approached her jewelry box. She was going to put in a navel piercing?! From his conversations with the spirits, Blake remembered that magic and metal don’t always mix - a piercing adorning his prison would act as a lock, preventing him from using magic to escape from Gemma’s abs!

Gemma shook her hips a bit as she opened her jewelry box, enjoying the power she now had over Blake. Pulling out a cute silver belly button ring, the teenage titaness lifted the top of her dress, revealing the approaching ring to her terrified prisoner.

Blake needed to remember the separation spell. It was now or never!
1553322222121222112.title: Put a Ring On It

choices: Blake ends up as someone else’ abs!
15533222221212221122.content:
Yet, try as he might, his brain simply couldn’t find the words he so desperately needed. Disjointed bits and pieces it brought forth from his memory, but without the spell in it’s entirety, there was little chance of escaping his tight prison. All he could do was watch as Gemma’s fingers brought the metal piercing that would entrap him, possibly-forever, closer and closer until…

…

… it stopped right in front of his “face”.

“Actually…” He heard Gemma hum as he watched her pull the ring back. “I think I’ll help myself to some sweets first. It’s no fun just rushing a moment like this.”

Gently, she popped the ring back into it’s box, but left the lid open, leaving the silver decoration exposed. For easy access later on, but also likely a purposeful and twisted reminder to her captive of his eventual fate. It was, after all, the last thing he saw before her dress fell over him once again.

In the dark, Blake’s mind scrambled through itself to put the separation incantation back together. A hard task that grew harder when he felt Gemma begin to move. With every step she took, she shook her hips from side-to-side in a clearly exaggerated manner. He could feel the movement’s vibrate up into her belly – and by extension, into him, it’s inhabitant – and silently he cursed himself at how good they felt coursing through him. He needed to remember the spell fast.

With a wide smile on her face, Gemma ceased her hip-shaking steps when she reached her bed. Squatting down, in the process squishing her belly, she reached beneath the furniture and pulled out a large bag of jellybeans from the darkness underneath. She couldn’t help but smile smugly at the sight. Her mother had been trying so hard to ween her off them that she destroyed all Gemma’s stashes hidden around her room… except for the one in the most obvious place of all. She chuckled.

Her snack now secured, Gemma crawled onto the bed and got herself comfortable, laying on her back with her head on her favorite pillow. Her finger floated down and slowly shifted her dress out of the way, giving her a nice view of her now free tummy. She dangled her bag of sweets above it.

“You like sweets, don’t you?” Gemma asked, before answering for her prisoner. “Of course you do. You’re part of me now; I like sweets, so you must like sweets!” With gusto, she opened the bag and immediately shoved a handful into her mouth. A part of her wanted to take it slow, to torment her prisoner more, but damn, she just loved jellybeans.

Behind him, Blake heard a splash as the first clump of jellies fell out of Gemma’s throat and into her stomach. At first, he dismissed it, choosing to focus back on the more pressing matter of escape. But then came another splash. And then another. Then another. Gulp. Splash. Gulp. Splash.

Then her stomach rumbled. Responding to the food dripping in, it came to life with gurgling roar as it began to pump digestive juices into the organic sack. With those juices came movement. The awoken beast behind him flexed over and over, intent to marinate and compress the jellybeans down into an absorb-able slurry for her intestines. Blake was rocked violently with every pump. Bounced with every pulse against his will within the confines of Gemma’s abs. If concentrating was hard before, now it seemed impossible. And from the blissful look of Gemma’s face, she seemed to have no intention of stopping anytime soon.

Weakly, he cried out, barely hear-able over the storm in her stomach. “G-Gemma… please let me out…” He doubted he could make her stop. But if he could stall her for a just little bit… “I’ll do anything…”

Gemma paused, sparing the jellybean that dangled over her lips for the moment, and glanced down at her belly. “Anything?”

“A-Anything!” Blake cried, louder than before and sounding more desperate this time. Her noisy gut was already calming down from only this slight pause. If he could get her to pause for a bit longer… “I-I’ll be your slave! Y-you can turn me into any sweet you w-want and eat me w-whenever you want! Or into clothes to wear! Or any part of your body! Just, please don’t… don’t absorb me!”

The teen’s lips pursed in contemplation. A slave could be nice, she thought as she turned her gaze towards the ceiling. Someone to boss around, have her way with, to do her homework for her… It was definitely a tempting idea. But her eyes fell onto the jellybean still dangling above.

“… Nah.” Was Gemma’s response. She let the lonely jelly fall into her mouth and swished it around, preparing it to join it’s friends below. “A cute slave would be nice and all, but getting rid of you will make Mom reeeally happy. Not to mention the magic power I’ll get from breaking you down!” After a quick swallow, she gave her gut a few soft, almost-comforting pats. “So I’m gonna keep you in there til you’re gone, okay? But don’t worry, cutie; I promise I’ll make your last days very enjoyable.”

Her prisoner was silent. Gemma rubbed him in a reassuring manner, then helped herself to more of her sweets.

But Gemma was wrong in thinking Blake had fallen silent in defeat. He had known from the beginning that such a request was doomed to failure. Blake was silent from his own success: the few seconds of calm from Gemma’s thundering gut had given him enough time to remember!

Quietly, Blake let the incantation spill forth. “__________!”

And with it…
15533222221212221122.title: Gemma's Secret Stash

15533222222.content:
There IS another girl I forgot to mention...she recently transferred to Opal High from somewhere in Japan!

Yuki Winters

Age: Unknown (she looks 16)

Height: 5'8"

Appearance: Yuki wears brown boots, white gloves, and a light-blue dress with a hood that conceals her black hair. She is fairly slim.

Personality: Not much is known about Yuki at all, since she rarely speaks to anyone at school. Some say she's up to no good, others say she's just extremely shy. But there's one thing that none of the students at Opal High, not even those of magical origin, seem to know...she's a youkai who wields ice magic!

So, how about it? Will Blake end up meeting Yuki?
15533222222.title: Blizzard Beauty

choices: "...I see we have traits in common."
"...why would you do such a thing?"
155332222221.content:
Blake suddenly felt a sharp chill in the air around him. The tiny mage shivered, wondering what was making him so cold on a nice, sunny day like this. Turning around, he saw an unfamiliar giantess wearing brown boots, white gloves, and a light blue hooded dress...

"What was her name again..? Yuki?" Blake thought out loud. "Oh...she's that transfer student from Japan, isn't she? I wonder if she'll help me..." The shrunken boy then started waving and yelling up to the towering Japanese girl, hoping to get her attention.

Yuki's cautious walking paused as she swore she heard a tiny noise...it didn't sound like a bug...looking down, the giantess was surprised to see a small, waving figure on the floor by her feet...

"A tiny person..?" Yuki reacted before delicately scooping puny Blake up into her hands, raising him to eye level. "How did this happen?"

Blake gulped nervously. "W-well...I'm a mage...I made a deal with ghosts to toughen myself up, but it came at the cost of my size."

Yuki stared silently for a moment, before replying...
155332222221.title: Blake Meets Yuki

1553322222211.content:
"Traits in common..?" Blake reacted to the giantess's words. "Are you by any chance...a mage?"

"Well...kind of..." Yuki responded timidly. "I wield ice magic, so I suppose that makes me a...cryomancer."

Cryomancy...that was one branch of magic Blake hadn't explored yet. And judging from her speech and tone, Yuki seemed rather small...even from Blake's perspective. Normally HE was the shy one at Opal High, but this girl...she was quite possibly the shiest in the whole town of New Opal.

"Cryomancer...I've never met one before..." Blake said nervously. "What's your name?"

"My name?" The Japanese giantess blushed. "It's Yuki."

"I'm Blake...nice to meet you."

"Likewise. So why did you make a bargain with the unliving?"

Uh oh. The one question Blake did NOT want Yuki to ask. Lying wouldn't do him any good...but, neither would the truth...would it?
1553322222211.title: Talking with Yuki

15533222222111.content:
Ultimately, Blake decided to reveal the truth of his shrinkage to Yuki - after all, she'd been fairly open to him about her ice powers. It was only fair.

"It's a long story..." Blake proceeded to explain, "...but basically, I asked the spirits to toughen my body up in an effort to impress Aria, a girl I like. Unfortunately, this deal came at the cost of my size..."

Yuki stared silently for a good minute at the tiny boy in her gloved palm. The Japanese exchange student seemed mildly interested in him...but then he stated that he had feelings for someone else. Although, she thought, it might not work out between her and Blake anyway, with her actually being...

She shook her head, dropping the idea. "I see...well, at your current height, it may be difficult to travel alone. Perhaps it's best if I carry you around..."

Even though Blake had just met this girl, he didn't seem intimidated in the least. She had a trustworthy air to her...or was it just a cool aura leaking out from her hands? "That works!" Blake smiled softly. "Where exactly do you plan to put me?"

Yuki blushed a bit, mulling over her options. "Maybe I should put you..."
15533222222111.title: Opening Up to Yuki

155332222221112.content:
“...in one of my boots.”

Blake blinked in surprise, trying to process Yuki’s words. She planned to hide him in her boot?! The shrunken boy wasn’t sure how to feel about all this.

“My apologies, Blake...” Yuki faltered. “I’m just concerned that you might end up lost if I keep you under my hood, or get swallowed in my mouth...”

The tiny mage shivered at the thought of falling out of Yuki’s hair, or being accidentally gulped into her stomach. Now that he thought about it, being in a giant boot was one of Blake’s safer options. He nodded in approval.

The Japanese cryomancer then lowered her hand and tipped it, sliding Blake into her right boot. Puny Blake slid towards Yuki’s sole and prepared for uncomfortable warmth and foul odors...but he faced the opposite - the air in Yuki’s boot was shockingly chilly, and no sweaty stench surrounded her foot! Perhaps this was one benefit of being tiny with an ice mage...Blake smiled softly and closed his eyes, somewhat enjoying his current situation.

Yuki walked a fair distance with little Blake in her boot, eventually encountering another girl in the school hallway...

Blake noticed a towering figure walking his way - an unfamiliar giantess with long silver hair, crimson eyes, and a pale complexion wearing a long-sleeved shirt, white gloves, and long pants. She looked like the shy type, but Blake didn't realize that this woman, Kaya Coluan, was 50% machine. The tiny mage ran up to the giantess and waved for her attention.

Kaya walked through the hallway of Opal High cautiously, always on the alert for hostility. The cybernetic girl's left foot stopped extremely close to what looked like a bug, and her movement stopped. Looking down, Kaya scanned the strange creature before quickly scooping it up into her hands, raising it to eye level.

"A tiny...human?" Kaya reacted with curiosity.

"H-hello..." Blake stammered nervously.

"I had no idea people could become this small...what is your name?"

"M-my name? It's Blake."

"Interesting...my name is Kaya. In all honesty, tinny persona - um, I mean, tiny person - I am not fully human...I am partially mechanical. In essence, I am a cyborg."

"Gosh..." Blake was unable to hide his amazement.

"However, I have no desire to possess mechanical quirks that conflict with my human emotions. Trying to become fully human has been a difficult endeavor..."

Blake almost cried at Kaya's tale. Her mechanical half was clashing with her organic side! He couldn't take this sitting down.
